THE BREAKDOWN TRIANGLE - AN OUTDATED CONCEPTIWARN® - YOUR SECOND LIFE IN THE BOOTWARNING - RESCUING - GETTING HELP  Modern vehicles with their active and passive safety systems have advanced significantly over the years but even when you are having an accident with a premium car the safety system you are using to secure the accident scene is more than 50 years old, viz. a breakdown triangle. When you are counting on your hazard flasher you may be left abandoned sometimes. Depending on the impact, this device simply will no longer work as the blinkers are destroyed mechanically in most cases. Moreover, more than 70% of crashed vehicles come to a standstill crosswise to the direction of traffic so even a working hazard flasher will almost not be visible to other vehicles.In addition, experience has shown that especially on motorways breakdown triangles are run over by other road users in no time and as they are set up on the ground they are poorly visible only. Terrible accident reports of the last few years show that serious sequential accidents happen time and again costing the lives of innocent bystanders who had not been hurt in the accident in the first place. story:
We started the Morningwood brand 4 years ago with the idea of bringing high quality steering wheels to your car. Now we are back at it again with our new part the Morningwood Bamboo Trunk Mat. It is our answer to classing up that boring trunk space.

We are focusing on bamboo this time around to be more environmentally friendly. Bamboo can be harvested every 3-7 years. This saves a ton of trees which can take anywhere from 25 to 70 years to grow on average. Bamboo is also very durable, water resistant, and has some antibacterial properties. This makes our mats easier to clean and ready for anything you throw at them.

Unlike your normal campaign we are focusing on collecting templates, while getting you an awesome custom mat at a special price. We are accepting all types of cars and suvs with a trunk measuring a max of 48" X 55". You can help us by spreading the word to friends, family, and anyone else that wants to bring a special touch of elegance to their ride.

story:
THE SMARTEST WALL MOUNT EVER.


Conceived as a true piece of design, Bike Safe by Vadolibero is a first in the market. It solves three issues at once: it's the first wall mount lock that holds any kind of bicycle perfectly straight on the wall. At home, in the office, in the garage or... outdoors! It’s beautiful, with its sleek lines it fits any style of apartment or ambience. It’s resistant: engineered to offer a secure locking system, either the thief uses a sledge hammer to remove it from your wall or an electric saw to cut the reinforced stainless steel layers and junctions. And they both are quite noisy activities... Bike Safe by Vadolibero is the most advanced bike wall mount available on the market.

* Designed in Italy

Bike Safe has been conceived with essential, fluid lines, emphasised by a sleek satin finish. But you don't have to be tricked by the pureness of its shape: its structure comes out of 18 different AISI 304 stainless steel components, carefully engineered, and carefully lathed and welded by skilled hands. Maybe you'll change your bicycle, Bike Safe will stay with you forever!


INTRODUCING: BIKE SAFE UNIQUENESS


* The tilting base holds any bike straight

Yes, the base that holds your bicycle can compensate the inclination of sloping frames: you can adjust it and hang any kind of bike straight on the wall.

* The tube-shaped bracket is telescopic...
You can customise its depth according to the handlebar: you are free to use Bike Safe with an essential road-bike and with a massive mountain bike, too.

...and it fits them all

Road bike narrow handlebars, of course...

... and the widest mountain bike handlebars, too.


* The anti picking steel lock
The bespoke steel lock is provided with an anti picking radial pins tumbler cylinder (that makes over 250 different combinations) and it carries individual tubular keys (each Bike Safe has its own, you get 3 sets), that you use only to unlock it: it locks automatically, with a click.


* A Technogel™️ pad comes with it

Bike Safe is equipped with a Technogel™️ pad to be stuck on the base, in order to avoid scratches and sliding.


* Indoors and outdoors
Bike Safe is made of top quality satin stainless steel 304, an alloy with a higher corrosion resistance to atmospheric agents than regular steel. You can use it outdoors, on the balcony or in your condo's public courtyard.



* Convenient for maintenance

It's true: Bike Safe makes it very convenient to do a bit of maintenance. While your bike is safely parked on it, you can clean it and fix it.

TALKING ABOUT YOUR EXPENSIVE WHEELS...
Bike Safe is the only wall mount that aims to beat bike crime in the home, securing the bicycle most precious part: the frame. And that's an absolute first in the market! In these first days of the Indiegogo campaign, some people pointed out that the expensive wheels could still be stolen... Well, here is an easy (and still stylish) solution: use common braided steel double loop cables. And if you own an expensive seat post, you can use the cable to block that, too!


IN THE BOX

Here in Vadolibero we want to take seriously all details, the product packing, too. This is how your Bike Safe will be delivered to your home.


OUR PERKS

Here is the range of the different perks, at the most affordable price you'll ever see, tailored on different needs: it depends on the number of people (and bikes) you want to share Bike Safe with! Plus, you will be the first to wear our Vadolibero hat and t-shirt: they have both a special "made in Milano" twist, in terms of materials and fit, featuring the truest message of our brand: "I go free", this is the meaning of Vadolibero in Italian. Try them on!



VADOLIBERO T-SHIRT - 100% organic cotton,  urban fit, L and XL sizes for men; M and L sizes for women. Full black with the logo printed in white.


VADOLIBERO HAT - 5 panels design, 100% polyester front panel and mesh rear panels, snapback size adjuster, full black with embroidered logo in white.


*Exploded view

Measurements

* base height: 14,5 cm
* late diameter: 15 cm 
* base width: 17 cm
* min/max depth: 40,6 - 50 cm
* weight: 4 kg

The materials

- Stainless steel 304: widely used for its exceptional forming and welding characteristics, it has a higher corrosion resistance than regular steel to a wide range of atmospheric environments and many corrosive media. For Bike Safe we chose a sophisticated satin finish.
- Technogel™️: a unique “soft solid” material, that joins together the 3D deformation of a fluid and the memory shape of a solid. It’s a completely non-toxic and stable polyurethane substance (made without using oils or plasticizers), used in a wide range of applications.

* Mounting & security

Last but not least, Bike Safe is very easy to mount on the wall: we provide 4 security anchors (size M6x60mm, together with special allen key and bit) and the targeting mask, you will only need to use your drill. As far as the anchorage is concerned, we've tested Bike Safe on brick walls, reinforced concrete and drywalls: it works with them all. In the box, you'll find the anchors suitable for the first two, while if you want to hang it on a drywall, you'll need to get the ones that fit best its thickness.


*Assembly instruction





Bike Safe accessories

To fit in the most sophisticated surroundings, Bike Safe is equipped with a luxurious wardrobe: made of the finest leather, the same used by made in Italy top design brands, it includes a soft hand-sewed pad, a key holder equipped with a solid carabiner, and a wheel strap. The kit is available in two variants: a dark turtle dove brown and subtle natural leather shade.


WHY INDIEGOGO

Supported by the experience we have developed producing the Bike Butler and the Bike Shelf, we have carefully selected the suppliers chain, looking for maximum quality, reliability, expertise in every field: from materials to manufacturing, from packing to shipping. We ask for your support in order to reach the right quantity to launch the production at the best price. And guarantee the most efficient customer service worldwide.



THE TEAM



TIMELINE

BEHIND THE SCENES



SPREAD THE NEWS!

You simply like our vision and you want to endorse our challenge? You can help us a lot letting your cycling friends know that our Bike Safe campaign is online: you'll make them happy!

 

CHECK OUT OUR PRESS!


ABOUT VADOLIBERO 

Vadolibero is our Milan-based new company born with a mission: to design and create smart solutions dedicated to those who love and use their bike, rarely or every day, men or women of any age and latitude. It’s a collection of products never seen before, that truly make the cyclist's life easier and more beautiful: thus far the Ride Home Collection includes Bike Butler and Bike Shelf, two unique pieces of furniture that make your bike feel at ease in your apartment and double as organizers for the gear, too.

The Bike Shelf

The Bike Butler
The Bike Butler dux

Risks and challenges

We've been working for 3 years marketing the products of the Ride Home collection by Vadolibero, learning how to move a prototype to a ready to use product for the market. The Bike Safe has been prototyped and tested by retailers and friends. Your investment will go towards production and shipping. We'll be making the Bike Safe in manufacturing facilities in Brianza, the design district in Northern Italy. We are ready with the whole process. We only need now to reach sufficient quantities to offer the best price with the maximum quality.  However, if we had to pick a risk factor in making this product, it would be dealing with Italian indulgence on deadlines... But we are familiar with this by now, so we counted in advance possible delays and took some precautions with the suppliers! We are confident in the stated timeline for delivery and we promise to stay in touch to keep you well informed!

FAQ

* Can I hang Bike Safe on any type of wall?
We've tested Bike Safe on brick walls, reinforced concrete and drywalls: the anchorage works with them all! In the box you'll find the anchors suitable for the first two, as far as drywall is concerned you'll need to provide the proper ones. The anchorage resistance is guaranteed, what we cannot foresee is the quality of the wall...
* Is the locker secure enough? 
Well, we all know that any safe can be opened by a professional thief: it's only a matter of time, the longer it takes him, the riskier for the burglar. We use a bespoke lock (it's not a standard) with an anti-picking radial pins tumbler cylinder (with over 250.000 different combinations) and individual keys: to open it, it would take him definitely longer than with standard lock! Talking about time: you must unwind the lock base 38 times in order to separate it from the anchorage screw... If the bicycle is locked in, the thief would have a very hard time! The stainless steel tubes have reinforced junctions: you need an electric saw to cut them. And the only way to take Bike Safe out of the wall is to use a sledge hammer.

* Is VAT included? 
Yes, VAT is included in the price, while duties is not.
* Is Bike Safe easy to mount?                                                                               You need to have a drill (and know how to use it, of course), if you don't... everybody has a drilling friend! Apart from that, we can assure that in 30 minutes at the most you'll have a Bike Safe perfectly set on the wall.
* What's the difference between S-304 and S-316?
They are both excellent alloys. The only difference is that stainless steel S-316 is the only one able to resist to saline corrosion: so if you live in extreme weather conditions or simply by the sea, and you want to use Bike Safe outdoors, it's the version you need if you want to avoid rust. Bike Safe S-316 is more expensive than the S.304 version, because the raw material is more costly and it's more difficult to form and mould.
* Is the delivery certain?                                                                                        We are planning to produce Bike Safe in any case, because we have invested so much time and resources on this product we are so enthusiastic about! When we previewed Bike Safe at the Milan Design Week, we have already gathered some orders and serious interest from architects and real estate companies: it's the perfect solution to ensure bike parking lots in the new green condos they are building. With this response from the market, we cannot give up: that's why we've chosen a flexible goal campaign. So we can guarantee the delivery even if we don't reach the target! But we will...


                                                               THANK YOU!
                                                        www.vadolibero.com

story:
The challenge was to design an efficient boat with same level features as their big brothers. To do that, we started designing and building this fantastic mini boat from scratch. Considering the success of JimBoats 6.5, we'd like to think that this first challenge is successful !

We are proud to receive hundreds of messages and congratulations from all over the world !

It's now time to share our pleasure with you, and give you the opportunity to enjoy this little "jewel" with your kids!

Many thanks again for your warm support !

 

 

Because "others" talk about it so much better...

 

"Motorboat & Yachting Magazine" 6.5's presentation:

Is that a large child or an extraordinarily small boat?

The latter you’ll be relieved to hear. What you’re looking at here is being touted as the world’s first electric and very eco-friendly mini boat – " the Jimboats 6.5".

Who came up with it and why?

Denis Jimenez is a French designer and boat builder. Married with two sons, it was discovering that his five-year-old grandson was passionate about boating that inspired Denis to build the JimBoats 6.5 for him.

That’s remarkable. How big is it?

It’s just 6.5ft long – that’s exactly 2m. That’s a full half metre less than the beam of a Sea Ray 190 sportsboat, for example.

Astonishing. So it would fit in the back of my pick-up?

Absolutely! In fact, there is a promotional shot of it in the bed of a double cab.

What makes it go?

A 55lb thrust electric motor spins a 3 blades prop that is concealed within a tunnel, safe from dangling legs or swimmers.

How fast is it?

The builder reckons it’ll do about 5.5 knots, controlled by a five-step throttle (limitable) that also offers a single-speed reverse.

And how long will it run for?

About four hours on a full charge.

Is it just for kids, or can grownups have a play?

It’s aimed predominantly at children, but small adults (up to 5ft 6in and 155lbs) can have a go.

 

So where can I buy one and how much are they?

At the moment only a few exist. Denis is currently seeking crowdfunding investors with the intention of putting the boat into series build. If he succeeds in getting the necessary funding (never a given in the boating world), he expects the finished product to cost between $3,500 and $4,000.

"Source :  Motorboat & Yachting, 2017"

 

 

Overall dimensions and weight :

  • Length:    6.5 ft / 200 cm   –   Can be carried in a pickup or a van !
  • Width:   3.3 ft / 100 cm
  • Draft:   1 ft / 30 cm
  • Weight capacity :   155 lbs / 70 kg
  • Total vessel weight ( battery included ):   75 kg / 165 lbs

Propulsion specs:

  • Compatibility with saltwater/freshwater
  • 100% electric - no engine noise
  • Zero CO2 emission ( eco-friendly )
  • 55 lbs thrust electric motor to spin a 3 blades propeller
  • Five-step throttle (limitable)
  • General circuit breaker with a removable key

 

Security :

- Unsinkable thanks to 4 watertight compartments

- Protected propeller

 

- Non-skid floor , seat and backrest in non-absorbent foam by Seadeck®

 

- Waterproof Marine Stereo and Speakers:

FM / AM radio – MP3 - USB input - AUX input - Bluetooth

Power :   2 x 40 watts

 

- 2 stainless steel folding cleats

 

- 1 cup holder +  2 fishing rod holders

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

1. Do you ship JimBoats 6.5 worldwide ?

Yes, JimBoats 6.5 is shipped worldwide (United States, Canada, Europe and Australia, etc...).  On the payment menu, you can check if the shipping is available to your country.

2. Does the price of perk include the shipping charge ? 

The price does not include the shipping charge. If you select your country on the payment menu, you can check the shipping charge based on your country. 

For example, the shipping charge to Australia and United States is US$545 and US$425, respectively.  

3. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT for international orders?

Import duty tax or VAT may need to be paid if your country requires it.

4. Is there a warranty on my JimBoats 6.5 ?

Yes. We will offer one year limited warranty on all JimBoats 6.5.

Note: this does not cover damages incurred by rider usage. Any alteration, tampering or modification of the electronics, battery, controller, motor or related electrical wiring will not be serviced or supported by JimBoats and will void the warranty.

5. Does the price of my JimBoats 6.5 include the battery ?

Yes. JimBoats 6.5  is delivered complete and ready to use.

6. How long will JimBoats 6.5 run for?

Approximately 4 hours at full speed depending on the weight of the crew. It could be 6 hours or more at low speed !

7. What about the battery?

Our goal is not to earn money by selling batteries or to force you to buy our batteries. This is the reason why we decided to use "Marine grade Bluetop" batteries from Optima. You can buy these batteries everywhere in the world!

8. How long does it take to fully charge the battery?

For a JimBoats 6.5  with standard "D34M"- 55Ah battery, approximately 5~6 hours with the specific "Optima battery charger" or 7~9 hours and with a "classic" battery charger for cars, trucks etc...

9. What is the maximum size to ride a JimBoats 6.5 mini boat ?

We recommend under 170cm (5'6") for the best riding experience.

10. What is the maximum weight to ride a JimBoats 6.5 mini boat ?

We recommend under 70kgs (155lbs) for the best riding experience.

11. Where can JimBoats 6.5 mini boat be serviced?

JimBoats 6.5 mini boat is designed to be simple enough for anyone to replace parts on their own. We will provide written and video documentation of possible replacement processes.

12. I want to be a distributor or retailer, where do I start?

We are open to distributors and retailers worldwide once our initial crowdfunding campaign ends.

 

Other Ways You Can Help :


If you like the 6.5 Jimboats, turn that into action! Even if you aren’t able to get a 6.5 Jimboats right now, spread the word and promote our project.  Join the community, tell a friend, come have fun with us.

Use your favorite social networks and Indiegogo's sharing tools !
 

Visit our website : jimboats.com

Our Facebook page : 6.5-Electric Boat by JimBoats

 

SAFETY RULES :

Denis says: "6.5 isn’t a toy like any other, its use must be made under adult supervision and responsibility. Like any other nautical activity, a life jacket is strongly advised. Some countries even require it. Inquire about it. There are smartphone or walkie-talkie holders, to communicate with the driver.“

We are proud to receive hundreds of messages and congratulations from all over the world !
It's now time to share our pleasure with you, and give you the opportunity to enjoy this little "jewel" with your kids!
Many thanks again for your warm support !

A 55lb thrust electric motor spins a 3 blades prop that is concealed within a tunnel, safe from dangling legs or swimmers.
How fast is it?
The builder reckons it’ll do about 5.5 knots, controlled by a five-step throttle (limitable) that also offers a single-speed reverse.
And how long will it run for?
About four hours on a full charge.
Is it just for kids, or can grownups have a play?
It’s aimed predominantly at children, but small adults (up to 5ft 6in and 155lbs) can have a go.

 
So where can I buy one and how much are they?
At the moment only a few exist. Denis is currently seeking crowdfunding investors with the intention of putting the boat into series build. If he succeeds in getting the necessary funding (never a given in the boating world), he expects the finished product to cost between $3,500 and $4,000.

"Source :  Motorboat & Yachting, 2017"

 


 
Overall dimensions and weight :

Length:    6.5 ft / 200 cm   –   Can be carried in a pickup or a van !
Width:   3.3 ft / 100 cm
Draft:   1 ft / 30 cm
Weight capacity :   155 lbs / 70 kg
Total vessel weight ( battery included ):   75 kg / 165 lbs


Propulsion specs:

Compatibility with saltwater/freshwater
100% electric - no engine noise
Zero CO2 emission ( eco-friendly )
55 lbs thrust electric motor to spin a 3 blades propeller
Five-step throttle (limitable)
General circuit breaker with a removable key


 
Security :
- Unsinkable thanks to 4 watertight compartments

- Protected propeller

 
- Non-skid floor , seat and backrest in non-absorbent foam by Seadeck®

 
- Waterproof Marine Stereo and Speakers:
FM / AM radio – MP3 - USB input - AUX input - Bluetooth
Power :   2 x 40 watts

 
- 2 stainless steel folding cleats

 
- 1 cup holder +  2 fishing rod holders

 


 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 

1. Do you ship JimBoats 6.5 worldwide ?
Yes, JimBoats 6.5 is shipped worldwide (United States, Canada, Europe and Australia, etc...).  On the payment menu, you can check if the shipping is available to your country.
2. Does the price of perk include the shipping charge ? 
The price does not include the shipping charge. If you select your country on the payment menu, you can check the shipping charge based on your country. 
For example, the shipping charge to Australia and United States is US$545 and US$425, respectively.  
3. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT for international orders?
Import duty tax or VAT may need to be paid if your country requires it.
4. Is there a warranty on my JimBoats 6.5 ?
Yes. We will offer one year limited warranty on all JimBoats 6.5.
Note: this does not cover damages incurred by rider usage. Any alteration, tampering or modification of the electronics, battery, controller, motor or related electrical wiring will not be serviced or supported by JimBoats and will void the warranty.
5. Does the price of my JimBoats 6.5 include the battery ?
Yes. JimBoats 6.5  is delivered complete and ready to use.
6. How long will JimBoats 6.5 run for?
Approximately 4 hours at full speed depending on the weight of the crew. It could be 6 hours or more at low speed !
7. What about the battery?
Our goal is not to earn money by selling batteries or to force you to buy our batteries. This is the reason why we decided to use "Marine grade Bluetop" batteries from Optima. You can buy these batteries everywhere in the world!
8. How long does it take to fully charge the battery?
For a JimBoats 6.5  with standard "D34M"- 55Ah battery, approximately 5~6 hours with the specific "Optima battery charger" or 7~9 hours and with a "classic" battery charger for cars, trucks etc...
9. What is the maximum size to ride a JimBoats 6.5 mini boat ?
We recommend under 170cm (5'6") for the best riding experience.
10. What is the maximum weight to ride a JimBoats 6.5 mini boat ?
We recommend under 70kgs (155lbs) for the best riding experience.
11. Where can JimBoats 6.5 mini boat be serviced?
JimBoats 6.5 mini boat is designed to be simple enough for anyone to replace parts on their own. We will provide written and video documentation of possible replacement processes.
12. I want to be a distributor or retailer, where do I start?
We are open to distributors and retailers worldwide once our initial crowdfunding campaign ends.

 
Other Ways You Can Help :


If you like the 6.5 Jimboats, turn that into action! Even if you aren’t able to get a 6.5 Jimboats right now, spread the word and promote our project.  Join the community, tell a friend, come have fun with us.
Use your favorite social networks and Indiegogo's sharing tools !
 
Visit our website : jimboats.com
Our Facebook page : 6.5-Electric Boat by JimBoats
 

SAFETY RULES :
Denis says: "6.5 isn’t a toy like any other, its use must be made under adult supervision and responsibility. Like any other nautical activity, a life jacket is strongly advised. Some countries even require it. Inquire about it. There are smartphone or walkie-talkie holders, to communicate with the driver.“

story:
Energy is the foundation of your life; You are in constant need of it and would never consider wasting it so wouldn’t it be nice if there was something to let you know how much energy you have used and how much remains?

Energpoint is a Electronic board that allows your smartphone to communicate with your vehicle’s energy source, giving you the opportunity monitor and control it at any time and from anywhere through a SMS system that delivers text messages to provide you all the information you need for peace of mind.

Energpoint is a new system to monitor and manage the energy of 12 and 24 volt batteries used on campers, trucks, boats, solar islands and more

Energpoint optimizes the use of the recharged batteries, increasing the performance and lengthening the time of usage of the four batteries that can be connected to the system. The batteries can be charged and interchanged with any of these four energy sources that include wind, solar, external chargers and alternate vehicles.

Energpoint will handle and manage all your energy in an automatic way to guarantee high performance like nothing you have seen before.

You can decide to use your Energpoint even in manual mode by sending SMS messages which can manage and recharge your energysources and batteries connected to the system. You can decide which batteries to use and, if necessary, disable the entire output of the electric charge using the 4G USIM DATA SMS forwarding and receiving to give you full autonomy of management and control from anywhere and anytime.

The 4G USIM reader, the GPS module and the power relays are well managed by microprocessors which ensure reliability, speed and stability for the system. 

Using our app you have access to the source of the connected battery charges, the location, date of purchase, the power, name and costs as well as enable and disable each energy source and battery.

Energpoint is a monitoring system that will control and manage your energy as well as alert you automatically if there are any critical issues. In the system setting you can choose whether to be notified via push notification, SMS. 

The microprocessor dedicated to the management of the system is able to optimize and each charge the batteries improving performance and durability as well as making your batteries last longer. 

Energpoint also has an antenna to provide a stable and powerful signal to your USIM to increase your connectivity.

This way, you'll be able to closely and securely monitor your energy , communicating with your remote data to program and monitor the status of its functions wherever you are without having to run into unpleasant surprises.

Not yet satisfied? we have equipped Energpoint of a gold-plated circuitry to guarantee maximum performance and reliability

Using the built-in GPS Energpoint can tell you exactly where your vehicle is located and alert you if there are any unusual movements. If necessary the device can transform into a satellite alarm in an instant.

Your energy will be managed in an optimal way, ensuring high standard performance and real time notifications so your system is always properly operated. Using the app, you will be able to put it in manual mode using the microprocessors, using the energy as you see fit.

Our App will allow you to manage and monitor the status of your battery system and charging sources. It will allow you to enable or disable each battery, energy source and overall charge independently.

With one single click, you can control your Energpoint at any time and from anywhere. Energpoint allows you to manage the most diverse energy needs, never leaving you unprepared. The management system also allows for a unique power distribution that will extend the life of your batteries, improving performance.

You can decide from which sources the energy is received, which batteries to enable and disable, and if necessary disable the overall output of the electric charge.

Choose the best perk for 340€ and save 60€ to the final price!

With Energpoint you can see all the cataloged statistics of your batteries, charging sources,electricity consumption and efficiency. Using our database you can manage and monitor the stored residual energy so you are always prepared for a new day of work, or a family outing.

Wherever you are, whatever you're doing, your vehicle, your energy and your memories will always be with you, because Energpoint is all about reliability and security.

Energpoint is energy

Energpoint is the optimal solution for the management of batteries for campers, boat, truck, photovoltaic and for other application systems.
Energpoint born dall'esisgenza of having to monitor their energy on the move to avoid unpleasant surprises ......
-Stay No current campers not having the possibility of other eternal energy
-In The middle of the sea with the boat and not be able to start the boat's engine.

The system handles two batteries and two power sources and charging to optimize all batteries because they have the highest office and management.
The system manages two energies of simultaneously charging so that no energy is lost.

All the energy is transmitted to the battery order to be able to better manage and accumulate as much available energy.
The battery management to the exit for campers, boat, trucks, utilities etc ... will be managed by the system to be able to always get the most out of batteries without their being subjected to stress affecting performance.
With Energpoint batteries will always run at their best in order to help increase yield and their lives.


The entire system is managed by the microprocessor mother of the system to optimize all the energy and power consumption giving so the user can always track all energies without incurring unwanted problems.
Energpoint use your cell phone as a system warning to always have all the information when and where you are.
The system manages all the energy in three different modes with the ability to select them depending on usage
-Fast For a fast battery charging
-Slow To a slow charging of the batteries
-Auto For optimal charging handled better by the microprocessor

Energpoint is a Electronic board that allows your smartphone to communicate with your vehicle’s energy source, giving you the opportunity monitor and control it at any time and from anywhere through a SMS system that delivers text messages to provide you all the information you need for peace of mind.

With your phone you can set manually all your batteries and charging sources with multiple combinations according to your needs without having to manually ingegnarvi with cables and various equipment to edit your sources and batteries. Enewrgpoint also give you notice, through the 'APPLICATION, state LIFE remainder of your energy left viewing the current consumption. All information will be sent to the APP management through SMS and receipt of information that the system will give you and you will want to ask. Energpoint also will send status messages and error messages that may be arising from your battery and your charging sources so tenrvi always informed about the global status of your energy and give you the opportunity to interact with the system to be able to view and resolve problems conveniently anywhere you are.

 

Energpoint also within his present system has a GPS to always monitor the position of the vehicle, boat or where it has been assembled. This function is activated via SMS for conoscerfe the position or can be set to cycle mode to learn the position at user-set timeframe. Energpoin turns into a real satellite alarm system informing you step by step where you and 'moved by sending the coordinates that can be used through your phone's browser, in order to recover what you've been robbed.

story:
Summary

I am a 22 year old  senior student of Manufacturing Engineering Student at Oregon Institute of Technology. I have always had a passion for mechanics, electronics, and green energy. 

For my engineering senior project, I will be designing and building a lightweight and efficient electric motorcycle, ideal for short to mid-range commuting and off-roading. 

In 21st century, we are living through the renaissance of green energy and electric transportation. Every day, people are finding newer, cleaner, and smarter ways to travel -- whether its to their place of work, the store, or on trails in the mountains. 

My project will provide an in-depth analysis of not only how to build an electric motorcycle by yourself, but will also show which products are most ideal for the type of electric commuting desired. The report will be cost/benefit analysis focusing on price range, efficiency, power, and reliability.

 

What We Need & What You Get

At this point, in the early stages of my project, I am expecting to need $2,800 for materials such as the electric motor, controller, batteries, wheels/tires, framing materials, welding supplies, and power wires.

For donations of $250 or more, sponsors will have the option to provide a logo which will be placed on the electric bike upon completion, and their or their company's name will be announced as a sponsor during my Senior Project presentation.

 

Risks & Challenges

This project will be very complex and require mountains of research,  trial and error, and help from external resources; however, this project is extremely important and exciting to me, and I have confidence that I will overcome any of the hurdles this project will provide.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate to my project, that's okay! Please feel free to spread the word to anyone that may be able to help me fund my project, or simply share the link to my project on Facebook. :)

story:
Introducing the Next Generation in Portable Electric-Scooters——Mantour X! 

Made of carbon fiber and aluminum alloy and weighing a mere 16 lbs, Mantour X is the lightest, most portable self-balancing e-scooter to hit the market.  

The First Self-balancing E-scooter 

There are e-scooters and then there’s Mantour X! This leading edge design sets a new benchmark in light, portable e-scooters. And, in a total breakthrough, Mantour X is both self-balancing and foldable!

The use of carbon fiber and aluminum alloy has resulted in a record-breaking 16lbs, so Mantour X is extremely light, highly durable and unbeatably strong. The revolutionary self-balancing feature when folded, makes it the most portable e-scooter available.

A generous battery life, quick recharging and a very respectable top speed are also part of the winning combination. Plus a double braking system makes Mantour X highly safe and responsive in all conditions. A bright LED headlight, clear LED display - showing battery life and speed - and a dust and splash-resistant exterior, make for comfortable, confident travel.

  • ✅ Carbon Fiber Pedal Board Ensures Light Gross Weight 
  • ✅ Aluminum Alloy Body Ensures High Durability
  • ✅ Self Balance Feature Ensures High Portability
  • ✅ Sport Mode & Follow Mode Designed for All Usage Scenarios

 

 

YouTube Review Video by Martijn Wester

 

Youtube Review Video by Electrified Reviews

 

 Read the full article on DIGITAL TRENDS

 

Read the full article on InceptiveMind

 

Read the full article on New Atlas

 

Read the full article on GEEK DAD

 

Mantour X has a unique in-built self-balance algorithm which enables it to always stay up straight and move forward smoothly. 

When folded up vertically so that it is resting on its front wheel, you simply engage the Follow Mode, which powers the front wheel and allows it to roll obediently along beside you, no effort required. Wherever you go, Mantour X remains steady as you roll it along.

Mantour X is the perfect sidekick - no effort, no hassle and always by your side!

 

Mantour X is super light yet extremely strong and durable. Its pedal board is made of carbon fiber, which is 35% lighter than aluminum alloy and four times stronger than steel. 

The end result of all its clever design features, is that Mantour X is THE lightest e-scooter on the market. With a weight of 16 lbs (7.3kg), and a size of 31.6 x 5.4 x 7.1 inches, it is speedy and maneuverable. When folded, it can be easily carried around and stored almost anywhere. You can lift it easily with just one hand which makes it ideal for all members of the family every day. 

 

 

Switch Modes at A Touch of the Button

A simple button and a clear LED display, let you know which mode you are in. A short press of the button on the right handle turns on Sport Mode. A long press (5 seconds), turns on the Follow Mode. 

Easy Stop and Go

Mantour X puts safety first every time, with an easy stop and go function. 

To accelerate, slide the throttle switch on the left handle from left to right and off you go!  

Your scooter is equipped with both an electric brake, for low speed braking, and a physical brake for high spreed braking. 

The electric brake is a simple slider switch which operates from right to left to bring Mantour X to a gradual stop.

The physical brake is placed above the back wheel. Step firmly on the break to stop when needed. 

 

The Mantour X LED display is easy to read when you're on the move. It monitors the mode you are in, your speed and the battery level. Simple, bright, efficient - everything you've come to expect from Mantour X!

A bright LED headlight completes the package, lighting your way home on even the darkest night. 

 

Mantour X continues to break records, including its ability to unfold and get ready to roll in under 5 seconds. 

Simply unfold and press to select the mode you want using the Mode Button on the right handle. 

At the end of the journey, you can fold the lightweight Mantour X with one hand. Then select Follow Mode and it will roll along, upright and power assisted to its where you want to store, which incidentally is pretty much anywhere as it is so slim and compact. 

When it is folded Mantour X measures a tiny 31.6 x 5.4 x 7.1 inches, which means you can put it in the trunk of your car, take it on the subway of fit it in the tiniest of offices or apartments. Mantour X is super compact and space-efficient, perfect for city dwellers and daily commuters.  

  

When fully charged, Mantour X has an impressive 12.4 miles range, which it can achieve non-stop.

 

The handle is charged separately and lasts between two and three months.

 

Although Mantour X is extremely compact, it has a 220 lbs (100kg) maximum payload and is capable to run under a maximum speed of 12.4 mph (20km/h). The secret? Mantour X’s built-in 240W motor. You’ll never be late for an appointment again with this powerful and ultra efficient motor powering you along.

 

Mantour X is IP54 waterproof which in non-technical terms means it is water resistant and durable even in bad weathers. And that is great news for get on your scooter and taking on the elements on even the gloomiest of days!

Mantour X not only breaks new ground in terms of its functionality, its sleek desirable appearance also sets benchmarks in stylish design. No more bulkiness and exposed parts, only clean design remains.

Mantour X arrives on your doorstep in ready to use condition. There's no assembly and no charging, just unfold select your mode and go!

Operation is simple and straightforward, no complicated handbooks or learning curve here. It's easy for all ages and abilities to have fun with and makes a great gift, including for yourself!

 

Mantour X is a great option to start a sustainable lifestyle compared to other vehicles. 

  •  Less Energy Consumption 
  • Cost-effective

  • Way more affordable

 

From Sketch Drawing

To Multiple 3D Modeling Modifications​

To CAD Design​

 

To the 1st Batch Assembling

 

Finally, Mantour X is ready to meet you all! 

 

 

FlowDot was founded in 2015 by a team of passionate designers and engineers. We focus on developing innovative transportation products for commute or fun. 

MantourX is unique and outstanding among the e-scooter market. It took us three years to finally bring the concept of MantourX to live. It was tough, but we enjoyed the journey. 

We've produced the first batch of MantourX, our team rides it every day, and the experience is excellent. Please help us introduce this fantastic innovation to the world.

Step firmly on the break to stop when needed.  The Mantour X LED display is easy to read when you're on the move. It monitors the mode you are in, your speed and the battery level. Simple, bright, efficient - everything you've come to expect from Mantour X!A bright LED headlight completes the package, lighting your way home on even the darkest night.  Mantour X continues to break records, including its ability to unfold and get ready to roll in under 5 seconds. Simply unfold and press to select the mode you want using the Mode Button on the right handle. At the end of the journey, you can fold the lightweight Mantour X with one hand. Then select Follow Mode and it will roll along, upright and power assisted to its where you want to store, which incidentally is pretty much anywhere as it is so slim and compact. When it is folded Mantour X measures a tiny 31.6 x 5.4 x 7.1 inches, which means you can put it in the trunk of your car, take it on the subway of fit it in the tiniest of offices or apartments. Mantour X is super compact and space-efficient, perfect for city dwellers and daily commuters.    When fully charged, Mantour X has an impressive 12.4 miles range, which it can achieve non-stop. The handle is charged separately and lasts between two and three months. Although Mantour X is extremely compact, it has a 220 lbs (100kg) maximum payload and is capable to run under a maximum speed of 12.4 mph (20km/h). The secret? Mantour X’s built-in 240W motor. You’ll never be late for an appointment again with this powerful and ultra efficient motor powering you along. Mantour X is IP54 waterproof which in non-technical terms means it is water resistant and durable even in bad weathers. And that is great news for get on your scooter and taking on the elements on even the gloomiest of days!Mantour X not only breaks new ground in terms of its functionality, its sleek desirable appearance also sets benchmarks in stylish design. No more bulkiness and exposed parts, only clean design remains.Mantour X arrives on your doorstep in ready to use condition. There's no assembly and no charging, just unfold select your mode and go!Operation is simple and straightforward, no complicated handbooks or learning curve here. It's easy for all ages and abilities to have fun with and makes a great gift, including for yourself! Mantour X is a great option to start a sustainable lifestyle compared to other vehicles. 
 Less Energy Consumption 


Cost-effective

Way more affordable
 From Sketch DrawingTo Multiple 3D Modeling Modifications​To CAD Design​ To the 1st Batch Assembling Finally, Mantour X is ready to meet you all!   FlowDot was founded in 2015 by a team of passionate designers and engineers. We focus on developing innovative transportation products for commute or fun. MantourX is unique and outstanding among the e-scooter market. It took us three years to finally bring the concept of MantourX to live. It was tough, but we enjoyed the journey. We've produced the first batch of MantourX, our team rides it every day, and the experience is excellent. Please help us introduce this fantastic innovation to the world.

story:
Segway's Exclusive Partner 

Contact: info@longhamtec.com

The urban mobility revolution is here. Featuring the longest mileage from Segway-Ninebot, robust tires, and a body made for all terrains, yet still offered at the most attractive price, the Ninebot KickScooter MAX is here to spark a change. The MAX is ideal for all kinds of riders, terrains, and journeys.

 

Press kit is available for download here

Most electric scooters face the problem of limited mileage and battery life. The Ninebot KickScooter MAX changes this with a battery capacity of 551Wh that almost triples the mileage on the Ninebot KickScooter ES2. With a MAX range of 40 miles, you can easily ride 162 laps around a standard running track in a single charge, or complete a full marathon PLUS another half marathon. Go green by commuting to work on your MAX and recharge it only once a week.

Riding on rough roads can be challenging for electric scooter users. We understand that and want to make your journey more comfortable. Drawing inspiration from bicycle designs, we developed 10-inch tubeless pneumatic tires with the shock-absorption to make your ride smoother and more stable, even on rough surfaces or speed bumps.

                

With revolutionary upgrades to the propulsion power, you can now enjoy greater freedom and convenience when you cruise around on your MAX. The high torque motor gives the MAX a top speed of up to 15.5-18.6mph on level ground. The 350W-700W of power provides the MAX with sustainable propulsion on all kinds of road conditions.

Say goodbye to having a spinning wheel when your electric scooter is going up a steep slope, MAX can climb slopes around 20%, allowing it to go uphill easily. Rear-wheel drive offers you a better solution to acceleration, stability, and brake. 

     The MAX comes with a one-step folding system that makes it the ultimate electric scooter for people who are always on the go.  The built-in charger lets you recharge it easily when you’re on the go without having to carry along a bulky charging device. You just need to bring along a pocketable cord similar to a phone charging cable. The new charger is more efficient than before. The MAX can be fully charged in 6 hours, two times faster than any previous electric scooters.

                      

  • The MAX has an aviation-grade aluminum alloy frame that gives it a strong body and also has the carrying capacity of  220 lbs or 100 kg.
  • We designed the MAX with the enterprise scooter-sharing market in mind. The improved structure along with other feature updates such as resistance rating of IPX5 for the whole body (IPX7 water resistance to its core components) and various durability upgrades ensure that the MAX will be your faithful, long-serving companion.
  • One major concern for scooter riding is to have a flat tire. With the self-healing tire feature, when the tires’ outer layers are punctured, the sealant within the tire fills the holes automatically. The MAX tire can withstand multiple punctures (less than 6mm in diameter) without leaks, so you won't experience the nightmare of replacing tires.  
  • Our MAX received huge support from backers all over the world. We decided to add the new feature of self-healing tire as our way to say ’Thank You ‘. 

 

  • Lock controls: you can also lock your MAX with a single swipe to the right.
  • Scooter status: displays information about your MAX such as remaining mileage, speeds
  • Riding modes: Select from 3 different modes for different scenarios

         ‘ECO’ is the economic model with a maximum speed of 10km/h (6.2 mph)
         ‘D’ is the standard drive mode with a maximum speed of 20km/h (12.4 mph)
         ‘S’ is the sport mode with a maximum speed up to 25-30km/h (15.5-18.6 mph)

  • Firmware upgrades: Keep your MAX firmware up to date.

                        

Overall, MAX is the perfect choice for mobility, it allows you to move from point A to point B while enjoying the time you spent. You won't be tired even with 10 miles daily commute or a short trip, and no need to worry about the range issue. Ride on and explore your city and countryside in a new way!

Why E-scooter transportation is not just a flashy trend, but a sustainable lifestyle?

  • Less energy consumption: Statistics shows electric scooter holding a great advantage over energy consumption, comparing to other vehicles. ​

  • Cost-effective: You can save a lot of money if you opt for electric scooters over gas or electric vehicles.

  • Cost of purchase:  MAX priced at around 1% of the electric car, one of the most affordable choices to go green.

With its edge on energy consumption, cost of use and price, we believe in our combat with global warming, the electric scooter may offer us the best chance to win regarding transport energy.

The Indiegogo Special at $699 (MSRP $799)

We are giving out great deals to our Indiegogo backers, including special discounts and special Indiegogo edition. The more you buy, the more you save. 

*An additional international transaction fee may occur during the payment, please check with the bank on how to eliminate/avoid this fee. 

Notice: Indiegogo color option is no longer available to pre-order as all 1000 units have been claimed.

The Indiegogo community has given us overwhelming support and affirmation of our vision to produce great products that people love using daily. Share this Indiegogo value of backing great products by wearing the Indiegogo badge on your MAX wherever you ride. We are offering very limited quantities(1000 units) of the Indiegogo special edition KickScooter MAX that comes with the iconic Indiegogo color.

  • The only difference between Indiegogo edition and Standard color edition is the color on the wheel rims.

                           

  1. Typical Range: tested while riding under full power, 165.3 lbs (75.0 kg) load, 77°F (25°C), 9.3 mph (15 km/h) on average on pavement.
  2. The charging cable only comes with a 3 pin power cord.

Help us out by sharing this campaign and spread our message. Plus, riding is more fun with a friend!                 

                              

 

How to win accessories?  

  1. Ninebot phone holder:  the perfect tool for navigation 
  2. Ninebot storage bag: perfect match with MAX
  3. Segway helmet:  guardian for your safety                                               
  4. Segway backpack:  show your style                                                               

Please check the update#2 for details.

                             

Ninebot is a privately held company headquartered in Beijing, China. In April of 2015, Ninebot acquired Segway Inc., headquartered in Bedford, New Hampshire. As the world’s leading provider of mobile robotics solutions, the company focuses on the research and development, design, manufacturing, distribution, and sales of short-distance transportation products. 

 

As the main supplier to the global electric scooter rental business, Segway-Ninebot has great cooperation with Bird, Lime, Uber(Skip), Spin, Lyft, Jump and more. 

  • Reduces congestion and pollution

City congestion and pollution cost urban dwellers not only wasted time and money but the overall quality of life. The electric scooter has been proven to substantially reduce congestion in most urban areas. 

  • Greener solution for cities. And burns more calories than a bus, light rail or car riding!

By switching to electric scooter riding, urban areas can save a lot of space otherwise used for parking.  These areas can be reutilized to help solve the increased housing demand and provide green areas for a better community.

  • The more healthy way to transport                 

On matter what you heard about the electric scooter, you will feel more energetic and happy when you riding on it. It burns more calories than taking a bus or driving yourself.

story:
Summary

Skyer Self-Balancing Scooter is the coolest and smartest scooter ever. It has Bluetooth Anti-Lost and Speaker builded in. You can connect the Anti-Lost  and Speaker via Bluetooth with any of your iPhone or Android smartphone. You would be noticed on your smartphone when you're 10 meters away from the Skyer, you can also trace the location of your Skyer on your smartphone. Not only this, you can play your favorite songs on Skyer during your ride too.

Safety: Anti-Lost & Location Trace

The Skyer has two major wireless security features. The first one is the wireless lock, you can lock the wheels of the Skyer with the remote. The second one is the Anti-Lost & Location Trace feature.You can connect to the Skyer via Bluetooth to use the Anti-Lost & Location Trace, you would be noticed on your smartphone when you're 10 meters away from your Skyer. You can also trace the location of you Skyer on your smartphone. No longer need to worries about where your scooter is.

Play Music

With the Skyer, you can play your favorite songs on Skyer via Bluetooth during your ride, it would make your journey more impressive.

Charging & Distance

The Skyer would be fully charged at around 90 mins, it can drive you to a place that's up to 25 miles away.

How To Control It？

What We Need

We need $25,000 to get the mass production started, and need your help to spread the word!

What You Get

You will get the Skyer Self-Balancing Scooter that you contributed around September 2015 or a little bit earlier.

The Impact

Skyer is a new product based on an existing scooter that's on the market, we came up the Bluetooth Anti-Lost and Speaker idea about three months ago, so we contacted the official manufacturer that's in China, and working with them for adding the Bluetooth Anti-Lost & Speaker features into the scooter, and called it Skyer. The retail price for the existing scooter that's on the market is $450 without shipping. Now, the Indiegogo backers can get a Skyer as low as $388 with many new improvements and new features added. 

It's very impressive for Paying Less But Getting More!

Risks & Challenges

There're no risks & challenges for this campaign, because we're working with the official manufacturer.

story:
It is just 180 cm in length and 150 cm high. AirBoard doesn't need an airport to take-off or land because it is a vertical take-off and landing aircraft as well as it does not need an hangar and can be hold in a house.

When you close the AirBoard it takes  3 times less space with a size of just 110 by 80 cm. It can lift a human yet it is small enough to fit in a car's trunk. That means with its portable size you can take it in a train, bus or a car when traveling a long distance. Then open and fly.


Brains behind the AirBoard is an intelligent Intel processor. The chip combines many sub-systems into one remarkably compact module, which is bluetooth enabled to create interactive connectivity between your phone or tablet and AirBoard.

AirBoard has a ground collision sensor ensuring constant height from the ground. This comes very handy in mountainous environments and traveling up or down the stairs. In safety mode the flight altitude is limited to 1.5 meters.

Custom designed software uses the built-in gyroscope and accelerometer providing continuous take-off and keeping device steady balancing the weight and lift. This makes it very easy to control AirBoard even for unexperienced pilots. The built-in GPS system and compass establishes better speed and navigation data for Remote App, as well as secures the device with a location based security alarm.


AirBoard can be used for moving in extreme environments, military and emergency services like search and rescue, filming astonishing footage, aerial cattle mustering and having a great travel experience.


In 2013 we were struck by the idea to create AirBoard and since then became obsessed with it.

In 2014 we started small scale prototyping and testing. We CNC machined full-scale parts and began testing.

In the beginning of year 2015 we have started software development and entered into agreement with manufacturing partner of AirBoards.

Beginning on the 9th February the future of AirBoard is in YOUR hands. By backing the campaign we will receive the funds needed to develop the AirBoard and ship it. We will improve it according to your advice, enter into certification process, start software debugging, tooling, pre-production and final testing. In late 2015 we will begin to mass produce this air vehicle and start shipping.





Battery life is displayed with a colorful LED ring around the power button. Thanks to compact thermal system there is plenty of room for a powerful battery.


Airplane greenhouse gas equivalent emission is more than 300 grams per passenger kilometer. Instead of gas or petrol, AirBoard is forward thinking and uses 100% electricity to fly.


In addition to shifting weight you can control AirBoard with a mobile remote application.



App shows important data like AirBoard battery life, speed, compass and level. User can control flight level or altitude in which the flying platform is moving. The current high is shown next to the slider with a red arrow. Learn more


The future of the AirBoard project is in your hands. You have the chance to be part of a technological breakthrough.

We’ve had a blast — 2 years of dreaming, creating, building, testing, developing and getting ready.

Now, it’s go time.

The final phase we’re waiting on is you.

You can be part of the first generation of AirBoard users, dreamers, and pioneers. You can be the first owner of the AirBoard.




Please spread the word about this product across all of your social media channels.

The link is simple:  http://igg.me/at/airboard

Remember to use Indiegogo sharing tools.

story:
Let's Electrify Racing

Own a piece of electric racing history today by helping us to create the world's first fully-electric road racing series. Let's demonstrate that cutting-edge green technology can win and change the world of racing by creating a fully-electric road racing series. 

For 25 years, Entropy Racing has been renting, building, and racing cars. We have a reputation for being on the forefront of technology while building cost-effective, reliable cars. Our reliability and capability are what keep our customers coming to us year after year. Last year we entered into the future of motorsports and electrified racing with EVSRs, our 100% electric racecars, which have since proven themselves over and over.  We've competed against gas-powered racecars, set records everywhere we went, and impressed many. In fact, EVSR has the longest competition range of any electric race car in the world.

Our cars are built on a simple design for premium performance:

  • Power: 160 whp
  • Torque: 190 ft/lbs
  • Top Speed: 140 mph
  • Charge: 1.8 hrs at 100A, 3.5 hrs at 50A
  • Battery System: LiFePo4 at 150 VDC
  • Weight: 1950 lb
  • 30 min run time at race conditions

We have some of the best drivers on our team, from two-time LeMans winner and Pikes Peak winner, Rick Knoop; five-time US Rally Champion, Tim O’Neil; and US Rally Champion, Wyatt Knox.  With these guys on our team, our EVSRs are poised to be on the podium.

Join our team! 

Charlie Greenhaus, EVSR developer, and Tim O'Neil, five-time US Rally Champion.

What it Takes to Make an Electric Road-Racing Series

It costs a lot of money to race cars, from building and transporting the cars to assembling and housing a winning team, paying race fees and expenses, and providing high value to our sponsors. We need your help today to make an electric road-racing series to prove to the racing community and the world that cutting-edge green technology can be fun, it can win, and with EVSR, it's on its way to being a reality.

We've already built two cars and our third car is almost complete. All three will race in Pikes Peak in June 2015. To make a road-racing series, we need to build 20 cars and ready them to race at prime venues in the United States.

Our cars, our drivers, and the fact that we're making history create a winning promotional opportunity that cannot be matched anywhere in the paddock. See our perks to find out how you can own a piece of electric racing history.

EVSR's Race History, Including Jay Leno

EVSR has raced in over 30 events in every form of motorsports from road races to hill climbs, auto cross, and drag racing. Jay Leno has even driven EVSR and loved it. We've set records everywhere we've gone and competed against conventional gas-powered racecars. And, we've gotten some impressive media coverage.  Electric racecars address many of the concerns the public has with both motorsports and cars in general - noise and pollution. Best of all, they're fun and exciting to play with. 

EVSR is proven and demonstrates that fully-electric racecars can race alongside gas-powered cars and be both competitive and viable. While a number of electric racing cars have been produced successfully in the past few years, Entropy Racing has built EVSR for a small fraction of the cost and time of any other electric racecar. Today, EVSR has the longest competition range of any electric race car in the world.  Here's our record so far:

  • Placed 8th Overall out of 48 cars at the SCCA Chasing the Dragon Hillclimb
  • Placed First in Class in two 30-minute races with SCCA at Pocono Raceway.
  • Set 4th Fastest Time Overall our of 57 cars at Carlisle Import and Kits Autocross.
  • Posted the longest competition range in a 45-minute race (57 miles) on one charge.
  • Earned the Fastest Electric Time for Subaru's Climb to the Clouds at Mt. Washington.
  • Copmeted in the Grassroots Motosprots Ultimate Track Car Challenge at Virginia International Raceway.
  • Made history by racing two identical electric racecars in a sprint race with IMG at Lime Rock Park.
  • Set electric lap records at Virginia International Raceway, Summit Point Motorsports Park, Pocono International Raceway, Watkins Glen International, and Lime Rock Park.

Together, let's build on this extraordinary record and create the world's first fully-electric road racing series featuring EVSRs.  Own a piece of EVSR and electric racing history today.

Racing is Risky Business

The motorsports industry is completely dependent on sponsors, both large and small. It's a tough business but we think that electric car racing is too important so we're working hard to make history.  After all, we're looking to innovate, build, and promote fun, winning, green automotive racing technology and share these innovations with the auto industry and the world. We're a green racing tech-tank and to fund continual electric racing technology innovations, we need the support of sponsors like you. That means we have to be savvy marketers, be on top of our racing game, and give our sponsors value.  

Every race requires a team of people, sometimes traveling thousands of miles with our trucks and racecars, plus paying our professional drivers and support staff and ensuring that our sponsors, like you, receive the value the expect.  You can help us! See our perks to find out how you can be part of the EVSR team.

How You Can Be Part of it, What You Get

There's something for everyone in our Electrifying Racing campaign. Any amount will help and every giving category will receive some perks. If you or your company are looking for major exposure, this is the way to get it.   Motorsport is the top-ranked and fastest growing spectator sport in the US, with over 800 million attendees, and growth tripling that of the NBA, NFL and NHL combined. The typical attendance for a single race is 60,000-100,000 spectators, with over one million spectators over the course of a season. Aside from that, supporting our campaign will change the future of motorsports and promote a vision of a renewable, responsible, high tech yet thrilling new level of competition.

Besides donating and sponsoring, here are a few other things you can do:

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to let your friends know about our campaign.
  • Like us on Facebook, like our posts, and share our page with your Facebook friends.
  • See if your employer is interested in sponsoring EVSR.  They'll get some huge promotional benefits and make electric racing history.  And chances are, you and your colleagues will be able to come along for the ride.

Thank you!  We're glad to have you on the EVSR team.
story_txt:
Let's Electrify Racing 




Own a piece of electric racing history today by helping us to create the world's first fully-electric road racing series. Let's demonstrate that cutting-edge green technology can win and change the world of racing by creating a fully-electric road racing series. 
For 25 years, Entropy Racing has been renting, building, and racing cars. We
have a reputation for being on the forefront of technology while building cost-effective, reliable cars. Our reliability and capability are what keep our
customers coming to us year after year. Last year we entered into the future of motorsports and electrified racing with EVSRs, our 100% electric racecars, which have since proven themselves over and over.  We've competed against gas-powered racecars, set records everywhere we went, and impressed many. In fact, EVSR has the longest competition range of any electric race car in the world.
Our cars are built on a simple design for premium performance:


Power: 160 whp
Torque: 190 ft/lbs
Top Speed: 140 mph
Charge: 1.8 hrs at 100A, 3.5 hrs at 50A
Battery System: LiFePo4 at 150 VDC
Weight: 1950 lb
30 min run time at race conditions

We have some of the best drivers on our team, from two-time LeMans winner and Pikes Peak winner, Rick Knoop; five-time US Rally Champion, Tim O’Neil; and US Rally Champion, Wyatt Knox.  With these guys on our team, our EVSRs are poised to be on the podium.
Join our team! 


Charlie Greenhaus, EVSR developer, and Tim O'Neil, five-time US Rally Champion.

Like us on Facebook, like our posts, and share our page with your Facebook friends.

story:
Moved by What Matters:

We love the fact that from Point A to Point B, you’ll rarely see two skaters take the same route or put the same spin on a textbook trick. It’s a global community that respects creativity over competition and perseverance over perfection. Way beyond a sport, skaters share a spirit. 

So we thought: What if your skateboard could express all the shades of your signature style, even when it’s standing still?   

Sure, you’ve got the classic stickers and Sharpies, but those can fall flat on durability and pop. And sure, you can completely dismantle your board to swap one deck for another, but quality replacement decks don’t come cheap; and putting your ride back together is hardly an easy feat. Even for an expert, it’s a quarter of an hour you could otherwise spend shredding:

 

The WarDrobe Patent: Anatomy of Innovation

As a collective of artists, entrepreneurs, and champions of personal flavor, we wanted to make skaters a board that reflects the same freedom of creativity you feel when you cruise—from your mood of the day, to a favorite character or sports team to your favorite social cause. 

So instead of creating a collection of decks, we created strong and flexible skins that snap onto the sturdy decks of our proprietary WarDrobe Motherboard.

We knew that our technology had to be fool proof and fast. If kids couldn’t relate to our intuitive design as easily AND seamlessly as they handle a smartphone, we were going back to the drawing board. 

And most importantly, we knew that skaters didn’t just want an awesome accessory…they demanded a legit foundation that even the most seasoned pros would be proud to ride.

7 years, 10 prototypes, and endless test runs later, our team of engineers, pro skate icons, and amazingly talented artists have helped us bring our idea from drawing board to reality. We cannot be more proud or more excited to share the 1st generation of WarDrobe skateboards with you. 

The patented WarDrobe Interchangeable Faceplate Skateboard System (IFSS) is a first-of-its-kind skateboard kit that allows you to switch up the style of your board in minutes, with no complicated diagrams.

Premium Structure. Personal Style. 

For seasoned pros, first-timers, and all our friends in between, every WarDrobe Motherboard is a smooth-riding machine crafted with hardware from the industry’s most well-respected brands.  

From bearings to trucks, the WarDrobe crew knows what skaters demand from their boards.

Our commitment to you is a fresh skateboard experience that delivers an unprecedented level of professional functionality and personal flavor.  

When we took our final prototype to the streets, this is what a few of our new fans had to say:

WarDrobe Motherboard                                                     

  • War*Drobe Pusher 7.5 in. Complete Cruiser Skateboard                            
  • Pusher Specs (Skateboard)                                                  
  • Length: 30 in. 762 mm
  • Width: 7.5 in. 188 mm
  • 7 Ply Maple
  • Precision Machined Motherboard, Slender with Modern Concave and Double Kick
  • Dip Painted Finish w/ Screen Printed Wardrobe Logo
  • Wheelbase: 17.125 in 435 mm
  • WARDROBE POLYURETHANE WHEELS 54 mm diameter X 34 mm wide 84A Durometer
  • ACE HIGH 11 TRUCKS, Hanger Width 4.5 in (114 mm), axle Width 7.25 (184 mm), Color: RAW
  • Precision Sealed Speedy Lunatic ABEC 3 Ball Bearings
  • Precision Laser Cut Grip Tape

WarDrobe Faceplates

  • Stainless Steel Faceplate Mounting Hardware
  • Durable Nylon Construction Digitally Printed with Protective Clearcoat
  • Limited Edition Original Artwork
  • Fully Customizable FACEPLATE printing with no minimums – 2nd generation kits*

How It Works: Got Hands? You’re Golden.

The WarDrobe Interchangeable Faceplate Skateboard System required exactly two tools and about 1 minute. With your bare hands and one or two practice runs, you’ll see how easy it is to switch out one faceplate and replace it securely with another. Watch this demo video of our friends in action:

 

Learn More About The War*Drobe Mission

 

First Generation Faceplates


 

What are the funds for? (I'm glad you asked)

WarDrobe is looking to make a more cost effective skateboard for consumers in our next production run. We need to raise funds to help find different components that will help scale the business and lower the cost for the end user without significantly compromising quality and performance. We want our product to be innovative, user friendly, and cost effective, and we will continue on that journey of perfection as long as we are in business.

 

Ways to contribute...

1. PURCHASE             2. DONATE            OR              3.SHARE

***YOU DONT HAVE TO SKATE TO DONATE! EVERYTHING COUNTS!!!***

 

Extras...Perks that is! Actual WarDrobe

 

Limited Edition WarDrobe Snapback Baseball Cap (Black/White/Red)

Limited Edition WarDrobe T Shirt (Black/White)

 

Limited Edition WarDrobe Hoodie (Black/White)

 

 

 

Cruise full speed ahead—we’ve got your back.

Warranty 

WarDrobe stands behind every skateboard we build, and we’ve worked hard to create a kit that you’ll be proud to own and stoked to use.  With most of our manufactured components and product assembly being right here in the U.S.A, we have an opportunity to visit and build close relationships with our vendors/suppliers. This in turn helps supply and secure jobs here in America. We are confident in our construction, design, and engineering - and you'll share that confidence with our 30 day warranty on all components, from deck to plates. 

Delivery Guarantee

We know the best part of an Indie Go Go project is the day that big shiny box hits your front door, rewarding you for your generosity and awesome support of our vision. Our limited edition, 1st generation skateboards are ready and waiting to meet you, so there won’t be the standard period of waiting around and wondering when your reward will arrive. We’re guaranteeing 2017 delivery of your WarDrobe rewards or you’ll get your money back. Simple. Classy. It’s how we roll.

Risks and challenges

As a small business, we are confronted with roadblocks on a daily—even hourly—basis. As entrepreneurs, we thrive on finding solutions to these challenges. We recognize that introducing any new product to a category as competitive as sports equipment will come with hurdles and naysayers, but we are confident that our quality, unique designs and dedication to the customer experience will make a difference you can feel. In comparison to many other Indie Go Go projects, we’ve been engineering the WarDrobe build and curating exclusive art for our skins for over 2 years, and we are completely stoked that we can reward our early supporters with a premium kit. 

The WarDrobe team has established wonderful relationships with our manufacturers, supply chain, artists, engineers, and everybody involved in the process of bringing these boards to fruition, and we are ready to deliver them to you. 

We are committed to making our journey as transparent as possible to our supporters, so we will keep you in the loop regarding any fresh developments, product options, decisions, and possible delays. 

We sincerely appreciate your support of our dream, and we cannot be happier to welcome you into the fam!!!

 

WarDrobe Galaxy:

The Faces Behind the Faceplates

 

So Who Are We? 

Before we intro our people, we’d love you to meet our purpose. The opportunity for our company to impact the world beyond the board is the passion that drives us as entrepreneurs; and the commonality that unites us with so many of our initial supporters. 

WarDrobe hopes to partner with Ethiopia Skate, a non-profit organization that brings the artistic expression and sheer fun of skateboarding to curious, energetic kids. Our Ethiopia Skate face plate, created in collaboration with New York artist  Felipe Medrios, is a true celebration of the many personalities that make up our global community. We’re proud to donate a portion of our profits from each sale of this FACEPLATE to further the mission of Ethiopia Skate. If you’re interested in learning more about Ethiopia Skate, definitely check them out at:: http://www.ethiopiaskate.org 

 

THANK YOU SO VERY VERY MUCH!!!!!!!

WarDrobe Designs LLC., would like to give a heart felt thank you to everyone that has contributed in one way or another. Whether you purchased a perk, donated money, shared, posted, or read our campaign we are beyond thankful, and it means the world to us. We are a bunch of dreamers and hope to at least inspire someone to follow their dreams, no matter how big or small they are. From us out here in the WarDrobe Galaxy we thank you!

WHOEVER YOU ARE, WHEREVER YOU ARE...

WELCOME TO THE WARDROBE GALAXY!!!

 

Meet the founders

 

 

*Prices and Rewards/Perks are subject to change.
