story:
I’m Jesse Morgan, 

I was motivated to invent the EXTRACTOR due to my own serious accident 10 years ago. I was hit head-on by a drunk driver, rolled my car and was trapped upside down as my car caught fire.  A family driving by stopped, broke my side window and cut my seatbelt to get me out … they are my heroes … they saved my life. My accident and others like it I’ve heard over the years led me to invent a multi-purpose, easy access device, that can save lives in these situations.

You Don’t Need it ‘Till You Do … Then It’s a LIFE SAVING Tool!

What We Need:

We are now moving aggressively to transition from our successful “Proof of Concept” Prototype to our first production run of 5,000 units.  We need $35,000 to accomplish this critical phase of bringing the EXTRACTOR to market. 

What You Get:

We’ve created an attractive range of “Perks” associated with various donation or investment levels for this campaign. With the exception of our lowest level, each one features the EXTRACTOR  tool in varying quantities, so you will get the safety and protection my invention provides.  With the higher level packages, several tools are provided so you can share the “Gift of Life” among your loved ones and others that could benefit from our vehicle safety tool.

The Impact:

There are over 255 million vehicles on the road in the US … over 1.2 Billion worldwide. In 2015, there were over 6 million car accidents each year, with 27% of those resulting in injury and 6% resulting in a fatality.  Not ONE of us ever thinks we’ll get in a car accident, let alone a serious one involving a rollover or other trapped situation. But, they happen all too often and when they do, you will have only a matter of seconds to act to save your life or the life of someone you love. Stats show that you are likely to witness 2-3 serious accidents in your lifetime. The EXTRACTOR is designed to be out-of-sight but always within easy and secure reach, ready to spring into action when your need arises.

Risks and Challenges:

Most of the risks and challenges have already been overcome through testing and extensive design review during our very successful Prototype development phase.

  • Funding (amount & continuity)
    • A risk common to many startups. We are working several parallel channels to acquire adequate start-up funds for immediate and 6-12 month funding. This is to ensure necessary early product development,  production, and proper cash flow until sales are sufficient to sustain on-going operations and growth.
  • Overseas manufacturing and shipping … potential delays and added expense
    • Using high quality but lower cost manufacturing in China is attractive from a cost perspective BUT can be challenging and somewhat risky without experience and proper management. We have retained a US expert in the selection and management of Chinese manufacturers. Using this expert, we have made our “source selection” of the best choice for our needs, and this consultant has already traveled to meet and coordinate with them several times to work key production issues such as mold development, materials selection, scheduling, etc.
  • Market penetration given the range and maturity of existing competitors:
    • The market for vehicle “EXTRACTOR” tools is by no means new and includes several competitors. We have done extensive research into our competition to ensure that we have a unique and attractive product that is priced to compete. We offer several KEY discriminating features not provided by ANY other competitor:
      • Sun Visor Mounting for quick, secure and easy access, even when trapped by your seatbelt upside down. Every other competing device is mounted or stored OUT OF REACH!
      • Carbon Tungsten Tip for our glass breaker. Others without this quality have proven to fail when tested.
      • Super Sharp Belt Cutter w/Longer Access Glide to ensure easier use during stressful and time urgent application.
    • Added features  augment basic functions (ice scraper edge for snow & ice, hex bit 1/4 to 1/2 inch heads, ruler) that make our tool very competitive.

Other Ways You Can Help:

We understand not everyone can contribute funds to support our effort.  Whether you’re a Contributor/Buyer or not, please help us get the word out on our Campaign and our life-saving tool … YOU can help us save lives. Use the Indiegogo “Share Tools”, your social media connections, your email network, etc. to help us get the word out on the existence of the EXTRACTOR.  Encourage all to contribute to our Campaign to bring the EXTRACTOR  to market as soon as possible! Help us save lives … who knows, the next one may be yours or someone you love.

  • Visit our Website at www.EXTRACTOR.us
  • Visit our Facebook Page at https://www.facebook.com/Extractor.us/

  • Window Breaker Tip – Easily     Breaks Side Window Glass

Ice Scraper Edge to Clean Ice & Snow Off Windows

  • Hex Bit Drivers to Screw / Unscrew Hex Nuts
  • Seatbelt Cutter Quickly Slices Thru Stuck Seat Belt
story_txt:
I’m Jesse Morgan, 
I was motivated to invent the EXTRACTOR due to my own serious accident 10 years ago. I was hit head-on by a drunk driver, rolled my car and was trapped upside down as my car caught fire.  A family driving by stopped, broke my side window and cut my seatbelt to get me out … they are my heroes … they saved my life. My accident and others like it I’ve heard over the years led me to invent a multi-purpose, easy access device, that can save lives in these situations.

You Don’t Need it ‘Till You Do … Then It’s a LIFE SAVING Tool!
What We Need:
We are now moving aggressively to transition from our successful “Proof of Concept” Prototype to our first production run of 5,000 units.  We need $35,000 to accomplish this critical phase of bringing the EXTRACTOR to market. 
What You Get:
We’ve created an attractive range of “Perks” associated with various donation or investment levels for this campaign. With the exception of our lowest level, each one features the EXTRACTOR  tool in varying quantities, so you will get the safety and protection my invention provides.  With the higher level packages, several tools are provided so you can share the “Gift of Life” among your loved ones and others that could benefit from our vehicle safety tool.
The Impact:
There are over 255 million vehicles on the road in the US … over 1.2 Billion worldwide. In 2015, there were over 6 million car accidents each year, with 27% of those resulting in injury and 6% resulting in a fatality.  Not ONE of us ever thinks we’ll get in a car accident, let alone a serious one involving a rollover or other trapped situation. But, they happen all too often and when they do, you will have only a matter of seconds to act to save your life or the life of someone you love. Stats show that you are likely to witness 2-3 serious accidents in your lifetime. The EXTRACTOR is designed to be out-of-sight but always within easy and secure reach, ready to spring into action when your need arises.
Risks and Challenges:
Most of the risks and challenges have already been overcome through testing and extensive design review during our very successful Prototype development phase.

Funding (amount & continuity)A risk common to many startups. We are working several parallel channels to acquire adequate start-up funds for immediate and 6-12 month funding. This is to ensure necessary early product development,  production, and proper cash flow until sales are sufficient to sustain on-going operations and growth.

Overseas manufacturing and shipping … potential delays and added expenseUsing high quality but lower cost manufacturing in China is attractive from a cost perspective BUT can be challenging and somewhat risky without experience and proper management. We have retained a US expert in the selection and management of Chinese manufacturers. Using this expert, we have made our “source selection” of the best choice for our needs, and this consultant has already traveled to meet and coordinate with them several times to work key production issues such as mold development, materials selection, scheduling, etc.

Market penetration given the range and maturity of existing competitors:
The market for vehicle “EXTRACTOR” tools is by no means new and includes several competitors. We have done extensive research into our competition to ensure that we have a unique and attractive product that is priced to compete. We offer several KEY discriminating features not provided by ANY other competitor:

Sun Visor Mounting for quick, secure and easy access, even when trapped by your seatbelt upside down. Every other competing device is mounted or stored OUT OF REACH!

Carbon Tungsten Tip for our glass breaker. Others without this quality have proven to fail when tested.

Super Sharp Belt Cutter w/Longer Access Glide to ensure easier use during stressful and time urgent application.


Added features  augment basic functions (ice scraper edge for snow & ice, hex bit 1/4 to 1/2 inch heads, ruler) that make our tool very competitive.



Other Ways You Can Help:
We understand not everyone can contribute funds to support our effort.  Whether you’re a Contributor/Buyer or not, please help us get the word out on our Campaign and our life-saving tool … YOU can help us save lives. Use the Indiegogo “Share Tools”, your social media connections, your email network, etc. to help us get the word out on the existence of the EXTRACTOR.  Encourage all to contribute to our Campaign to bring the EXTRACTOR  to market as soon as possible! Help us save lives … who knows, the next one may be yours or someone you love.


Visit our Website at www.EXTRACTOR.us

Visit our Facebook Page at https://www.facebook.com/Extractor.us/




Window Breaker Tip – Easily     Breaks Side Window Glass

Ice Scraper Edge to Clean Ice & Snow Off Windows


Hex Bit Drivers to Screw / Unscrew Hex Nuts



Seatbelt Cutter Quickly Slices Thru Stuck Seat Belt

story:
Do you love to have fun in the great outdoors but hate the hassle of getting all your gear from the garage to the next exciting location?  Well we felt the same way and that is why we created “The Quantum Transporter.”  Our product makes moving all your gear easy, painless and fast.  We’ll pride ourselves on providing a product that is as versatile and adventurous as the market it will serve.  

The goal of this campaign is to reach like-minded people for collaboration, and also to help us raise funds to make the QT a reality. With a contribution to this campaign you’ll have early access to the Transporter, and also some great rewards.  We could also use your help by spreading the word to your friends that a new solution is just around the corner!  The more people we can get thinking about “The Quantum Transporter” and all it’s benefits, the faster we can make it a reality for us all!  A big objective of this campaign is to  bring you up to speed on all our efforts and the great progress we have made.  Beyond that we encourage you to ask us questions, and help us get others involved. We think you’ll agree the Quantum Transporter provides an easier way to pack your gear and move with the flow of life!

We have successfully created a device that solves a nagging problem: transporting the gear we love on the roof of our vehicles.  This is the classic example of the mother of invention being necessity!  With our unique design and innovative solution, we have made a device that is as essential as the gear it carries.  Our manufacturers dedication to quality will make the QT something you’ll be proud to have on your vehicle, for many years to come.

With your contribution you will receive some really cool perks and become part of the solution! This is just the beginning of an awesome journey, and we want you to be part of it! But wait, do you have friends that could benefit from the QT?  Share this with them through word of mouth, emails and social media and have them do the same ...you are a world changer why not start to make a difference in 2016!


What is a Quantum Transporter?

“The functionality of a trailer with the convenience of a roof rack”  

The QT is a sled deck that deploys from the roof of your car,and lets you load and secure your gear at waist level,and then with the push of a button  move it  to the top of your vehicle without having to lift, and maneuver your gear overhead, it will transport almost anything related to outdoor activity!

• Kayaks

• Bikes

• Paddle Boards

• Skis

• Powered Paragliding units

• Tailgating Sports Events

• Picnic supplies

• Even for transporting home improvement material

And much much more!

The full functionality of the QT can be seen below:


Overview

As we get older, finding adventure and then getting there with your gear can be challenging. Working together we can change this, one “Quantum Transporter” at a time!  Finding out you can move your gear with ease will be life changing. Empower us to make this vision a reality with a contribution to this project today,and Thank You!

Perks

  

The Indiegogo promotional price for the Quantum Transporter is $3,787 by donating a small amount now you will receive some of our amazing merchandise as well as an incredible discount on the unit. All contributors to this campaign will receive the option to buy the Transporter months before it is available to the general public.

About us


Our company is passionate with creating an unmatched solution that’s easy, and hassle free for your transporting needs. Our company will run the business based on our mission statement “Innovating to move what moves you”.

Life is Motion Group LLC was established as a family effort around the prospect of making the transportation of recreational and sporting equipment a much simpler task.

The Principals involved are:

Robert C Baxter JR

Bob has spent his adult years working in the trades, his journey has involved him in everything from building houses and hotels in his earlier years, to running a Cable TV construction company, later on to add to his repetra he became involved in heavy construction,building water treatment facilities throughout New England. His involvement in these very mechanized industries has been paramount to the vision and creation of the Quantum Transporter.

Robert C Baxter Sr,(1934 to 2015)

He is Dearly Missed. Bob SR spent his life working for what was then called The Bell System telephone company, he entered this profession as a young janitor and with hard work and determination rose in the ranks to become a first line supervisor. During  the break up of the Bell System in 1982 he accepted a retirement package and went on to start a new chapter in his life. He found his next calling through his faith and with his wife created a missionary organization called Lifeline Ministry's their goal was to install phone systems in schools and hospitals in third world countries across the globe. After losing his wife to cancer in 1988 he found strength to carry on in God and physical activity. Bob Sr has been the driving force for the project and it is with heavy hearts and much much dismay Bob Sr won't see the Quantum Transporter come to full production.

Cheryl A Baxter

Cheryl's early years raising kids on a farm in New England to being a pivotal player in a building restoration company, later on she used her organization skills to become a professional assistant to a prominent New York Senator. Upon  retirement married Bob Sr in 1998 and together they developed a whole new passion for biking and kayaking throughout the years the have biked and Kayaked throughout New England into Canada and all along the east coast. Cheryl's unmatched drive and creative thought is what has taken the Quantum Transporter from the drawing board to the workshop with great enthusiasm.

COMING SOON TO THE TEAM: YOU!

Design Concept

From the Founder Robert Baxter:

“The Quantum Transporter was conceived back in 2011. While watching my father and his wife struggle to load their 17 foot Kayaks onto the roof of their car, my thoughts were there has to be a better way to accomplish this task! After an extensive search on the internet it became clear that a better loading option wasn't available and so the Idea for the Quantum Transporter was hatched.”

Timeline

Prototypes

Images and videos of the first prototype can be seen below:


Images and video of the second prototype can be seen below:



How You Can Help

For us to bring the “The Quantum Transporter” to life, we need your support!

Your funding will help us get the drawings to an engineering firm for final production design. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly, your support gives you the chance to be one of the first users of the “The Quantum Transporter”. The Quantum Transporter will serve many people in many different markets, and we are committed to continuously reaching out so we are always giving people the best possible transportation solutions.

Spinal Cord Injuries

One activity that has become popular within the parapeligic community is Hand cycling. This is an amazing activity, made possible with forward thinking and new technology.The cycles used for this activity are typically quite long, and have a three wheeled stance making them wider, and more difficult for an individual to transport. With the Quantum Transporter an individual with limited mobility, can independently load and transport their cycle, when ever the urge arises! Part of the design of the QT is the sled decks deploy-able legs option. Depending on the situation the QT's sled deck can be deployed with the legs left in the retracted position,this allows the sled to descend to ground level so the user can simply roll their apparatus onto the sled deck,secure in position, and with the push of a button retract it to the roof of the vehicle ready for travel!
If you or someone you know could benefit from this technology, we would love to have you be part of the team, and the solution. Would you contribute today to make this very important product available to all living with limited independence?
Thank You
The QT Team

We will also be using the funding to:

•  Expand the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as enterprise solutions of the “The Quantum Transporter”

•  Further customize the first version of the “The Quantum Transporter”

•  Create additional products and services that will compliment “The Quantum Transporter”

The “The Quantum Transporter” needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest!  Please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!

Others ways to help:

For us to bring this vision to life, we need your support!

If you aren't able to make a monetary donation, but would like to contribute to the campaign mission, there are plenty of other ways to help!

Share this campaign with someone else.

At its core, this campaign is about helping people. You are contributing to this campaign by passing on the awareness. The success of this campaign is directly correlated with the number of people who view this page. If you can increase that number, you are making a tangible contribution to the mission.

How We'll Use the Funds:

We need $40,000 in order to break “The Quantum Transporter” onto the market. That will includes marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for start-up.


Final Thank You 

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read our campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “The Quantum Transporter” family.

 THIS IS  BIGGER THAN YOU THINK

  "QUANTUM  TRANSPORTER"

story:
Contribute $499 and get a Melonboard -Shipping by air starts in late August 2015 

               
Specs

Range - 18 miles
Top Speed - 18 MPH
Maximum grade - 15 % 
Motor - 1200 watt 
10 MPH Cruise controll
Regenerative Braking
Charge time - 2.5 - 3.0 hours
Battery - Li-ion
Wheels - 78 A, 80 % rebounce, 83mm diameter / 52mm width 
Battery capacity - 8 AH 
Battery cells quantity - 6 pcs 
Transmission model - Synchronous Belt Drive
Motor type - Brushless Direct Current 
Weight - 13.2 pounds/ 6 kilos
Wheel Material - Polyurethane
Max rider weight - 100 kg
Deck dimension - 915mm *215mm


                       

                        



Stretch Goals

MelonBoard is a highly portable transportation device that has an amazing range, top speed and power.


BACKGROUND


The MelonBoard was designed to be easy to use, lightweight, portable and have enough range to take you anywhere. The board weighs in at less than 13 pounds competing with the top 3 brands on the market. The motor gives enough power to take you 18 miles per hour and take you 18 miles per charge. Everything is controlled through a radio frequency remote that allows you to control acceleration and braking


Whether you are going to class, work, running errands or go to the beach, small distances have always been a problem. Not only do you build up a sweat when you take your bicycle those 10 kilometers to work, you also have to find a place to lock it. At MelonBoard we though it had to be a better, more affordable solution. There are a lot of different electric skateboards on the market, but they are either $1000 or more. We wanted to make an affordable solution to the short distance problem and the high price on electric longboards. Our early backers will get the board for  $499  making it the best priced electric longboard on the market. 


We have been working on making the board perfect over the last 2 years and have finally made a model that suits every rider. The time engineering and designing the Melonboard have been an amazing and fun adventure, and we can not wait until it gets out on the market. All this is now a reality because of the world class team I put together. I have done most of the part myself, but there are times where you have to let professionals do the work. There have been a lot of people helping me on the way to this point, and thanks to them, the Melonboard dream will come true. With a lot of support from family and friends, I built the MelonBoard to be simple to use, breathtaking design and mind blowing to ride.


              Melonboard hoodie: $40                                         Melonboard T-shirt: $25

____________________________________________________________________

MelonBoard have the CE certificate making us able to sell to most of the countries in Europe.

Austria - Belgium - Bulgaria - Croatia - Cyprus - Czech Republic - Denmark - Estonia Finland - France - Germany - Greece - Hungary - Iceland - Ireland - Italy - Latvia - Liechtenstein - Lithuania - Luxembourg - Malta - Netherlands - Norway - Poland - Portugal - Romania - Slovakia - Slovenia - Spain - Sweden - Switzerland - Turkey - United Kingdom



The MelonBoard is designed in Norway where functionality, modern and convenience is the top priorities. The battery construction is built so it is comfortable to carry, flexible and strong. It is designed with a smooth matt black surface to give a (nice) design. 

__________________________________________________________________________                                                 
                                           

MelonBoard Battery and technology


With our battery technology Melonboard will take you anywhere within 18 miles. You can comfortably take the board to school and work without worrying about if you will run out of battery. Our technology is similar to what used in Tesla Model S, and one of our stretch goals is to have a super charger which will make you recharge the board in less than 90 minutes instead of 180 minutes. The 18 miles you get in one charge is through all kind of terrain, uphill and downhill. Most of our testriders got even more, it all depends on riding style and the riders weight. The Melonboard has technology that allows you for a smooth start, acceleration and braking thanks to a sensor we installed in the motor. The program Melonnboard is running on, constantly monitor each cell of our Lithium Ion Battery to make sure they are running on peak performance. There are also a safety software installed to protect the battery if the cells reach a certain voltage than can cause damage to the battery.

The Melonboard thinks for itself, you do not have to do anything. Just enjoy the thrilling power of a close to 2 horsepower motor on a 6 kilogram longboard, and you are in controll of its powers.

_____________________________________________________________________________                                              

MelonBoard Deck and Motor


MelonBoard has a 9 layer high quality Canadian Maple deck. It is known to be flexible and strong. We have chosen the most durable grip tapes to withstand everyday use. Our motor is compact, durable and strong. We have chosen a simple, yet highly durable belt design following the "Keep it simple stupid". The motor has almost 2 horsepowers making it really strong and can take you up a 15 degree at 10 miles per hour. Both the deck, trucks, battery case, belt, and motor have a matt casual design where our light green wheels make a huge color contrast. The history behind this was that electric longboard in Norway was not totally legal on public roads so I tried to make it not noticeable. 

In the box

- MelonBoard

- Radio frequency remote controller

- T-shape MelonBoard multitool

- Universal quick charger

- MelonBoard user manual


MelonBoard is 100 % ecofriendly and will cost you less than $15 in electricity if you ride it every day for a whole year. Put away the bike and jump on a Melonboard and it will take you 18 miles in any direction.

____________________________________________________________________________ 

             


Thank you!

A big thank you to Niccolo de Zambiasi for making the breathtaking video. Ariel Film for making interviews and guidance, "Grunderhuset" for helping me with the project and that you took my idea 2 years ago seriously and did not judge me because of my age and education level. A big thanks you to DIGISPACE and MEMKIT for creating the website and helping me out with the campaign. Thank you Christian Smith, CEO of TrackRbravo for taking such care of me in USA and helping me on the way to launch the campaign. I could not have done this without Santa Barbara City College for its awesome teachers helping me out with ideas and solutions. A big thanks you to my mentors Jonathan Hall and Helge Krøgenes for guiding me all the way to this point. Last but not least, my family and friends for giving me motivation and ideas for the Melonboard.

All of this is thanks to you guys, I could never have done this myself. We are all a part of the Melonboard Team. Together we are going to create the biggest electric longboard company in the world. 

Please note that every city and country have their own laws about electric longboards. Please check your own country for laws or regulations.

 

FAQ


Can I ride the Melonboard in the rain?
 No! It is not safe to ride a longboard in the rain. It is very slippery and the water may damage the electronics. All the electronics are hidden under a cover underneath the deck. Water damage is not covered by the warranty! The cover is not waterproof or dust proof. We recommend driving the Melonboard in the same weather conditions as  you would for a normal longboard.

What is the riders weight limit on the board?
 The riders weight limit is 100 kg.
 

Can I push it like a normal board?
 Yes of course. You will experience a small drag because of the drivetrain connected to the rear wheel.  Other than that you can cruise like normal longboard.
 

Is the battery switchable?
 Yes, but with right tools. Be carefull when removing the battery case, wires to the motor are still attached. 

How do i get a new battery?
From our website.
 

How do I control the board?
You controll the Melonboard with a radio frequency remote controller allowing you to control acceleration and braking.
 

Can I ride the Melonboard up very steep hills?
 Yes of course, but no steeper than 15 %.

Can I brake going downhill?
No, the motor may get overheated. For the riders safety we highly recommend not to go down hill. The motor is fixed with the wheels. Turn OFF the Melonboard and ride it as a normal longboard.


Are there places where I can try a Melonboard before buying one?
 The Melonboard Team will post through our Facebook page promotion tours all around USA and Europe. We are trying to put Melonboards in local skateshops where people can try before purchasing. 
 

What will be the retail price?
 The MelonBoard will be retailed for a maximum price of $799
 

Do you ship to other countries than Eu, USA and Canada?
 As for now, we only do the countries within Eu, USA and Canada, but after the indiegogo campaign, we will prioritize world wide shipping as number 1.
-This does not include Alaska or Hawaii.
 

What is the warranty?
 The warranty is 90 days against manufacturing defects.
 

Where can I get replacement parts?
Replacement parts are easily purchased off our website.

Do I have to pay mva (Norwegian buyers)?
Yes, 25 % will be added to original price and will be done by our shipping company.
story_txt:
Contribute $499 and get a Melonboard -Shipping by air starts in late August 2015 
                

Specs

Range - 18 milesTop Speed - 18 MPHMaximum grade - 15 % Motor - 1200 watt 10 MPH Cruise controllRegenerative BrakingCharge time - 2.5 - 3.0 hoursBattery - Li-ionWheels - 78 A, 80 % rebounce, 83mm diameter / 52mm width Battery capacity - 8 AH Battery cells quantity - 6 pcs Transmission model - Synchronous Belt DriveMotor type - Brushless Direct Current Weight - 13.2 pounds/ 6 kilosWheel Material - PolyurethaneMax rider weight - 100 kgDeck dimension - 915mm *215mm
                       


                        



Stretch Goals




MelonBoard is a highly portable transportation device that has an amazing range, top speed and power.

BACKGROUND
The
MelonBoard was designed to be easy to use, lightweight, portable and have enough
range to take you anywhere. The board weighs in at less than 13 pounds
competing with the top 3 brands on the market. The motor gives enough power to
take you 18 miles per hour and take you 18 miles per charge. Everything is controlled
through a radio frequency remote that allows you to control acceleration and braking
Whether you are going to class, work, running errands or go to the beach, small distances have always been a problem. Not only do you build up a sweat when you take your bicycle those 10 kilometers to work, you also have to find a place to lock it. At MelonBoard we though it had to be a better, more affordable solution. There are a lot of different electric skateboards on the market, but they are either $1000 or more. We wanted to make an affordable solution to the short distance problem and the high price on electric longboards. Our early backers will get the board for  $499  making it the best priced electric longboard on the market. 
We have been working on making the board perfect over the last 2 years and have finally made a model that suits every rider. The time engineering and designing the Melonboard have been an amazing and fun adventure, and we can not wait until it gets out on the market. All this is now a reality because of the world class team I put together. I have done most of the part myself, but there are times where you have to let professionals do the work. There have been a lot of people helping me on the way to this point, and thanks to them, the Melonboard dream will come true. With a lot of support from family and friends, I built the MelonBoard to be simple to use, breathtaking design and mind blowing to ride.              Melonboard hoodie: $40                                         Melonboard T-shirt: $25


____________________________________________________________________

MelonBoard have the CE certificate making us able to sell to most of the countries in Europe.Austria - Belgium - Bulgaria - Croatia - Cyprus - Czech Republic - Denmark - Estonia Finland - France - Germany - Greece - Hungary - Iceland - Ireland - Italy - Latvia - Liechtenstein - Lithuania - Luxembourg - Malta - Netherlands - Norway - Poland - Portugal - Romania - Slovakia - Slovenia - Spain - Sweden - Switzerland - Turkey - United Kingdom
The MelonBoard is designed in Norway where functionality, modern and convenience is the top priorities. The battery construction is built so it is comfortable to carry, flexible and strong. It is designed with a smooth matt black surface to give a (nice) design. 

__________________________________________________________________________                                                                                             MelonBoard Battery and technologyWith our battery technology Melonboard will take you anywhere within 18 miles. You can comfortably take the board to school and work without worrying about if you will run out of battery. Our technology is similar to what used in Tesla Model S, and one of our stretch goals is to have a super charger which will make you recharge the board in less than 90 minutes instead of 180 minutes. The 18 miles you get in one charge is through all kind of terrain, uphill and downhill. Most of our testriders got even more, it all depends on riding style and the riders weight. The Melonboard has technology that allows you for a smooth start, acceleration and braking thanks to a sensor we installed in the motor. The program Melonnboard is running on, constantly monitor each cell of our Lithium Ion Battery to make sure they are running on peak performance. There are also a safety software installed to protect the battery if the cells reach a certain voltage than can cause damage to the battery.The Melonboard thinks for itself, you do not have to do anything. Just enjoy the thrilling power of a close to 2 horsepower motor on a 6 kilogram longboard, and you are in controll of its powers.

_____________________________________________________________________________                                              

MelonBoard Deck and Motor
MelonBoard has a 9 layer high quality Canadian Maple deck. It is known to be flexible and strong. We have chosen the most durable grip tapes to withstand everyday use. Our motor is compact, durable and strong. We have chosen a simple, yet highly durable belt design following the "Keep it simple stupid". The motor has almost 2 horsepowers making it really strong and can take you up a 15 degree at 10 miles per hour. Both the deck, trucks, battery case, belt, and motor have a matt casual design where our light green wheels make a huge color contrast. The history behind this was that electric longboard in Norway was not totally legal on public roads so I tried to make it not noticeable. 
In the box
- MelonBoard
- Radio frequency remote controller
- T-shape MelonBoard multitool
- Universal quick charger
- MelonBoard user manual
MelonBoard is 100 % ecofriendly and will cost you less than $15 in electricity if you ride it every day for a whole year. Put away the bike and jump on a Melonboard and it will take you 18 miles in any direction.
____________________________________________________________________________ 
             


Thank you!
A big thank you to Niccolo de Zambiasi for making the breathtaking video. Ariel Film for making interviews and guidance, "Grunderhuset" for helping me with the project and that you took my idea 2 years ago seriously and did not judge me because of my age and education level. A big thanks you to DIGISPACE and MEMKIT for creating the website and helping me out with the campaign. Thank you Christian Smith, CEO of TrackRbravo for taking such care of me in USA and helping me on the way to launch the campaign. I could not have done this without Santa Barbara City College for its awesome teachers helping me out with ideas and solutions. A big thanks you to my mentors Jonathan Hall and Helge Krøgenes for guiding me all the way to this point. Last but not least, my family and friends for giving me motivation and ideas for the Melonboard.All of this is thanks to you guys, I could never have done this myself. We are all a part of the Melonboard Team. Together we are going to create the biggest electric longboard company in the world. 
Please note that every city and country have their own laws about electric longboards. Please check your own country for laws or regulations. FAQ



Can I ride the
Melonboard in the rain?
No! It is not safe to ride a longboard in the rain. It is very slippery and the water may damage the electronics. All the electronics are hidden under a cover
underneath the deck. Water damage is not covered by the warranty! The cover is
not waterproof or dust proof. We recommend driving the Melonboard in the same
weather conditions as  you would for a normal longboard.

What is the riders weight limit on the board?
The riders weight limit is 100 kg.
 
Can I push it like a
normal board?
Yes of course. You will experience a small drag because of the drivetrain connected to the rear wheel.  Other than that you can cruise like normal longboard.
 
Is the battery
switchable?
Yes, but with right tools. Be carefull when removing the battery case, wires to the motor are still attached. How do i get a new battery?From our website.
 
How do I control the
board?You controll the Melonboard with a radio frequency remote controller allowing you
to control acceleration and braking.
 
Can I ride the
Melonboard up very steep hills?
Yes of course, but no steeper than 15 %.Can I brake going downhill?No, the motor may get overheated. For the riders safety we highly recommend not to go down hill. The motor is fixed with the wheels. Turn OFF the Melonboard and ride it as a normal longboard.


Are there places where I can try a Melonboard before buying one?
The Melonboard Team will post through our Facebook page promotion tours all
around USA and Europe. We are trying to put Melonboards in local skateshops where people can try before purchasing. 
 
What will be the
retail price?
The MelonBoard will be retailed for a maximum price of $799
 
Do you ship to other
countries than Eu, USA and Canada?
As for now, we only do the countries within Eu, USA and Canada, but after the
indiegogo campaign, we will prioritize world wide shipping as number 1.-This does not include Alaska or Hawaii.
 
What is the
warranty?
The warranty is 90 days against manufacturing defects.
 
Where can I get
replacement parts?Replacement parts are easily purchased off our website.

Do I have to pay mva (Norwegian buyers)?Yes, 25 % will be added to original price and will be done by our shipping
company.

story:
Boozhoo,

 

I'm a 24 year-old Anishinaabe kwe from the Aamjiwnaang First Nation, located in Canada's Chemical Valley. I've been volunteering to bring awareness to the health and environmental issues resulting from the Chemical Valley. I am an organizer with the group Aamjiwnaang and Sarnia Against Pipelines (ASAP). I also independently travel to publicly speak about environmental racism to classes and community events across the region. 

 

However, organizing requires reliable transportation to meetings in both Aamjiwnaang and Sarnia. We just lost our car that was used to pick up folks who needed rides to gatherings and bringing materials to meetings. A car would also help us to regularly connect to all groups in the surrounding area to continue our build Indigenous solidarity.

 

Please support our on-the-ground efforts to bring health and environmental issues in our community. 

 

Visit us at http://www.aamjiwnaangsolidarity.com

story:
Epic Brief

Radical Illumination for the Bold & Inspired: Epic LEDs is dedicated to creating easy-to-install and use stand-alone LED strip light kits for bicycles, motorcycles, scooters and more. Our kits feature 12V Lithium power for brighter longer lasting lighting impact. Our rechargeable battery pack comes with a water resistant zipper case and integrates into the LED strip lights system with quick-connect connectors. Epic LED kits come in a variety of colors including RGB variable colors. 

Crowdfunding Podcast recording from 11/20/2015

Click Here -->

Background Story

My name is Christopher Wiggins and I have devoted most of my career to designing and developing consumer products in the sporting goods and light electric vehicle space. I recently founded Epic LEDs as a pilot project to help support our other primary business Glide Cruisers, USA. In 2010, I founded Glide which designs and manufacturers a premium line of electric-drive stand-up cycles: 

Although we have seen some success, We have been doing everything we can to grow this company on a bootstrap budget! Earlier this year, we started engineering on a new budget model series (SR line) that will help grow our business and the Glide brand! And we are excited about it: 

However, these models will not have "built-in" lighting like our first model series and thus I felt the need for stand-alone light accessories. So earlier this year I created Epic LEDs to help accessorize the new models for Glide, but also found that nobody in the field had done a self-powered 12V LED lighting kit for bikes, motorcycles or scooters. The key was that I needed a compact rechargeable 12V battery that could easily be attached to a bike or motorcycle in addition to quick-connect LED strip features in an easy to install light kit. 

End result - after working with a number of key suppliers, I have devised a great series of LED light kits that will be perfect for Glide and I think a fun and functional solution for bicycle, motorcycle and scooter enthusiasts! Here's a few highlights:

  • Rechargeable 12V Lithium Battery produces super bright and vibrant light
  • Modular kit with quick-connect lights have glue strips and are easy to install
  • Water resistant Zipper Case for Battery Velcro's to bike frame
  • Lots of fun colors to choose from Including RGB Variable colors.



So this campaign, if successful will help launch our new series of LED light kits and also support the growth and success of Glide with our highly anticipated new line of products for 2016! 
Thank you for reading this far! If intrigued - please continue on. 
What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise a minimum of $2,500 through the exceptional practical value and price for light kit sales through this campaign. The anticipated financial success here (going beyond our initial goal) will give us enough momentum with Epic LEDs to support additional marketing and advertising activities to ultimately grow the company to a sustainable entity.

In addition, our bigger more loftier goal is that "huge success" with our Epic LEDs campaign (beyond $15k) can mean that we will support additional R&D for Glide's planned expansion (one of which is an off-road dual suspension model :-)) and become the other successful revenue channel as an accessory line for Glide! 
Are you're in? If so, thank you so much for your support!

The Impact

This is one of those rare situations where even moderate success of our campaign can cause big ripple effects of success in lots of directions for our projects. Even if we do not have huge numbers here - a little success has the potential of going a long way.. so we hope that you see some value in it for you in the perks and will help us reach our goal! Besides, maybe you will have huge amounts of fun riding a radically lit up bike at night...

A little about the Perks:

  • We have (4) LED light kits to choose from and a variety of great perks to share with you!
  • We are also offering a combination of kits with extra perks for those who want to give these as gifts to that deserving someone..

  • These light kits make your bike, scooter or motorcycle light up like a whirlwind of fun and well... it also makes you more visible at night -- thus safer!
  • Ever hear of BikeParty? These fit right in with that venue and we have a number of participants riding with them. Check Facebook to see if there is one in your city.. Lots of lighted bikes and super fun!
  • Perks starting at $80 and up come with an Epic "Light Your Ride" T-Shirt or light-weight Hoodie! Here's the "Light Your Ride" graphic we devised:


  • Interested in making this a part of your Christmas gift plan this year? We would love that and want to help. Since we won't actually have inventory until January, will be offering those who want to give EPIC as a gift the option of having this card sent as a "place-holder" till the product arrives:


  • Our limited top-tier Perk offers those who have a higher level interest in our Glide project the chance to be part of it! Our $2500 perk will include the opportunity to be one of the first to own our new SR24 series Glide Cruiser in addition to of course a special edition Epic LED light kit (pre-installed on the SR24) and were even tossing in a "Light Your Ride" T-shirt. These perks will not be available until we complete our next Production run in Feb 2016 but an exceptional value! (Limited to 25)


Risks & Challenges

The good news is - that there really isn't any big risk in this project that I can see. We have already done the research, engineering and testing. The product works great and we have sold some to friend and family! I suppose the fact that I am dealing with overseas suppliers is a risk - mostly with time to receive goods. But I have been dealing with these group of suppliers for years now and have had good results - and a comfort level with them. Lastly, I do need to deal with the issue of shipping in quantity if this project is hugely successful. 

  • Our product is tested and ready go!
  • Once we gauge demand, we will start our first production
  • We may have anticipated larger quantity shipping hurdles, but have over 25 years of experience with consumer goods manufacturing so are confident.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able or interested in participating in my project directly through buying one of our kits or perks - there are other ways you can help:

  • It would be really awesome (either way actually) if you could make some noise about our campaign!! You know Facebook, Twitter, etc! 
  • Or maybe good ole "word of mouth" - tell your friend or family member. Maybe they would like to have an Epic light kit for their bike?
  • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools right here!

Questions? Feel free to email me here: chris@epicleds.com

THANKS AGAIN!!

story:
VERSION FRANCAISE EN DESSOUS

 

“If opportunity does not knock, build a door.”

 

WHAT WE'RE UP TO

“Don’t do things better.  Do better things.”

Have you ever felt like showing up at the airport with a friend and hopping on the next flight to somewhere cool?  Right now, that’s probably still a dream (unless you make a ton of money, in which case, please call us).  I mean, there are so many empty seats yet the airlines want more money today than they did yesterday for them.  To us, this just doesn’t make any sense.

 

 

 

 

 

So we’re going to propose something a bit……. interesting.  We’re creating an Unlimited Flight Pass for the airport.  Yes, pay one flat monthly rate and fly wherever you want, anytime you want.  It’s in the works.  But like Pulp Fiction or any other good Quentin Tarantino movie, let’s take a step back:

We have launched a new platform where airlines can drop their unsold seats at the last minute (within 1-7 days of departure).  FlyScribers see a new “menu” of places they can fly to everyday.  Prices are flat (round trip), and customers will be able to choose from a “Pay As You Go” version or a subscription that includes flights.  Want to fly with friends?  Just enter their emails at checkout.

 

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU

We have 2 stages in our development: the FlyScribe Club and the Unlimited Pass!

The FlyScribe Club: Opening in June 2018

The principle is simple: You can subscribe to the club for 50€ per year, which will give you access to our service. You can choose any of our flights which are all at flat fares (so you always know what you'll pay), typically 20 to 50€ lower than the market, at the last minute (up to 7 days before departure). There again, no research, no booking. You will get your tickets in 2 mins.

 

The Unlimited Pass: Coming in 2019

Here again, the principle is very simple. It's an unlimited pass for last-minute flights! You pay a monthly subscription to fly as much as you want!

 

THE REWARDS

“Today you are you, that is truer than true.  There is no one alive who is youer than you.”

Notes:

1 €10:  Thank you!  Your contribution keeps us rolling.  We’ll sign you up for our exclusive deals, travel news, and our cool city Adventure Plans.  Expect to see departures from London, Barcelona, Madrid, Berlin, Amsterdam soon in 2018 and we’ll let you know when they’re live.  Also be the first to get alerted when we extend our offerings (city alerts, last-min hotels, upgrades)

2 €50:  Club membership.  1-year membership (flights not included) to the FlyScribe portal where you can choose from a list of destinations, all at flat fares, typically €20-€50 lower than market prices. No additional monthly payment.  For those outside our current/next cities:  sign up now and your membership will continue from now until a year after we launch your city!  Note:  outside the Indiegogo campaign we will be offering this at €10/mo, so now is your chance to save €70 by paying upfront and supporting us!

3 €90:  Club membership for TWO. Bring a friend! 1-year membership (flights not included) FOR TWO to the FlyScribe club. Yes, it can be a different friend each time. No additional monthly payment. Want to take off next weekend? Don't bother searching. You always know what you'll pay. Just pick your destination, pack your bags and go.

4 €149:  The Mystery Flight.  Promotion only through 31 May.
Fly blind! Destination-less flying is here. Only top airlines.

€0:  You can still help!  Share the campaign and get entered into our contest for one cool prize (surprise!).  The more you share, the more entries you get.

 

WHAT WE NEED

“If I can only scrape a living, at least it will be a living worth scraping.”

We need help and time to build all of our ideas. We’re completely bootstrapped and everything we raise will get reinvested into the company – we really want to just build this company into a success.  Here’s a breakdown:

Timeline:  At the moment, we're offering departures out of Paris (medium-haul flights around Europe) and expect to open up other European origin cities in the summer.  For those outside Paris who contribute €50, your membership will be valid through 1 year after the date we launch in your city.  We're working out of our MVP at the moment, and we have a ton of features and new cities that we plan to roll out very soon.  We're also working on integrating last-minute hotel offers, and all of this will be available to our FlyScribers as we roll them out.  Also to come... the Unlimited Flight Pass!!!  :D

 

WHAT WE'VE DONE

“If it ain’t broke, break it.”

We’ve gotten underway in early 2018 and have taken some big steps!  We sent our first FlyScriber over to Porto, gotten a number of others waiting to fly, and flown around the world for pitch competitions.  Airlines have been super receptive to the idea and now it's time for the big push!  Check out some of our milestones:

WHO WE REALLY ARE

“Be who you are and say what you feel because those who mind don’t matter, and those who matter don’t mind.”

We are a group of travel junkies who are here to change the airline industry.  Recent MBAs from top business schools (HEC Paris and INSEAD), we got bored of our corporate jobs in investment banking, consulting, and project management and have decided to go all-in in one of the toughest sectors to crack.  We now need your help to get this done!  We want to build something a bit fun, a bit crazy, and hopefully a bit disruptive.  We’re full of ideas, and we’re going for it.

This industry needs a major transformation.  Let’s shake things up:  transparency, flexibility, and simplicity – together we can make this happen.

 

ABOUT THE FOUNDERS

“Why fit in when you were born to stand out?”

One of us has traveled to over 80 countries and scuba dives at night.  Another is a martial arts black belt and studies leglocks.  The third is a full-blown momma's boy who loves Wikipedia deep dives.  We rock climb, speak in GIFs, enjoy Will Ferrell/Jim Carrey/Adam Sandler movies, and like to disrupt things.

 

THE IMPACT

Our aim is not to raise a little bit of capital and move quietly behind the scenes.  We consider anyone who already has and who will help crowdfund us as partners – because it’s only together that we’re going to be able to create this change.

Airlines see so many small players enter and exit the industry so often, most with very similar value propositions.  If we’re able to show up and have a huge number of backers for our idea, it will certainly not be anything they could ignore!

Sign up.  Join us.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

“Don’t ask for permission.  Ask for forgiveness.”

The success of this venture (the way we currently envision it) relies on airline partnerships.  As of today, every airline we have spoken to has expressed great interest.  One went so far to ask us for exclusivity recently!  However, bureaucracy stands in the way.  This slow decision-making process is a risk for us and adds to our costs since time is money.

“If you always do what you’ve always done, you’ll always get what you’ve always got.”

So how do we deal with that?  Airlines have told us that if we’re able to show a high number of customers ready to go, this proof of concept will get it done.  This industry continues to do business the way they’ve always done and are typically weary of new thinking.  With enough support from you, together we’ll change something in a big way.

 

HELP!

“Don’t ask for permission.  Ask for forgiveness.”

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Want to help but can’t or just don’t feel like making a contribution?  Help us out by sharing this!  We need to get the word out, so any help here will go a long way :)  Out of all the entries, we'll pick one and offer them a free flight!

Find us in social media, tag us, tweet us, stalk us, whatever.  We want to hear from you.

If you’ve read this all, we sincerely appreciate it (more than you know).  More than anything, we’re having a lot of fun trying to create something like this and we’re glad that we can count on even the slightest bit of support.  Reach out to us:  we’d love to connect with you all. 

Thank you!!!

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Version Française

EN 10 SECS

FlyScribe est une plateforme sur laquelle vous pouvez obtenir des billets d’avion à la dernière minute (de 1 à 7 jours avant le départ), à un prix plus bas que celui du marché, sans faire la moindre recherche ni booking, le tout en moins de 2min !

Nous créons des partenariats avec les compagnies aériennes afin de vous mettre à disposition leurs invendus, à un prix attractif !

Rejoignez le club !

 

FLYSCRIBE ?!

Tout le monde aime voyager, mais il est difficile de le faire autant qu’on le voudrait. Le problème ? Les vols à la dernière minute sont trop chers et choisir et réserver son vol demande du temps. Nous sommes en train de changer tout ça. Nous créons une plateforme qui va vous permettre de voyager à la dernière minute pour un coût plus faible que celui du marché, sans effectuer la moindre recherche ou le moindre booking. Vous serez prêt à partir à l’aventure en 2 mins !

Nous allons même plus loin ! Nous créons un pass illimité pour les vols. Oui ! Vous payez un forfait mensuel, abordable, et vous prenez l'avion où vous voulez, quand vous voulez. C'est en cours d'élaboration ! Mais comme dans Pulp Fiction, prenons un peu de recul...

Nous avons lancé une nouvelle plateforme où les compagnies aériennes peuvent déposer leurs sièges invendus à la dernière minute (dans les 7 jours précédent le départ). Les FlyScribers ont accès à ce "menu" de destinations où ils peuvent voler.  Les prix sont fixes, c’est à dire que vous payez la même chose tout au long de l’année, et grâce à nos partenariats avec les compagnies aériennes, vous payez significativement moins cher que le prix du marché.

 

POUR VOUS

Nous avons 2 étapes dans notre développement: L’accès au club FlyScribe et le Pass Illimité !

Le Club FlyScribe : Ouvert en Juin 2018

Le principe est simple: Vous pouvez vous abonner au club pour 50€ par an, ce qui vous donnera accès à notre service. Vous obtiendrez des vols entre 20 et 50€ moins cher que le marché, toujours à la dernière minute (10 jours avant le départ). La encore, aucune recherche, aucun booking. Vous obtiendrez vos billets en 2min.

 

 

Le Pass Illimité: Courant 2019.

La encore le principe est très simple. C’est un pass navigo, mais pour les vols à la dernière minute ! Vous payez un abonnement mensuel et vous pouvez voler autant que vous le voulez !

€10 : Un grand merci ! Votre aide nous permets de construire notre rêve. Actuellement, nous proposons des vols au départ de Paris, mais nous déploierons de nouvelles villes en 2018.  Attendez-vous à voir Londres, Barcelone, Madrid, Berlin, Amsterdam durant la seconde partie de 2018.

€50 : 1 an d'abonnement (vols non inclus) au portail FlyScribe où vous pouvez choisir parmi une liste de destinations, toutes à des tarifs forfaitaires, généralement entre 20 et 50€ de moins que les prix du marché. Aucun paiement mensuel supplémentaire.  Pour ceux qui sont à l'extérieur de nos villes actuelles et futures : inscrivez-vous maintenant et votre adhésion se poursuivra jusqu'à un an après le lancement de votre ville ! Note : en dehors de la campagne Indiegogo, nous vous offrirons ce service à 10€/mois, vous avez donc maintenant la possibilité d'économiser 70€ en payant d'avance et en nous soutenant !

€90:  1 an d'abonnement pour DEUX. Amenez un ami ! Adhésion d'un an (vols non inclus) POUR DEUX au club FlyScribe. Oui, il peut s'agir d'un ami différent à chaque fois. Tu veux partir le week-end prochain ? Ne vous donnez pas la peine de chercher. Tu sais toujours ce que tu vas payer. Choisissez votre destination, faites vos bagages et partez.

€149 :  1 Mystery Flight  
Volez à l'aveugle ! Le Mystery Flight est là !

0€ : Vous pouvez encore aider !  Partagez la campagne et participez à notre concours pour un prix cool (surprise !).  Plus vous partagez, plus vous obtenez de chance de gagner.

 

CE DONT ON A BESOIN

Nous avons besoin d'aide et de temps pour développer toutes nos idées. Nous sommes complètement investis dans le projet et tout l’argent que nous récoltons est investi dans l'entreprise - son succès est notre seul préoccupation.  Voici en détail ce que nous ferons de l’argent:

Timeline 

Pour le moment nous offrons des départs de Paris pour l’Europe. Nous planifions l’ouverture d’autre villes durant l’été 2018.

Pour ceux d’entre vous qui contribueront à hauteur de 50€, votre abonnement d’un an commencera au moment où nous ouvrirons dans votre ville.

 

JUSQU'ICI...

Nous avons démarré l’aventure FlyScribe en Septembre 2017 et depuis, nous ne nous arrêtons plus !  Nous avons envoyé notre premier FlyScriber à Porto pour un week end et avons près de 400 personnes sur notre mailing list. Nous parcourons les plus grandes compétitions de startup du monde pour présenter notre projet. Nous avons été finalistes aux MBA Odyssey à New York et au EU Startup Summit à Barcelone, la plus grosse compétition européenne. Nous pitchons dans diverses compétitions à Paris et nous avons même eu la chance de remporter le concours Mentor Day à Tenerife dédié aux startups du tourisme.

Du côté des compagnies aériennes, nous avons obtenu notre premier "Oui" et nous avons déjà commencé à offrir leurs vols. Un acteur mondial majeur est également intéressé pour travailler avec nous et nous a demandé une version exclusive de notre service. Nous sommes toujours en discussion sur ce point, mais nous nourrissons de grands espoirs pour construire quelque chose d’énorme !

Nous avons également eu la chance d’intégrer Station F, le plus grand campus de startup en Europe.

 

QUI SOMMES NOUS ?

Nous sommes un groupe de “travel junkies” qui ont pour mission de “secouer” l’industrie aérienne. Récemment diplômés du MBA d’HEC Paris et d’INSEAD, nous n’en pouvions plus de nos métiers dans de grosses boîtes et nous avons décidé de lancer un business dans une industrie qui à grandement besoin de changement. Nous avons maintenant besoin de votre aide pour y arriver !

Nous voulons construire quelque chose d'amusant, un peu fou et, espérons-le, qui fera bouger les lignes. Nous débordons d'idées et d’énergie, et n’avons pas peur de tester nos idées parfois farfelus !

Cette industrie a besoin d'une transformation majeure. Secouons les chose et apportons transparence, flexibilité et simplicité. Ensemble, nous pouvons y arriver !

 

A PROPOS DES FONDATEURS

L’un de nous fait de la plongée sous-marine de nuit, l’autre est passionné d’art martiaux, le troisième adore Wikipedia. A nous trois nous avons voyagé dans dans plus de 100 pays. Nous parlons en GIF, apprécions les films de Will Ferrell/Jim Carrey, et aimons perturber les choses.

 

NOTRE IMPACT

Notre objectif n'est pas de lever un peu de capitaux et de faire ce projet tranquillement dans notre coin.

Notre mentalité est la suivante : Soit nous construisons le prochain AirBnB, soit nous faisons autre chose.

Mais comme Rome ne s’est pas construite en un jour, et encore moins toute seule, nous avons besoin de vous.

SI nous pouvons compter sur votre soutien, cela représentera une force qui nous aidera énormément lors de nos négociations avec les compagnies aériennes.

 

RISQUES ET CHALLENGES

Le succès de cette entreprise (tel que nous envisageons actuellement) repose sur des partenariats avec les compagnies aériennes. À ce jour, toutes les compagnies aériennes auxquelles nous avons parlé ont manifesté un grand intérêt. L’une d’elles nous a même demandé une exclusivité ! Cependant, la bureaucratie fait obstacle. Cette lenteur du processus décisionnel est un risque pour nous et augmente nos coûts. Le temps reste de l’argent, et c’est aujourd’hui notre seul resources.

Alors comment faire pour accélérer le processus ? Les compagnies aériennes sont comme tous les business, elles sont attirées par l'appât du gain. Si nous sommes en mesure de leur montrer une forte demande de votre part, la chaîne de décision avancera plus vite.

 

POUR FINIR

Vous voulez aider, mais vous ne pouvez pas ou n'avez pas envie d'apporter une contribution financière ? Aidez-nous en partageant le lien de la campagne sur votre facebook ou linkedin ! Chaque geste compte !

Si vous avez pris le temps de lire jusqu'ici, sachez que cela nous touche et que nous vous remercions chaleureusement. Avant toute chose, notre but est de vivre une aventure entrepreneuriale excitante et nous sommes heureux de pouvoir compter sur le moindre soutien.

N’hésitez pas à nous contacter, nous serons ravis d'entendre vos commentaires et d'entrer en contact avec vous tous. Un grand Merci !
story_txt: VERSION FRANCAISE EN DESSOUS “If opportunity does not knock, build a door.” WHAT WE'RE UP TO“Don’t do things better.  Do better things.”Have you ever felt like showing up at the airport with a friend and hopping on the next flight to somewhere cool?  Right now, that’s probably still a dream (unless you make a ton of money, in which case, please call us).  I mean, there are so many empty seats yet the airlines want more money today than they did yesterday for them.  To us, this just doesn’t make any sense.     So we’re going to propose something a bit……. interesting.  We’re creating an Unlimited Flight Pass for the airport.  Yes, pay one flat monthly rate and fly wherever you want, anytime you want.  It’s in the works.  But like Pulp Fiction or any other good Quentin Tarantino movie, let’s take a step back:We have launched a new platform where airlines can drop their unsold seats at the last minute (within 1-7 days of departure).  FlyScribers see a new “menu” of places they can fly to everyday.  Prices are flat (round trip), and customers will be able to choose from a “Pay As You Go” version or a subscription that includes flights.  Want to fly with friends?  Just enter their emails at checkout. WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOUWe have 2 stages in our development: the FlyScribe Club and the Unlimited Pass!The FlyScribe Club: Opening in June 2018The principle is simple: You can subscribe to the club for 50€ per year, which will give you access to our service. You can choose any of our flights which are all at flat fares (so you always know what you'll pay), typically 20 to 50€ lower than the market, at the last minute (up to 7 days before departure). There again, no research, no booking. You will get your tickets in 2 mins. The Unlimited Pass: Coming in 2019Here again, the principle is very simple. It's an unlimited pass for last-minute flights! You pay a monthly subscription to fly as much as you want! THE REWARDS“Today you are you, that is truer than true.  There is no one alive who is youer than you.”Notes:1 €10:  Thank you!  Your contribution keeps us rolling.  We’ll sign you up for our exclusive deals, travel news, and our cool city Adventure Plans.  Expect to see departures from London, Barcelona, Madrid, Berlin, Amsterdam soon in 2018 and we’ll let you know when they’re live.  Also be the first to get alerted when we extend our offerings (city alerts, last-min hotels, upgrades)2 €50:  Club membership.  1-year membership (flights not included) to the FlyScribe portal where you can choose from a list of destinations, all at flat fares, typically €20-€50 lower than market prices. No additional monthly payment.  For those outside our current/next cities:  sign up now and your membership will continue from now until a year after we launch your city!  Note:  outside the Indiegogo campaign we will be offering this at €10/mo, so now is your chance to save €70 by paying upfront and supporting us!3 €90:  Club membership for TWO. Bring a friend! 1-year membership (flights not included) FOR TWO to the FlyScribe club. Yes, it can be a different friend each time. No additional monthly payment. Want to take off next weekend? Don't bother searching. You always know what you'll pay. Just pick your destination, pack your bags and go.4 €149:  The Mystery Flight.  Promotion only through 31 May.Fly blind! Destination-less flying is here. Only top airlines.€0:  You can still help!  Share the campaign and get entered into our contest for one cool prize (surprise!).  The more you share, the more entries you get. WHAT WE NEED“If I can only scrape a living, at least it will be a living worth scraping.”We need help and time to build all of our ideas. We’re completely bootstrapped and everything we raise will get reinvested into the company – we really want to just build this company into a success.  Here’s a breakdown:Timeline:  At the moment, we're offering departures out of Paris (medium-haul flights around Europe) and expect to open up other European origin cities in the summer.  For those outside Paris who contribute €50, your membership will be valid through 1 year after the date we launch in your city.  We're working out of our MVP at the moment, and we have a ton of features and new cities that we plan to roll out very soon.  We're also working on integrating last-minute hotel offers, and all of this will be available to our FlyScribers as we roll them out.  Also to come... the Unlimited Flight Pass!!!  :D WHAT WE'VE DONE“If it ain’t broke, break it.”We’ve gotten underway in early 2018 and have taken some big steps!  We sent our first FlyScriber over to Porto, gotten a number of others waiting to fly, and flown around the world for pitch competitions.  Airlines have been super receptive to the idea and now it's time for the big push!  Check out some of our milestones:WHO WE REALLY ARE“Be who you are and say what you feel because those who mind don’t matter, and those who matter don’t mind.”We are a group of travel junkies who are here to change the airline industry.  Recent MBAs from top business schools (HEC Paris and INSEAD), we got bored of our corporate jobs in investment banking, consulting, and project management and have decided to go all-in in one of the toughest sectors to crack.  We now need your help to get this done!  We want to build something a bit fun, a bit crazy, and hopefully a bit disruptive.  We’re full of ideas, and we’re going for it.This industry needs a major transformation.  Let’s shake things up:  transparency, flexibility, and simplicity – together we can make this happen. ABOUT THE FOUNDERS“Why fit in when you were born to stand out?”One of us has traveled to over 80 countries and scuba dives at night.  Another is a martial arts black belt and studies leglocks.  The third is a full-blown momma's boy who loves Wikipedia deep dives.  We rock climb, speak in GIFs, enjoy Will Ferrell/Jim Carrey/Adam Sandler movies, and like to disrupt things. THE IMPACTOur aim is not to raise a little bit of capital and move quietly behind the scenes.  We consider anyone who already has and who will help crowdfund us as partners – because it’s only together that we’re going to be able to create this change.Airlines see so many small players enter and exit the industry so often, most with very similar value propositions.  If we’re able to show up and have a huge number of backers for our idea, it will certainly not be anything they could ignore!Sign up.  Join us. RISKS AND CHALLENGES“Don’t ask for permission.  Ask for forgiveness.”The success of this venture (the way we currently envision it) relies on airline partnerships.  As of today, every airline we have spoken to has expressed great interest.  One went so far to ask us for exclusivity recently!  However, bureaucracy stands in the way.  This slow decision-making process is a risk for us and adds to our costs since time is money.“If you always do what you’ve always done, you’ll always get what you’ve always got.”So how do we deal with that?  Airlines have told us that if we’re able to show a high number of customers ready to go, this proof of concept will get it done.  This industry continues to do business the way they’ve always done and are typically weary of new thinking.  With enough support from you, together we’ll change something in a big way. HELP!“Don’t ask for permission.  Ask for forgiveness.”          Want to help but can’t or just don’t feel like making a contribution?  Help us out by sharing this!  We need to get the word out, so any help here will go a long way :)  Out of all the entries, we'll pick one and offer them a free flight!Find us in social media, tag us, tweet us, stalk us, whatever.  We want to hear from you.If you’ve read this all, we sincerely appreciate it (more than you know).  More than anything, we’re having a lot of fun trying to create something like this and we’re glad that we can count on even the slightest bit of support.  Reach out to us:  we’d love to connect with you all. Thank you!!! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------Version FrançaiseEN 10 SECSFlyScribe est une plateforme sur laquelle vous pouvez obtenir des billets d’avion à la story:
Staying Gold

I've adopted the phrase "Stay Gold" as a reminder to myself that life is full of Gold moments. To me, Staying Gold is about finding or creating these gold moments in life. Stay Gold Karaoke is a boutique karaoke experience in a van. It is a unique way to experience gold moments full of music, friends and microphones, as well as a reminder to look for the gold in your everyday life.

The business has investors, but the renovation costs are higher than initially anticipated.  Any gold you contribute to this campaign will go towards the costs of renovations to the 15-passenger Ford Transit, into a 70s style karaoke lounge on wheels.  With your help, we will be able to finish all the renovations and be rolling on the road by August. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

To pay for the remaining renovations we need more funding. This campaign is for $10,000, which will cover a majority of the remaining renovation costs, while private investments will cover the rest. Whatever funds are raised through this campaign will go towards the renovation costs. 

Your contributions come with Stay Gold perks! The perks include being a part of this unique and exciting business, through adding tunes to the Stay Gold Top 40 Playlist, VIP membership, discounts and more! 

The Impact

Your contributions to Stay Gold Karaoke will make this dream a reality. The world can use a little more joy right now, and Stay Gold Karaoke will bring just that. This unique and positive experience will be rolling around the streets of Los Angeles full of all kinds of passengers. Besides the regular karaoke lovers and party celebrations, Stay Gold Karaoke is committed to giving elderly populations this unique experience during the day.

This is an image of the first test run! We used Christmas lights and PS2 Singstar, and everyone had a blast!

Risks & Challenges

Starting a business is always a risk. Obstacles have already presented themselves several times over in this journey. One of the guiding principles I have for this business is "every problem has a solution" and with that attitude, there will always be a path forward. This campaign is a solution to the obstacle of needing more capital to finish renovations without taking on more debt.  

I'm known as someone who "makes things happen".  I take risks and look at obstacles with thoughtful, extensive, and careful evaluation. Stay Gold Karaoke is one of those things I can't not do (I apologize for the double negative), so it's happening. 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can always help, even if it's not with money at the moment. I'm always accepting of words of encouragement and it's very helpful if you spread the word about this campaign!  Share it in an e-mail, or on social media or at dinner with friends, family, and strangers!
story_txt:
Staying Gold
I've adopted the phrase "Stay Gold" as a reminder to myself that life is full of Gold moments. To me, Staying Gold is about finding or creating these gold moments in life. Stay Gold Karaoke is a boutique karaoke experience in a van. It is a unique way to experience gold moments full of music, friends and microphones, as well as a reminder to look for the gold in your everyday life.
The business has investors, but the renovation costs are higher than initially anticipated.  Any gold you contribute to this campaign will go towards the costs of renovations to the 15-passenger Ford Transit, into a 70s style karaoke lounge on wheels.  With your help, we will be able to finish all the renovations and be rolling on the road by August. 
 

What We Need & What You Get
To pay for the remaining renovations we need more funding. This campaign is for $10,000, which will cover a majority of the remaining renovation costs, while private investments will cover the rest. Whatever funds are raised through this campaign will go towards the renovation costs. 
Your contributions come with Stay Gold perks! The perks include being a part of this unique and exciting business, through adding tunes to the Stay Gold Top 40 Playlist, VIP membership, discounts and more! 

The Impact
Your contributions to Stay Gold Karaoke will make this dream a reality. The world can use a little more joy right now, and Stay Gold Karaoke will bring just that. This unique and positive experience will be rolling around the streets of Los Angeles full of all kinds of passengers. Besides the regular karaoke lovers and party celebrations, Stay Gold Karaoke is committed to giving elderly populations this unique experience during the day.

This is an image of the first test run! We used Christmas lights and PS2 Singstar, and everyone had a blast!


Risks & Challenges
Starting a business is always a risk. Obstacles have already presented themselves several times over in this journey. One of the guiding principles I have for this business is "every problem has a solution" and with that attitude, there will always be a path forward. This campaign is a solution to the obstacle of needing more capital to finish renovations without taking on more debt.  
I'm known as someone who "makes things happen".  I take risks and look at obstacles with thoughtful, extensive, and careful evaluation. Stay Gold Karaoke is one of those things I can't not do (I apologize for the double negative), so it's happening.
