story:
OTRA – an app to get you ON THE ROAD AGAIN

 

 

About OTRA

You have the whole road ahead of you, and nothing can slow you down. Of course, that’s not entirely true: unless you are prepared, there are about a million and a half things that can slow you down from your departure point to your destination. The key is to hit the road prepared. You need to expect that challenges will arise, expect that something will pop up to get in your way. What can you to prepare, though? What can you do to make sure you’re ready for anything that may come? Our solution is OTRA. OTRA stands for “On The Road Again,” and it’s a comprehensive service that will help you get just that.

With OTRA you can access nine key features that will place you in total control of your Automotive needs.

 

one tap notifies road side assistance providers in your geographical location, confirms your safety and notifies local authorities.

 

one tap sends user profile and geographical location to local first responders, emergency contact, insurance provider and local road side assistance provider.

 

tap the tow and go icon and your relevant profile information will be sent to vetted local road side service providers allowing your vehicle to be serviced. The user is then linked with a preferred ride service provider and transported to their desired destination.

 

 

Information gathered from the users profile along with parts request are sent to participating auto parts suppliers. User receives availability, order link and price point via text and or email.

 

user vehicle and relevant profile information are then sent via text and email to local auto mechanics based on the geographical information in the user’s profile. The user then receives a quote or response from participating auto services in the geographical area matching the users profile information.

 

simply taps the ride icon and you're connected to the ride service listed in your user profile. 

 

ask OTRA allows the user to connect with a live OTRA representative.

 

tap the 'get a quote' icon. a short questionnaire appears. once completed the form along with the user profile information is forwarded to local service providers. the user receives a quote via text and or email.

 

choose an offered service for the area such as auto detailer, windshield repair, scratch and dent repair, auto Fluid Change, break repair, tire services and more.

 

We've carefully researched and tested the product definition and feasibility of OTRA and we're confident that, with your support, we can launch OTRA effectively and with incredible success.

Right now, we have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising the funds that we need to complete development on OTRA prototype. The OTRA prototype will be fully functional representation of the OTRA application. Once we've completed our development and testing phase, we will announce stretch goals to bring OTRA to the masses. 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

While the risk of delay is always real any time you are developing a new app, we are confident that we can launch OTRA in a timely manner. If any unforeseen challenges arise, we will be sure to let all our contributors know about them immediately. We value your trust, and we pledge to stay transparent throughout the development and launch processes.

Other Ways You Can Help

 

In addition to making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing a link to our campaign on Indiegogo, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people are aware of what we are doing, the smoother this campaign will go. We appreciate your support, and we thank you for your time!

Perk Content

$1

Every contribution helps. We’ll keep you updated on all the progress we make developing OTRA.

$10

Get car support now! You’ll gain early access to OTRA at this level.

$20

Stick it on your bumper! You’ll receive a bumper sticker branded with the OTRA logo plus early access to OTRA.

$50

Wear it when you drive! You’ll receive a t-shirt branded with the OTRA logo plus early access to OTRA.

$100

Stay warm! You’ll receive a sweatshirt branded with the OTRA logo plus early access to OTRA.

$200

Stay warm and felx! Stay warm! You’ll receive a sweatshirt branded with the OTRA logo plus early access to OTRA.

 

$300

 

 

$500

 

$1,000

story:
F2, from Tomoloo, is an ultra-long range e-scooter with a Harley-inspired look. It features a stunning 100km range with a max speed of 25 km/h and it handles up to 20% hill grade with ease. F2’s 12’’ non-pneumatic tires are equipped with a dual-brake system for easy and safe control and excellent braking ability. For a more comfortable ride, F2 uses a special dual shock-absorption spring system to reduce the bumps on any rocky road. Take a ride with Tomoloo F2 and enjoy your cruise in style!

 

Shipping Starts!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Your contribution is a guaranteed purchase! TOMOLOO is experienced in design and manufacture of e-scooter, self-balancing scooter and more, Tomoloo is one of the first enterprises passed US UL2272 certification and is committed to offering high-quality hoverboard, skateboard, and scooter to our customers since 2013. Your purchase will be delivered for sure and we will update our progress in production and shipment on time.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Imagine something that you can ride for 10, 20, or even up to 100 kilometers on a single charge! With an optimized battery capacity, Tomoloo F2 cruises for up to 100km (62 miles), explore the city without worry and never push your scooter home again!

 

 

 

 

F2 uses a powerful 700W motor that delivers an exceptional speed up to 25km/h (15.5 mph) to set you free from crowded streets and snail-slow traffic. With a max hill grade of 20%, F2 provides an effortless ride on any road!

 

 

 

 

 

Inspired by Harley, F2 features a metal frame and two 12’’ * 2.5'' extra-large non-pneumatic tires which provides a wider contact patch for better traction and turning ability. Its super wide deck lets you stand in a comfortable position and cruise with ease!

 

 

 

 

 

Thanks to the shock-absorption spring system in the front wheel, F2 provides amazing steering stability with good handling while reducing bumps to improve the overall riding experience even on uneven and rough surfaces.

 

 

 

 

 

F2 is easy to use, simply select the speed level, press the thumb throttle and you are ready to cruise! If you want to stop, release the thumb and you will slow down steadily, for an effortless experience anytime!

 

 

 

 

 

The braking system is the most important safety component of an electric scooter. Tomoloo F2 features a dual brake system (disc brake for the front and drum brake for the rear), providing a shorter braking distances in both wet and dry condition.

 

 

 

 

Whether you’re an experienced rider or a beginner, getting started with F2 is quick and easy. Featuring two indicator lights and an alert bell, F2 is safe to ride even at night. The stoplight in the rear automatically turns on and flashes during braking for a smart and safe ride in any situation!

 

F2 features a digital dashboard that shows the speed in real time. Before you go, simply press the speed button to choose from 3 gear speed to meet different trip purposes.

 

F2 is also foldable and portable, simply fold the handlebar down and it can be easily carried away or stored in your trunk!

 

 

 

 

 

 

As one of the best rated scooter sellers on Amazon, the pursuit of quality and safety is always our guiding principle. Tomoloo F2 has passed US UL2272 certified standards for its safety and electrical performance, making it a safer choice for your daily ride!

 

 

 

 

F2 is IPX4 waterproof to resist splashing water, so that it’s ready for whatever the road condition is!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Founded in 2013, Tomoloo Technology Industrial Co., Ltd is one of the earliest manufacturers and innovators in hoverboard and skateboard R&D, built around their patent for the world’s leading self-balancing technology. Tomoloo is a leader in personal transportation devices and is respected worldwide for its commitment to quality. Tomoloo makes safety a priority for all products and has obtained UL2272, CE, RoHS, and ISO9001 Wal-Mart (FCCA & SCS) BSCI approval.

 

 

 

Our experienced team has years of experience in the design of electric hoverboards, skateboards, production, sales and OEM. However, we understand that challenges often occur with shipping and logistics. If any unexpected problems arise we will keep our backers updated and informed about how we are solving the issue. Thank you for your support!

story:
Driving through town is something we do every day, but current means of getting around our own cities like public transport and filling our cars with gas can be time-consuming, stressful, and expensive.

Quick trips through your city should be fun, not a chore.


We saw that there were no options for electric rideables that were stylish, fun, and affordable! Through the Hover-1 line, we created clean and efficient rides that anyone can afford without sacrificing style! A blast to ride, you’ll enjoy every trip to the grocery store, gym, bank, and all other nearby commutes.

 

 

The Aero is where luxury meets sustainability. Designed to cruise in comfort, the Aero model is the perfect option for those who love a more luxurious ride about town.

 

The Dragonfly is the perfect marriage between the earth conscious and the adventurous. With the design of modern motorcycle bike and the effortless cruise of an EV, this is truly the best model for those who want to reduce their carbon footprint, and look good doing it.

 

 

 

The average person spends $2,000 a year or more on gasoline!!! Hover-1 electric rideables pay for themselves FAST!!!



Like most EV brands, our mission is to completely redefine the way we travel around our neighborhoods. What’s different about Hover-1, above superior style, is superior affordability. We have worked hard to ensure that everyone can own a Hover-1 EV and contribute to the future of mobility.

 

Half the fun of cruising around town is turning heads along the way. Each rideable has a sleek, minimal design that’s perfect for riding around town in style. Electric rideables to do not have to be lackluster. They can be modern, fun, and for everyone.

 

 

Electric rideables are more than just a fun, affordable way to travel. Hover-1 vehicles produce zero direct emissions that contribute to climate change and smog, significantly improving air quality and overall public health.

 

 

 

We at Hover-1 We want to redefine transportation with a whole new fleet of products that allow you to optimize the way you travel in your neighborhood and we need your help to do it. We've already invested in R&D and product development and now we need your help to tool this product and deliver some amazing vehicles to our customer. 100 percent of your pledges will go to manufacturing of the product and delivering it to your doorstep.

 

 

 

 

 

Avi started working when he was 17 years old when he moved from Canada to the USA. His passion was sales so that's what he wanted to make his career. 15 years later Avi is in charge of all of DGL Group sales including Hover-1 and is responsible for generating millions in revenue.

 

Marc started developing when he was 18. He always had a passion for innovation. His first job out of college was developing a line of electronic accessories. Realizing the hardware was his passion he ended up moving to DGL to develop some of the most cutting edge products.

​

 

 

We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Kickstarter and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:

The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on site during production.

Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, customs clearance or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.

story:
Introducing the high-performance RBIKE

100 km (62 miles) on a single charge!

Faster, farther, quieter and more fun in all kinds of conditions  Available for delivery anywhere in the world


If you love being outdoors and love to bike, the RBIKE is for you. This revolutionary new line of electric bicycles enables you to ride faster, farther and quieter, and can adapt to all kinds of conditions.

I’ve been cycling all my life and have been frustrated at the lack of a reliable, affordably-priced electric bicycle. So I assembled a team of engineers and designers to develop a top-of-line ebike that doesn't cost a fortune.

It’s finally here: the Rbike. Prices start at just $599 USD.


Everyone enjoys a nice bicycle ride but sometimes the hilly trails are just too demanding. You can use the motor when riding up a hill or when you get tired. If you feel like pedaling a traditional bicycle, you can turn off the motor and ride without any mechanical assistance.   

Use it for your daily commute. Utilize RBIKE’s motorized capability on the way to work so you don’t show up all sweaty, then ride in manual mode on the way home to get some exercise.

RBIKE enables riders of all ages and abilities to enjoy cycling. It’s fun for the whole family. Anyone who likes riding, sports, exercising and being close to nature will enjoy riding the RBIKE. 

You do not need a special permit or license to operate it. 

Our electric bicycle is great for serious cyclists and casual riders. It can be used for several types of riding:

  1. Road Bikes: Light weight, Speed, Ergonomic
  2. Mountain Bikes: Rigid Frame, High Performance Suspension and Tires
  3. Cross Country: Comfortable (on Long tours)

One of the keys is our specially designed frame in order to vastly improve the overall stability of the bike. It has a unique bending part that reduces direct shock to the frame and allows riders to feel confident even on bumpy mountain road.

Rbike is equipped with a 9Ah rechargeable lithium battery, which has reached ranges over 100km on a single charge with pedal assist.

You also can charge your mobile phones on the USB port specially made for the Rbike. This makes your busy life manageable and you don't have to worry about running out of battery during long tours. We provide a multi-use USB cable for easy connecting both iPhone and Android devices. 

The battery can be removed from the bike for indoor recharging.



We made 2 versions of Rbike to adapt for different riding needs. The main difference of R6 and R6X is the drive motor. If you live in a really hilly area and you wish to have a lot of torque and power to go quickly on hills, R6X would be for you. The 48V 750W motor allows to attain Federal regulated top speed of 20mph with little pedaling effort. 


Alexander Brincker is the lead of our design team. As Technical Director for international bicycles of Ferrari, Lamborghini and Jeep, Alex has a wealth of experience and many cutting-edge ideas.   

With the RBIKE, he has combined the features of a mountain bike, road bike and city bike, enabling cyclists to ride anywhere and do it further, faster and in a most comfortable way.   

All the Rbikes were and will be finished in Komda Industrial (SZ). Komda was founded in 1988, the factory with a total constructed area of 45,000 m2 is well equipped with the most up-to-date facilities and softwares and has grown into one of the most important manufacturing bases for a number of renowned brands in medium & high end bicycles and E-bikes.


We need $100,000 to begin manufacturing RBIKES in quantities that will enable us to sell them at a competitive price. All donations will be used to fund production, materials and shipping (shipping in the US is $199, $249 Worldwide).

Plus, if you get it on the ground floor, you'll have the opportunity to provide us with feedback. What are the features you'd most like to see in an electric bike?

Investors are also welcome.

We appreciate donations of any amount. If you can’t contribute financially, please support our campaign and help us reach our goal. Please share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter and other social media outlets. It's really very helpful.

1. Where are you located?

The RBIKE plant is located in Shenzhen and we ship all over the world.

2. Do you offer a warranty?

A one-year warranty on all parts is provided for all “non-human” damage.

3. What is the maximum recommended rider weight? 

Maximum recommended weight is 100kg (220 pounds).

4. What are the recommended minimum and maximum heights for riders?

160 cm (5 foot, 2 inches) to 180cm (5 foot, 10 inches) is recommended.

5. Is the RBIKE available with fenders?

Yes. The cost is $19.99 per set.

6. How do I know when I’m running out of battery power?

There is a power indicator on the LCD screen and on the battery.

7. How long does it take to charge the battery?

The battery can be removed easily and charged inside your house. The first four charges require 12 hours. After that, the battery will fully charge in 4-6 hours.   

8. Can the Rbike be used anywhere in the USA?

Some areas of the country have restrictions so it’s best to check the regulations in your state.

9. Does the RBIKE come assembled?

No, but we provide a demonstration video. Shipping the bike unassembled reduces the shipping cost considerably and enables us to offer the lowest possible prices.
story_txt:
Introducing the high-performance RBIKE100 km (62 miles) on a single charge!Faster, farther, quieter and more fun in all kinds of conditions  Available for delivery anywhere in the world 
If you love being outdoors and love to bike, the RBIKE is for you. This revolutionary new line of electric bicycles enables you to ride faster, farther and quieter, and can adapt to all kinds of conditions.
I’ve been cycling all my life and have been frustrated at the lack of a reliable, affordably-priced electric bicycle. So I assembled a team of engineers and designers to develop a top-of-line ebike that doesn't cost a fortune.
It’s finally here: the Rbike. Prices start at just $599 USD.
Everyone enjoys a nice bicycle ride but sometimes the hilly trails are just too demanding. You can use the motor when riding up a hill or when you get tired. If you feel like pedaling a traditional bicycle, you can turn off the motor and ride without any mechanical assistance.   
Use it for your daily commute. Utilize RBIKE’s motorized capability on the way to work so you don’t show up all sweaty, then ride in manual mode on the way home to get some exercise.
RBIKE enables riders of all ages and abilities to enjoy cycling. It’s fun for the whole family. Anyone who likes riding, sports, exercising and being close to nature will enjoy riding the RBIKE. You do not need a special permit or license to operate it. Our electric bicycle is great for serious cyclists and casual riders. It can be used for several types of riding:

Road Bikes: Light weight, Speed, Ergonomic

Mountain Bikes: Rigid Frame, High Performance Suspension and Tires

Cross Country: Comfortable (on Long tours)



One of the keys is our specially designed frame in order to vastly improve the overall stability of the bike. It has a unique bending part that reduces direct shock to the frame and allows riders to feel confident even on bumpy mountain road.
Rbike is equipped with a 9Ah rechargeable lithium battery, which has reached ranges over 100km on a single charge with pedal assist.You also can charge your mobile phones on the USB port specially made for the Rbike. This makes your busy life manageable and you don't have to worry about running out of battery during long tours. We provide a multi-use USB cable for easy connecting both iPhone and Android devices. The battery can be removed from the bike for indoor recharging.We made 2 versions of Rbike to adapt for different riding needs. The main difference of R6 and R6X is the drive motor. If you live in a really hilly area and you wish to have a lot of torque and power to go quickly on hills, R6X would be for you. The 48V 750W motor allows to attain Federal regulated top speed of 20mph with little pedaling effort. 

Alexander Brincker is the lead of our design team. As Technical Director for international bicycles of Ferrari, Lamborghini and Jeep, Alex has a wealth of experience and many cutting-edge ideas.   With the RBIKE, he has combined the features of a mountain bike, road bike and city bike, enabling cyclists to ride anywhere and do it further, faster and in a most comfortable way.   
All the Rbikes were and will be finished in Komda Industrial (SZ). Komda was founded in 1988, the factory with a total constructed area of 45,000 m2 is well equipped with the most up-to-date facilities and softwares and has grown into one of the most important manufacturing bases for a number of renowned brands in medium & high end bicycles and E-bikes.




We need $100,000 to begin manufacturing RBIKES in quantities that will enable us to sell them at a competitive price. All donations will be used to fund production, materials and shipping (shipping in the US is $199, $249 Worldwide).


Plus, if you get it on the ground floor, you'll have the opportunity to provide us with feedback. What are the features you'd most like to see in an electric bike?
Investors are also welcome.

We appreciate donations of any amount. If you can’t contribute financially, please support our campaign and help us reach our goal. Please share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter and other social media outlets. It's really very helpful.






1. Where are you located?
The RBIKE plant is located in Shenzhen and we ship all over the world.
2. Do you offer a warranty?
A one-year warranty on all parts is provided for all “non-human” damage.
3. What is the maximum recommended rider weight? 
Maximum recommended weight is 100kg (220 pounds).
4. What are the recommended minimum and maximum heights for riders?
160 cm (5 foot, 2 inches) to 180cm (5 foot, 10 inches) is recommended.
5. Is the RBIKE available with fenders?
Yes. The cost is $19.99 per set.
6. How do I know when I’m running out of battery power?
There is a power indicator on the LCD screen and on the battery.
7. How long does it take to charge the battery?
The battery can be removed easily and charged inside your house. The first four charges require 12 hours. After that, the battery will fully charge in 4-6 hours.   
8. Can the Rbike be used anywhere in the USA?
Some areas of the country have restrictions so it’s best to check the regulations in your state.

9. Does the RBIKE come assembled?
No, but we provide a demonstration video. Shipping the bike unassembled reduces the shipping cost considerably and enables us to offer the lowest possible prices.

story:
AffordabilityThere is a lot to love about the FM 500.  

  • Tektro Mechanical Disc Brakes
  • Hydraulic Front Suspension
  • Kenda Anti-puncture Tires
  • Samsung 48 Volt 14 AH Lithium-ion Battery 
  • 500 watt AKM Motor ⚡............. to name a few

Our team has worked tirelessly to comb over every detail of this eBike to give you the most enjoyable riding experience. Each eBIke comes standard with top-notch components. Another impressive feature is the comprehensive frame design. This eBike was engineered with a Stand-Over Height (SOH) at 27 inches. The ergonomically designed frame makes both riding and standing comfortable.

 

Inergy Series

The Inergy Series includes a lineup of affordable high quality eBikes. The FM 500 is a part of the Inergy Series which comes with a powerpacking 500-Watt motor. 

Street or Trail? Why Not Both?

The FM 500 is an extremely capable eBike that can handle it all. The paved city street and the road less traveled are both an enjoyable journey on an Fission eBike. 

Delivery Is Guaranteed

We promise that we can deliver on your contribution. Bikes will go out on a first come first serve basis. So..... don't wait around to claim your Fission ride. 

 

Lots Of Smiles :)

Old, young, new, or experienced Fission wants to give the joy of biking to everyone. Riding the FM 500 always makes us smile and we want to share that with you.

 

The FM 500 takes what you love about mountain biking and makes it better. This Fission FM 500 uses a durable corrosion-resistant 6061 aluminum alloy frame to keep it lightweight and tough. The FM 500 is one of the most affordable options on the market today. As a contributor, you will get an even better value by buying a perk through Indiegogo. 

 

The FM 500 was designed for great versatility. The Inergy Series comes with a proven 48 volt 500-watt AKM rear hub motor⚡ . This motor produces more than enough power to handle both on and off-road riding.

 

This eBike is powered by a Samsung 48 volt 14 amp-hour lithium-ion battery that can go 30 miles or more on a single charge. This battery locks snug to the frame for a quiet ride, even on rough terrain. Easily switch out batteries by unlatching the battery from the frame with a key. You can also observe the charge with an indicator light on the side of the battery. There is a bonus of a USB charging port that can be used to charge your phone, power GPS, or other electronics. 

 

Hydraulic front suspension and shock absorbent fat tires make this one of the most comfortable eBikes you will ever ride. Fat tires can be run on a lower pressure making the ride quality softer and traction better than traditional tires.

 

Tektro mechanical disc brakes offer superior control in all riding conditions. The smooth operating disc brakes generate an incredible amount of stopping power. These brakes do most of the work to prevent hand muscle fatigue on long rides.

Standover Height

Most electric mountain bikes are descendants of the traditional mountain bike. Upon close inspection, it seems like someone simply took an old mountain bike frame..... slapped on some fat-tires and a motor..... and started selling them as fat-tire electric mountain bikes. The design hasn't changed much over the years.

 

Our team thought we could do better! The FM 500 underwent a complete frame redesign to provide a better standover height without sacrificing strength. We also preserved the sleek mountain bike look.

Shipments Are Already Being Sent Out

Our facility is hard at work producing this amazing newly designed eBike. Be the first to receive your FM 500 eBike by claiming the perk earlier rather than later. Adventure awaits!

 

Choose Your Ride

Step 1: Pick the perfect package

FM 500 w. Inergy Standard Package

This bike has everything you need to get started. The FM 500 comes standard with tons of great features. The 500-watt motor and 48-volt LG battery will easily meet the challenges of off-roading and urban riding. The Shimano 8 speed and disc brakes give you maximum control for hill climbing and advanced trails. 

 

FM 500 w. Inergy Offroad Package 

Even "fair weather" cyclist get caught in the rain sometimes. The Inergy Offroad package combines 4" fat tires, hydraulic front suspenstion, and large fenders for an amazing offroad experience.  The large front and back aluminum fenders keeps mud and road grime off your clothes.  

FM 500 w. Inergy Pro Package

The works! The Inergy Pro package includes large front and back aluminum fenders to keep you dry and clean in less than ideal conditions. The spacious rear-mount cargo rack lets you take all the essentials with you.

 

Step 2: Choose a color

Matte Black or Gloss Red

 

About Us

Our company was founded by east coast biking enthusisit. We bring over 20 years of industry experience into the design of our eBikes. Our team consists of skilled individuals with backgrounds in manufacturing, chemistry, physics, engineering, and education. Our goal was to build on existing technology and make it better. We want to meet the needs of every patron. We joined functionality and simplicity to create the most durable eBikes on the market. Our pedal-assist technology coupled with throttle control ensures that you make it there without breaking a sweat or the bank.

We hope to build a loyal base of eBike enthusiasts who appreciate the environmental benefits that come with using electric bikes. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We love our community and encourage you to join! 

Help us get the word out and make some noise about Fission Cycles by liking and sharing our content on social media.

Don't forget to share this campaign using Indiegogo share tools!

We believe that everyone has a unique journey and Inergy will help you along the way. Whether it is reconnecting with the outdoors or an evening workout on the commute home you can trust Inergy. Claim yours today!

story:
Quikride is the newest way to get around Vancouver BC, Canada, the carshare capital of North America.

My name is Ayaz and I come from an automotive background. I started as a delivery driver in my family's auto parts store, moved up the ladder and for the past 10 years have been managing one of the stores. I found myself interested in the concept of carsharing and the sharing economy in general. What I discovered was the cost of carsharing was too high for me to drive these cars regularly and when I needed a vehicle it was sometimes hard to find. My average monthly bill was around $600 (between 3 of the 4 operators in Vancouver). While it was fun to drive around in a Mercedes, it wasn't cheap! At the same time, costs of owning my own car are also on the rise. Check out this link from AAA (http://newsroom.aaa.com/auto/your-driving-costs/). 

When I suggested to my wife Liina that there has to be a better more affordable way to carshare, she suggested we should do something about it. We set out to create an affordable carshare to entice more people to give up their car and at the same time bring the cost of a trip down so that it won't hurt your wallet. What we found was by putting advertising on the cars we could bring the cost down and even pay everyone to drive. 

We are going to build our fleet from the ground up and need your support

All of your contributions will go to purchasing vehicles and equipment. We have 3 plans to choose from;

  • Gold plan - $89 a month includes your first 2 hours FREE PER TRIP and subsequent hours are $6.99 per hour.
  • Silver plan - $49 a month includes your first hour FREE PER TRIP and subsequent hours are $6.99 per hour.
  • Bronze Plan - Pay-as-you-go $6.99 per hour or as little as .25 cents a minute.

If you choose the monthly plans, you can earn stars for every paid hour you drive and for every 30 minute portion of unused free time after driving 20 km (each star is valued at $0.25). You can use the stars to offset the cost of your driving expenses or towards the purchase of gift cards, promo items and "advertiser" products. Imagine driving for free or even getting paid!

Traffic congestion and automobile pollution will be a thing of the past

And we believe Vancouver will be the epicentre of this phenomenon. Currently, Vancouver is ranked #2 greenest city in North America on (https://www.worldatlas.com/articles/the-greenes...). With your help we will advance to #1. Our goal is to start with small cars and build a fleet of hybrid vehicles. Once the electric infrastructure is more complete and electric vehicles increase their range a bit more, we intend to operate electric vehicles only. Our long term goal is to connect our vehicles around the country (like one big carshare) and eventually around the world. This means you could pick up your car in Vancouver and drop it in Calgary and vice versa.  We are constantly looking to partner with transit providers, municipalities, governments and large companies to make it even easier for you to give up your car or at least leave it at home. The way we see it, our Gold Plan is better than a bus pass!

You might be thinking what happens in the event of an accident?

Your only responsibility in an at fault accident is to pay the deductible (just like if you owned the car). You have the option of buying deductible insurance which will pay the deductible in the event you need it. Your credit card company may also pay this but it is your responsibility to make sure they do.

The Competition

Below is a market comparison between Quikride and the 4 carshare operators in Vancouver. The first 2 (Evo and Car2go) are floating fleet models just like Quikride where you can pick up and drop off vehicles in their respective home zones. The second 2 (Zipcar and Modo) are station to station models where you pick up and drop off at the same location.

Take a look at our Quikride vs Evo comparison; if you get into an accident with an Evo car, you are on the hook for the $1000 deductible. In a head to head comparison against our pay as you go plan we beat their rates. We don’t charge for extra kilometres because we offer unlimited kilometres. We also offer 2 monthly plans to maximize your savings and they both include FREE hours per trip! 

Next up is Car2go;  If you get into an accident with a car2go vehicle, you are on the hook for the $1000 deductible during your first 90 trips while you are paying $1 per trip for the loss damage waiver. Only after your first 90 dollars/trips will the deductible be reduced to $250. Once you have accumulated 200 trips your Deductible becomes zero. Car2go offers 3 different cars, 2 of which are mercedes (at a higher rate). Liina enjoyed the Mercedes more than the smart cars but wasn't to keen on the higher costs. Quikride comes out ahead in rates, loss damage waiver, kilometres included and if you opt for the monthly plan you also get FREE hours! 

Modo is station to station and offers the same type of damage waiver as Quikride. If you get into an accident you are responsible for the $1000 deductible unless you have opted in for the damage waiver or your credit card company covers you. While Modo plus rates appear to be similar to ours, we offer free hours and our rate does not fluctuate depending on the vehicle you choose or the time of day. We never charge for kilometres because our kilometres are unlimited! Modo was my go to carshare until I switched from Modo plus to the monthly membership and found it to be expensive. The final straw was an incident with one of the customer service reps who scolded me for not returning my rental in time. While it was my fault, it was unnecessary to treat me rudely.

Zipcar is station to station and has the most plan options of all the players in the market. The biggest hurdle if you have an accident with a Zipcar is the $2000 deductible. They also do not offer by the minute billing. Quikride and Zipcar have very similar rates by the hour and day, however Zipcar does not offer free hours and their best monthly plan will cost you $250, yikes!  Quikride offers unlimited kilometres and a cheaper damage waiver that is renewable after every incident. 

All information for these comparisons was compiled from information available on their respective websites and phone calls made by me to each provider to confirm the information. It is possible that the information may change by publication of these comparisons.

Plans for the future

Our plan is to take this carshare model across Canada and the rest of the world. We also want to use multiple types of cars so that you the user have more choice. Keep checking our indiegogo campaign page for updates. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can’t afford to pitch in to the cause financially, let your family and friends know about our project on Indiegogo. Please share this on your social media (facebook, twitter, instagram) as every bit helps. There are some fantastic share tools that make it easy to share.

Advertisers

We are looking for launch advertisers for the Vancouver area, space is limited. We will work hard to get your message out to Vancouver and our users. Our dedicated team can create a captivating  ad for you or you can provide the artwork.

In a head to head comparison against our pay as you go plan we beat their rates. We don’t charge for extra kilometres because we offer unlimited kilometres. We also offer 2 monthly plans to maximize your savings and they both include FREE hours per trip! Next up is Car2go;  If you get into an accident with a car2go vehicle, you are on the hook for the $1000 deductible during your first 90 trips while you are paying $1 per trip for the loss damage waiver. Only after your first 90 dollars/trips will the deductible be reduced to $250. Once you have accumulated 200 trips your Deductible becomes zero. Car2go offers 3 different cars, 2 of which are mercedes (at a higher rate). Liina enjoyed the Mercedes more than the smart cars but wasn't to keen on the higher costs. Quikride comes out ahead in rates, loss damage waiver, kilometres included and if you opt for the monthly plan you also get FREE hours! Modo is station to station and offers the same type of damage waiver as Quikride. If you get into an accident you are responsible for the $1000 deductible unless you have opted in for the damage waiver or your credit card company covers you. While Modo plus rates appear to be similar to ours, we offer free hours and our rate does not fluctuate depending on the vehicle you choose or the time of day. We never charge for kilometres because our kilometres are unlimited! Modo was my go to carshare until I switched from Modo plus to the monthly membership and found it to be expensive. The final straw was an incident with one of the customer service reps who scolded me for not returning my rental in time. While it was my fault, it was unnecessary to treat me rudely.Zipcar is station to station and has the most plan options of all the players in the market. The biggest hurdle if you have an accident with a Zipcar is the $2000 deductible. They also do not offer by the minute billing. Quikride and Zipcar have very similar rates by the hour and day, however Zipcar does not offer free hours and their best monthly plan will cost you $250, yikes!  Quikride offers unlimited kilometres and a cheaper damage waiver that is renewable after every incident. All information for these comparisons was compiled from information available on their respective websites and phone calls made by me to each provider to confirm the information. It is possible that the information may change by publication of these comparisons.Plans for the futureOur plan is to take this carshare model across Canada and the rest of the world. We also want to use multiple types of cars so that you the user have more choice. Keep checking our indiegogo campaign page for updates. Other Ways You Can HelpIf you just can’t afford to pitch in to the cause financially, let your family and friends know about our project on Indiegogo. Please share this on your social media (facebook, twitter, instagram) as every bit helps. There are some fantastic share tools that make it easy to share.AdvertisersWe are looking for launch advertisers for the Vancouver area, space is limited. We will work hard to get your message out to Vancouver and our users. Our dedicated team can create a captivating  ad for you or you can provide the artwork.

story:
HEXAGON makes any bike a safer and smarter by seamlessly connecting with your smartphone. View the traffic behind you, live stream your ride, & signal to cars all through smartphone integration. 

 

 

 

With our rear-facing camera, you can view traffic & stream your ride.

 

HEXAGON has Automatic Stop, Turn, and Motion signals.

 

 

iOS & Android app with activity tracker, navigation system, and more.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Award-winning cyclist, Vittorio Brumotti, loves HEXAGON. Check out the video below to hear Vittorio's stamp of approval!

 

 
 
 
 
  
  

 

 

 

HEXAGON is equipped with a rear-facing HD camera, Automatic Stop, Turn, and Motion signals. To navigate the turn signals, HEXAGON comes with a wireless remote that securely attaches to your handle bars. HEXAGON's social and recording features can be managed through the HEXAGON app.

   

HEXAGON comes with two 18650 batteries and can easily be recharged with the complimentary Micro-USB cable. 

 

 

HEXAGON Light has all the great features of HEXAGON, minus the turn signals and the Wireless Remote Control. This slimmed down model has the same rear-facing HD camera, Automatic Stop, and Motion signals. All of HEXAGON Light's features and settings can be managed through the HEXAGON app, so there's no need for the remote! 

   

 HEXAGON Light comes with two 18650 batteries and can easily be recharged with the complimentary Micro-USB cable. 

   

 

 

 

One of HEXAGON's most revolutionary features is its HD rear facing camera. With a rear facing camera,  cyclists have the ability to view traffic via the smartphone app, making your ride safer and more connected.

 

You can live broadcast your ride to your social networks or record video in full HD-resolution! To extend your battery life, HEXAGON's camera can be turned off to maximize your battery's charge by 3-6 times. No need to worry - even with the camera off you're traffic signals will still work.

   

   

HEXAGON has Automatic Stop, Turn, and Motion signals enhancing the safety of your city or country ride. Distinguish yourself while biking day or night with HEXAGON's bright and reliable traffic signals. 

 

Automatic Stop Signal: HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light's Automatic Stop Signal will automatically turn on whenever you brake leaving every driver aware of your stopped-status. 

 

Motion Signal: HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light's motion signal continuously flashes when your bike is moving, increasing your visibility in traffic. This is an essential feature for night rides in the country side or city.

 

Turn Signals: HEXAGON has a left and right turn signal so you can easily distinguish your next move. Simply press the left or right button on the wireless remote control and your turn signals will ignite. 

 

Smart Control Brightness: HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light can control the brightness of your traffic signals based on photocell data. It can sense if there's oncoming traffic and adjust HEXAGON's brightness accordingly. 

 

   

   

Our iOS and Android mobile app allows cyclists to view camera footage in real-time, track and navigate their ride, monitor fitness parameters, connect and share to social networks, and much more.

   

HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light can recharge your favorite gadget & is ideal for long rides when you need to recharge your smartphone. Connect your USB cable to HEXAGON and charge!

 

 

HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light connect seamlessly to our complimentary app, allowing you to see rear-view footage in real time. While viewing your live stream, you'll also see the main parameters of your ride including: average speed, ride time, and calories burned.

 

   

View the distance of your ride and number of calories burnt on the Live-Viewing and Navigation screens of the HEXAGON mobile app. 

   

   

Setting up your HEXAGON is simple. Attach your device on the seat post binding underneath your saddle and then mount the Remote Control and your smartphone to your handlebars. Once your device is paired with the app you're ready to ride!

   

   

Afraid of getting your HEXAGON stolen? HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light can be easily detached for protection against theft. Effortlessly detach it from the mount and toss HEXAGON in your bag. 

   

    

Imagine capturing your next race with the on-board SD Card to share with friends as you pass other cyclists! HEXAGON has a micro-SD slot that allows you to record up to 4 hours of video in full HD resolution.

    

   

HEXAGON's sensors can detect a crash and automatically send an SMS text to designated emergency contacts in your smartphone. If it's a minor accident, you can cancel the message.

 

 

   

 Monitor your child's biking activity via the HEXAGON app. Simply set up the Parental Control functions in the HEXAGON app on your child's smartphone and yours and begin tracking their location and speed. You'll also receive and SOS message if you child has an accident.

 

 

See HEXAGON in action. 

 
We wanted to create a video that goes the extra mile to explain how you can use HEXAGON! Check the video out below to learn more: 
   
 

 

 
 

    

Our power mount's herculean grip is a perfect match for your phone's genius design.

 

HEXAGON offers a smartphone mount accessory made by Abcotech that pairs perfectly with HEXAGON or HEXAGON Light! We test drove bikes just like yours to guarantee a surefire grip for your phone.

The Battery: the Abco power mount's lithium polymer battery power bank has a whopping 3.7 voltage/ 6000 mAh capacity, with Input 5v 1A and output 5v 1.5A for maximum roadside charging.

Easy Installation: We've included a simplified manual guide for super simple installation prior to your adventurous ride. You'll be amazed at how easy it is to be smarter than your smartphone.

Adjustable Clamp Wings: The sidebar clamp wings ensure a perfect grip which can be shaped to fit all smartphones with the iconic grip and traction which our mountain bike phone mount charger is known for.

Safety First: Never hit a bike trail without our mountain bike rechargeable power mount. With its secure harness and the ability to power charge while driving, the Abcotech bike mount is a mountain rider's necessity.

    

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

HEXAGON is proud to say that all the members on our team are friends and bikers! With more than 20 years of experience under our belts, we started to develop HEXAGON in 2014 due to the high rate of road accident induced cycling injuries.
 

Bottom line: we wanted to find a way to increase the safety of cyclists. So, our team thought a lot about solutions for biker safety. After a lot of thought and research, we found a key feature many cycling devices were missing: a rear view camera. Our team collectively decided a rear-view camera would give cyclists more visibility, and therefor confidence on city and road rides. The ability to see behind you was something no other device had done.

 

From a team of cycling enthusiasts, we hope to change the way your ride for the better.

   

 

What is the difference between the HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light?

The main difference between HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light is HEXAGON is equipped with turn signals.  

The second difference is that the HEXAGON Light doesn’t come with the wireless remote control. Without the wireless remote, you will not be able to take photos during movement and manage the switching on/off the camera. However, HEXAGON Light can be navigated by the HEXAGON app.

The third difference is HEXAGON allows you to add two additional batteries to increase operation time. HEXAGON Light does not allow this.

 

What’s the quality of HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light’s camera and video footage?

Both models of HEXAGON have a full HD camera with a quality of 1920x1080 or 1080x720 (you set your preferred quality in the camera settings. For smartphone display footage is shown at 640x480 and for live streaming footage is 432x230.

 

Is it possible to take photos while I’m riding with HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light’s rear-view camera? If so, how do I take still photos?

You can take still photos with HEXAGON, however you cannot with HEXAGON Light.

HEXAGON’s wireless remote has a special button that allows you to capture high-resolution photos. If you take a photo while you’re live streaming your high-quality photo will be posted to social networks!

 

What quality are the photos taken with the HEXAGON / HEXAGON Light rear-view camera? 

The quality of photos are 5MP.

 

I saw you can record straight to an SD card. How long can I record my ride to a 32GB SD card and how does it work?

The maximum file size is 32GB and it will be sufficient for about 3 hours of continuous video recording. This approximately corresponds to the time of operation of the base battery pack.

With increasing operating time, the camera with the same SD card, such as used during a long bike tour, the oldest video files are automatically deleted and new ones are recorded on their place (in a circle), as in a car video recorder.

Approximately 10 minutes before the exhaustion of the working space on the SD card, the system will warn you about this and you can either replace the card and save all videos on your computer, or suspend the camera operation, or allow the system to delete the oldest files and continue recording video files at the vacant place.

 

How can I copy video files to my computer?

There are three ways to upload your HEXAGON video footage:

 

1) Physically transfer the SD card from HEXAGON into your computer and copy the video files to your desktop or laptop

2) Connect the HEXAGON micro-USB connector to your desktop or laptop using the cable provided.

3) Connect HEXAGON to a computer via a Wi-Fi network.

 

In the latter two cases, Hexagon is connected to a computer as an external disk.
 

Are HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light’s traffic signals visible on a bright sunny day? And how far will my lights be visible?

Yes, they are! The motion, turn, and emergency signals are perfectly visible even on a sunny day from a distance of more than 100 meters.

 

Will the motion signal still be visible if a car has its brights on or if the sun is setting?

HEXAGON's remote control has a smart sensor that control the brightness of HEXAGON’s lights. They continuously monitor the natural illumination of the environment and the brightness of the oncoming traffic. Correspondingly, in a bright counter current flow light, it immediately and proportionally increases the brightness of the corresponding light-emitting diodes.

 

Can I change Motion light to steady light? In Germany a blinking light is not allowed.

Yes, you can change and customize the the Motion light function in the "Settings" section of HEXAGON's mobile app.

 

Will the bright light from HEXAGON’s turn signal and stop signal not illuminate the camera and effect my footage?

Nope! HEXAGON is specifically designed for simultaneous and independent operation of the camera and the signals.

 

How long does the battery last for HEXAGON, HEXAGON Light, and the wireless remote?

You can charge HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light’s batteries through the device’s micro-USB socket by connecting a 5V/1A power supply unit via the supplied micro-USB/USB cable.

On a full charge, HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light’s will last 3 hours with the camera operating or 12 hours without the camera operating.

HEXAGON’s remote is powered by a CR2032 battery. A CR2032 battery typically lasts one year.

 

Is the battery in Hexagon's remote replaceable?

Yes, HEXAGON’s Remote Control has on the board most commonly used battery CR2032 that can be simply and easily replaced as necessary.

 

Is the battery in Hexagon replaceable?

Initially installed rechargeable 18650 batteries (2 pieces) in HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light are not replaceable by ordinary user, but qualified personnel can easily replace it. At the same time, two additional batteries in HEXAGON can be simply and easily installed or replaced as necessary.

 

Can I extend the operating time of Hexagon/Hexagon Light after a single charge?

You can 2-fold increase the operating time of Hexagon by purchasing and installing 2 additional Hexagon batteries of the 18650 form factor (of the recommended by us types and manufacturers). In this case, the charging time for 4 batteries will be 2-fold increased.

It is impossible to increase the capacity of the battery for the Hexagon Light version.

 

Can I use my HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light as a Power Bank? 

Yes, you can use HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light as a Power Bank!  Using a standard USB cable, you can charge your smartphone or other gadgets when at a halt. Simply detach HEXAGON from its mount and connect your gadget to HEXAGON or HEXAGON Light.

 

How easy is it to detach HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light?

Both models can be easily removed with one hand.

 

What if my HEXAGON / HEXAGON Light stops functioning in the middle of my ride? 

First of all, when battery’s charge will be less than 25% from full charge value, you will be informed by special beep sound and message in your Smartphone screen. And you can decide to switch rear camera OFF. In this case, leaving battery’s charge will be able to supply signal lights more than 3 hours of continuous operation.

 

How do I know, especially in absence of a Smartphone, when the battery charge ends up?

The device will beep!

 

How will I know if I left my turn or alarm signals enabled?

The device will also beep in these cases.

 

Will Hexagon use my phone's data if it can't connect to WiFi?

Yes, HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light will operate using your phone’s data network if permitted.

 

Is there a mobile app? What are its functions? 

Yes, you can download HEXAGON mobile app for iOS (5 and above) and Android (4 and above). Here are main functions of mobile app:
 

  • Rear View Camera Footage Viewing
  • Tracking and Navigation
  • Fitness parameters monitoring
  • Alert message sending or aborting
  • Parental control (speed/location/crash or SOS signal)
  • Social media and other settings

 

Does HEXAGON / HEXAGON Light track me? Where does this data go? 

The HEXAGON mobile app sends your location data to the HEXAGON server and displays the parameters and trajectory of your movement on the map on the screen of your Smartphone.

If you have installed HEXAGON on the bike of your child and if you installed the HEXAGON mobile app, you can set up Parental Control functions on his/her Smartphone and on yours. After this is done, you can track the driving style, the trajectory, and motion parameters of your child on your Smartphone.

 

Can I connect to other cyclists who are using the HEXAGON app?

Only if an emergency happens. If it is needed, you can press special button on the wireless remote and your SOS message will be sent to appropriate phones, i.e. other cyclists from your Smartphone.

Additionally, you can receive the SOS message from other cyclist if your phone number was entered in appropriate setup menu in his HEXAGON mobile app.

 

Can I use HEXAGON / HEXAGON Light without my Smartphone?

Yes, you can. In this case, you can use two functions of HEXAGON: switch on and off turn indicators or alarm (parking lights) using buttons of Remote Control, mounted on the handlebars of your bike, and make video recording with the rear view camera on the SD card of HEXAGON by pressing the REC button on a device (you need to set in advance the SD-card into the appropriate slot of devise). In addition, stop and motion signals are working automatically in HEXAGON.

Even if you do not have Remote Control, or it does not work, switched HEXAGON will automatically work out the stop and motion signals and can lead the video recording from the rear view camera with turned on REC button. In addition, in the absence of a Smartphone, we are recommending you to turn off Wi-Fi button on the HEXAGON, to conserve its battery.

 

I saw HEXAGON has different “modes.” How do HEXAGON's different modes work exactly (i.e. city or highway)?

By using its own telemetry’s data from embedded gyroscope and accelerometer, HEXAGON clearly controls the Stop and Moving signal lights automatically regardless of the type of track (i.e. city, country or highway).

 

What is photocell data? I see Hexagon uses this to decide the brightness of my traffic signals.

Photodiode installed on the front of Remote Control generate the photocell data. The micro controller of Remote Control is in watchdog mode and when photocell data will exceed/downgrade the threshold level, micro controller will wake up and send appropriate telemetry to HEXAGON to increase/decrease the brightness of traffic signals.

 

Does HEXAGON's motion signal automatically turn on as soon as my bike starts moving?

HEXAGON’s Moving signal is working permanently. But when you are braking, the Stop signal turns on for 3 seconds. Hereupon the Stop signal turns off and the Moving signal turns on again.

 

For the Motion Signal, how does HEXAGON know I'm moving?

HEXAGON knows you’re moving on the base its own telemetry data from embedded gyroscope and accelerometer.

 

How does HEXAGON / HEXAGON Light mount to my bike? 

HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light both attach to your bike with a complimentary mount-to- frame. The mount is designed so you can easily remove and install HEXAGON!

 

Will HEXAGON / HEXAGON Light damage my bike? 

Nope – not at all! Fastening to the frame is so simple and designed so mindfully that there’s no way to damage your bike’s frame.

 

What is the warranty for HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light?

We provide a one (1) year limited warranty.

 

What's your return policy? 

At observance of operating conditions of HEXAGON, in the case of its failure, you need to send it to our US office with all the other components of the kit (Remote Control, mount, etc.) and we will send you exchange within 2 weeks provided that HEXAGON and other components have no mechanical damages. These warranty conditions apply throughout the world for 12 months from the date of purchase of your device.

 

When will HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light be delivered?

We will deliver our product in September 2017!

 

What are the shipping cost for HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light?

Free U.S. and Canada shipping

$7 for EU, UK, Australia, Japan, South Korea, Singapore, Taiwan, and Hong Kong

$15 Rest-of-World

 

How can I contact you?

You can send us an email at ceo@smartbike.systems or fill out request on our website, http://www.smartbike.systems/. If necessary, we can arrange a Skype-conference with you!

Correspondingly, in a bright counter current flow light, it immediately and proportionally increases the brightness of the corresponding light-emitting diodes. Can I change Motion light to steady light? In Germany a blinking light is not allowed.Yes, you can change and customize the the Motion light function in the "Settings" section of HEXAGON's mobile app. Will the bright light from HEXAGON’s turn signal and stop signal not illuminate the camera and effect my footage?Nope! HEXAGON is specifically designed for simultaneous and independent operation of the camera and the signals. How long does the battery last for HEXAGON, HEXAGON Light, and the wireless remote?You can charge HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light’s batteries through the device’s micro-USB socket by connecting a 5V/1A power supply unit via the supplied micro-USB/USB cable.On a full charge, HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light’s will last 3 hours with the camera operating or 12 hours without the camera operating.HEXAGON’s remote is powered by a CR2032 battery. A CR2032 battery typically lasts one year. Is the battery in Hexagon's remote replaceable? Yes, HEXAGON’s Remote Control has on the board most commonly used battery CR2032 that can be simply and easily replaced as necessary. Is the battery in Hexagon replaceable? Initially installed rechargeable 18650 batteries (2 pieces) in HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light are not replaceable by ordinary user, but qualified personnel can easily replace it. At the same time, two additional batteries in HEXAGON can be simply and easily installed or replaced as necessary. Can I extend the operating time of Hexagon/Hexagon Light after a single charge?You can 2-fold increase the operating time of Hexagon by purchasing and installing 2 additional Hexagon batteries of the 18650 form factor (of the recommended by us types and manufacturers). In this case, the charging time for 4 batteries will be 2-fold increased.It is impossible to increase the capacity of the battery for the Hexagon Light version. Can I use my HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light as a Power Bank? Yes, you can use HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light as a Power Bank!  Using a standard USB cable, you can charge your smartphone or other gadgets when at a halt. Simply detach HEXAGON from its mount and connect your gadget to HEXAGON or HEXAGON Light. How easy is it to detach HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light?Both models can be easily removed with one hand. What if my HEXAGON / HEXAGON Light stops functioning in the middle of my ride? First of all, when battery’s charge will be less than 25% from full charge value, you will be informed by special beep sound and message in your Smartphone screen. And you can decide to switch rear camera OFF. In this case, leaving battery’s charge will be able to supply signal lights more than 3 hours of continuous operation. How do I know, especially in absence of a Smartphone, when the battery charge ends up?The device will beep! How will I know if I left my turn or alarm signals enabled?The device will also beep in these cases. Will Hexagon use my phone's data if it can't connect to WiFi?Yes, HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light will operate using your phone’s data network if permitted. Is there a mobile app? What are its functions? Yes, you can download HEXAGON mobile app for iOS (5 and above) and Android (4 and above). Here are main functions of mobile app: 
Rear View Camera Footage Viewing
Tracking and Navigation
Fitness parameters monitoring
Alert message sending or aborting
Parental control (speed/location/crash or SOS signal)
Social media and other settings
 Does HEXAGON / HEXAGON Light track me? Where does this data go? The HEXAGON mobile app sends your location data to the HEXAGON server and displays the parameters and trajectory of your movement on the map on the screen of your Smartphone.If you have installed HEXAGON on the bike of your child and if you installed the HEXAGON mobile app, you can set up Parental Control functions on his/her Smartphone and on yours. After this is done, you can track the driving style, the trajectory, and motion parameters of your child on your Smartphone. Can I connect to other cyclists who are using the HEXAGON app?Only if an emergency happens. If it is needed, you can press special button on the wireless remote and your SOS message will be sent to appropriate phones, i.e. other cyclists from your Smartphone.Additionally, you can receive the SOS message from other cyclist if your phone number was entered in appropriate setup menu in his HEXAGON mobile app. Can I use HEXAGON / HEXAGON Light without my Smartphone?Yes, you can. In this case, you can use two functions of HEXAGON: switch on and off turn indicators or alarm (parking lights) using buttons of Remote Control, mounted on the handlebars of your bike, and make video recording with the rear view camera on the SD card of HEXAGON by pressing the REC button on a device (you need to set in advance the SD-card into the appropriate slot of devise). In addition, stop and motion signals are working automatically in HEXAGON.Even if you do not have Remote Control, or it does not work, switched HEXAGON will automatically work out the stop and motion signals and can lead the video recording from the rear view camera with turned on REC button. In addition, in the absence of a Smartphone, we are recommending you to turn off Wi-Fi button on the HEXAGON, to conserve its battery. I saw HEXAGON has different “modes.” How do HEXAGON's different modes work exactly (i.e. city or highway)?By using its own telemetry’s data from embedded gyroscope and accelerometer, HEXAGON clearly controls the Stop and Moving signal lights automatically regardless of the type of track (i.e. city, country or highway). What is photocell data? I see Hexagon uses this to decide the brightness of my traffic signals. Photodiode installed on the front of Remote Control generate the photocell data. The micro controller of Remote Control is in watchdog mode and when photocell data will exceed/downgrade the threshold level, micro controller will wake up and send appropriate telemetry to HEXAGON to increase/decrease the brightness of traffic signals. Does HEXAGON's motion signal automatically turn on as soon as my bike starts moving? HEXAGON’s Moving signal is working permanently. But when you are braking, the Stop signal turns on for 3 seconds. Hereupon the Stop signal turns off and the Moving signal turns on again. For the Motion Signal, how does HEXAGON know I'm moving? HEXAGON knows you’re moving on the base its own telemetry data from embedded gyroscope and accelerometer. How does HEXAGON / HEXAGON Light mount to my bike? HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light both attach to your bike with a complimentary mount-to- frame. The mount is designed so you can easily remove and install HEXAGON! Will HEXAGON / HEXAGON Light damage my bike? Nope – not at all! Fastening to the frame is so simple and designed so mindfully that there’s no way to damage your bike’s frame. What is the warranty for HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light?We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. What's your return policy? At observance of operating conditions of HEXAGON, in the case of its failure, you need to send it to our US office with all the other components of the kit (Remote Control, mount, etc.) and we will send you exchange within 2 weeks provided that HEXAGON and other components have no mechanical damages. These warranty conditions apply throughout the world for 12 months from the date of purchase of your device. When will HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light be delivered? We will deliver our product in September 2017! What are the shipping cost for HEXAGON and HEXAGON Light? Free U.S. and Canada shipping$7 for EU, UK, Australia, Japan, South Korea, Singapore, Taiwan, and Hong Kong$15 Rest-of-World How can I contact you?You can send us an email at ceo@smartbike.systems or fill out request on our website, http://www.smartbike.systems/. If necessary, we can arrange a Skype-conference with you!

story:
By searching online, we shock by the reports about bike theft. Almost every 10 seconds a bike is missing somewhere in the world.That’s why we come up with Walsun. I thought there had be a better option.Fingerprint identification saves you from keys, combinations, and lock picking, protecting your bicycle, or motorbike.

The disc brake lock weighs only 220 grams and is locked to the disc brake for bicycles and motorcycles. Unlock with your finger, integrated design works and Anti-theft. Without lock Strap.

Walsun is not only for bicycles,but fits for motorcycles and e-bikes. The 6mm lock pin fits for most motorcycles and bikes with disc brakes which is less than 6mm thick. Stapler style can prevent potential damage caused by riding away while Walsun is engaged.

 

 

In order to reduce any default, there’s one button on the left side of the lock. The lock will automatically enter into the “ sleeping mode”, which means no reaction when you try to unlock it with your finger. Don't worry and the lock still protects your bike, locking your bike.If you want to unlock the lock, you must click the button to wake it up and unlock with your fingerprint. It can prolong the stand-by time of the lock and avoid any copy of our fingerprints.

 

Walsun Team strive to develop products which meet the needs and taste of the cyclist. With a sense of security and aesthetics, Walsun Team continues to design and produce fashionable and dependable fingerprint lock. We want to provide reliable and use friendly safety guard for your beloved family and partners.

story:
We Want to Save Lives by Reducing Intextication

If you’re brave enough to venture out on the road, you know how many people text and drive on a regular basis. Sometimes, it’s just annoying, when a driver waiting at a light is too busy texting to notice when the light turns green. Other times, it can be deadly. 

In fact, distracted driving is now the number one cause of fatal crashes in many places; even causing more deaths than drinking and driving.

Everybody knows texting and driving is bad, but 49% of people under age 35 still do it, and according to a 2012 Ad Council study, 78% of teens and young adults admit to having read an SMS message while driving.

Governments all over the world have brought in distracted driving laws to combat the issue, and in most places, they’ve done little to curb the problem. In fact, RCMP Corporal Chris Little was quoted as saying that after 3 years of distracted driving legislation in his home province of Alberta, it’s actually getting worse…

Legislation enacted to combat distracted driving in jurisdictions around the world has often proven ineffective at lowering the rates of death and injury. It’s simply too easy to hide your phone while texting and the police can’t be everywhere at once.

Textattle is a FREE Android application currently under development that helps to provide an added incentive to hang up and drive; the wrath of your mom.

Here’s how it works. Textattle uses two technologies that are already built into your phone; text messaging and GPS, to tattle on drivers who text at speed.

So, when a driver sends a text to their friend while driving on the highway, their mom, or someone else who loves them, gets a message too. No one wants big brother telling them what to do, but we’re hoping that people will still listen to their mom.


What We Need & What You Get

We are not a big company looking to make a ton of money by launching the next big app. We just had a simple idea to combat a vexing and complicated problem; we're addicted to our phones and there is very little impedus to stop using them behind the wheel until it's too late.

  • We need to raise $10,000 to bring Textattle to market as a FREE Android app. This fee will cover the salaries for the coders and developers who are making Textattle happen, along with providing some very basic marketing and promotional support; primarily press releases, SEO, and grassroots marketing like flyers at concerts, etc.
  • A lot of people like the idea and want to help. If you're one of them, and you donate $5 to the cause, we'll send you a 'Texting and Driving is Dangerous' bumper sticker. If you really like the idea, check out some of the bigger perks.
  • If we don't reach our fundraising goal through IndieGoGo, the app will take longer to bring to market, and the iOS version and more advanced commercial applications we envision down the road. If we greatly exceed our fundraising goals we'll spend the extra money on additional app development, marketing, and media.


The Impact

We count ourselves extremely lucky to have never been the victims of a distracted driving crash, but with almost half of all drivers under 35 now admitting to texting behind the wheel, calamity seems almost inevitable. Textattle can't stop distracted driving, but if it saves even one life, it'll be totally worth it. Here's why we think it will work:

  • People who text and drive do so because they don't think about the repercussions. Your mom (or wife, or daughter, or son, of dad, or whomever it is that loves you) often do. 
  • We have put together a great team to help bring this to market; expert coders and developers at a leading sofware development company (Three Point Turn Inc) and great marketing, public relations and advertising from Billet Marketing Inc.
Textattle is not the only solution to this problem, but it's a novel step in the right direction. We know that people don't like the government telling them what to do, but we're hoping that people will still listen to their moms.


Risks & Challenges

We anticipate that some people are going to think this idea is stupid; "So what if my mom knows I text and drive?" In our experience, these are the same people who believe that they can text-and-drive safely. 

Unfortunately, it often takes a tragedy to change these people's minds. This app is for the rest of us. Those people sitting on the fence about whether or not to try and get away with it. People who know distracted driving is bad but do it anyway because they don't think they'll get caught. Thankfully very few people wake up in the morning and decide to kill someone with their car. Crashes happen because of inattention and driver error. There are no accidents.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.
Eventually we plan to offer more advanced versions of the app that cannot be easily defeated; great for parents whose kids are using their cars and texting with mobile devices paid for by parents. Fleet and commercial operators may also want to know when one of their employees is putting people on the road at risk with a company vehicle and a company phone. There are ways to give Textattle more 'teeth' but first we need to establish that this idea; a little bit of additional accountability, can have an impact on behavior. A free Android app is a great way to do that.


Other Ways You Can Help

We need more than just money. We need people spreading the word and supporting the idea, so that when the application is finished, it's well-received and can start saving lives. 

  • Share our video, site and IndieGoGo campaign via social media
  • Tell your friends and family about this cool idea
  • Share your story with us if you've been the victim of a distracted driving crash
At the moment, Textattle is a well-planned idea, with two professional teams standing by to make it happen. We need your help to turn Textattle into a reality.
