story:
Update: Hello Dear Backers, It has long been a issue about 'flexible funding' on Indiegogo whether the contributor would receive their reward if the campaign does not reach its goal or not..Well we are happy to inform every contributor and would-be backer than you could have a good night's sleep when you help us here at Technotreon realize our dream. We absolutely guarantee that we would deliver every single reward than you paid for with your hard-earned money. There is a chance of slight delay in the shipment but there would not be a single case of a person losing his money just because a campaign did not reach its goal. Have a good day fellow humans!

The most efficient animal on the planet is the condor. The most inefficient animals are humans. But a human with a Bicycle becomes the most efficient animal.

-  Steve Jobs

Introducing the world’s first tri-suspension bike, the TECHNOTREON ALPHA.  We proudly claim that there does not exist a bike to match its stability or comfort anywhere close to its offered price.  And to add another exquisite feature, we made it theft-resistant so that you experience the freedom of riding into unchartered territories your way. It has a revolutionary in-frame lighting system which makes it practically impossible to steal your headlights and sabotage your night riding safety.  Every person on Earth is unique or this is what we like to believe. So why can’t his objects of such importance be as unique as him/her. Unfortunately we cannot do anything about your phone or your car but what we could do is offer you the ability to reinvent your bike….your way. Technotreon Alpha boasts of LIMITLESS customization.  Your Alpha can be made to reflect you in every way possible. Custom paint job, unique name printing, customized decals, favorite automotive inspired vinyls or special bike type transformation customization. You name it. If you can imagine it, we can do it. There is nothing we can’t display on your very own unique Alpha. Experience bike riding in a way you never really did.


The patented design of Technotreon Alpha is definitely the most unique in the world. For all intents and purposes the design consists of two individual unique components, the wheel tri-suspension and the in-frame suspension.

                     WHEELS

 Its revolutionary wheels are the next level of technology since the invention of the ‘hub less wheels’ in the 1980s. A single wheel consists of three shock absorbers positioned at such an angle that they preserve and conserve momentum, increase propulsive efficiency and effectively act as the WORLD’s most advanced suspension system not just in the biking industry but in the entire transportation technology. There is no explanation required about the benefits of this tech in offroading in any kind of terrain (we tend to include grass, mud, sand, gravel, dunes and semi flood in our definition!) but little did we at Technotreon anticipate that they work exceptionally good even in urban commuting and cruising at high speeds. The angle formed by the suspension system makes the wheels very efficient during high speeds and hence increase stability and comfort which is seldom found in retail bikes and only exist in custom racing cycles. Hence we are proud to present an all-terrain biking experience.

                      FRAME

This feature of the Technotreon Alpha is particularly awesome, simply because it takes frame suspension to a whole new level. It would be a gross understatement to say that this is a better frame suspension than any other bike has to offer in the entire world.  What it actually does is convert not just your rear wheel into a shock absorber but transforms the entire lower length of your bike into a retracting compressing spring. And when added with our patent pending wheels, this effectively transforms your Technotreon Alpha into a rolling cushion. The shock absorber is located vertically in the center and with its axle uniquely positioned over the front fork, makes the bike an invincible suspension vehicle which is way apart from what the biking industry has ever seen.

                     DESIGN

Every person has the right to stand out. The Technotreon Alpha cannot help you in your job but it can definitely make you look different while riding. It has been designed in such a way that it tends to stand apart. We increased the length of the frame by 15% as compared to standard bikes and decreased the height by 10% to improve its aerodynamic capabilities and thereby increase its speed and decrease your effort. Also it is adaptable to any electric bike module just in case you want to motorize your beloved Alpha. And this does not end here, there are a lot of bike thieves these days and we know how painful it is to lose such a beloved possession. That is why we designed it to be ANTI-THEFT. Yes, you are a fantastic reader and you read it right! Having a theft-resistant bike is a bare necessity during such times. And your beloved beauty will have all of the adequate features to keep conspiring thieves at bay. It will have custom wheel bolts with supplied attachment so that only you could access the wheels. The rest of the bike is design welded and custom fitted to serve you for years to come without ever being stolen.

                  BIKE SIZE

We want you to be as comfortable as possible during your leisure time or your commute. This means that your bike should be a perfect fit for you. Due to the unique frame design of our Technotreon Alpha we could cater to heights beginning from 135cm (53”) to 195cm (78”) which is by far one of the best height ranges any bike has to offer. 


       ELECTRONIC LIGHTING

Technotreon Alpha has the best lighting system ever. Not only because it is powered by a massive 2.5 Ampere battery which could go on for weeks with standard night usage or because it has USB ports located under its seat and optional ports on the handle bar but because it’s the only real anti-theft light in the market.  We absolutely guarantee the safety of your headlights. Technotreon Alpha has first-of-its-kind IN-FRAME lighting technology which basically means that the lights are permanently welded in your bike and cannot be stolen. With most of the wiring through the frame, the only way to steal its lights is by slicing the handlebar itself with an angle grinder. (The thief is in for a lot of work!). The headlight can be tuned for urban or cross country night riding at the push of a button.  Also your Alpha has specifically designed LED turn signals with the most comfortable triggers ever. Each side trigger is located on the respective side of the handlebar which is the first time a bike is utilizing this obvious feature. This drastically improves accessibility and shortens the reaction time ultimately leading to upgraded safety.

            APP DEVELOPMENT

Along with the numerous features of the Technotreon Alpha, we also cater to the thirst of Techies and fitness freaks with in-development app. We have a dedicated professional software developing team working to make your ride as easy and interactive as web browsing! The app is expected to offer your ride stats such as speed, time and distance while also recording further stats such as calories burned with respect to the selected gear ratio and the distance travelled. We have been analyzing the market and the customer preference for a long time and hope to offer you nothing but the best.  We also aim to offer all the social networking necessities required in this technological era along with the ability to share your ratings and rankings set on the unique Technotreon segments. We are also thinking on the lines on backer accessibility and aiming to make replacements and free upgrades just a finger swipe away all through the app. Any kind of review and consumer complaint could be filed right there on the app itself. That apart, we are aware that software development is tedious and can take longer than expected. But fear not, since we are as tough as the problems! We ready to tackle any unforeseen problem head on. But at the end we rely on our backers and funders for support and patience if we run into difficulties and delays for we know it is you who matters to us most at the end of the day.

             CUSTOMIZATION


                                 Bike Type Transformation Customization

Technotreon Alpha offers a feature which no other bike in the world does, Type Customization. We found that the need of every individual is different and there exists no bike to satisfy them all. So we did what we aim to here at Technotreon, reinvent. We came up with a unique bike transformation program. You could choose your bike type, your way. We customize the bike to fit your exact standards and intended purpose. Following is a list of detailed types of bikes we offer in this particular arena

  • Road Bicycles are designed for traveling at speed on paved roads.
  • Touring Bicycles are designed for bike touring and long journeys. They tend to be comfortable, durable and have cargo capabilities.
  • Commuter bikes are designed specifically for commuting over short or long distances. It typically features derailleur gearing, thin wheels, fenders, and storage area. A well-equipped commuter bike typically features front and rear lights for use in the early morning or late evening hours encountered at the start or end of a business day
  •  Hybrid bicycles are a compromise between the mountain and racing style bicycles which are featured to have a light frame, medium gauge wheels, and derailleur gearing, and feature straight or curved-back,touring handlebars for more upright riding.
  • City Bikes are optimized for the rough-and-tumble of urban commuting. It usually feature mountain bike-sized (26-inch) wheels, a more upright seating position, and wide heavy belted tires designed to shrug off road hazards. They also feature full fendors, suspension system and lighting for all night riding.
  • Comfort bikes are equipped with derailleur rather than the inefficient hub gearing. They typically have a modified mountain bike frame with a tall head tube to provide an upright riding position, 26-inch wheels, and semi-slick tires. Comfort bikes typically incorporate such features as front suspension forks, seat post suspension with wide plush saddles with a comfortable handle bar.
  • Mountain bicycles (also called All Terrain Bicycle) are designed for off-road cycling. All mountain bicycles feature sturdy, highly durable frames and wheels, and wide-gauge treaded tires for stability in unpredictable terrain. Mountain bicycles feature a dedicated suspension systems and mechanical disc brakes with multi gearing ability.
  • Cruiser Bicycles re heavy framed bicycles designed for comfort, with curved back handlebars, padded seats, and balloon tires. They are also called beach bikes or boulevardiers and are designed for comfortable travel. A cruiser is single-speed with coaster brakes, we also offer cruisers that range up to seven speeds. Aluminum frames have been used in Cruiser type construction, lowering weight.
  • Track Bikes, intended for indoor or outdoor cycle tracks or velodromes are exceptionally simple compared with road bikes. They have a single gear ratio, a fixed drivetrain (i.e. no freewheel), usually no brakes, and are minimally adorned with other components that would otherwise be typical for a racing bicycle.

We also offer a range of tire thickness in the Full Customization Package tailored to your specific needs and intended usage.

                                                           Color Options

Standard color options include the Royale Red-Black, Pearl Sky Blue-Black and Full Matte Black

These can be customized and a custom paint job option can be selected in the  Customization packages to include the color choice required.


                                              Basic/Premium Customization

In the Basic customization package the Technotreon Alpha can be modified to include unique name printing on the body frame and a decal style from over 10 alternatives. These customizations will be confirmed via Email after the campaign.

The Premium Customization Package offers everything that you could humanly dream of. It comes along with the BIKE TYPE CUSTOMIZATION TRANSFORMATION to suit your specific needs. It also includes a custom paint job along with your own color demands for specific components, Name printing, customized decals and not to forget your favorite automotive inspired vinyls. Need a particular logo on your beloved Alpha…You got it. Want a specific color to suit your riding likes…fear not. If you can imagine it, we can do it!


                                            Drop Down Handle Bar Upgrade

Drop-bar handlebars are lightweight & aerodynamically designed to reduce air resistance. They are a viable option if you want to go faster or are more concerned with efficiently transferring your energy into making the bike move forward. They also allow for a greater number of riding and hand positions than standard flat-bars which allows you to be in a comparatively relaxed position with negligible strain over hands, wrists and shoulders. This increased versatility comes with the tradeoff of being slightly less efficient (from an aerodynamic standpoint) than the typical drop-bar road bike.

         REFERRAL PROGRAM 

Here is another exciting opportunity to win rewards and maybe even a TECHNOTREON ALPHA(s). When your friends have contributed an equivalent to the amount shown below you will be rewarded. And yes, even now we stay true to our limitless customization claim and offer various types of rewards on a particular level of referral contributions.

For example, If your referral contribution is $1000, then you would be rewarded a free upgrade on your Technotreon Alpha (which you could obviously select from the given options) and we would be contacting you by email to confirm your selection. The detailed reward list is given below and let’s not forget, with enough referrals you could earn a FREE Technotreon Alpha!

How does it work?

1.  Visit our Campaign on Indiegogo

2.  Log in or Sign up

3.  On the left end of the screen exists an icon which contains your unique sharing URL link. Clicking the icon will display the link.

4.  All you have to do is copy the link and share with your friends-n-family through Emails, Facebook, Twitter or Google Plus.

5.  You could view your total referral contribution by selecting the ‘REFERRALS’ option in your profile.



                                                           Warranty

We believe in providing the finest components accessible and hence are absolutely confident about our product. And we do not hesitate in providing a service no other company does… COMPONENT GUARANTEE.This means that any non-human error damage to the components entitles the owner (which is you J) to receive brand new parts at no cost. We have also extended the standard time period of 30 days to 6 months without any extra charges simply because you are awesome!

           SPECIFICATIONS



   FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

How Do I order The Technotreon Alpha?

You can use your credit card to select your intended perk and let Indiegogo do the rest. However we are currently not accepting paypal. For additional Information contact us at http://www.technotreon.com/

Is The Technotreon Alpha compatible with electric bike attachments and other modifications such as grills and baskets?

Yes, the Alpha is designed in such a way that it can be modified in any standard way you like. But for the best results we recommend using Basic/Premium Customization Package which can be found in the Customization section of our Indiegogo page.

 How is Technotreon Anti-theft and what components are protected under the design?

Your Technotreon Alpha has custom designed bolts which cannot be unscrewed without the supplied spanner so only you can access the wheels when you want. Its In-frame lighting mechanism is the first of its kind and we absolutely guarantee that it would not be stolen if your bike isn’t.

How would I receive replacement parts if I needed some?

That’s not at all difficult. You could buy most of the components in your town/city itself since your Alpha is compatible with most standard components. However if there is a requirement for specialized components, feel absolutely free to contact us and we will make sure you get what you need. We also offer 6 month component guarantee so any requirement in that time period would be at no cost to you.

Do you ship internationally?

Yes, the Technotreon Alpha is available worldwide. So go ahead and book one for yourself.

What are the recommended height and weight measurements?

The standard model can support weight up to 250lbs i.e. 120 Kgs approx. and heights ranging from 135cm (53”) to 195cm (78”). If there is a specific requirement please select the Premium Customization Package and you will get a bike specifically tailored to your needs.

How would I confirm my unique customization options?

You will be contacted through Email around the end of the campaign and could place your own unique order. Like we claim, we can customize it the want you want according to your chosen customization package.

Do you offer warranty?

Currently, we offer 6 month component guarantee, a huge increase as compared to the standard 30-day warranty. So relax and enjoy your ride!

What is the gear ratio of the drive systems?

The Technotreon Alpha offers single speed and 7-speed gear ratios

When will I receive my Alpha?

Please take a look at the Timeline graphic above.

Can I get a refund on my donations?

Please refer to Indiegogo’s refund policy and terms & conditions.

What if the campaign doesn’t reach the goal?

We have designed the Technotreon Alpha in such a way that if the goal is not met there would only be a slight delay in the shipment of your bike and your product would reach you the way it was supposed to be. You will get what you contributed for. Guaranteed!

How much is the cost of shipping internationally?

We are trying to make shipping as cheap as possible and could arrive to a definite number when we have the confirmed number of orders and hence the shipping could be paid around the end of the campaign. Either way you don’t need to pay for shipping right now!

Do all perks require shipping to be paid?

Yes, you will receive a link directing you to the shipping payment before the end of the campaign.

Who is responsible for taxes customs and the VAT?

The backer is responsible for all kinds of taxes and customs.

What is the primary bike type of Technotreon Alpha?
Technotreon Alpha is primarily a comfort/mountain bike. However, it  can be completely customized  according to your needs and intended usage in the Premium Customization Package to suit your requirements.
story_txt:
Update: Hello Dear Backers, It has long been a issue about 'flexible funding' on Indiegogo whether the contributor would receive their reward if the campaign does not reach its goal or not..Well we are happy to inform every contributor and would-be backer than you could have a good night's sleep when you help us here at Technotreon realize our dream. We absolutely guarantee that we would deliver every single reward than you paid for with your hard-earned money. There is a chance of slight delay in the shipment but there would not be a single case of a person losing his money just because a campaign did not reach its goal. Have a good day fellow humans!
The most efficient animal on the
planet is the condor. The most inefficient animals are humans. But a human with
a Bicycle becomes the most efficient animal. 
- 
Steve Jobs
Introducing the world’s first
tri-suspension bike, the TECHNOTREON ALPHA. 
We proudly claim that there does not exist a bike to match its stability
or comfort anywhere close to its offered price. 
And to add another exquisite feature, we made it theft-resistant so that
you experience the freedom of riding into unchartered territories your way. It
has a revolutionary in-frame lighting system which makes it practically
impossible to steal your headlights and sabotage your night riding safety.  Every person on Earth is unique or this is
what we like to believe. So why can’t his objects of such importance be as
unique as him/her. Unfortunately we cannot do anything about your phone or your
car but what we could do is offer you the ability to reinvent your bike….your
way. Technotreon Alpha boasts of LIMITLESS customization.  Your Alpha can be made to reflect you in
every way possible. Custom paint job, unique name printing, customized decals,
favorite automotive inspired vinyls or special bike type transformation
customization. You name it. If you can imagine it, we can do it. There is nothing
we can’t display on your very own unique Alpha. Experience bike riding in a way
you never really did.


The patented design of Technotreon Alpha is definitely the most unique in the world. For all intents and purposes the design consists of two individual unique components, the wheel tri-suspension and the in-frame suspension.


                     WHEELS

 Its revolutionary wheels are the next level of technology since the invention of the ‘hub less wheels’ in the 1980s. A single wheel consists of three shock absorbers positioned at such an angle that they preserve and conserve momentum, increase propulsive efficiency and effectively act as the WORLD’s most advanced suspension system not just in the biking industry but in the entire transportation technology. There is no explanation required about the benefits of this tech in offroading in any kind of terrain (we tend to include grass, mud, sand, gravel, dunes and semi flood in our definition!) but little did we at Technotreon anticipate that they work exceptionally good even in urban commuting and cruising at high speeds. The angle formed by the suspension system makes the wheels very efficient during high speeds and hence increase stability and comfort which is seldom found in retail bikes and only exist in custom racing cycles. Hence we are proud to present an all-terrain biking experience.


                      FRAME

This feature of the Technotreon Alpha is particularly awesome, simply because it takes frame suspension to a whole new level. It would be a gross understatement to say that this is a better frame suspension than any other bike has to offer in the entire world.  What it actually does is convert not just your rear wheel into a shock absorber but transforms the entire lower length of your bike into a retracting compressing spring. And when added with our patent pending wheels, this effectively transforms your Technotreon Alpha into a rolling cushion. The shock absorber is located vertically in the center and with its axle uniquely positioned over the front fork, makes the bike an invincible suspension vehicle which is way apart from what the biking industry has ever seen.


                     DESIGN

Every person has the right to stand out. The Technotreon Alpha cannot help you in your job but it can definitely make you look different while riding. It has been designed in such a way that it tends to stand apart. We increased the length of the frame by 15% as compared to standard bikes and decreased the height by 10% to improve its aerodynamic capabilities and thereby increase its speed and decrease your effort. Also it is adaptable to any electric bike module just in case you want to motorize your beloved Alpha. And this does not end here, there are a lot of bike thieves these days and we know how painful it is to lose such a beloved possession. That is why we designed it to be ANTI-THEFT. Yes, you are a fantastic reader and you read it right! Having a theft-resistant bike is a bare necessity during such times. And your beloved beauty will have all of the adequate features to keep conspiring thieves at bay. It will have custom wheel bolts with supplied attachment so that only you could access the wheels. The rest of the bike is design welded and custom fitted to serve you for years to come without ever being stolen.




                  BIKE SIZE

We want you to be as comfortable as possible during your leisure time or your commute. This means that your bike should be a perfect fit for you. Due to the unique frame design of our Technotreon Alpha we could cater to heights beginning from 135cm (53”) to 195cm (78”) which is by far one of the best height ranges any bike has to offer. 





       ELECTRONIC LIGHTING
Technotreon Alpha has the best
lighting system ever. Not only because it is powered by a massive 2.5 Ampere
battery which could go on for weeks with standard night usage or because it has
USB ports located under its seat and optional ports on the handle bar but
because it’s the only real anti-theft light in the market.  We absolutely guarantee the safety of your
headlights. Technotreon Alpha has first-of-its-kind IN-FRAME lighting
technology which basically means that the lights are permanently welded in your
bike and cannot be stolen. With most of the wiring through the frame, the only
way to steal its lights is by slicing the handlebar itself with an angle
grinder. (The thief is in for a lot of work!). The headlight can be tuned for
urban or cross country night riding at the push of a button.  Also your Alpha has specifically designed LED
turn signals with the most comfortable triggers ever. Each side trigger is
located on the respective side of the handlebar which is the first time a bike is
utilizing this obvious feature. This drastically improves accessibility and shortens
the reaction time ultimately leading to upgraded safety.

            APP DEVELOPMENT

Along
with the numerous features of the Technotreon Alpha, we also cater to the
thirst of Techies and fitness freaks with in-development app. We have a
dedicated professional software developing team working to make your ride as
easy and interactive as web browsing! The app is expected to offer your ride
stats such as speed, time and distance while also recording further stats such
as calories burned with respect to the selected gear ratio and the distance
travelled. We have been analyzing the market and the customer preference for a
long time and hope to offer you nothing but the best.  We also aim to offer all the social networking
necessities required in this technological era along with the ability to share
your ratings and rankings set on the unique Technotreon segments. We are also
thinking on the lines on backer accessibility and aiming to make replacements
and free upgrades just a finger swipe away all through the app. Any kind of
review and consumer complaint could be filed right there on the app itself.
That apart, we are aware that software development is tedious and can take
longer than expected. But fear not, since we are as tough as the problems! We
ready to tackle any unforeseen problem head on. But at the end we rely on our
backers and funders for support and patience if we run into difficulties and
delays for we know it is you who matters to us most at the end of the day.

             CUSTOMIZATION





                                 Bike Type Transformation Customization
Technotreon Alpha
offers a feature which no other bike in the world does, Type Customization. We
found that the need of every individual is different and there exists no bike
to satisfy them all. So we did what we aim to here at Technotreon, reinvent. We
came up with a unique bike transformation program. You could choose your bike
type, your way. We customize the bike to fit your exact standards and intended
purpose. Following is a list of detailed types of bikes we offer in this
particular arena

Road Bicycles are designed for
     traveling at speed on paved roads.
Touring Bicycles are designed for bike touring and long journeys. They
     tend to be comfortable, durable and have cargo capabilities.
Commuter bikes are designed specifically for commuting
     over short or long distances. It typically features derailleur gearing, thin
     wheels, fenders, and storage area. A well-equipped commuter bike typically
     features front and rear lights for use in the early morning or late
     evening hours encountered at the start or end of a business day
 Hybrid bicycles are a compromise between the mountain and racing style bicycles which are featured to have a light frame, medium gauge wheels, and derailleur gearing, and feature straight or curved-back,touring handlebars for more upright riding.
City Bikes are optimized for the
     rough-and-tumble of urban commuting. It usually feature mountain
     bike-sized (26-inch) wheels, a more upright seating position, and wide
     heavy belted tires designed to shrug off road hazards. They also feature
     full fendors, suspension system and lighting for all night riding.
Comfort bikes are equipped with derailleur rather than the
     inefficient hub gearing. They typically have a modified mountain bike
     frame with a tall head tube to provide an upright riding position, 26-inch
     wheels, and semi-slick tires. Comfort bikes typically incorporate such
     features as front suspension forks, seat post suspension with wide plush
     saddles with a comfortable handle bar.
Mountain bicycles (also called All Terrain
     Bicycle) are designed for off-road cycling. All mountain bicycles feature
     sturdy, highly durable frames and wheels, and wide-gauge treaded tires for
     stability in unpredictable terrain. Mountain bicycles feature a dedicated
     suspension systems and mechanical disc brakes with multi gearing
     ability.
Cruiser Bicycles re heavy framed bicycles designed for comfort,
     with curved back handlebars, padded seats, and balloon tires. They are also called beach
     bikes or boulevardiers and are designed for comfortable travel. A cruiser
     is single-speed with coaster brakes, we also offer cruisers that range up to
     seven speeds. Aluminum frames have been used in Cruiser type construction,
     lowering weight. 
Track Bikes, intended for indoor or
     outdoor cycle tracks or velodromes are exceptionally simple compared with road bikes.
     They have a single gear ratio, a fixed drivetrain (i.e. no freewheel),
     usually no brakes, and are minimally adorned with other components that
     would otherwise be typical for a racing bicycle.

We
also offer a range of tire thickness in the Full Customization Package tailored
to your specific needs and intended usage.

options include the Royale Red-Black, Pearl Sky Blue-Black and Full Matte Black
These can be
customized and a custom paint job option can be selected in the  Customization packages to include the color choice required.

customization package the Technotreon Alpha can be modified to include unique

not. If you can imagine it, we can do it!

lightweight & aerodynamically designed to reduce air resistance. They are a

the typical drop-bar road bike.

finest components accessible and hence are absolutely confident about our

story:
EverCharge Range Extender

The Team

I have a management background dealing with engineers and IT professionals. Over the course of 8 months I've consulted with many different Engineers and designers. My team and I have put in over 1,100 hours in building an electric car from the ground up. We took a stock 99 VW Golf and made it 100% electric.

What you are looking to help fund is groundbreaking. There is no other product like it on the market. This product has SUCCESSFULLY passed all the tests and we have a WORKING PROTOTYPE.  Imagine being able to say you were a part of making electric cars part of normal driving culture. 

-Weight: About 48+- pounds

-Output: 440 Wh to a maximum potential of up to 35,520.074 Wh for the next phase prototype

-In comparison

-Nissan Leaf EV has a 660 pound battery at 21,000 Wh

-Tesla P90 has a 90,000 Wh battery 1,200 pounds

-Each device can link together adding more electricity for an even longer driving range

-Device is able to connect to any electric vehicle

-Entire unit can fit in about a 15” x 15” box

-It can work with all types of batteries found in an EV.

- It does not impact performance. 

What We Need & What You Get

Breakdown of the funding.

  • I'm looking for $77k to get the product ready for licensing.
    • $20k will go to obtain a PCT patent which will give us protection globally
    • Remainder of the funds will go towards bringing the product to market
  • Main focus is getting the PCT patent done. Any funds will first go to that.

The Impact

Put aside the lowering levels of gas around the world. Put aside the environmental factors. If you only focus on this being a huge contributor to getting the electric car into the main stream, I'd say that's big enough. 

Risks & Challenges

As with anything groundbreaking, technology is a factor. Currently the technology does exist to make this happen. It's just a matter of sourcing the right equipment from the right vendors and then modifying it to work as I need it. Everything that has been built and tested was bought off the shelves and modified. 

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not be able to financially contribute. You can still help. Please spread the word. Pass the link along and tell your friends. Good thoughts and prayers are also very much needed. Helping the world get off fossil fuel is not a small task but one that's finally achievable. 

If you're thinking of going for The BIG PAPA perk but want to have assurance that the prototype works. I'll gladly make you this deal. Your attorney or mine, can draft papers stating that your funds will go into an escrow account. You and your team can run the prototype through all the tests you want, in the course of 48 hours. If the device doesn't successfully PASS any of the statements I made in this proposal, you'll not only get 100% of your money back but I'll give you 5% of any money this invention ever makes. Your funds will only be released to me upon succesfully passing the tests.  That's how sure I am of my invention. 

Now. Who's ready to invest in the future?

story:
Why we're passionate about this

EcoBike is a start-up company that wants to shake up the bike-sharing industry in a number of ways. Two of the most precious commodities in life is our health and time, and we want to help you with both!

The majority of students that travel to university from their halls or accommodation primarily walk, due to the cost of other transport options or simply, it is the most convenient. When I was a student, I had to walk over 45 minutes to get to university from my flat, and that is a lot of time wasted. Just think, one and a half hours a day simply getting to lectures and back - I could do so much more in that time. What if we could reduce that time to 30 minutes, without breaking the bank?

Well, that's exactly what we plan to do.  People are becoming aware that transport options are limited in most towns and cities, and whilst universities and local authorities are trying to do something which is sustainable and environmentally-friendly, it simply isn't always cost-effective. One example of a bike-sharing scheme in the U.K, which costs the tax-payer, for one bike docking station and 10 bikes, costs £10,000! That is a ridiculous sum of money due to bureaucracy and many other issues that come with publicly-funded schemes. Most of these systems are heavily subsidised by either business through sponsorship, local authorities, central government and charities. We can provide a stationless system for much less, meaning we can pass these savings onto the user.

In the U.K, we cycle a very small amount (4% average of the U.K population). I'd like to change this, and bring us inline with our European neighbours. How can this be done? Simple - provide truly affordable, convenient transport with added benefits via our app. 

You'll not only get a new, fast, affordable and environmentally free transport option to get around your town, city or university, but you'll also help to plant new forests, contribute to cleaning our nations fantastic yet rubbish ridden beaches, reduce pollution, reduce congestion, increase health and fitness or even donate to a general fund for EcoBike to donate to our partners. EcoBike will have a network of bikes around your area to allow you to get from A to B with ease. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

In 2017, we understand that transparency is key for backers and that’s why we’re upfront about our costs. So here’s a breakdown of what we have worked out to be the total cost of this project. We want to run a small crowdfunding project for our MVP (minimal viable product) - which means we're able to provide the app, a few bikes to test and trial with users and our admin service at the most basic level. We want to show that our way is better than all others in this market - with the help of you! 

1. App development - £6,000

2. IndieGoGo Fees - £800

3. 5 bikes including locks for demonstrating our bikes around the U.K - £1,000

4. Marketing budget - to spread the word of EcoBike - £1,500

5. Buffer money for unforeseen expenses - £700

6. Staff costs - £0 - We're doing this all without pay, because we believe in this company so much, so ZERO of the money we raise will go directly to us. 

What happens if we over-fund?

We'd be absolutely thrilled if we over-funded, as we could do so much more with the money. Any money we get over our £10,000 target, we'll use that to make a better app, add improved features, purchase more bikes to showcase in the U.K and visit universities, towns and cities to spread the word about EcoBike. Simply put, the extra money would speed up our plans and bring us to launching much quicker! So every little helps.

So what are the perks of this app?

It couldn't be simpler to use the app. We've designed it so that you can find a bike in the user's vicinity, with icons clearly showing where the bikes are. You can tap on the bike you want, and reserve it for up to 10 minutes, giving you time to walk to the bike's location as well as ensuring that you have a ride home. Once the user finds the bike, they scan the QR code - wait a few seconds and ta daaa, the Smart Lock will unlock and off they go. Simple right?

Bikes will be conveniently located around university halls and the campus - so that at any time, a user will be within a 100m radius of a bike. Convenience, affordability and user-driven experiences are what EcoBike is founded on.

Key Perks of the App

Some of the most interesting perks of the app are the following:

  1. Tracks calories / miles / co2 saved / money donated to charity
  2. Allows users to connect with friends so - friend leaderboards show stats
  3. Membership fees for monthly / yearly access or pay per use - flexible + affordable use
  4. Social-media focussed - interactive experience with friends, family and peers

Our goal is just enough for us to get this off the ground - £10,000 - but with your help, that money will mean that we will be able to ask investors for extra funding to make EcoBike a reality.  

We want you, the backers, to feel a part of this project every step of the way. We know that people who support campaigns on IndieGoGo like to feel part of something special. That's why we're making you, 100% apart of this journey. We'll be adding ways for you to get involved, such as events around the U.K, naming our bicycles for certain areas and even choosing the colours of our bikes. We want lots of feedback to make you all feel one of the team, and above all, a successful launch. 

The Impact

What will your contribution mean?

It will mean a lot! Not only will it get this project funded, we also would love feedback on the project along with your opinions to shape and mould this new venture in the way that you, the users want, rather than what we think you want. 

Your contribution will likely mean in the future, we'll be collectively donating £1000's to good causes. You will be a giver in many different ways, you will become part of our team, helping us to protect the UK's air, water, forests and bees plus supporting other charities which aren't all about the environment. You will be an essential cog in the EcoBike by allowing us to promote clean living, healthy lifestyles and create a cycling revolution which will benefit the whole of the UK, not just economically, but personally for people, their health, their wellbeing and much more. 

We will update you every day via our YouTube posts or Blog posts, where we'll show you information about meetings with manufacturers and designers, we'll talk about the ins and outs of the business to provide you with the utmost transparent project you'll back. We want you to trust us to deliver on our promises. 

We aim to have within 1 year, 1000 bikes on the ground with over 1,000,000 individual hires and 10 million miles ridden, which will result in over ££££ donated to charity, millions of co2 being saved, millions of hours saved for our riders, £1000's saved from switching to a low-cost transport option and most likely, a fitter group of people.

Be a backer, and make this happen. We have big goals - this is just the beginning. 

Risks & Challenges

Our initial work has led us to the current point we're at. We have the bikes ready to be made, with our bike designed, we have a factory ready, we have the app developer ready to go, we have the locking mechanism and GPS tracking system ready, we have found potential offices in London, we have spoken with shipping companies for the bikes. There isn't too much that will go wrong, but we all know anything in life can go wrong.

We are prepared for any issue that may come up - be it production, the rewards our backers will receive or the final hurdles of getting the bikes on the ground for users to hire. 

Other ways to get involved

As I've already mentioned, I don't just want backing in the form of cash, which of course is important, but we want to create a community of people who can offer their advice and feedback to make this project go ahead smoothly. 

Join us, be a backer, be an EcoBiker. 

If you've got down to here, and you've read it all...then you MUST be keen in helping. So click one of those rewards on the right-hand side and support us simply, you can 'Back Us' without receiving a reward, just because you're that awesome.Thank you ever so much!

story:
It's the new PANZERBOARD. Made by CELCIUS TECHNOLOGY, manufacturer of Law Enforcement and Military equipments. The highly anticipated campaign is finally here and ready to kick-off! This board is made for both Professionals and Inexperience Riders. 



With the PANZERBOARD  you can ride as far as 30km / 18.6miles and reach top speed up to 50kph /31mph. The speed mode is variable, Slow ▸ Medium ▸ High. Any inexperienced riders can hop up to the wide board, balance easily, and ride it. Once you are comfortable riding, you can unlock PANZERBOARD  true speed potential.


               Soft Acceleration ◢ ◣ Deceleration                               Aggressive Acceleration

Electric skateboards are very fun to use, especially on terrain that allows them to reach their top speed. But for those who live in areas with hills and uneven terrain, the right electric skateboard is needed to make the most of it and use it for more than just for fun.  PANZERBOARD  is durable, safe to use, and can climb steep hills. It’s bigger, more powerful and certainly makes an impression. It’s got it all - the affordability, the image, the attitude. It’s also built to let you push your limits: Go ahead and venture off the beaten path. It’s your ride to ultimate freedom.


 






We've invested all our time, effort, blood and sweat into this beast of an e-Board that’s made perfect for any rider, any terrain, in any given situation. We’re done with prototyping  and are currently optimizing parts, configurations and logistics. We want to take this board to the next level and get even more people to ride it. Everyone who helps us in the making of this board, will get it at half of the retail price.

We’re not only building an electric vehicles or a brand, but rather growing a community of encouragement while we grow our company along with our backers. We’re constantly improving both the electric vehicles and the performances, listening to and seriously taking in feedback.

This vehicles are made by each one of you! And our mission is making the best vehicles for everyone.



FREE LED & Laser Tail Light for Every Backers! Safety is important, but it has to look cool! 

We really appreciate your support! Help us to share this campaign to your friends on Facebook, tweeter, Instagram, or any other social media platform. We would like to appreciate your kindness with this special gift. Please follow this two simple steps:

1: Share the campaign; click the one of the share buttons at the top right corner of this campaign page, just right beside the “BACK IT” button.

2: Leave a comment; once you shared the campaign, go to the “COMMENTS” section of this campaign, write something like: “Just ordered this! Christmas Gift for my son!”, Please remember to include a link to your post and your order number. If you have any question, feel free to contact us at info@celcius.shop
 

Warranty Policy

CELCIUS warrants to the original user that the PANZERBOARD  electric skateboard shall be free from all defects in material and workmanship for SIX MONTHS. This warranty does not apply to any electric skateboard that has been subject to abuse, misuse, negligence, or accident. Defects caused by tampering or unauthorized modifications or repairs are also not covered by this warranty.  Consumable parts are not subject to warranty due to their deterioration through standard use, these items are: bearings, tires, bushings, griptape and wheels. 

Shipping date: December 2018 ❄ Get Your Chirstmas Gift Now ❄

story:
Summary
 

Thank you Indie Trendsetters, travelers, people-on-the-go, & foodies for checking out my new product and for being the fearless "early adopters" that love trying new innovations!! 

I'm often on the go which means, like most of you I eat and drink in my car. However balancing food or hot coffee on my lap or console is not only risky but dangerous. 

The Wheel Tray was born out of my desire to solve a problem and avoiding the hazards of eating in the car. 
 

Features

  • Easy-to-use ( sets it up in less than 5 seconds)
     
  • Light weight ( carry it with you for travel or using in a coffee shop)
     
  • Folds and stores easily ( tucks between your seat and center console)
     
  • Has optional white board for quick notes and numbers
     
  • Makes eating on the go a pleasant experience (no messes) 


Hi I'm Mark Machuszek -  an inventor, foodie, car enthusiast and traveler.  I have been in the innovation, environmental and tech space for 20-plus years creating a number of products and solutions for automotive, education, restaurant and media industries. 
 


Yes, Yes, Yes, The Wheel Tray!!  How do I know you will love it?

Well, one afternoon I went to a drive thru, got my food, parked the car and was ready to eat, only to discover that I left The Wheel Tray back at the "studio" aka my garage! Omg I just realized how important and convenient it is! 
 
No more messes, spills or ketchup dripping down the side of the center console while trying to eat those French fries you aren't supposed to have anyway! 
 

Wheel Tray Benefits
 

  • Cool, convenient, fun-to-use and even a conversation starter.
     
  • Take the "mess" out of your car meals 
     
  • Eat in your car without spilling drinks
     
  • Have a place to put your food, keys, book or mobile device 
     
  • No more stained clothes, carpets or upholstery 
     
  • Cleans easily with antibacterial wipes
     
  • Prevents items from falling between the seat and console


WHAT STARTED THIS JOURNEY  


I was in my 1970 VW bus making a colossal mess trying to eat while balancing my "to-go meal "precariously on my lap.  

As I was contorting myself around the steering wheel, I said "this is ridiculous, there has to be a solution for this!" 

 So, I went to work, and after numerous prototypes  - much more difficult than I imagined - The Wheel Tray was born. 

Soon, others were asking  "do you have one for my car"? 

Now creating a universal fitting Wheel Tray that works on the majority of cars in the world that have different sized steering wheels, mounted at different angles, was a complex challenge.

So, what I'm offering on Indie is the solution to that problem. It is the result of many months of work, over a year of development and patent. I think you'll you love it like we do! 

This (below) is the original VW bus prototype that started this product line!!  


We need your support!!
 

  • Help us make this happen ! We are currently hand-making, a limited number of Wheel Trays but we have to manufacture these at scale because it's impossible to do them all by hand.
     
  • The number of pre-orders we receive will determine our production goals and pricing.
     
  • We also want to hire more people  including single parents, veterans, seniors, homeless and a few special needs individuals like my family business did years before. My family  was awarded Small Company of the Year 7-times by Dunn & Bradstreet. 
     
  • Contributors will get a new Made in the USA product  that will grow jobs, help the environment including increasing the market for recycled materials. 
     
  • I would love to see Indie peeps blow the roof off this so we can make a difference.
     

What we need & what you get...
 

  • Your Excitement & Support is #1!! Help us spread the word!
     
  • All Pre-Order clients will get a discount off the list price of any Wheel Tray plus future updates about new products/accessories.
     
  • Available now is our hand-made, limited edition Wheel Tray!  These are first-run exclusives, made in our Redondo Beach, California studio - aka our "garage" and they will be signed by the person that made 'em! 
     
  • Our 5k goal will help us increase inhouse production and help us partner with  manufacturer.
     
  • Funds raised over 10k expands our Innovation Lab  allowing us to release a number of new products both related and unrelated to The Wheel Tray.

    Sneak peak of a new innovation coming soon (below)! Any guesses? 





Full funding allows us to start our unique hiring plan for making our sustainably produced, custom Wheel Tray .

These will be signed by the person who made them, so you know your purchase made a difference in someone's life.  That signature might be from a vet, a single mom/dad, a special needs person or it might be from me!
  

  • If you know a company  that would like to partner, brand, private label or advertise, let us know.  

    Below, is one of the early cloth/foam backed prototypes but we changed materials because it was harder to clean in the age of Corona virus. Note the number of fasteners needed to hold the industrial grade elastic backing in place.


     

The Impact
 

  • Wheel Tray has a World-Wide market potential and you could be part of it!
     
  • Wheel Tray adds a little more fun, enjoyment and convenience in your life, while making your car more useful.
     
  • The Wheel Tray creates new jobs and new markets while helping people.
     


Risks & Challenges
 

  • There are a number of risk factors including market, economic, political, production and competitive risk, as well as known/unknown events like Covid-19, thus nothing can be guaranteed.
     
  • My past business experience  will help lessen those risks especially with a few key people, selected partnering, the right manufacturers and getting some of your suggestions/ideas.
     

 Call to Action!!
 

  • Take the wheel tray with you wherever you go, travelling or grabbing a bite.
     
  • Never worry about ruining your clothes or your day.
     
  • Makes a great gift for anyone who has a vehicle!!
     
  • Buy it for your sales team .
     
  • Every busy mom will love the convenience!
     

Join us
 

  • We want movers & shakers to help us via your social networks, talk us up to your friends and families.
     
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools. 
     
  • Contact me if you have new ideas for improving the product or promoting it.
     
  • If you see imitation products  or cheap knock-offs, let us know (we have quality control and a patent) and you might get a bonus for helping us too.
     
  • Always support the innovators, not the imitators!
     

Lets see what we can do together!

This entire project is dedicated to my dad, aka "Jammin' Joe," who saw my early prototypes, loved the idea and wanted me to launch it. l love you dad  - 1/1/2020 

Thank you so much everyone,

Mark Machuszek, inventor of The Wheel Tray

Take the "mess" out of your car meals  
Eat in your car without spilling drinks 
Have a place to put your food, keys, book or mobile device  
No more stained clothes, carpets or upholstery  
Cleans easily with antibacterial wipes 
Prevents items from falling between the seat and console

WHAT STARTED THIS JOURNEY  
I was in my 1970 VW bus making a colossal mess trying to eat while balancing my "to-go meal "precariously on my lap.  As I was contorting myself around the steering wheel, I said "this is ridiculous, there has to be a solution for this!" 
 So, I went to work, and after numerous prototypes  - much more difficult than I imagined - The Wheel Tray was born.  Soon, others were asking  "do you have one for my car"? Now creating a universal fitting Wheel Tray that works on the majority of cars in the world that have different sized steering wheels, mounted at different angles, was a complex challenge.So, what I'm offering on Indie is the solution to that problem. It is the result of many months of work, over a year of development and patent. I think you'll you love it like we do! This (below) is the original VW bus prototype that started this product line!!  

We need your support!! 


Help us make this happen ! We are currently hand-making, a limited number of Wheel Trays but we have to manufacture these at scale because it's impossible to do them all by hand. 

The number of pre-orders we receive will determine our production goals and pricing. 

We also want to hire more people  including single parents, veterans, seniors, homeless and a few special needs individuals like my family business did years before. My family  was awarded Small Company of the Year 7-times by Dunn & Bradstreet.  

Contributors will get a new Made in the USA product  that will grow jobs, help the environment including increasing the market for recycled materials.  

I would love to see Indie peeps blow the roof off this so we can make a difference. 


What we need & what you get... 


Your Excitement & Support is #1!! Help us spread the word! 

All Pre-Order clients will get a discount off the list price of any Wheel Tray plus future updates about new products/accessories. 

Available now is our hand-made, limited edition Wheel Tray!  These are first-run exclusives, made in our Redondo Beach, California studio - aka our "garage" and they will be signed by the person that made 'em!  

Our 5k goal will help us increase inhouse production and help us partner with  manufacturer. 

Funds raised over 10k expands our Innovation Lab  allowing us to release a number of new products both related and unrelated to The Wheel Tray.Sneak peak of a new innovation coming soon (below)! Any guesses? 


Full funding allows us to start our unique hiring plan for making our sustainably produced, custom Wheel Tray .These will be signed by the person who made them, so you know your purchase made a difference in someone's life.  That signature might be from a vet, a single mom/dad, a special needs person or it might be from me!  

If you know a company  that would like to partner, brand, private label or advertise, let us know.  Below, is one of the early cloth/foam backed prototypes but we changed materials because it was harder to clean in the age of Corona virus. Note the number of fasteners needed to hold the industrial grade elastic backing in place. 

The Impact 


Wheel Tray has a World-Wide market potential and you could be part of it! 

Wheel Tray adds a little more fun, enjoyment and convenience in your life, while making your car more useful.  

The Wheel Tray creates new jobs and new markets while helping people. 




Risks & Challenges 


There are a number of risk factors including market, economic, political, production and competitive risk, as well as known/unknown events like Covid-19, thus nothing can be guaranteed. 

My past business experience  will help lessen those risks especially with a few key people, selected partnering, the right manufacturers and getting some of your suggestions/ideas. 


 Call to Action!! 


Take the wheel tray with you wherever you go, travelling or grabbing a bite. 

Never worry about ruining your clothes or your day. 

Makes a great gift for anyone who has a vehicle!! 

Buy it for your sales team . 

Every busy mom will love the convenience! 

Join us 


We want movers & shakers to help us via your social networks, talk us up to your friends and families. 

Use the Indiegogo share tools.  

Contact me if you have new ideas for improving the product or promoting it. 
If you see imitation products  or cheap knock-offs, let us know (we have quality control and a patent) and you might get a bonus for helping us too. 

Always support the innovators, not the imitators! 

Lets see what we can do together!This entire project is dedicated to my dad, aka "Jammin' Joe," who saw my early prototypes, loved the idea and wanted me to launch it. l love you dad  - 1/1/2020 Thank you so much everyone,Mark Machuszek, inventor of The Wheel Tray

story:
About G.O.A.T.

G.O.A.T. is an acronym for "Greatest of All Time" driver and is being used as a placeholder name until we formulate the new company.  G.O.A.T. wants to create a company that:

  • Is Driver centric.
  • A safer choice for passengers.
  • Offers a fair split between company and driver.

We will create a platform from the ground up, starting with your voice.

What We Need & What You Get

We are working with StreetTeams to deliver incentives and for G.O.A.T. feedback :

  • Our move forward goal is 25K.
  • We will use the funds toward legal and technology.
  • In the event we don't reach our mark, we will use the monies to continue the StreetTeams platform.

The Impact

Your contribution, whether large or small will move us forward:

  • As a contributor, we want to work with you first.
  • We have experience building platforms, including rental and social media with all types of budgets. We can do this.

Risks & Challenges

We have set a moderate goal to achieve our first milestone. We need you to commit to make this a reality.

  • We are going up against the giants, so we need everyone on board.
  • We need to hear your voice on StreetTeams to help develop a product that is a differentiator.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Spread the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Join us at StreetTeams.com G.O.A.T. discussion board.

July the 4th we start our Rideshare Independence Campaign!

story:
The World Is Facing A Big Dilemma.

Dilemma: A situation in which a difficult choice has to be made between two or more alternatives, especially equally undesirable ones.

We Want A Robust Economy...


We Want A Healthy, Viable Planet:

But, We Can't Have a Robust Economy Without Transportation.

The Emissions From Cars & Trucks Is Changing Our Planet.

Unless you've been living under a rock you know our environment is under extreme stress from car & truck emissions...

AND WE NEED TO DO SOMETHING!

* There are 253 million cars & trucks on American roads.
* There is in excess of 1 Billion cars & trucks worldwide.
*  These vehicles emit over 40 Billion tons of EXTRA carbon dioxide into our air each year.

YES,"40 BILLIONS TONS

PER YEAR."

Motor vehicles are responsible for nearly one half of smog-forming volatile organic compounds (VOCs), more than half of the nitrogen oxide (NOx) emissions, and about half of the toxic air pollutant emissions. Motor vehicles, including non-road vehicles, now account for 75 percent of carbon monoxide emissions WORLDWIDE.

These toxins are destroying the earths ozone layer.

We want our kids to inherit a prosperous world, which we can only deliver to them through a growing economy,... but we also DON'T want our kids to have to wear SPF 150 sunscreen, because the ozone layer has been destroyed, due to that same economic activity.


OUR DILEMMA...

WHICH DO WE PREFER TO DO WITHOUT... HEALTHY PLANET, OR BOOMING ECONOMY?

Al Gore talked about this dilemma, a few years back... but had no, balanced, political & economic solution to our dilemma, because In a free country people get to make choices.



Free people have a right to drive a car or truck of their choice, HOWEVER, chose to drive that truck 15,000 miles per year, and it emits about  18,000 pounds of CO2 into the air. Choose the  average car and it emits about 11,000 pounds of CO2!

Vehicle by Vehicle, It Adds Up To 40 Billion Tons of CO2 Per Year And We All Play A Part.


Governments are pushing the mini-electric car concept, but consumers, especially American consumers, want big powerful cars, and so the auto industry keeps making them.

So, government tries to force new regulations...

But, BIG AUTO Continually Pushes Back...
(Excerpt) - Wall Street Journal Article: "... Car companies are laying the groundwork to seek some relief when the targets come up for review by regulators in 2017, executives said at the North American International Auto Show in Detroit..."


WHAT'S THE SOLUTION?...

Many say, carbon free, electric cars.

The reality is, there is no ZERO carbon footprint. The mass adoption of electric cars, that need to pull power from our electric grid, might make the situation worse.

Experts agree that if electric vehicles become widely adopted many power companies will have to burn coal, or use nuclear power, to meet the electrical needs of these vehicles, Which might not be green at all.

This excerpt from a UC Berkley study states clearly the challenge:

“A super charging Tesla coming online would “feel” to the electric grid as if 120 houses came online for half an hour, or like an entire neighborhood popping up in the middle of a city.”

That’s one Tesla, now, imagine 1 million Tesla’s.

Coal plants are the nation’s TOP source of carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions, the primary cause of global warming. In 2011, utility coal plants in the United States emitted a total of 1.7 billion tons of CO21.  A typical coal plant generates 3.5 million tons of CO2 per year2.

"Do we want to burn 3x the amount of coal to power electric cars?"

NO!


Let’s Face It, Our Dilemma Won't Be Solved Using Current Thinking & Technology. 

  • Current engines are only 23% efficient & dump about 19 lbs of CO2 into the air for every gallon of gas they burn. 

  • Current Hybrids use these old engine designs, which only generate about 3kW of electricity - TO LITTLE TO HELP HYBRIDS REALLY COMPETE WITH PURE ELECTRIC CARS, IN TERMS OF EMISSIONS


    • The Dilemma Can Only Be Solved Through A Business Driven Solution Acceptable To The Green Generation. 


    'Business Driven' Means:

    We must offer consumers vehicles of the size and power they desire, so they will purchase them: To Drive Our Economy & Become Part Of The Solution.


    'Acceptable to the Green Generation' Means:

    Those  vehicles need to be electric, or a vastly improved hybrid, with a minimal carbon footprint: Saving Our Environment.


    THE TECHNOLOGY REQUIRED TO MEET THE GOALS OF BOTH IS A SUPER-CHARGER, AS ENVISIONED BY TESLA, BUT ONE THAT'S SMALL ENOUGH TO FIT IN THE VEHICLE & RUNS ON JUST A SIP OF GASOLINE.


    WOLVERTONBAILEY HAS INVENTED THAT ENGINE SYSTEM...

The NEX Engine System is a Level 2 | 3 Charger (Super-Charger.) The enormous electrical power provided by the NEX engine system will offer needed flexibility for a manufacturer wanting to build vehicles with drive power and  outstanding mileage - to reduce CO2 emissions.

In our vision the NEX engine's exclusive role will be to recharge the battery -  effectively creating, an electric vehicle with its own charging system, that runs on a sip of gasoline. 

NEX Technology by the Numbers:

The average NEX vehicle would emit about 1000 lbs of CO2 each year -vs- current levels of 11,000 pounds. A reduction of  around 10,000 pounds of CO2, per vehicle, per year.

  •  A Nex vehicle has 1200% more available electric power, then current hybrids of the same size.

  • A NEX vehicle will have 200-300% better MPGe.

This Could Translates into a 34 Billion Ton Reduction In CO2 Emissions A Year: 

"Shouldn't We Make This Happen?"


The NEX Engine System solves many of the problems keeping industry from beating the dilemma, by making available 1200% more electric power than today's hybrid engine systems. It's enough power to even power light trucks.  

The NEX Engine Sytems is Comprised of 4 Important Modules:


Want to know more?: DOWNLOAD THE NEX ENGINE BROCHURE.

Current hybrid engines produce about 3kW of continuous power. The NEX system produces 1200% more, or 36Kw from the same size engine. Remember, every gallon of gas burned emits about 19lbs of CO2 into the atmosphere, so the longer a vehicle can run on batteries the better for our environment.
 

WHAT WE NEED YOUR HELP WITH:

WE NEED TO:

- Push our technology into the popular consciousness.

- Tap into & leverage the enthusiasm of millions of consumers who want cleaner motive power.
- Become visible to major competitors - on OUR terms.
- Getting NEX Technology noticed around the world.
- Getting maximum 'free media' coverage.

We plan to accomplish the above goals by driving two NEX vehicles coast-to-coast.


Drive One NEX Car and One NEX Truck 2980 miles, from our offices in Santa Rosa, CA. to a location, to be chosen, in New York, NY,  to demonstrates a 200+ MPGe for the car, and 57+ MPGe for the truck. 

Our demonstration truck is an Isuzu model box truck and the demonstration car will be a Factory Five 818 S kit car. We have chosen these models because each has already been made electric.
NEX system integration will give each vehicle its own power supply, since the wheel motors and the majority of the electrical system is already in place. This saves both time and money, on the integration.

Don't You Need More Money?

Yes, this is a $1,500,000 project, to integrate the engines into the vehicles and drive them across country. Bringing an electric vehicle to production has high up-front costs. This campaign is only a part of a much larger fundraising effort, which includes company funds, new investor funds, and The NEX Vehicle Coast-to-Coast Drive Sponsorship Campaign. 

Together, these funding efforts will provide the means for us to deliver our technology to the public. But your support is a very important part of the whole! 

Even, If we don't reach the goals of this campaign, all the money you contribute will go into the larger pool of money, and we will get the car and truck integrated with our NEX system, and we will complete the coast-to-coast drive. Afterwards, we will begin the process of getting our technology into the market & begin eliminating BILLIONS OF ADDITIONAL TONS OF CO2 FROM OUR AIR, while offering consumers powerful, fun to drive, electric vehicles.

Please support us, & share our campaign with your friends, through social media, and any other way you can think of.

How Will Funds Be Used?

The funds from this campaign will be used to fund the coast-to-coast drive and related development cost, to showcase the superiority of NEX technology.

PROJECT COST INCLUDE:

- Technical Specialist & Consultants
- Purchasing the Vehicles
-  System Integration Cost
- Drive Expenses
- Event Expenses


Your Reward For Helping Us

We're building cars and trucks, and of course we can't give one to each of our contributors. (However, we are running a sweepstakes to give away the Factory Five 818s NEX car, as a part of our promotional campaign for the coast-to-coast drive, and you are welcome to enter, just email to request the link. Entry is free.)

The #1 Reasons to Contribute to This Campaign:

Is because you are as concerned about our planet as we are, and you want to see NEX technology in the marketplace.

Together we can demand automakers produce better vehicles, with  smaller carbon footprints, and create millions of new jobs around the world, as each country pushes to replace their old fleets with NEX engine system vehicles. 

The NEX engine system is an extraordinary advancement to come from a startup company, and we're hoping you will add your name to our success. Together, we can reduce the impact of transportation systems on the environment, and build stronger economies around the world.

Thank You For Your Support!


THE PERKS:


PERK #1:

$18 | Wall of Fame

A HUGE email 'Thank You' from the CEO of the Company, and your name added to the NEX engine Hall of Fame we will add and keep on our Website for life.


PERK #2:

$47 |Access Key to The Insider's Portal

- Access Key (Password) to our 'Insider Portal' for shareholder & partners. Insiders can follow project development, in real time, watch private videos, register for our 'Friends & Family' list, (which is relevant to our coming public listing.), register to win a NEX car, and so much more. Portal members receive regular email updates, and notice of all events, and happenings.

In short, information is power, and the portal gets you inside the company.  You will also receive an Email 'Thank You' from the CEO


PERK #3:

$2500 | Named Sponsor & Tickets

While the car body will be branded by a major sponsor, for upwards of $350,000, your name will appear, along with 49 others, right on the hood of the car, making you a part of an historic drive of the NEX vehicle. (Name placement is front of hood, back to windshield, in the order in which your sponsorship is received.)

You Also Get Access To The Insider Portal & Plus, 4 VIP Event Badges: You will be a VIP guest at the New York Arrival Ball Event, and all other promotional events you wish to attend. (We are planning many events throughout the campaign, and you will receive notice of all events through the Insider Portal. 


Who We Are

Founded in 2009, WolvertonBailey, Inc. is dedicated to the rapid commercialization of In-Vehicle Multi-Phase Electric, (Quick-Charge), Systems for Hybrid Electric Vehicles.

Eva Wolverton - Keeps you informed.

Derek Bailey,CEO | Del Wolverton, CSO | Mike Keen, COO

WolvertonBailey Lab | Santa Rosa, CA.

We have 156 Shareholders. (Picture is Recent Shareholder Meeting)

See Our October 2015 Newsletter

____________________

The company developed its initial models of the charging system’s prime mover, the Counterpoise engine - which powers our Hybridyne electric generator, in conjunction with Cal Poly University, and received its first Patent (US 9,074,527, B2) in July of 2015.

Additional patents are pending on it’s advanced battery charging systems - including a patent application for a multi-spark device which improves the combustion timing and process in any type of spark ignition engine, including rotary engines. Our multi-spark technology is incorporated into our NEX engine system, but will also be developed as a stand-alone product, as it can be retrofitted into existing spark ignition engines for a 20%-30% efficiency improvement. Multi-spark technology will be a huge help to truck fleets seeking to improve efficiency in engine performance.


Our Company website is www.wolvertonbailey.com.

 

The Impact of Our Technology

 Our NEX engine system can meet the needs of a variety of applications including;

  1. Electric & Hybrid Vehicles
  2. Portable Back-Up Generators
  3. Village Level Power Plants (for humanitarian & development missions)
  4. Small Aircraft
  5. Marine Craft
  6. Tactical Remote Power for Military Applications (powering remote base camps)

Want to know more about the NEX system? Download the NEX Brochure.


    Risks & Challenges

    The risks associated with this project are essentially the same as you would find taking any ambitious technological project to production.  We worked hard to minimize risk in all aspects of the project.

    • Reliability: Some projects fail because their products are not reliable or rugged enough for consumer use.  We have Solid works (CAD) models, and Mat Labs, and the coast-to-coast drive will completely prove our technology concept.

    • Sourcing: A risk that many hardware projects face is that of discontinued items. Our team has experience with production management, and the majority of our parts will be custom made for us.  We’ve learned the value of reliable sources and secondary suppliers for key items and embrace that philosophy in all NEX systems.

    • Safety: Particularly with electric vehicles, it is important to have redundant systems.  We only use quality electronics and assembly practices, and all of our NEX vehicles will have redundant safety systems built-in.

    • Scalability: Another area many projects fail is inability to meet higher-than-anticipated demand.  Our suppliers can handle larger orders, but once our technology is proven through this campaign, companies from around the world will be licensing and building based on our patented design. We will not have to build NEX systems for a billion vehicles.

    We have an aggressive execution plan, and are ready to face the challenges ahead.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just don't have the money to contribute, and we understand that, clearly.

    But that doesn't mean you can't help:

    • Get the word out to your friends to check us out, and make some noise about the NEX coast-to-coast drive campaign.
    • Share, Share, Share! Please use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word!
    • @ $18 we need 8333 people to support us to reach our goal.
    • @ $47 we need 3191 people to support us to reach our goal.

    If, each of our friends ask five to ten of their friends to support us, we can do it!

    Thank you for your time and support, and we'll see you in New York.


    FAQ:

    How much more power does the NEX engine produce, than a regular hybrid engine?

    Current hybrid engines produce about 3kW of continuous power. The NEX system produces 1200% more, or 36Kw from the same size engine. Remember, every gallon of gas burned emits about 19lbs of CO2 into the atmosphere, so the longer a vehicle can run on batteries the better for our environment.

    How much pollution does a vehicle produce?

     

    How much power does an electric vehicle require?

    Understanding power requirement of electric vehicles.
    The average vehicle running on a battery needs about 30 kWh of electricity to power the vehicle for 100 miles.  (30 kilowatts of power per hour.)

    For example, the EPA rating for the Nissan LEAF is exactly 30 kWh per 100 miles.  A Tesla Model S 60 is rated at a combined 35 kWh per 100 miles, and uses a little more energy since it’s heavier and more powerful than a LEAF, while the Chevy Spark EV has a combined consumption rating of 28 kWh per 100 miles. A box truck, or heavy pickup, might need double or triple that amount of electricity to travel 100 miles, and that assumes no hills.

     At a supply rate of 3 kW, it would take 3 to 7 hours to charge the batteries in the average car. (Useless for drive-time applications)

    Note the chart below.
