 part of a much larger fundraising effort, which includes company funds, new investor funds, and The NEX Vehicle Coast-to-Coast Drive Sponsorship Campaign.  
Together, these funding efforts will provide the means for us to 
deliver our technology to the public. But your support is a very 
important part of the whole!  
Even, If
 we don't reach the goals of this campaign, all the money you contribute
 will go into the larger pool of money, and we will get the car and 
truck integrated with our NEX system, and we will complete the 
coast-to-coast drive. Afterwards, we will begin the process of getting our technology into the market & begin eliminating BILLIONS OF 
ADDITIONAL TONS OF CO2 FROM OUR AIR, while offering consumers powerful, fun to drive, electric vehicles.
Please support us, & share our campaign with your friends, through social media, and any other way you can think of.




How Will Funds Be Used?



The funds from this campaign will be used to fund the coast-to-coast drive and related development cost, to showcase
the superiority of NEX technology. 








 PROJECT COST INCLUDE:

- Technical Specialist & Consultants- Purchasing the Vehicles-  System Integration Cost- Drive Expenses- Event ExpensesYour Reward For Helping Us
We're building cars and trucks, and of course we can't give one to 
each of our contributors. (However, we are running a sweepstakes to give
 away the Factory Five 818s NEX car, as a part of our promotional
 campaign for the coast-to-coast drive, and you are welcome to enter, 
just email to request the link. Entry is free.)
The #1 Reasons to Contribute to This Campaign:
 Is because you are as concerned about our planet as we are, and you want to see NEX technology in the marketplace. Together we can demand automakers produce better vehicles, with  smaller carbon footprints, and create millions of new jobs around the world, as each country pushes to replace their old fleets with NEX engine system vehicles.   The NEX engine system 
is an extraordinary advancement to come from a startup company, and 
we're hoping you will add your name to our success. Together, we can 
reduce the impact of transportation systems on the environment, and build stronger economies around the world.Thank You For Your Support!


THE PERKS:

PERK #1: 
$18 | Wall of Fame

A HUGE email 'Thank You' from the CEO of the Company, and your name 
added to the NEX engine Hall of Fame we will add and keep on our Website
 for life.

PERK #2: 
$47 |Access Key to The Insider's Portal

- Access Key (Password) to our 'Insider Portal' for shareholder &
 
partners. Insiders can follow project 
development, in real time, watch private videos, register for our 
'Friends & Family' 
list, (which is relevant to our coming public listing.), register to win
 a NEX car, and so much more. Portal members receive regular email 
updates, and notice of all events, and happenings.

In short, information is power, and the portal gets you inside the company.  You will also receive an Email 'Thank You' from the CEO


PERK #3: 
$2500 | Named Sponsor & Tickets
While the car body will be branded by a major sponsor, for upwards of $350,000, your name will appear, along with 49 others, right on the hood of the car, making you a part of an historic drive of the NEX vehicle. (Name placement is front of hood, back to windshield, in the order in which your sponsorship is received.)

You Also Get Access To The Insider Portal & Plus, 4 VIP Event Badges: You will be a VIP guest at the New York
 Arrival 
Ball Event, and all other promotional events you wish to attend. (We are
 planning many events throughout the campaign, and you will receive 
notice of all events through the Insider Portal.  


 


Who We Are
Founded in 2009, WolvertonBailey, Inc. is dedicated to the rapid commercialization of In-Vehicle Multi-Phase Electric, (Quick-Charge), Systems for Hybrid Electric Vehicles.



Eva Wolverton - Keeps you informed.

Derek Bailey,CEO | Del Wolverton, CSO | Mike Keen, COO

WolvertonBailey Lab | Santa Rosa, CA.

We have 156 Shareholders. (Picture is Recent Shareholder Meeting) 
See Our October 2015 Newsletter
____________________

The company developed its initial models of the charging system’s prime mover, the Counterpoise engine - which powers our Hybridyne electric generator, in conjunction with Cal Poly University, and received its first Patent (US 9,074,527, B2) in July of 2015. 
Additional patents are pending on it’s advanced battery charging systems - including a patent application for a multi-spark device which improves the combustion timing and process in any type of spark ignition engine, including rotary engines. Our multi-spark technology is incorporated into our NEX engine system, but will also be developed as a stand-alone product, as it can be retrofitted into existing spark ignition engines for a 20%-30% efficiency improvement. Multi-spark technology will be a huge help to truck fleets seeking to improve efficiency in engine performance.







Our Company website is www.wolvertonbailey.com.
 

The Impact of Our Technology
 Our NEX engine system can meet the needs of a variety of applications including;

Electric & Hybrid Vehicles
Portable Back-Up Generators
Village Level Power Plants (for humanitarian & development missions)
Small Aircraft
Marine Craft
Tactical Remote Power for Military Applications (powering remote base camps)

Want to know more about the NEX system? Download the NEX Brochure.


  Risks & Challenges  
The risks associated with 
this project are essentially the same as you would find taking any 
ambitious technological project to production.  We worked hard to 
minimize risk in all aspects of the project.
• Reliability: Some projects fail because their products are 
not reliable or rugged enough for consumer use.  We have Solid works (CAD) models, and Mat Labs, and the coast-to-coast drive will completely prove our technology concept.
• Sourcing: A risk that many hardware projects face is that of
 discontinued items. Our team has experience with production management, and the majority of our parts will be custom made for us.  We’ve learned the value of reliable 
sources and secondary suppliers for key items and embrace that 
philosophy in all NEX systems.
• Safety: Particularly with electric vehicles, it is important
 to have redundant systems.  We only use quality electronics and 
assembly practices, and all of our NEX vehicles will have redundant safety systems
built-in.
• Scalability: Another area many projects fail is inability to
 meet higher-than-anticipated demand.  Our suppliers can handle larger 
orders, but once our technology is proven through this campaign, companies from around the world will be licensing and building based on our patented design. We will not have to build NEX systems for a billion vehicles.We have an aggressive execution plan, and are ready to face the challenges ahead.
  Other Ways You Can Help Some people just don't have the money to contribute, and we understand that, clearly.
 But that doesn't mean you can't help:  Get the word out to your friends to check us out, and make some noise about the NEX coast-to-coast drive campaign. Share, Share, Share! Please use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word!
@ $18 we need 8333 people to support us to reach our goal.
@ $47 we need 3191 people to support us to reach our goal.

If, each of our friends ask five to ten of their friends to support us, we can do it!
   Thank you for your time and support, and we'll see you in New York.FAQ:How much more power does the NEX engine produce, than a regular hybrid engine?
Current hybrid engines produce about 3kW of continuous power. The NEX
 system produces 1200% more, or 36Kw from the same size engine.
 Remember, every gallon of gas burned emits about 19lbs of CO2 into the 
atmosphere, so the longer a vehicle can run on batteries the better for our environment.How much pollution does a vehicle produce?
 How much power does an electric vehicle require?
Understanding power requirement of electric vehicles.The
 average vehicle running on a battery needs about 30 kWh of electricity to power the vehicle for 
100 miles.  (30 kilowatts of power per hour.)For example, the 
EPA rating for the Nissan LEAF is exactly 
30 kWh per 100 miles.  A Tesla Model S 60 is rated at a combined 35 kWh 
per 100 miles,
 and uses a little more energy since it’s heavier and more powerful than
 a LEAF, while the Chevy Spark EV has a combined consumption rating of 
28 kWh per 100 miles. A box truck, or heavy pickup, might need double or
 triple that amount of electricity to travel 100 miles, and that assumes
 no hills. At a supply rate of 3 kW, it would take 3 to 7 hours to charge the batteries in the average car. (Useless for drive-time applications)Note the chart below.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Tatiana Cuadra Bermúdez, and I am a law student and passionate scout leader belonging to the Association of Guides and Scouts of Costa Rica. I appeal to you for your help in order to accomplish my dream to be a volunteer for a year at Nocrich Scout Center.

Why do I want to be a volunteer there?

Nocrich Scout Centre is the only scout centre in Romania. Located in a remote village, it brings the children and young people there a new view on their possibilities, and a helping hand in their personal development. Working with volunteers from across the world, it helps the children with school work, teaches them foreign languages, integrates children from poor families and Roma minorities, and offers them a safe and attractive environment form them to learn and play. The pottery workshop at Nocrich is the only such workshop in the area, and teaches the children free of charge the art of pottery.

How does your contribution help? 

Your money will help me fly to Nocrich and stay there for a year. Most volunteers are short-term ones, and that is why it is very important to have people that stay for longer periods of time and ensure the continuity of the process and the training of the new arrivals, together with activities around the year for the children. Therefore your money are not buying only a plane ticket: they are buying better futures for children that don't have any other people to turn to, and a strong team-player for the Nocrich Scout Centre staff.


What We Need & What You Get

To be able to go to Nocrich, I need to raise a minimum of 1200 USD on top of the 900 USD I already managed to raise together with my family and friends. The money I need are for the airfare and visa:

- visa cost 150 USD

- round trip to Mexico 400 USD for visa purposes

- round trip to Romania 1500 USD

- one year health insurance 150 USD.

Once in Nocrich, the Scout Centre will cover my accommodation and meals for the duration of my voluntary service.

What you will get for your donation apart from my gratitude?
For donations of 100 USD and smaller, I will send you a postcard from Nocrich signed by me and the kids.
For donations between 101-300 USD I will send you a hand-crafted clay memorabilia from the Nocrich pottery workshop together with a hand-written card of thanks signed by me and the kids.
For donations of 300-1000 USD you will get a Nocrich Supporter official diploma together with a hand-written card of thanks signed by me and the kids.

The Impact

The motto of scouts around the world is "Creating a better world". How am I going to do that in Romania? In my one year as a volunteer there I will work with children and young people from remote villages and Roma communities, helping them in their personal and social development, doing after-school activities with them, teaching them Spanish and English, playing with them and try to guide them towards a better future. I will do that together with four other long-term volunteers: 2 from Portugal and 2 from the Czech Republic.

Apart from working with the children, I want to get involved in the development of the scout centre. I believe I can bring a positive contribution to the promotion of the centre, attracting new volunteers and running the activities and projects there.

I have a lot of experience in working with children and young people, being a scout leader in Costa Rica for the past three years. This will help me in my work with the kids. Also, I have been a volunteer at the Guide World Centre, Our Cabaña Mexico in 2013, experience that taught me a lot about what makes a scout centre successful.

Risks & Challenges

Going to Romania for a year to be a volunteer is not as easy a task as it seems... First of all I need a Visa, which I can only take from the embassy in Mexico. That adds another 500 USD to the 1500 USD of the round trip fare from Costa Rica to Romania...

Fortunately my friends from the Romanian Scouts are doing their best to facilitate the Visa process and my scout friends in Mexico are willing to help me while I'm there.

You will be able to read all about it on my Facebook page: Fly Me to Nocrich.


Other Ways You Can Help

Money is not the only way you can help us! If you can't give us a donation yourself, you can spread the word about my project to all your friends- maybe one of them would like to contribute!

Support is of great value to us, and if you believe in our cause share our story using Facebook and the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
I am Jesse Denson. I began research in 2003 developing small rocket engines that could be used later in a design for a Hydrogen and Oxygen engine powered from water. In 2008 the research was completed and a design was quickly made for a engine that runs on gasses from water. All of the research showed that this engine would be self powering and be over unity. I can't know that the engine will be free energy without having a prototype tested, but we would like to find out for our curiosity and for the world. Even if this device cannot power itself it is still a very green tech that could be a big improvement over fossil fuel vehicles as the fuel (water) is not destroyed as it is exploded in the rockets, it is simply recirculated back to the electrolysis machine, re-compressed and then fired again in the engine. Most people don't know that Free Energy is something they can get. Many don't know that Solar, Wind and Geothermal  are Free Energy. They are free energy because you don't pay for the fuel. In the case of the Rocket Hydra Motor it is powered by the same free fuel that powers wind and solar, that being Hydrogen. Solar does not produce a large amount of free energy in small spaces, wind will produce a lot of energy in a small space but it is not portable. The Rocket Hydra Motor not only produces a lot of energy in a small space it is portable as well. All powered by Hydrogen from water. Solar and Wind are powered by the Hydrogen on the Sun, that energy comes from the sun that is 93 million miles away. The hydrogen that powers the Rocket Hydra Motor is right here on earth.

See these links for more information about my story?
https://www.facebook.com/groups/HydrogenEngine/

https://www.facebook.com/RocketHydraMotors

https://www.facebook.com/TheHydrogenEconomy

http://peswiki.com/index.php/Site:HydrogenRocketBodyPack 

Be sure to tune into Reelfoot Lake Radio on ITunes on your apple device or TuneIn radio on your android device or visit http://www.reelfootradio.com

story:
JemStone Transport™, located in Rochester, NY, will change the game of transportation. From automobiles to boats and even livestock transportation, I want JemStone Transport ™ to one day be the household name that everyone chooses. The professional service we will provide, the courteous and knowledgeable staff that will serve our customers, and the affordable pricing we will offer is something that everyone will want. My perks will make this a great campaign for so many funders. 

------------------->Will you Be planning on buying a car in the future or even know someone who is? Doesn't everone?

--------------->Would you like for a great boat transport company to free you of the headache of getting it from A to B? You just have to hop in and worry about your sunscreen...

------------->Do you or someone you know have a farm and like a reliable, trust worthy, licensed and properly trained staff take care of your transport needs? If I had a farm, I would.......




Dealing with the challenge of open auto transport means having your vehicle exposed to the elements which is a liability no one feels comfortable taking. Unlike most open auto transport, our open transport plastic option will give any customer the peace of mind when dealing with open transport and the elements. We also will be providing a free tracking service so you can know where your vehicle is anytime, anywhere.

The old saying goes: there are two favorite days of owning a boat—the day you buy it and the day you sell it. Why can't a favorite day be having a headache free, worry free marina transport need met? Once operational, our marina department will be able to not only pick up and deliver, but will set a standard by providing a free tracking service so customers will know exactly where their marine vehicles are in real time.

Hoping to expand to the transportation of horses and cattle as well, JemStone transport™  will not only provide a tracking service at no additional cost, but will also offer a web cam service for ANYONE to know that their animals are well treated.  Our transporters will not only be trained to drive and operate at compliant CDL capacity, but will also be trained to provide the proper animal care. 

With the proper funding, JemStone Transport will be able to set a new standard in the transportation industry. Funds received will go into acquiring the proper vehicles and trailers essential for various transportation needs, the proper insurance crucial for businesses, and, of course, the necessary training and pay for experienced and professional drivers.

These great perks offered will give any funder a great return on investment--from a fantastic discount on any type of your future transporting needs, to being able to profit $300-$1600 + and even being able to be a part of our company! 

This campaign is not just important to me, but to so many others. We will be providing our community with well-earned incomes helping to strengthen and stimulate the economy. This campaign will help me achieve the goal of not only just running a great business, but being a great employer in an organization that everyone will want to be a part of. Our team will be proud to wear the JemStone Transport™ logo.

Thank you reading, I hope to hear from you as a funder, and God Bless everyone.


-Jeremy Smith

story:
Die Schuhrevolution - The Shoe Revolution

Please, scroll down for the English version of our pitch text!

Sie stehen mitten im Leben, und da macht es einen entscheidenden Unterschied, wie gut Sie stehen. Stellen Sie sich vor, Sie stehen und gehen auf einem Trampolin. Ein Gefühl des Schwebens erfasst Sie. Und genau so ist es, wenn Sie in den aergo® steigen und zu gehen beginnen. Dann sind Sie so frei, wie sich Ihre Füße fühlen.

„Freiheit beim Stehen, Gehen und Arbeiten“

aergo® ist ein neuer, revolutionärer Damenschuh basierend auf einem schwebenden Fußbett. Sie können sich den Schuh wie ein Minitrampolin in Fußform vorstellen. Sie stehen in einem Stück Textil, welches sich zu 100% Ihrer Fußsohle anpasst.

Durch das schwebende Fußbett können Sie Gelenke, Knie, Hüfte und Wirbelsäule um bis zu 25% im Vergleich zu einem herkömmlichen Schuh entlasten. Das wurde mit biomechanischen Analysen durch die Fachhochschule Medizintechnik in Linz (Austria) unter Prof. (FH) Andreas Schrempf nachgewiesen.


Das Team

Wer steckt hinter dem Projekt aergo®? Julia Stöhr hat in den letzten 5 Jahren mit einem Team von Spezialisten gemeinsam mit Andreas Baatz den aergo® Schuh erfunden, entwickelt und bis zur Serienreife gebracht. Sie ist die Projektleiterin, die den kaufmännischen und Projektmanagementanteil im Unternehmen abdeckt. Ihre berufliche Erfahrung reicht vom Kunststoffmaschinenbau über die Sportartikelindustrie bis in die Flugzeugzulieferindustrie.

Andreas Baatz ist das technische Gewissen im Projekt. Er ist als Diplomingenieur Flugzeugbau der Techniker, der einerseits für die technische und serienmäßige Umsetzung sowie anderseits für das Qualitätsmanagement zuständig ist.

Im Fokus unserer Arbeit stand die Verbindung innovativer Technik mit modernem Tragekomfort und höchster Qualität bei Material und Verarbeitung. Das Ergebnis: die aergo® Pantolette für mehr Wohlbefinden und Erleichterung im Alltag. Die patentierte aergo® Schuhtechnologie wurde mit Orthopäden, Schuhtechnikern und -designern sowie Wissenschaftlern aus Oberösterreich entwickelt. Im letzten Herbst erreichten wir unter den Kleinunternehmen den 2. Platz beim oberösterreichischen Landesinnovationspreis mit dem aergo® Schuh.


Was wollen wir mit dieser Kampagne erreichen?

Mit dieser Kampagne wollen wir eine Kleinserie von 500 Paar Schuhen finanzieren und Feedback über das neue Produkt am Markt bekommen. Schön wäre auch für den aergo®, einen gewissen Bekanntheitsgrad zu erlangen und damit auch neue Kunden, Followers und Fans zu gewinnen.

Dazu benötigen wir Euro 20.000.

Die Werkzeuginfrastruktur für die Schuhgrößen 36-40 wurde bereits investiert und ist vorhanden. Für die Produktion unserer nächsten Kleinserie sind einerseits die Materialien wie Thermoplastisches Polyurethan, Polyamid, das Schuhobermaterial inklusive Klettbänder sowie die Gestricke bzw. die Herstellung dieser einzelnen Komponenten notwendig und zu finanzieren. Zu investieren, ist auch noch in einzelne Hilfsmittel für die Kleinserie.

Wie das Geld verwendet?


Your Perks - Ihre Dankeschöns

Als Gegenleistung haben wir uns einige "Perks" bzw. Dankeschöns für Ihr Engagement überlegt:










Bitte buchen Sie die Versandkosten zu den Perks bzw. Dankeschöns zusätzlich für internationale Lieferungen dazu. Danke!
Ausnahme sind die Lieferungen innerhalb von Österreich, wo die Versandkosten bereits berücksichtigt sind. 

Das einzelne Paar aergo® wird bei dieser Kampagne für einen Spezialpreis von Euro 89 angeboten, welches außerhalb der Kampagne einen regulären Preis von Euro 119 hat. Damit sparen Sie 25% während der Kampagne beim Kauf von  1 Paar  bzw. 1 Paar aergo® inklusive Weleda Fußbalsam .

Für Lieferungen außerhalb Österreichs werden Versandkosten verrechnet.

Sollten wir das Funding Ziel nicht erreichen, werden wir eine kleinere Paarzahl an Schuhen produzieren. Hier noch der angestrebte Zeitplan für 2015:


Wie geht's weiter?

Die ersten Rückmeldungen von unseren aergo® Schuhträgerinnen sind sehr positiv und ermutigend, so dass wir bei Erfolg an den Randschuhgrößen 35 sowie 41 und 42 arbeiten werden. Bei einem guten Geschäftsverlauf ist geplant, die Schuhe auch für Herren und Kinder zu entwickeln. Weitere Modelle für geschlossene Schuhe stehen am Plan.


Mögliche Risiken & Herausforderungen

In den letzten 5 Jahren haben wir bereits viele Hindernisse im Projekt aergo® überwunden und das neue Produkt entwickelt sowie getestet. Bei den ersten Serienteilen haben wir noch einiges an Optimierungsmöglichkeiten gesehen, die wir Schritt für Schritt umsetzen werden. Aufgrund unserer Erfahrungswerte im Projekt und unserem Unterstützungsteam vom Transfer Center für Kunststofftechnik in Wels sowie dem Know-how der Produzenten werden wir diese Optimierungen auch erfolgreich in das Produkt einfließen lassen können. Gewisse Verbesserungen werden Erfahrungswerte und Zeit benötigen. Wichtig ist, einen funktionstüchtigen und komfortablen aergo® Schuh als Ergebnis zu haben.


Wege, wie man helfen kann

Wir bitten um Unterstützung von jedem/jeder einzelnen. Die größte Unterstützung ist, wenn Sie eines unserer Dankeschöns bzw. Perks erwerben. Jede/r kann das Projekt aergo® auch unterstützen, in dem darüber gesprochen wird, es weiterempfohlen wird, es einerseits auf der Platform Indiegogo unterstützt, es auf den sozialen Medien wie Facebook, Linked In, Xing, etc. „liked“, teilt und weiterempfiehlt. Umso mehr Personen uns kennen und Interesse an dem innovativen aergo® Schuh haben, umso erfolgreicher werden wir den aergo® am Markt erfolgreich im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes zum Laufen bringen. Schon vorab ein herzliches Dankeschön für Ihr persönliches Engagement!


FAQ - Häufig gestellte Fragen

* Ich habe Fragen zu aergo® - wie kann ich Sie erreichen?

Hier ist unsere e-Mail-Adresse: aergo@enaergy.com – wir bemühen uns, möglichst rasch auf alle Fragen zu antworten. Weitere Informationen finden Sie auch auf unserer Website: www.aergo.at.

* Wie wähle ich die Schuhgröße?

Der aergo® ist als Gesundheitsschuh groß geschnitten und hat die Weite G½. Derzeit sind die Größen 36-40 verfügbar. Hier finden Sie die Größentabelle und Umrechnung in verschiedene Länderformate:

Auf unserer Website finden Sie 1:1 Schablonen für die Kontur des Fußbetts für die einzelnen Größen, welche Sie 1:1 ausdrucken können und sich in die Schablone reinstellen zum Größencheck. (http://www.aergo.at/de/schuhgroessen.html)

* Was ist der aergo® Sonder- bzw. Spezialpreis?

Als Dankeschön für Ihr Vertrauen in uns, möchten wir Ihnen das Paar aergo® zu einem Sonderpreis von Euro 89 inklusive Versandkosten innerhalb Österreichs anbieten. Das gilt für die ersten 200 Paar verkauften aergo®. Damit sind wir 25% günstiger als zum späteren Verkaufspreis, der bei Euro 119 liegt + Versandkosten.

Des Weiteren werden Sonderpakete mit verschiedenen Zusammenstellungen aus Schuhmodellen, Fußbetten, Fußbalsam von Weleda und Schuhsack angeboten, die es zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt in dieser Form nicht mehr geben wird.

Mit Ihrer Unterstützung und Ihrem „Funding“ ermöglichen Sie uns, eine erste Kleinserienfertigung, und dafür möchten wir uns herzlich bedanken.

* Wie sieht es mit Versandkosten aus?

Für Lieferungen sind Versandkosten nur für internationale Sendungen zu berücksichtigen. Lieferungen innerhalb Österreichs sind bereits berücksichtigt. Details sind ind der Perk-Beschreibung zu finden.

* Wann bekomme ich mein Crowdfunding Dankeschön bzw. Perk?

Unser Crowdfunding wird von Juni bis Mitte Juli 2015 laufen. Bereits im Juli während der Crowdfunding Kampagne starten wir mit dem Einkauf der Materialien und planen die Produktion der einzelnen Komponenten. Die ersten Dankeschöns bzw. Perks werden anschließend ab Aufgust 2015 ausgeliefert. Für die aergo® Schuhe planen wir einen Liefertermin im Oktober bzw. November 2015. Wir halten Sie über die Produktionsfortschritte und Liefertermine selbstverständlich über die Plattform am Laufenden.

* Woher kommt der aergo®?

Der aergo® ist ein österreichisches Produkt und wurde in Gmunden, Oberösterreich erfunden, mit verschiedenen regionalen Partnern entwickelt, designt und wird auch hier in der Region produziert. Der aergo® ist ein regionaler, patentierter Schuh – nicht aus Fernost - sondern „Made in Austria“. Wichtig ist uns in unserem Projekt, die Wertschöpfungskette regional zu nützen und Vorort Arbeitsplätze zu schaffen und abzusichern.

* Aus welchem Material besteht der aergo®?

Der aergo® wird aus hochwertigen Kunststoffen hergestellt und ist waschbar. Dementsprechend ist der aergo® auch vegan. Selbstverständlich ist die Sohle rutschfest. Die Kunststoffe sind am Ende der Schuhlebenszeit auch recycelbar. Der Schuh besteht aus 2 Komponenten: Die Schuhsohle mit Schaft und dem schwebenden Fußbett.

* Gibt es eine Garantie auf den aergo®?

Ja, wir geben 1 Jahr Garantie.

* Kann ich aergo® auch ohne Kreditkarte oder PayPal unterstützen?

Ja! Sie können unter Angabe Ihres Namens, Ihrer e-Mail-Adresse und ggf. Ihrer Wunschprämie auf folgendes Konto überweisen:

Sparkasse Lambach

IBAN: AT102031707701112679 lautend auf enaergy GmbH und BIC: SPLAAT21XXX

Der eingegangene Betrag wird dann von uns an Indiegogo weiterüberwiesen.

* Kann ich aergo® mit Kreditkarte, aber ohne PayPal unterstützen?

Wie man mit Kreditkarte und ohne Account über PayPal unterstützen kann, ist hier nachzulesen: http://support.indiegogo.com/entries/20501786-how-to-contribute-via-paypal-without-a-paypal-account - Kurz: Einfach auf der rechten Seite eine Gegenleistung auswählen und auf "Unterstützen" klicken. Danach werden Sie zu PayPal weitergeleitet, wo Sie sich auf der ersten Seite einloggen oder darunter "Mit Kreditkarte zahlen" auswählen können. Einfach darauf klicken, Daten eingeben und absenden. Fertig!

* Was passiert, wenn die 20.000 Euro nicht erreicht werden?

Sollten wir den angestrebten Zielbetrag in den kommenden Wochen nicht erreichen, werden wir eine kleinere Menge an Schuhpaaren produzieren.

* Was passiert, wenn wir mehr als 20.000 Euro erreichen?

Wenn mehr als der benötigte Betrag zustande kommt, werden wir die zu produzierende Schuhpaaranzahl, wie in den Perks angegeben, natürlich produzieren und ausliefern.

Zusätzlich können wir dann in die Werkzeuge für die Randgrößen 35, 41 und 42 investieren und eine größere Kundengruppe mit unseren Schuhen abdecken.


English Version: The Shoe Revolution


aergo® is a new revolutionary ladies shoe based on a floating foot bed/inner sole. You can liken the shoe to a mini trampoline for your foot. Imagine you are standing on a piece of textile which adjusts completely to the shape of your foot.

Together with Prof. Dr. Andreas Schrempf from the Upper Austrian University of Applied Science, Medical Science in Linz, Austria it was analysed and proven that the ankle joints, knees, hips and spine are all supported and relieved by the floating foot bed.

The knitted foot bed / innersole is permeable to air and offers a good microclimate to your feet. The shoe is washable and recyclable.

The sole is made of thermoplastic Polyurethane with excellent abrasion results for a good and secure floor adhesion.

Made in Austria.

The Team


The aergo® project was created by Julia Stoehr and her vision was for a shoe that relieved pressure when standing for long periods. Together with her partner Andreas Baatz and a team of specialists the aergo® was developed.

Julia is the project leader with her economic and project management background. Her previous occupations and experiences in plastic processing, sporting industry including general and athletic shoes, and the aircraft interiors industry enables her to put together this exciting project.

Andreas is an aeronautical engineer and is responsible for the technical and serial implementation and quality management.

We focused on innovative technology in conjunction with progressive comfort and high quality materials and processing. The result is our aergo® slip-on shoe for more well-being and relief in everyday life. The patented shoe technology was developed in conjunction with orthopaedists, shoe experts, scientists and designers in Austria.

Last fall the aergo®  project won the 2nd place in the Upper Austrian Innovation Competition for 2014 in the category small-medium sized enterprises.

What do we want to achieve with the campaign?

Our aim is to finance the manufacture of 500 pairs of shoes to seek greater market appraisal.

To create an extensive awareness of this new innovative health shoe and its benefits. (To win friends and influence people)

For this we need Euro 20,000.

We have put together different “perks” or incentives for your engagement. See the pictures in the German section which are self-explanatory . Please also book the shipping cost additionally to your perks / incentives on international shipping outside Austria.

The pair aergo® has a special early bird price of Euro 89 during this campaign, normally costs Euro 119.

If we do not reach the funding target we will produce a smaller amount of shoes.

For additional questions please send a message or comment. You can also reach us by email: aergo@enaergy.com.

How do we proceed?

The first feedback from our aergo® shoe customers has been extremely positive and encouraging, so that when we are successful we will work on the shoe sizes 35, 41 and 42. If the business continues to grow men’s and children’s shoes will be developed. Also there is a potential for different other types of models, like closed shoes.

Possible Risks & Challenges

During the past 5 years we have already faced different obstacles in the project aergo® which we have overcome. The new product developed and tested with the supporting team of the Transfer Centre for Plastics Technology in Wels, has produced a potential for optimising what has been discovered in the process.

Important is that we have a functioning and comfortable aergo® shoe as result.

How you can support this campaign?

We kindly ask for everyone’s support. Everybody can support aergo® by talking about it, by recommending, by becoming a fan on Indiegogo or in the social media like Facebook, LinkedIn, Xing, etc. and by sharing it or recommending it personally. The more people know about aergo® and its team and talk about it the more successful we will be with aergo®. The best help is to buy one of our perks and support our campaign.

We highly appreciate your support and want to thank you for your engagement and help for making our health shoe aergo® come true.
story_txt:
Die Schuhrevolution - The Shoe Revolution

Please, scroll down for the English version of our pitch text!
Sie stehen mitten im Leben, und da macht es einen entscheidenden
Unterschied, wie gut Sie stehen. Stellen Sie sich vor, Sie stehen und gehen auf
einem Trampolin. Ein Gefühl des Schwebens erfasst Sie. Und genau so ist es,
wenn Sie in den aergo® steigen und zu gehen beginnen. Dann sind Sie
so frei, wie sich Ihre Füße fühlen.
„Freiheit beim Stehen, Gehen und
Arbeiten“
aergo® ist ein neuer, revolutionärer Damenschuh basierend auf
einem schwebenden Fußbett. Sie können sich den Schuh wie ein Minitrampolin in
Fußform vorstellen. Sie stehen in einem Stück Textil, welches sich zu 100%
Ihrer Fußsohle anpasst. 






Durch das schwebende Fußbett können Sie Gelenke, Knie, Hüfte und
Wirbelsäule um bis zu 25% im Vergleich zu einem herkömmlichen Schuh entlasten.
Das wurde mit biomechanischen Analysen durch die Fachhochschule Medizintechnik
in Linz (Austria) unter Prof. (FH) Andreas Schrempf nachgewiesen. Das Team
Wer steckt hinter dem Projekt aergo®? Julia
Stöhr hat in den letzten 5 Jahren mit einem Team von Spezialisten
gemeinsam mit Andreas Baatz den aergo® Schuh erfunden, entwickelt
und bis zur Serienreife gebracht. Sie ist die Projektleiterin, die den
kaufmännischen und Projektmanagementanteil im Unternehmen abdeckt.
Ihre berufliche Erfahrung reicht vom Kunststoffmaschinenbau über die
Sportartikelindustrie bis in die Flugzeugzulieferindustrie. 
Andreas Baatz ist das technische Gewissen im Projekt. Er ist als
Diplomingenieur Flugzeugbau der Techniker, der einerseits für die technische
und serienmäßige Umsetzung sowie anderseits für das Qualitätsmanagement
zuständig ist. Im Fokus unserer Arbeit stand die Verbindung innovativer Technik mit
modernem Tragekomfort und höchster Qualität bei Material und Verarbeitung. Das
Ergebnis: die aergo® Pantolette für mehr Wohlbefinden und
Erleichterung im Alltag. Die patentierte aergo® Schuhtechnologie
wurde mit Orthopäden, Schuhtechnikern und -designern sowie Wissenschaftlern aus
Oberösterreich entwickelt. Im letzten Herbst erreichten wir unter den
Kleinunternehmen den 2. Platz beim oberösterreichischen Landesinnovationspreis
mit dem aergo® Schuh. Was wollen wir mit dieser Kampagne erreichen?
Mit dieser Kampagne wollen wir eine Kleinserie von 500 Paar Schuhen
finanzieren und Feedback über das neue Produkt am Markt bekommen. Schön wäre
auch für den aergo®, einen gewissen Bekanntheitsgrad zu erlangen und
damit auch neue Kunden, Followers und Fans zu gewinnen. 
Dazu benötigen wir Euro 20.000. Die Werkzeuginfrastruktur für die
Schuhgrößen 36-40 wurde bereits investiert und ist vorhanden. Für die
Produktion unserer nächsten Kleinserie sind einerseits die Materialien wie Thermoplastisches
Polyurethan, Polyamid, das Schuhobermaterial inklusive Klettbänder sowie die
Gestricke bzw. die Herstellung dieser einzelnen Komponenten notwendig und zu
finanzieren. Zu investieren, ist auch noch in einzelne Hilfsmittel für die
Kleinserie. Wie das Geld verwendet?Your Perks - Ihre DankeschönsAls Gegenleistung haben wir uns einige "Perks" bzw. Dankeschöns für Ihr
Engagement überlegt:Bitte buchen Sie die Versandkosten zu den Perks bzw. Dankeschöns zusätzlich für internationale Lieferungen dazu. Danke! Ausnahme sind die Lieferungen innerhalb von Österreich, wo die Versandkosten bereits berücksichtigt sind. Das einzelne Paar aergo® wird bei dieser Kampagne für einen Spezialpreis von Euro 89 angeboten, welches außerhalb der Kampagne einen regulären Preis von Euro 119 hat. Damit sparen Sie 25% während der Kampagne beim Kauf von  1 Paar  bzw. 1 Paar aergo® inklusive Weleda Fußbalsam . Für Lieferungen außerhalb Österreichs werden Versandkosten verrechnet.Sollten wir das Funding Ziel nicht erreichen, werden wir eine kleinere
Paarzahl an Schuhen produzieren. Hier noch der angestrebte Zeitplan für 2015:Wie geht's weiter?
Die ersten Rückmeldungen von unseren aergo®
Schuhträgerinnen sind sehr positiv und ermutigend, so dass wir bei Erfolg an den

entwickeln. Weitere Modelle für geschlossene Schuhe stehen am Plan.Mögliche Risiken & Herausforderungen

gesehen, die wir Schritt für Schritt umsetzen werden. Aufgrund unserer
Erfahrungswerte im Projekt und unserem Unterstützungsteam vom Transfer Center für
Kunststofftechnik in Wels sowie dem Know-how der Produzenten werden wir diese

Verbesserungen werden Erfahrungswerte und Zeit benötigen. Wichtig ist, einen
funktionstüchtigen und komfortablen aergo® Schuh als Ergebnis zu
haben.

Die größte Unterstützung ist, wenn Sie eines unserer Dankeschöns bzw. Perks erwerben.

story:
TRW Active -TRW-2, 1x11 Speed Drivetrain

TRW Active was started by Taber West and Ron Whitling in Los Alamos, NM, the Atomic City. Some of the greatest scientific discoveries in history were made here, so what better place to develop state of the art bicycle components? We are a couple of engineers who love bikes and design components, and we both managed bike shops when we were younger. We decided that there was significant room for improvement in the components currently available and we wanted to do something about it. We set out to develop a complete mountain bike drivetrain, and that is what we are bringing to market now.

 

 

The TRW-2  components have now been in testing, in real world conditions, in the mountains of New Mexico, Colorado, Utah, and Georgia, for the last 2 years. We have made multiple revisions based on this testing, and rider feedback, and now have the final configuration in production.

 

 

The goal of TRW is to bring high quality bicycle components to the world at affordable prices and we stand by the quality of those components. We will use this campaign to expand production, and our R&D capabilities, so that we can continue to  bring new products to market.

 

 

Our first groupset is the TRW-2,  1x11 speed line of components. It features an 11 speed trigger shifter, wide range rear derailleur w/ clutch, wide range 11 speed cassettes in 11-50t and 11-52t, a 1x crankset in LW Trail and HD grade w/ direct mount chainring, a BB, and an 11 speed chain w/ quick link in LW and HD versions.

This drivetrain will work on new bikes, as well as most existing mountain and commuter bikes. So, whether you are building up a new trail or enduro bike to shred the mountain, or upgrading your existing ride to 1x to give it new life, this drivetrain will get the job done. We are confident you will enjoy these components from your first ride aboard them, and we back them up with a 2 year warranty against defects as well as a low cost crash replacement program. We want you out riding on our components and we want you to tell others about them as well.

TRW Active SRX 1x11 speed complete drivetrain

Weight: 1729g (shifter, derailleur, 11-50t hybrid cassette, 126 link chain, LW crankset 175mm w/32t chainring)

  • The 11 speed trigger shifter

Weight: 136g (with uncut cable)

o   Lightweight alloy construction rides on bearings for smooth shifting.

o   Dual release index trigger can be pushed or pulled to shift to a higher gear.

o   Forged alloy thumb shifter can shift up to 5 gears in a single push.

o   Rear derailleur can be adjusted on the fly from the shifter’s barrel adjuster.

o   Angle and reach adjustable.

o   Compatible with Shimano 11 speed components.

  • The SRX wide range rear derailleur

Weight: 312g

o   Forged alloy body and links for strength and durability, no plastic caps.

o   Alloy 13t pulleys with sealed cartridge bearings for max chain takeup.

o   Cage lockup switch for easy wheel removal and installation.

o   Externally adjustable clutch to reduce chain slap in rough terrain.

o   Guide pulley for precise and smooth shifting.

o   Lower profile to reduce rock strikes.

o   Compatable with 11-50t cassettes (11-52t wide range with extender).

o   Compatible with Shimano 11 speed components.

  • Wide range cassettes for 1x11 speed drivetrains.

Weight: 545g (11-50t hybrid alloy & steel cogs, alloy carriers)

  • 11-50t = 11/13/15/18/21/24/28/32/36/42/50 cog teeth
  • 11-52t = 11/13/16/20/24/28/32/36/40/46/52 cog teeth

o   11-50t or 11-52t gives you all the range you need in a 1x drivetrain.

o   Available in steel cogs on alloy carriers or lighter hybrid alloy and steel cogs.

o   Fully ramped for precise shifting up and down the cogs.

o   Fits a standard 9/10/11 speed freehub body (not an XD driver).

o   Compatible with Shimano 11 speed components (rear Shimano derailleur will require an extender, longer B tension screw, and large pulley kit).

 

  • 1x crankset and bottom bracket

Weight: 690g (LW crank w/ 32t chainring) 753g (HD crank w/30t chainring)

o   3D Forged alloy construction

o   2 versions, HD for DH/Enduro and LW for Trail use.

o   Direct mount chainrings for aftermarket compatibility.

o   Dual pinch bolts and tension bolt for precise spinning in the bottom bracket.

o   Forged 24mm CrMo axle with splined interface to fit all common frames.

o   Chainring and BB included with crankset (BSA threaded, BB86/92 press fit, BB30 press fit).

  • 11 speed chain

Weight: 272g (LW w/ hollow pins lightweight links)

o   Stamped and rolled links for precision and durability.

o   Fully surface coated to resist corrosion.

o   Quick link for tool free maintenance.

o   Available in HD w/ solid pins and LW w/ hollow pins.

o   Compatible with Shimano and SRAM 11 speed components.

 

What We Need

We are looking to raise $60,000, or more, from this campaign. This funding will allow us to kick off our continuous production line instead of batch production. Neither of us will be taking a paycheck from this company until we are turning a profit. Instead the funds go to raw materials, tooling, production, assembly, packaging, shipping, and logistics. We will continue to reinvest in TRW Active until production is sustainable on its own. Both of us currently have jobs, so that frees up TRW to expand and grow. One day we hope that we are both doing this as our only job.

What You Get

For your support and investment in our company’s future you will receive a high quality complete groupset, or individual components to ride on and enjoy, as well as early notification and special pricing on any new components we produce. Don’t worry, we already have more goodies in testing now, and some really cool things on the drawing board.

The Impact

The cycling industry is a highly competitive market dominated by two major players. The cost for innovative startups to enter it is immense. This leaves the consumer with few options to address specific riding styles, personal preferences, or different configurations. We have brought this drivetrain to market to give consumers a viable alternative choice that meets some of those unique needs.  Once we ramp production it allows us the resources to bring additional drivetrains, components, full bicycles, and ebikes to the market, all forged with the same high quality and backed with a warranty consumers can depend upon.

The Challenge

The biggest risk we face is receiving too many orders without being able to purchase the raw materials and setup the production runs in a reasonable amount of time. Producing a complete drivetrain worth of components, while maintaining stringent quality controls, is not an easy task. By launching this campaign, we hope to eliminate this problem by having the funds on hand to initiate continuous production. Ultimately we want to be operating a JIT model that allows us to run continuous production while adjusting the manufacturing volume just ahead of the demand signals.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't need new components or even ride a bike, please buy a tshirt, or just help us get the word out by sharing this campaign with anyone who you think might benefit.

TRW Active -TRW-2, 1x11 Speed Drivetrain
TRW Active was started by Taber West and Ron Whitling in Los Alamos, NM, the Atomic City. Some of the greatest scientific discoveries in history were made here, so what better place to develop state of the art bicycle components? We are a couple of engineers who love bikes and design components, and we both managed bike shops when we were younger. We decided that there was significant room for improvement in the components currently available and we wanted to do something about it. story:
J'ai constaté dans mon environnement direct que des amis passionnés de sports de glisse (surf, paddle etc...) sont souvent  confrontés au problème du transport  de tout leur matériel.

I have found in my entourage as friends passionate about board sports (surfing, paddle etc ...) are often faced with the problem of transporting all their equipment.

Problématique qui s'accentue dés lors que l'on veut accéder à des zones peu roulantes.                                                                                                                                     Issues that accentuates as soon as you want access to low rolling surfaces.

Dans cette optique , j'ai décidé d'inventer un  vélo cargo adapté au transport de matériel de grande longueur et qui peut se charger sur 4 côtés.                      With this in mind, I decided to invent a cargo bike suitable for transporting high length material and which can be load on 4 sides.

Le vélo cargo pourra donc circuler sur la plage mais aussi en ville, avec l'Assistance Electrique en option.
Then the cargo bike can be drive on the beach but also in the city, with the optional power support.

Après 1 an de recherche, de nombreuses ébauches et un premier prototype bois pour tester le chargement, nous sommes arrivés à ce design original et fonctionnel.
After 1 year of research, many drafts and a first wooden prototype to test the load, we arrived at this original and functional design.


LE PROJET(The Project)





La version " Fat Bike" vous permet  d'accéder au plus près des spots avec tout votre matériel, sans contrainte et ainsi assouvir votre soif de découverte.
The "Fat Bike » version allows you to access surf spots with all your equipment, unrestricted and thus  gratify your envy for discovery.


La version Ville vous permet tous types de chargements même à usage professionnel.
The City version offers you all types of loads even for professional use.
 


Pour le rendre pratique, nous l'avons conçu pliable : encombrement réduit  au rangement  et au  transport.
To make it convenient, we designed it collapsible: compact size in storage and transportation.



...Et il pourra être utilisé comme un vélo traditionnel (empattement réduit).
And it can be used like a traditional bike (short wheelbase).



Un an de recherche nous a été nécessaire pour définir les grandes lignes d'un vélo cargo fonctionnel et original.
A year of research was necessary for us to define the main lines of a functional and unique cargo bike.


Le développement technique se poursuit au quotidien pour l'améliorer et proposer d'ici 1 an environ un produit qui  répondra aux attentes des futurs utilisateurs.
Technical development continues every day to improve it and offer in about 1 year a product that will meet the expectations of future users.



 Les budgets permettront en plusieurs étapes de développer des prototypes en fonction des différents tests réalisés pour aboutir au produit final, qui répondra à un cahier des charges exigeant.

Budgets allow to develop prototypes based on various tests to lead to the final product, which will serve a demanding specifications.


- Étude technique en CAO pour optimiser toutes les composantes du vélo.
- Sollicitation en situation réelle (ville et plage).
- Contraintes sur bancs techniques pour éprouver l'ensemble du vélo dans la durée.

- Technical Study CAD to optimize all bike components.
- Request in real situations (town and beach).
- Constraints on technical benches to experience the entire bike in duration.


Une gamme complète d'accessoires sera développée en parallèle pour satisfaire les besoins des utilisateurs et ainsi personnaliser le vélo.

A full range of accessories will be developed in parallel to meet the needs of users and customize the bike.


                              FAQs   


Q: Comment se fait la direction des petites roues avant(How does it turn)

R: Le système sera par câbles ou pneumatique-Technologie déjà testées(By cables system or may be pneumatic-Technology already tested)


Q: Comment seront gérées les petites roues avant dans le sable?(How will those tiny wheels handle in sand)

R: Les roues auront un diamètre de 250/300 mm avec des pneumatiques de 4 à 5 pouces. Une assistance électrique peut être ajoutée .Bien entendu il faudra rouler si possible sur sable humide mais c'est pour tous les vélos pareil.(The wheels have a diameter of 250/300 mm with 4 to 5 inches of tires. An electric assist can be added .Of course it will roll if possible on wet sand but it is for all such bikes.)


Q: Pourquoi faire un vélo cargo pliage(why do a foldable cargo bike)

R: Afin de faciliter le rangement et le transport. Les vélos cargo sont de par leur volume toujours difficile à ranger(To facilitate storage and transportation. The cargo bikes are by their volume still difficult to store)



                                                           ________________________




                                                        ________________________

EN PARTENARIAT AVEC

                                                (IN PARTNERSHIP WITH)


                                                      ________________________

                                            PRESS

story:
Save Money On Fuel With the Help of Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments, for both Gasoline & Diesel Powered Vehicles...

From the green tech innovation start-up company that brought the Smart Emissions Reducer (green tech emissions reduction technology), Extreme Kleaner (multi-purpose non-toxic biodegradable cleaner-degreaser), and H2O Energy Flow (consumable bottled structured water from artisan well) re-launches its very first consumer product innovation, Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments for both gas and diesel fuel. 

Extreme Energy Solutions, Inc.,... Innovation that moves you... now offers Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments after the company pulled back this product from its initial launch in 2009-2010. The product is back, after a long wait, and offered at a more affordable price. 

 

 

 

About Extreme Energy Solutions: 

Our History...We come from Main Street, not Wall Street.  Our founders are as close to Main Street as they get.  With roots as local business owners, the founders have evolved into respected leaders in the environmental-green tech community.  From their humble start in a two car garage to a 10,000 square foot plus Technical Campus, Extreme did something that is very rare. They kept true to their beliefs and expanded their business on Main Street.  By working with like minded individuals that hold wholesome the same old fashion values and morals, Extreme continues to build value.  Today Extreme has spread its positive influence to include strategic partnerships around the world, with other entities who value the preservation of the environment, deployment of technological solutions, and strive to be leaders in their respective industries.

Our Mission...To provide environmental and economic sustainability through innovation that redefines incremental savings.  It is because we know the time has come for our human family to experience a more prosperous lifestyle, and that the innovation is available to make that happen today. We are driven to set new standards in which the world does business, that creates value that enhances local communities.  Our products and services are there to be of value to society, lessening the impact on the environment for generations to come, while also providing a reasonable return on investment.  

Where we came from... Long before Extreme Energy Solutions Inc. was even a thought, its core founders and friends were involved in local and regional dirt track racing competition throughout the Northeast. As Extreme Energy Solutions Inc., began to develop, its core founders and supporters brought with them skills sets that have been proven to be invaluable in the development of the Company. Though the experiences of grueling competitive proving grounds, executives and tech experts have been able to utilize the competencies of strength, problem solving and endurance under extreme circumstances, which have come in handy for Extreme Energy Solutions Inc. during times when the company experienced challenges associated with growing pains. Today Extreme Energy Solutions Inc. supports these individuals by utilizing the value of being involved in the racing community and maximizes this platform to conduct cooperative research and development, product testing, market development, market research, promotion and advertising of Extreme Energy Solutions, Inc., products and services to an already captive audience, and as a way to grow product distribution channels.

About this Campaign: 

The purpose of this campaign is to pre-launch the latest version of Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments before the product hits shelves of retailer stores, and offer the product to the general market at a discounted rate, rewarding early market adopters of Extreme Xtra. 

We believe even in a saturated market of automotive products, if an individual, business, or company can offer more product, that achieves more functions, for less cost, there is still an opportunity for the product to be a success. Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments is very affordable and provides more product per application for the money than most of its competition. 

With your campaign contribution, you would be assisting our company launch Extreme Xtra on the broader stage. Proceeds would be funneled back into additional marketing and advertising efforts, creating public awareness and how Extreme Xtra can work for vehicle owners-operators; saving them money on fuel and increasing engine performance.  

 

Our Targets and the Perks...

  • We are aiming to raise a total of $2500 in this pre-market effort. Your campaign contribution will assist in additional branding and marketing-advertising efforts. 
  • Part of the proceeds of this product go to assisting Rookie Race Car Driver Roddy Watts with his racing campaign as he gets behind the wheel for his first season of racing action. Roddy is also a spokesperson for Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments

 

What you get in return

  • Each contributor to the program will receive their very own supply of Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments. Whether you commit to just one bottle or to a case of product, each contribution aids in forwarding this product to market;
  • You also get a sharp discount on the product;
  • Satisfaction that you are helping someone achieve their goals and dreams, even if it is at steps at a time. 

***PRODUCT IS READY AND AVAILABLE FOR SHIPPING***

The Impact we are making...

Your contribution and commitment will help further our research, development, marketing and product launch efforts. In addition to the help your contribution provides to our business; purchasing Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments creates a low risk, low cost gateway to contribute to:

  • Lowering harmful toxic emissions 
  • Lessening dependence on fossil fuels
  • Contribute to domestic job creation in the United States

EXTREME XTRA FUEL TREATMENTS ARE MADE IN THE USA!!!

Risk & Challenges...

Adversity is part of growing a green tech company of this kind. We have faced financial issues, supply chain issues, staffing issues, technological hurdles, and just about every kind of problem a small business has to overcome. We kept our focus on creating value, collaborating our team's talent to pull together new ideas how to solve challenges on the fly. On behalf of Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments, we have managed to: 

  • streamline our supply chain, vendors, and suppliers, thus effecting the ability to lower the price point for Extreme Xtra. This makes the product more affordable and available to more potential consumers.
  • re-branded our product and are planning to introduce Extreme Xtra into distribution channels where other Extreme Energy Solutions products are moving beyond the barriers of market entry 

Other ways you might be able to assist us...

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • We ask that if you cannot contribute to our campaign, then please take a moment to share this campaign on social media or with a friend. We only need 168 people to commit to the lowest campaign perk in making this campaign a success
  • You can use the share tools to Facebook, Twitter, Linked In, and other social media

On behalf of Extreme Energy Solutions, we want to thank you for consideration in advance. So go ahead, give it a try! 

Proud Sponsor of Rookie Race Car Driver Roddy Watts and the

#22 Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments Sportsman Modified Race Car

Save Money On Fuel With the Help of Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments, for both Gasoline & Diesel Powered Vehicles...
From the green tech innovation start-up company that brought the Smart Emissions Reducer (green tech emissions reduction technology), Extreme Kleaner (multi-purpose non-toxic biodegradable cleaner-degreaser), and H2O Energy Flow (consumable bottled structured water from artisan well) re-launches its very first consumer product innovation, Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments for both gas and diesel fuel. 
Extreme Energy Solutions, Inc.,... Innovation that moves you... now offers Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments after the company pulled back this product from its initial launch in 2009-2010. The product is back, after a long wait, and offered at a more affordable price. 

 
 
 
About Extreme Energy Solutions: 
Our History...We come from Main Street, not Wall Street.  Our founders are as close to Main Street as they get.  With roots as local business owners, the founders have evolved into respected leaders in the environmental-green tech community.  From their humble start in a two car garage to a 10,000 square foot plus Technical Campus, Extreme did something that is very rare. They kept true to their beliefs and expanded their business on Main Street.  By working with like minded individuals that hold wholesome the same old fashion values and morals, Extreme continues to build value.  Today Extreme has spread its positive influence to include strategic partnerships around the world, with other entities who value the preservation of the environment, deployment of technological solutions, and strive to be leaders in their respective industries.
Our Mission...To provide environmental and economic sustainability through innovation that redefines incremental savings.  It is because we know the time has come for our human family to experience a more prosperous lifestyle, and that the innovation is available to make that happen today. We are driven to set new standards in which the world does business, that creates value that enhances local communities.  Our products and services are there to be of value to society, lessening the impact on the environment for generations to come, while also providing a reasonable return on investment.  
Where we came from... Long before Extreme Energy Solutions Inc. was even a thought, its core founders and friends were involved in local and regional dirt track racing competition throughout the Northeast. As Extreme Energy Solutions Inc., began to develop, its core founders and supporters brought with them skills sets that have been proven to be invaluable in the development of the Company. Though the experiences of grueling competitive proving grounds, executives and tech experts have been able to utilize the competencies of strength, problem solving and endurance under extreme circumstances, which have come in handy for Extreme Energy Solutions Inc. during times when the company experienced challenges associated with growing pains. Today Extreme Energy Solutions Inc. supports these individuals by utilizing the value of being involved in the racing community and maximizes this platform to conduct cooperative research and development, product testing, market development, market research, promotion and advertising of Extreme Energy Solutions, Inc., products and services to an already captive audience, and as a way to grow product distribution channels.

About this Campaign: 
The purpose of this campaign is to pre-launch the latest version of Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments before the product hits shelves of retailer stores, and offer the product to the general market at a discounted rate, rewarding early market adopters of Extreme Xtra. 
We believe even in a saturated market of automotive products, if an individual, business, or company can offer more product, that achieves more functions, for less cost, there is still an opportunity for the product to be a success. Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments is very affordable and provides more product per application for the money than most of its competition. With your campaign contribution, you would be assisting our company launch Extreme Xtra on the broader stage. Proceeds would be funneled back into additional marketing and advertising efforts, creating public awareness and how Extreme Xtra can work for vehicle owners-operators; saving them money on fuel and increasing engine performance.   
Our Targets and the Perks...


We are aiming to raise a total of $2500 in this pre-market effort. Your campaign contribution will assist in additional branding and marketing-advertising efforts. 
Part of the proceeds of this product go to assisting Rookie Race Car Driver Roddy Watts with his racing campaign as he gets behind the wheel for his first season of racing action. Roddy is also a spokesperson for Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments

 
What you get in return

Each contributor to the program will receive their very own supply of Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments. Whether you commit to just one bottle or to a case of product, each contribution aids in forwarding this product to market;
You also get a sharp discount on the product;
Satisfaction that you are helping someone achieve their goals and dreams, even if it is at steps at a time. 

***PRODUCT IS READY AND AVAILABLE FOR SHIPPING***
The Impact we are making...

Your contribution and commitment will help further our research, development, marketing and product launch efforts. In addition to the help your contribution provides to our business; purchasing Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments creates a low risk, low cost gateway to contribute to:

Lowering harmful toxic emissions 
Lessening dependence on fossil fuels
Contribute to domestic job creation in the United States

EXTREME XTRA FUEL TREATMENTS ARE MADE IN THE USA!!!
Risk & Challenges...

Adversity is part of growing a green tech company of this kind. We have faced financial issues, supply chain issues, staffing issues, technological hurdles, and just about every kind of problem a small business has to overcome. We kept our focus on creating value, collaborating our team's talent to pull together new ideas how to solve challenges on the fly. On behalf of Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments, we have managed to: 

streamline our supply chain, vendors, and suppliers, thus effecting the ability to lower the price point for Extreme Xtra. This makes the product more affordable and available to more potential consumers.
re-branded our product and are planning to introduce Extreme Xtra into distribution channels where other Extreme Energy Solutions products are moving beyond the barriers of market entry 

Other ways you might be able to assist us...

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

We ask that if you cannot contribute to our campaign, then please take a moment to share this campaign on social media or with a friend. We only need 168 people to commit to the lowest campaign perk in making this campaign a success
You can use the share tools to Facebook, Twitter, Linked In, and other social media

On behalf of Extreme Energy Solutions, we want to thank you for consideration in advance. So go ahead, give it a try! Proud Sponsor of Rookie Race Car Driver Roddy Watts and the #22 Extreme Xtra Fuel Treatments Sportsman Modified Race Car

story:
Wike Bicycle Company

Wike has been in business for over 25 years and is located in the Guelph, Canada. Wike is North America's largest manufacturer of bicycle trailers and its success is due to the ability of its bicycle trailers to convert instantly for walking. The company is owned by Bob Bell who was awarded the prestigious "Wheels of Change" award by "Share the Road (Ontario)" in 2016 for his 25 years of cycling activism in the city of Guelph. 

 

Media

Wike and our new Salamander have been featured in..

                                    

 

        

 

   

 

                                

 

    

 

            

 

               

 

Features 

The Salamander is the world's first and only bicycle that converts instantly into a stroller or delivery cart without stopping! 

 

When using as a bicycle or stroller with children as the passengers, it's easy for parents to load and unload all from the front, without having to bend to the back or open side doors. 

 

With measurements of less than 32 inches wide, the Salamander can easily pass through any commercial doorway and on transit vehicles, such as buses and subway cars. It also folds down for transport in vans and SUVs.

 

We will ship the Salamander fully assembled anywhere in the world. When the box arrives, just open it up, adjust the handlebars and seat, and you are ready to stroll and ride in comfort - no assembly is required!

 

We're working hard for you!

The development, patents, design, and prototyping of the Stroller-bike have been a challenge to Wikes company finances and your support during the first commercial production run of the Stroller-bike would be greatly appreciated. 

It is the world's first multi-modal vehicle and is patented and available only from Wike. The first production run of frames is now being completed in Taiwan and will be assembled in Guelph, Canada during May 2017.

You can reserve your Salamander and save $500.00 during the Indiegogo campaign! Sample Salamanders are available at our factory for your inspection and test ride. Here is the tub for the child carrier in production at Prothermoform in Burlington.

Only 100 units will be offered during this campaign.

 

Update: On April 14, 2017, we delivered our first Salamander to Joe James yesterday in Blue Mountain, just before the last of the snow is gone. The early bird gets the worm!

story:
The Cut N Go Seat Belt Cutter

The Cut N Go safety tool is the ONLY emergency seat belt cutter that is locked on, self-enclosed, mechanically guided and child proof.

Wearing your seat belt improves survival rates when you are involved in any car accident. Unfortunately, many people also fear being trapped inside of their vehicles if and when an accident does happen.

In some cases, seatbelts can jam or become stuck while involved in an accident. This creates a serious life-threatening situation that most people are NOT prepared for!

The Cut N Go solves this problem, allowing you to quickly escape a jammed seatbelt. This device can also be used to break your window once the belt is cut, letting you escape. Unlike other tools that are hard to find or use when you need them, The Cut N Go is always ready to go!

Step 1: When needed, simply slide the Cut N Go into position and lift the tab to open. It's so simple, that in the moment you need it, you will know exactly what to do.

Step 2: To cut the seatbelt and break free, simply pull the lever away from you.

Step 3: If you need to escape through the window, use the built-in tungsten carbide tip to easily break the car window and escape in seconds. This is safer and more effective than using your hand, elbow, shoe, or anything else we've heard people try to use in these dire situations.

You simply place The Cut N Go over your seat belt and press down. Once you hear the click, it's on forever! That's how easy it is to install The Cut N Go!

The Cut N Go is a fully self enclosed device. The design makes it completely childproof. The blade inside will never be seen by you or your young children, EVER. You won’t see it when you buy it, during installation or during or after use. Plus, it requires at least 9 pounds of pressure to break the tab, which the same amount needed to unlock a child safety belt.

The Cut N Go is self-enclosed making it safe for every passenger! It is completely enclosed in super tough nylon which allows you to cut the seat belt but not cut yourself. The window breaking pin is hidden, as well, making it even more childproof. Blade and breaking pin – Out of Sight Out of Mind!

It's the world's only manually guided seat belt cutter! The Cut N Go is the only device of its kind that allows you to cut the belt without allowing that belt to curl. Curling of the belt during use is a Major Issue with similar products. Cut N Go holds the belt flat and cuts it that way.

Also, you only need ONE HAND to use Cut N Go. Because most similar devices on the market are, for all intents and purposes, right-handed, the Cut N Go is the most usable tool for EVERYONE.

Tough Nylon

The outer cast body shape of The Cut N Go is made out of Super Tough Nylon.

Stainless Steel Blade

With a simple lift of the handle and pull, it will easily cut your seat belt.

Carbide Tip

Once the belt has been cut simply fold back the handle and expose the carbide tip and hand grip.

Locks On Seat Belt

The Cut N Go locks directly on your seat belt. Fully adjustable to where you want it in case of an emergency.

If you are ever in an accident and used The Cut N Go, visit us online at www.TheCutNGo.com and we will send you a replacement - FREE OF CHARGE! It's our commitment to your safety for life.

Designed to be a complete awareness kit, The Cut N Go includes stickers that notify the user exactly where to strike the window and lets first responders know that you are Cut N Go Equipped.

The Inside window sticker helps the occupants of the vehicle identify exactly where to break the window, which is very helpful in a stressful situation. Get home to your loved ones safe and sound.

story:
VuL: THE on-demand fuel delivery service

 VuL Inc. essentially a gas station on wheels. We provide convenience and peace of mind to customers by eliminating the need to visit the pump. We bring the gas TO YOU while parked at home, work, or one of our convenient "VuL Stations" in areas that you frequent in your day to day.

 

How will it work?

It's very simple. PARK, POP, RELAX.

1. Park your car and pin your location in our App.

2. Pop open your gas tank door.*

3. Relax, A VuL specialist will service your car while you do your thing. You'll get a receipt and notification via email.

 

What do we need and what do you get?

Our goal is to raise $5,000 in this campaign. With that money, we will be able to begin the process of getting our trucks on the road! So far we have been putting up our own money to get the site where it is today but now, we need your help. We NEED your support and we are willing to give you some SWEET PERKS in exchange....

 

The impact we can make together

VuL is a win for both the consumer, and the companies they work for. It's the ultimate employee perk and increases everyone's overall productivity with the time saved (13.5 hours a year for the average joe who fills up once weekly). We have attended conferences, talked with companies, fleets, schools, and individuals- we know that we can bring this to market with your help!

 

Risks & Challenges

VuL will be a new concept in the Carolinas and it may take some time for it to catch on. This has been the same with many other on-demand service platforms that have come to the area. VuL has conducted market research and it supports the conclusion that the Carolinas are ready to #dumpthepump.

Safety is another concern that people often have about this service offering. VuL has done it's due diligence and research to this regard. All trucks will be built to the specifications and safety standards of the South Carolina Department of Transportation. All drivers will also be required to have the proper credentials to operate our vehicles to ensure the safety of themselves and our consumers.

Other ways you can help

So! If you've made it this far, THANK YOU! Your time is valuable and we appreciate you considering us out of all those awesome projects on Fundable! We have LOTS of cool perks that we think you will LOVE! Think about how cool it will be to be able to say that you were there in the beginning- that you were there when we decided to #Dumpthepump and disrupt the status quo.

Whether you're able to contribute become a supporter or not, we would GREATLY appreciate you doing 2 things for us: 

1.)Follow us on your favorite social media. We are on Facebook and Instagram

Facebook: VuL Incorporated

Instagram: @VuLinc

2.) TELL THE WORLD ABOUT US! Tell your employer, tell your co-workers, tell your mamanem...TELL THE WORLD! Fundable has some cool tools to make sharing our campaign easy! Please check back in as we want to keep you up to speed on our progress!

Thank your support!

Looking for more information or have a question? See the FAQ

story:
Wearing your seat belt improves survival rates when you are involved in any car accident. But many people are in a hurry, distracted, or simply forget to wear their seatbelts.

 

 

In some cases, seatbelts can jam or become stuck while involved in an accident. This creates a serious life-threatening situation that most people are NOT prepared for!

 

The Cut N Go solves this problem, allowing you to quickly escape a jammed seatbelt. This device can also be used to break your window once the belt is cut, letting you escape. Unlike other tools that are hard to find or use when you need them, The Cut n Go is always ready to go!

 

Step 1: When needed, simply lift the CutNGo into position and open. It's so simple, that in the moment you need it, you will know exactly what to do.

Step 2: To cut the seatbelt and break free, just pull the lever away from you.

Step 3: If you need to escape through the window, use the built-in tungsten carbide tip to easily break the car window and escape in seconds. This is safer and more effective than using your hand, elbow, shoe, or anything else we've heard people try to use in these dire situations.

 

 

 

Designed to be a complete awareness kit, The Cut N Go includes stickers that notify the user exactly where to strike the window and lets first responders know that you are CutNGo Equipped.

 

The Inside window sticker helps the occupants of the vehicle identify exactly where to break the window, which is very helpful in a stressful situation. Get home to your loved ones safe and sound.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

How do you know it will be there in time of an accident?

The CutNGo is made to lock on your belt forever until used. Made out of Super tough nylon, and self-enclosed to protect the blade and the window breaking carbide tip.

Is The Cut N Go safe around children?

Yes, the CutNGo is childproof - at no time can your child access the blade even after being used, since it is designed to be a self-enclosed device.

How does it cut the seat belt better than other devices?

It is attached to the seat belt and it prevents the curling in the cutting operation.

What else can the Cut N Go do?

It can break your car window to help you escape quickly and safely, rather than having to break the window with your hand, elbow, shoe, etc.

How easily does it break the car window?

The tip has engineered and tested to break the window with minimal effort.

Will fluctuating temperatures affect the device?

Super-tough nylon has been specified in order to meet the most extreme temperature variations.

How do I know I will be able to use this in an accident if I'm dazed or confused?

The CutNGo is designed for easy and quick use - just lift the lever and pull. Also, the window sticker is included so you will see exactly where to strike your window and how to get out in a moment's notice.

What if I want to take The Cut N Go off my seat belt?

The CutNGo is designed to remain on the seatbelt. We made it that way so when you need it, it's guaranteed to be there. If you choose to take the CutNGo off your seatbelt, this is not recommended, but certainly better than not having this safety device in a life-threatening situation.

Will the airbag deployment affect your device?

The recommended placement of the CutNGo is above the buckle. This makes CutNGo easily accessible and the super tough nylon material is very durable.

How will people know if I have The Cut N Go in my car?

CutNGo comes with an orange safety sticker so, in case of an emergency, passengers will see where to strike the window. Also, any good samaritans or first responders that come upon your accident will see the sticker from the outside, so they can help you escape if you are unconscious, injured, or incapacitated.

How many times can The Cut N Go be used?

CutNGo is a safety device intended for single use. After use, go to the CutNGo.com to tell your story and include a picture - if you do, we will send you a new CutNGo absolutely free!
