story:
I am an industrial designer having worked in particular for Matra automobiles, passionate about transport and sports equipment, practicing motorcycling for decades.


My partner ran a delivery business for decades and also rode motorcycles for so long.


We had the same idea to design a motorcycle specially dedicated to transporting loads, as there are planes, helicopters, boats, small and large 4-wheelers and even bicycles, but surprisingly no motorcycle!


The main world market for motorized two-wheelers is not mainly made up of "leisure motorcycles" as one might think living in developed countries but of what one might call "bikes of burden" (such as named in a book by Hans Kemp https://www.google.com/search?q=bikes+of+burden&client=firefox-b-d&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwigpp_wmtDsAhXRtHEKHUs4DU0Q_AUoAXoECBkQAw&biw=1536&bih=722).


In reality, India, Southeast Asia, China, Africa, South America, all of these regions and countries mainly use motorcycles as “bikes of burden”.

In developed countries, a motorcycle pick-up meets the needs of urban deliveries facing traffic congestion and responds in particular to the problem of the "last mile delivery" by being inserted between bicycles and four wheels :

But also concerns private individuals dissatisfied with the load capacities of their motorized two wheelers (cf. marketing brochure).

Honda, still the world leading manufacturer of motorcycles, earned this place by producing the Honda Super Cub, the best-selling motor vehicle of all time, at more than 100 million! (not to mention the countless copies produced by most motorcycle manufacturers in the world).
And it is easy to verify that a very large part - if not the main part - of "Super Cub type" motorcycles are actually used as "load bikes".

We want to offer an answer better suited to these needs than do the small motorcycles on the market.

On our way, we have to produce a prototype ready to go into production. To take this step, we need 120,000 euros, entirely dedicated to the construction of this next prototype in two versions, one electric and one gasoline with many common parts.


Our innovative architecture is simple but never proposed before by combining these three ideas :
- Moving the driver's position closer to the center of the wheelbase to find space over a given total length and move the load's center of gravity forward.
- A large front wheel for road holding and a small rear wheel to find space for a given overall height and lower the center of gravity of the load.
- Placing the components where they do not increase the minimum height of the loading surface, ie the diameter of the wheel plus the travel of the wheel for suspension work.

These simple solutions make it possible to achieve a low production cost which will allow either a low price or a good margin, depending on the target market.


Some designs offered an alternative to transporting goods on two wheels with a very low and centered load space, before the driver.


This centered loading space has four drawbacks:
- For a given total vehicle length, it reduces the length of the cargo space (and increasing the total length decreases handling and increases weight)
- The height limit of the load cannot exceed the shoulders of the driver (even lower when the load is quite long)
- Rather poor handling when empty.

- This architecture does not suit a gasoline engine version wich is better suited to many markets.


And one advantage : Its load capacity is better only in terms of heavy weight, wich means to transport high density goods.


But of what will actually be transported or delivered on two wheels, 99% would be medium or even low density goods. Which means that weight capacity is a less important problem to solve than volume capacity (keeping in mind that increasing the overall dimensions of the vehicle decreases handling, a decisive advantage for two wheels).


Millions of people did not wait for our pickup motorcycle to haul huge loads on light motorcycles. But with our pick-up motorcycle, they will improve road holding, operator safety and also loading speed, ease and safety at a low price.

We already built two prototypes :

- The first had to prove the capacities of our architecture as you can see in the video.

With a body, this prototype could have looked like these 3D renderings :

-The second one is a brief exploration of what could be done by modifying an existing scooter (ie Honda Big Ruckus).

We are aware that our product is so simple that it will be easy to copy and that is why we will not implement in this first production prototype all the ideas that we had after working hard on this freight problem of powered two wheelers for ten years.


If we did not answer to all your questions, please do not hesitate to ask on FAQ and if you liked our project, help us and share it as much as you can !

 

 

 

 

Version française :

Je suis un designer industriel ayant travaillé notamment pour les automobiles Matra, passionné par les transports et les équipements sportifs, pratiquant la moto depuis des décennies.
Mon partenaire a dirigé une entreprise de livraison pendant des décennies et a également pratiqué la moto pendant aussi longtemps.
Nous avons eu la même idée de concevoir une moto spécialement dédiée au transport de charges, comme il existe des avions, des hélicoptères, des bateaux, des petits et grands 4 roues et même des vélos, mais étonnamment pas de moto!
Le principal marché mondial des deux-roues motorisés n'est pas principalement constitué de «motos de loisir» comme on pourrait le penser en vivant dans les pays développés mais de ce que l'on pourrait appeler des «vélos de fardeau» (comme le nomme un livre de Hans Kemp).
En réalité, l'Inde, l'Asie du Sud-Est, la Chine, l'Afrique, l'Amérique du Sud, toutes ces régions et pays utilisent principalement la moto comme «vélos de fardeau».
Honda, toujours premier constructeur de motos, a gagné cette place en produisant le Honda Super Cub, véhicule motorisé le plus vendu de tous les temps, à plus de 100 millions! (sans compter les innombrables copies produites par la plupart des fabricants de motos dans le monde).
Et il est facile de vérifier qu'une très grande partie - sinon la partie principale - des motos «de type Super Cub» sont réellement utilisées comme des «vélos de fardeau».
Nous voulons proposer une réponse à cet énorme marché et sur notre chemin, nous devons produire un prototype prêt à entrer en production. Pour franchir cette étape, il nous faut 100.000 euros, entièrement dédiés à la construction de ce prochain prototype.
Notre architecture innovante est simple mais jamais proposée auparavant en combinant 3 idées
- Avancer la position du conducteur près du centre de l’empattement pour gagner de la place sur une longueur totale donnée et avancer le centre de gravité de la charge.
- Une grande roue avant pour la tenue de route et une petite roue arrière pour gagner de la place pour une hauteur hors tout donnée et abaisser le centre de gravité de la charge.
- Placer les composants là où ils n'augmentent pas la hauteur minimale de la surface de chargement, soit le diamètre de la roue plus la course de la roue pour la suspension.
Ces solutions simples permettent d'atteindre une coût de production très bas, au moins pour les marchés qui en ont besoin.
Certaines conceptions proposaient une autre solution pour transporter des marchandises sur deux roues avec un espace de chargement très bas et centré, avant le conducteur.
Cet espace de chargement centré présente quatre inconvénients:
- Pour une longueur totale de véhicule donnée, il réduit la longueur de l'espace de chargement (et l'augmentation de la longueur totale diminue la maniabilité et augmente le poids)
- La hauteur limite de la charge ne peut pas dépasser les épaules du conducteur (encore plus basse lorsque la charge est assez longue)
- Maniabilité assez médiocre à vide.

- Cette architecture n'est pas très adaptée à un moteur à essence, offre de motorisation encore nécessaire sur de nombreux marchés.


Et un avantage:
Sa capacité de charge est meilleure en ce qui concerne uniquement le poids, c'est-à-dire pour transporter des marchandises à haute densité.


Mais concernant ce qui sera effectivement transporté ou livré par deux roues, 99% seraient des marchandises de moyenne ou même de faible densité. Ce qui signifie que la capacité de poids pure est un problème beaucoup moins important à résoudre que la capacité de volume (en gardant à l'esprit que l'augmentation des dimensions globales du véhicule diminue la maniabilité, un avantage décisif pour les deux roues).


Des millions de personnes n'ont pas attendu notre moto pick-up pour transporter d'énormes charges sur des motos légères. Mais avec notre produit, ils amélioreront à la fois la maniabilité, la sécurité du conducteur et la vitesse, la facilité et la sécurité de chargement pour un prix contenu.
Notre produit est si simple qu'il sera facile à copier et c'est pourquoi nous ne mettrons pas en œuvre dans ce premier prototype de production toutes les idées que nous avons eues après avoir travaillé dur sur ce problème de transport de marchandises sur un deux-roues motorisé pendant dix ans.
Si nous n’avons pas répondu à toutes vos questions, n'hésitez pas à les poser en FAQ et si vous avez aimé ce projet, partagez-le autant que vous le pouvez !

story:
Short Summary

Lymousine was developed to address the big issue of poor vehicle/driver utilization rates with existing TNCs deployments like Uber & Lyft.  The founder of Zyleck in his Doctoral program research in the field of on demand transportation and autonomous vehicle potential usage in the ride sharing space, personally carried out, in the Atlanta market, over 1,250 rides on both Uber’s & Lyft’s platforms and made some very interesting discoveries.

  1. The results from his research carried out on the data shows that the average loaded trip miles by a vehicle/driver was 8.87 miles, while the average unloaded trip mile was 4.21 miles. The conclusion from this was that a vehicle/driver unloaded miles per trip relative to loaded miles per trip was approximately 47.46%. That is, for every 8.87 miles driven with a passenger the vehicle/driver traveled 4.21 miles without a passenger. Additionally, the analysis showed that the average ride time of a loaded trip was 18.51 minutes, while the average wait time for the next ride was 23.66 minutes. The conclusion drawn was that on average, in a vehicle’s/driver’s work shift, the vehicle/driver spent more time waiting for the next ride than spent giving a rider a ride.
  2. These two results combined and highlighted in his research meant that that the vehicle/driver utilization rates, measured in loaded miles relative to unloaded miles and trip time relative to wait time, were approximately 52% and 44% respectively. These poor utilization rates revelation led Mr. Treasure to conclude that there were significant improvement potentials to be had in the TNC model for vehicle/driver utilization rates and led him to develop his patent pending solution.

How Bad is it now for the Vehicle/Driver working for Uber & Lyft?

How does Mr. Treasure’s results translate to driver earnings with existing TNCs? He was able to use the data to develop a multilinear regression model to determine, for example, if one was interested in finding the average day’s revenue for 150 loaded miles travelled with 300 minutes of trip time for that day, a driver would earn $133.30. However, from the calculated utilization rates, it would have meant that the vehicle/driver would have amassed for the day another 138 unloaded miles and 398 minutes of wait time. Looked at in another context, this would have meant that the vehicle/driver would have had an 11 hour and 38 minutes’ work day, doing more than 288 miles of driving for the day, which would translate to less than 12/hr. in gross revenue and approximately $0.46/mile. These poor results would in part explain why drivers are grossly unhappy with their earnings, majority just work a few hours per week and why Uber & Lyft are unprofitable.

Figures 1-5 explain pictorially what's described above.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking to raise $250,000. This money will help us with our go to market. However, more important than the actual funds we will raise, we are looking for your support to help create the network effect we will need to be successful.
  • We are planning to launch city by city using a unique approach in this industry. We are going to use a city franchise model.
  • Using the municipal definition of a city/town and with the requirement that the city/town must have a minimum of a 10,000 population, we are going to allow an individual/consortium/company to purchase a franchise license for the city.
  • A Lymousine Franchisee, will be guaranteed a minimum 5% commission on gross ride revenue for all rides originating from that city/town for the duration of the license. More importantly, over a 3 year period of the license we will be guaranteeing that the franchisee earn a minimum of 2.20 times the amount paid for the license. 
  • As a contributor you will be given free rides on the Lymousine network! Additionally, as a rider, for every 1 road mile completed on the Lymousine Network, you will be rewarded with 5 frequent flyer air miles, redeemable on the airline of your choice (subject to conditions).
  • Your contribution here will go directly towards our go to market campaign whether or not we reach our campaign fund raising goal.

The Impact

Uber and Lyft have taken an approach to the on demand transportation market that does not equitably benefit, from a monetary perspective, all the stakeholders as it should. Additionally, Uber's & Lyft's long term view of the market is that eventually drivers will and must be replaced with autonomous vehicles (AVs). While we share the view that AVs are the future of transportation, we believe that those that help build the network should continue to benefit at all times.

  • With your help, we can help to bring another approach to the market as a counter balance to Uber & Lyft, who essentially operate off the same business model.
  • Lymousine's approach to the market is different in that both riders and drivers are prescheduled, but without taking away the flexibility from the rider and the driver of when or where to be picked up in the case of the rider or in the case of the driver when to start and stop driving. Additionally, Lymousine gives the driver more flexibility in determining start and end locations of work windows.
  • Drivers on the Lymousine Network will participate in the ownership of AVs that will eventually be used on the Lymousine Network. What this will mean is that drivers will be able to purchase AVs on their own, with financial support from Lymousine, and place the AVs on the Lymousine network. Lymousine will not entirely replace the driver, rather the driver, who will always own the car on the Lymousine Network, will work alongside the AV at all times. In Urban areas drivers will be freed up while in the AV to perform other tasks, When the AV has to venture out to non-Urban areas or during conditions where AVs cannot on their own operate, drivers will take over from the AV.
 

Risks & Challenges

Transport Network companies are poised for success if they get a good impetus to overcome the inertia in creating a network effect. In simple terms, it's necessary to overcome the chicken and egg situation of which comes first. Lymousine's chicken and egg situation is that of having enough riders to support drivers and enough drivers to support riders. The risk Lymousine faces is that of overcoming this network effect need to create both sides of the market.

  • To overcome this network effect hurdle, we need your help and the power of social media.
  • It is this reality of finding a solution to overcoming the creation of this network effect why we are here seeking your help, monetarily and virally spreading the word.
  • While it may be noble to think of Lymousine as the "David" facing the "Goliaths" of Uber and Lyft, Lymousine is not about that. What this is about, is that Lymousine has found a method to materially improve on some of the inefficiencies that the Uber & Lyft model has. We do not have billions of dollars behind us. However, social media can effect billions in responses and it is this we are hoping to capitalize on, to give us a fight in the game.

Why we think Lymousine is going to succeed

Lymousine cost structure is significantly lower than Uber's or Lyft and our operational approach is different.

  1. Lymousine plan to bring a more efficient structure to the TNC market. Improving the utilization rates of vehicles/drivers, making use of more full time driver participants and keeping the total driver pool levels at controlled limits within each market, will allow Lymousine to make more money per hour, spend less on recruiting drivers to replenish depleting pools, because drivers will be making much more than minimum wage and thus will be incentivized to stay within the Lymousine network and work longer shifts.
  2. Lymousine is not funded by Venture Capitalist money, this means that we are not mandated to provide 10X+ multiples on a return on investment. Lymousine seeks normal profit margins between 15 - 30%.
  3. Lymousine is not developing or plan to develop AVs. That is the function of OEMs, like Ford, GM, BMW, Mercedes, etc.,. Therefore, Lymousine does not have to expend R&D dollars of the magnitude necessary to become an OEM.
  4. Lymousine market strategy is pegged against a franchise model. Therefore, some operational functions will be shifted to franchisees, thus lowering overall customer acquisition cost.
  5. Lymousine is not so much into creating the market for ride sharing, Uber & Lyft have done and is doing that. Lymousine's mission is about bringing a different approach to the market with improve efficiencies and a more equitable revenue distribution to drivers.

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you still can't help:

  • As a potential rider traveling to the Atlanta market areas or in markets that we plan to launch, go to the Apple iOS App store . or Android Google Play store and download the Lymousine Rider App. Register and start using Lymousine for your planned rides in the markets that we support. Then , please help to get the word out and make some noise about Lymousine.
  • As a potential driver wanting to drive in the Atlanta market areas, go to the Apple iOS App store and download the Lymousine Driver App, or go to the Google Play store and download the Lymousine Driver App. Register, wait for the due diligence process of your background checks to be completed, once approved start driving for Lymousine. Then, please help to get the word out and make some noise about Lymousine.
  • To get the word out, Use the Indiegogo share tools, social media and word of mouth!

Now let's go make Lymousine a credible counter balance to Uber & Lyft!

While we share the view that AVs are the future of transportation, we believe that those that help build the network should continue to benefit at all times.
With your help, we can help to bring another approach to the market as a counter balance to Uber & Lyft, who essentially operate off the same business model.
Lymousine's approach to the market is different in that both riders and drivers are prescheduled, but without taking away the flexibility from the rider and the driver of when or where to be picked up in the case of the rider or in the case of the driver when to start and stop driving. Additionally, Lymousine gives the driver more flexibility in determining start and end locations of work windows.
Drivers on the Lymousine Network will participate in the ownership of AVs that will eventually be used on the Lymousine Network. What this will mean is that drivers will be able to purchase AVs on their own, with financial support from Lymousine, and place the AVs on the Lymousine network. Lymousine will not entirely replace the driver, rather the driver, who will always own the car on the Lymousine Network, will work alongside the AV at all times. In Urban areas drivers will be freed up while in the AV to perform other tasks, When the AV has to venture out to non-Urban areas or during conditions where AVs cannot on their own operate, drivers will take over from the AV.
 
Risks & Challenges
Transport Network companies are poised for success if they get a good impetus to overcome the inertia in creating a network effect. In simple terms, it's necessary to overcome the chicken and egg situation of which comes first. Lymousine's chicken and egg situation is that of having enough riders to support drivers and enough drivers to support riders. The risk Lymousine faces is that of overcoming this network effect need to create both sides of the market.

To overcome this network effect hurdle, we need your help and the power of social media.
It is this reality of finding a solution to overcoming the creation of this network effect why we are here seeking your help, monetarily and virally spreading the word.
While it may be noble to think of Lymousine as the "David" facing the "Goliaths" of Uber and Lyft, Lymousine is not about that. What this is about, is that Lymousine has found a method to materially improve on some of the inefficiencies that the Uber & Lyft model has. We do not have billions of dollars behind us. However, social media can effect billions in responses and it is this we are hoping to capitalize on, to give us a fight in the game.


Why we think Lymousine is going to succeed
Lymousine cost structure is significantly lower than Uber's or Lyft and our operational approach is different.

Lymousine plan to bring a more efficient structure to the TNC market. Improving the utilization rates of vehicles/drivers, making use of more full time driver participants and keeping the total driver pool levels at controlled limits within each market, will allow Lymousine to make more money per hour, spend less on recruiting drivers to replenish depleting pools, because drivers will be making much more than minimum wage and thus will be incentivized to stay within the Lymousine network and work longer shifts.
Lymousine is not funded by Venture Capitalist money, this means that we are not mandated to provide 10X+ multiples on a return on investment. Lymousine seeks normal profit margins between 15 - 30%.
Lymousine is not developing or plan to develop AVs. That is the function of OEMs, like Ford, GM, BMW, Mercedes, etc.,. Therefore, Lymousine does not have to expend R&D dollars of the magnitude necessary to become an OEM.
Lymousine market strategy is pegged against a franchise model. Therefore, some operational functions will be shifted to franchisees, thus lowering overall customer acquisition cost.
Lymousine is not so much into creating the market for ride sharing, Uber & Lyft have done and is doing that. Lymousine's mission is about bringing a different approach to the market with improve efficiencies and a more equitable revenue distribution to drivers.

Other Ways You Can Help
You may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you still can't help:

As a potential rider traveling to the Atlanta market areas or in markets that we plan to launch, go to the Apple iOS App store . or Android Google Play store and download the Lymousine Rider App. Register and start using Lymousine for your planned rides in the markets that we support. Then , please help to get the word out and make some noise about Lymousine.
As a potential driver wanting to drive in the Atlanta market areas, go to the Apple iOS App store and download the Lymousine Driver App, or go to the Google Play store and download the Lymousine Driver App. Register, wait for the due diligence process of your background checks to be completed, once approved start driving for Lymousine. Then, please help to get the word out and make some noise about Lymousine.
To get the word out, Use the Indiegogo share tools, social media and word of mouth!

Now let's go make Lymousine a credible counter balance to Uber & Lyft!

story:
Short description or some Words

We, the association Blue Opal, can set up projects and establish a new peaceful world with your help!

A world in which even our great-grandchildren may live in clean nature and have a free and happy life. We want that they have the chance to pick apples from trees and taste genuine honey from bees.

We begin a technological revolution and you will save a lot of money!

We think it is time to build the space energy converter based on the main features by Dr. Nikola Tesla, in collaboration with our research team.

The converter gives us free energy!

Free energy is clean, does not produce emissions, is environmentally friendly and renewable. Free energy is available in unlimited quantities. Free energy will become cheap and everyone can use it at no charge.

That sounds not bad, or?

The whole world will change completely.

Support us, please take part with the peaceful change.

You can help now!

What will you give us & what you get & what has been done.

In the laboratory, behind closed doors, we analyzed the brainstorming of Dr. Nikola Tesla, Prof. Dr Claus Turtur, Hans Coler, Prof. Dr. Stefan Marinov, Viktor Schauberger, Howard Johnson, Dipl. Ing. Lüling, Adam Trombly, Dr. Jack Kasher, Lane Andrews, James Gilliland, Daniel Sheehan, John Bedini, John Hutchison, Dr. Eugene Mallove, Dr. Steven Greer, Dr. Brian O'Leary, Dr. Shiji Inomata, Floyd “Sparky” Sweet and a lot more and we finished with our research team the Pre-Engineering for a space energy converter.

According to this analysis, we believe that the time has come to realize the next steps in the research and development.

To achieve this goal, we started this campaign to inform you.

You can donate now!

Here are some more informations for you.

We want free energy for all people and to renew the planet.

Free energy has the following characteristics:

  1. Free energy is clean, does not produce emissions, is environmentally friendly and renewable. Free energy is available in unlimited quantities.

  2. Free energy will become cheap and everyone can use it at no charge. It will supersede energy monopolies.

  3. Free energy will be / is available locally. High-voltage lines and gas stations will not be needed anymore. All energy will be wireless.

  4. Free energy is safe and no longer poses a risk to the earth. All processes are public and understandable for everyone.

  5. Using free energy means it will no longer be necessary to produce energy by destroying natural elements. We think it is time to build the space energy converter based on the main features by Dr. Nikola Tesla.

  6. This change brings us more money in every household.

  7. That means, that parents will have more time for the kids. Thereby the family awareness strengthened again.

  8. Also the poverty will be reduced and the life will be re liveable.

  9. The realization of this project brings for all people worldwide a positive life change.

The Association Blue Opal can do it

What will you give us?

It is very easy. You can give us the possibility to complete the research and development.

You can help that all people get the opportunity to use free energy

You can donate and help now!

What will you get?

After we successfully completed the research you can get your lifetime free energy, after you buy the converter.

Please close your eyes and think how it can be, not one cent more for gas, petrol, oil or electricity to pay in your life. Your children, grandchildren and our nature will thank you.

Risks & Challenges

Risks?

What can happen in the worst case?

It is difficult to describe. Why? We can not see into the future!
What could happen?
We are held by a natural disaster of the work. Or a world war breaks out. Or governments forbid us to build the converter. Or the scientists will not make it.

In the worst case, we will realize with the occupied money our other environmental projects.

Challenges?

Together, we can save the planet! We will make the space energy converter and free energy reality.

At this moment we do not need more nuclear power plants, substations, wind turbines and also oil platforms.



You will receive a certificate if you buy the perk R&D!





You can donate and help now!


Information about the Association Blue Opal

 

  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate money at this time, believe me when I say I understand the circumstance, but there are other ways you can help.

The word-of-mouth advertising is still so important, and social media makes that so much easier! Tell anyone who will listen how awesome space energy converter and free energy will be and how they can help bring it to life.

Financial support is not the only way to help us. Spreading a word about our campaign would help a lot:

→ Tweet and post as much as you can!

→ Use the Indiegogo share tools!

We can make “Free Energy for ALL People” happen.

Let's create something greater together!

If you want to support us, we would appreciate your help.

Please visit us for further information.

You have more questions?

Please visit us to ask your question. We’ll get back to you as soon as we can.

You want to be a member/associate?

Please visit us for further information.

Recognizing your generosity.

Thank you!


Dear readers, dear friends,
if not all the words are perfectly chosen in English, it is because, that English is not my native language and you can not be perfect everywhere.
But I know 100% about the technical relationships around the Space Energy Converter.
I will build him!
Many greetings
Michael
Head of Development Association Blue Opal

FAQ

As with any project, large and small, there’s always risks challenges involved.

Risks of perks offered:

This facility is unfortunately associated with risks and therefore not suitable for all investors. A final designation of all risks and determining their likelihood it is not possible at the moment.

A detailed description of the risks of this investment is, that from whatever reasons, the space energy converter can not be operated . (Legal approval is denied us. World war breaks out, earthquakes, natural disasters, death of scientist, or if it turns out,that this procedure is not feasible , although Dr.Nikola Tesla has operated it)

We write these sentences, although we 100% are convinced of the implementation, but we now do not know what will happen tomorrow.

story:
WHAT: Wuji is the world's first eco-conscious ride-share company that makes it simple to have a positive impact on the world. Wuji is a grassroots business that benefits communities and the planet with every ride. 

WHO: Founder Stephen M. Cutter knew he wanted to contribute something to a new vision of the world, but didn’t know where to start. He decided his contribution must be based in something he knew and turned to a  ride-share program. After being a ride-share driver for over a year, he'd seen the benefits the job could offer, and the growing market for the service. He realized no one offered a ride-share program that was not only sustainable but regenerative. And that the power of urban transportation could mean that a regenerative option could have major impact for our planet. 

WHEN: Wuji's crowdfunding campaign was timed to correlate with international peace day, and it runs from late September into early October. We plan to launch within three months, and already have both the software and logistics in place to "press play" when our fundraising goals are met. We're also obtaining venture capital and angel investors and have experienced fundraisers working for us night and day to secure the capital we need to transform the globe. Your contribution will help us launch marketing campaigns, train drivers, obtain safety certifications, and prepare for nationwide launch. 

WHERE: Our launch city is Chicago, where we live. We aim to expand to 20 urban areas within our first 12 months of operation. 

WHY: Our mission is to make it easy and cost-effective to make a difference. It's estimated that 60% of the human population will live in urban areas by 2030. That means urban transportation is a fundamental system for all of humanity. We've long taken for granted that urban transit has to be a suck on the environment, but what if we could turn that notion on its head? What if every time you take a ride from point A to point B, you know you're reforesting the planet, cleaning up the ocean, and giving back to your community. What if you knew you were paying your driver well, and benefitting your local economy? With Wuji, all you have to do to be the change you want to see in the world is switch the app you use to get around.

HOW: Wuji is moving at a higher vibration! That's why Wuji is a triple-bottom-line company: People, planet and profit. We want our drivers to have a voice in the company. That's why we have a reserved driver-elected seat on the board of the company. Drivers can also earn equity in Wuji and also receive residual long term income, so as the ecosystem grows, so does the health of the whole.

More than 90% of the people we have surveyed want to make a positive impact on our environment but find it difficult, or are unclear which actions they can take that would really make a difference. With the Wuji rideshare, we are creating a platform to make it easy for people to vote with their dollar and contribute to their communities and environment with just a click of a button. We are helping to shift to a more sustainable paradigm one ride at a time by making it fun, rewarding and easy to go green and make a change. Take your next ride today with Wuji and move with purpose! Download the app here link needed

 

Wuji has the app ready and needs your help to launch!!!!

Here is what your pledge will be influencing

Marketing = $15k

Insurance Premiums = $15k

Driver/Rider Acquisition = $10k

Ongoing App Development = $10k

Customer Support = $5k

Legal Fees = $10k

Building/Equipment/Supplies = $10K

Total Expenses

$75,000


 

Rider Benefits - Why Ride Wuji?

No surge pricing

Fully Carbon-Neutral

Raffles off a bicycle for every 1,000 downloads

Safety features via www.guardllama.com that give peace of mind

Driver customer service training

Green bonus programs - Planet focused company

  a) Plant trees with every ride

  b) Every hundred rides saves an acre of rainforest

  c) Part of every ride goes to programs benefiting the health of the oceans

  d) A portion of every ride will go to projects and research for clean drinking water for the planet

Our goal is to benefit the air, water and land with every ride. We aim to be a regenerative vehicle for the planet.

 

Driver Benefits - Why Drive Wuji?

Drivers will have an equity stake option in Wuji

Riders have tip options for drivers

Vehicle payment program for drivers

Residual income opportunities - Drivers make money while they sleep!

Drivers will have a seat on the board

 

The Impact

Your contribution will allow Wuji to successfully launch in Chicago as our first city to kick off our green mission!

Wuji will IMPACT the communities we serve to have a more sustainable lifestyle simply by getting where you need to go! 

Wuji is a new model of business that is only interested in win-win-win scenarios for all stakeholders including people, the earth, and more.

 

Wuji Safety Features

Studies show drivers with eco-friendly habits get in 15-20% less accidents than traditional vehicles. Wuji also has a push button service to alert authorities to real-time GPS location in case of any sort of altercation. Additionally we have advanced driver screenings and customer service and training programs that verify that our drivers are the best on the road.

 

Partnerships

Wuji has been developing partnerships with other green organizations and cross promoting campaigns with companies who hold similar values and commitments to community, culture, and the environment we live in.

Earthdollar.org -  Our digital currency partner. Their innovative currency is backed by land and the health of the earth and the currency value goes up the healthier the planet is.

Unify.org -  Global mindfulness and meditation community and platform to promote peace and sustainability around the world.

Treesisters.org - Sustainable tree planting business which is empowering women to plant trees on 5 continents around the world and nurture our Mother Earth!

Carbonfund.org - Wuji's partner in offsetting our CO2 footprint and helping to raise awareness of the need to be carbon-neutral

 

Risks & Challenges

Our main challenge is penetrating the market with the industry's two Goliaths: Uber and Lyft. We feel people are embracing more life purpose and creativity and are choosing to use products and services that focus on creating impact and not just money.

We are counting on the power of the crowd to stand up and make a change. No one person, company, or technology can save the world. The collective good deeds of millions of people are what makes the change.

Business experts say that if you want to start the next big business you need do two things. 1.) Add more value than anyone can possibly expect 2.) Focus on solving the world's biggest problems. Wuji is adding value by ease of access to go green and is helping solve the biggest problem by taking care of Mother Earth!

You can help in so many ways,

Pledge your support and vote with your dollar!

Share this with your friends and family and be the change you want to see in the world. (With every share Wuji will plant a tree via Edenprojects.org or Treesister.org)

Lets use the social media machines for good and spread the positive vibes!

Peace be the journey,

Wuji Team

story:
Bike of the future 

Norrcycle Elliott might be the most unique and sustainable bike there is!

Norrcycle Elliott is:

Durable
Our bike is incredibly durable due to our magic ingredient bamboo that lets us
create a bike that is ​light, stiff and flexible, all at the same time!

  • Tested for 2 years under Nordic weather conditions. 
  • Certified according to ISO 4210 to guarantee you durability and safety. 
  • Quality tested at EFBE institute

Why we use bamboo instead of other tree wood:

 

 

Sustainable
While using the bike in itself is a fantastic solution for the environment, why stop there?

  • Addition to bamboo being a natural material it also houses CO2 in the actual frame!
  • Bamboo can grow up to 1 meter a day which makes it sustainable to produce.
  • This bike is made by nature for the nature!

 

Riding experience
This bike is light and stiffness is on par with a good aluminum bike! 
But what bamboo has that other bike material doesn't is flexibility! 

  • Bamboo has a unique function of absorbing chocks and is extremely hard to crack!
  • Light and stiff like any other bike!
  • Looks dope!This bike sticks out in the masses with style!

 

 

We have 3 options to choose from!

The difference inte the 3 options lies in the different components. 
So choose the specifics that suits your needs!
Psst! Every option have an earlybird version limited to 10 bikes.
Ends with "li" 

Options:

Ba/Bali
- 9 gear shifting 
- Hydraulic disc brakes
 

    Bi/Bili
    - Sturmey Archer S2
    - Leather handle and saddle
    - Clean frame without cables
     

    Bo/Boli
    - Deore 10 gear rear derailleur
    - Leather handle and saddle
    - Shimano Deore disc brake

     

    If you have any questions don't hesitate to contact us at: info@norrcycle.com

     

     

    As individual as your fingerprint 

    While materials like aluminum or steel can be perfectly duplicated they will also lose their perfection and attraction over time.
    The unique character of natural materials like bamboo, wood or natural fabrics at the other hand just gets stronger with time. 

    You will never find a 100% copy. Like every person, each Norrcycle has its own fingerprint by nature.

     

    Design your Norrcycle 

    for just 50€ you can brand your bike to make it 100% unique!

    Its that simple

    • Send a black & white picture as logo  or typo engraving
    • The resolution is recommended min. 10x of the measurements in millimeter. If using the full space, it would mean min. 600x600 pixel (60x60mm) in the front and 1200 x 300 pixel (120x30mm) on the saddle tube.
    • Black and white, hard edges, no shades, no color
    • Format: PNG, JPG, EPS
    • Contact us for technical questions
    • Until we start building your frame you can change the branding. 

     

    Durable construction material 

    Safety and durability starts with the selection of the material! 

    Bamboo, really?!
    Having bamboo as the main ingredient in a bike might seem odd at first glance, but this hidden gem of material has amazing properties unknown to many of us!

    When it comes to flexibility and toughness bamboo beats most tree-based timber.
    Skateboards out of bamboo demonstrate that impressively in being hardly breakable compared to boards out of tree-based timber.
    Because of these fantastic properties bamboo became our natural choice. We developed the material together with an experienced skateboard producer and developed our frames over a long time to use the maximum of its potential.
    In fact the properties are so good in bamboo that producers within extreme sports have been starting to use it to withstand the most gruesome conditions. Bamboo boards work great as construction material in skateboards, ski, surf boards boats and other sport articles – in other words bamboo boards are predestined to build bikes.

    Bamboo is a fibre material that is significantly less brittle than aluminium, and much more impact-resistant than carbon fibre. The material fatigue of bamboo under load is very low compared with metals. Bamboo has a unique function of absorbing chocks and is extremely hard to crack!

    In order to increase the Norrcycle bike’s durability, we learned from boat builders how to protect the surfaces of our bikes and glue the parts in a long-lasting way.

     

    Safety and durability of the bike 

    The Norrcycle bikes have been in use and tested for almost 2 years under all kind of Nordic weather conditions and are certified according ISO 4210.

    The German certification provider EFBE is a great specialist in testing and certifying bikes for safety and durability. The bike has been tested on a test stand that simulates 10 years average use under urban conditions. The frame has not shown any signs of weakness after that. In fact, EFBE was very satisfied with the result as they mentioned.  

        

    We are using the experience of boat builders and skateboard producers to glue and protect our bikes against weather and other forces. We developed durable bikes, and bamboo is a great basis.

     

    Sustainability of bamboo  

    While using a bike in itself is a fantastic solution for the environment, why stop there? Bamboo is the fastest growing plant and absorbs the most carbon per square meter in one year – it can grow over 90 cm a day! Norrcycle frames are made out of “materialized CO2” stored in our frames instead of emitting it during production.

    Our bikes are durable, last for a long time and avoid the use of conventional materials that have a high carbon footprint. 

    Norrcycle bikes are glued with a solvent free high-performance adhesive developed in the boat industry, which contains a high amount of plant-based ingredients.

    This bike is made by nature for the nature!

    ,

     

     

    What We Need & What You Get!
     

    • You will get your bike! If we don`t reach our goal, we produce the ordered bikes in smaller numbers. 
    • We need 50.000 € to produce the bikes and order material for production in the future. 

     

    The Impact

    We developed the bikes and are ready for production. We have material for 100 bikes on stock in Sweden and Germany. Now we wait for your orders to proceed further.

     

    Risks & Challenges

    We have tested and certified the prototypes according to CE (ISO 4210) and prepared the production.  We can offer a safe and durable product. Our challenge is follow-up orders and to get new material for this in time to speed up our development. 

    We have successfully managed the challenge to transfer the production from a prototype stadium into a serial production scenario. During this process we optimized the production to reach serial quality while becoming more efficient. 

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We are always thankful for sharing the campaign or if someone wants to report about our bike. If you are around Gothenburg feel free to contact us, have a  test ride and share your experience with others. We are confident to convince you about the great riding quality.

story:
Short Summary
  • My name is John Wilken and I am not a used car salesman so you won't see a lot of flash and fake videos or mind numbing graphics spread across the page to distract you. I wont tell you you can go 500 miles on a charge at 40 miles an hour then charge the battery with a solar panel in 5 minutes or charge while you ride with a dyno (no such thing as perpetual motion).

  • I have worked in the alternative energy transportation industry for 5 years and served as a Chief engineer/ Diesel technologies in the navy. I have built everything from a GT5 electric super car to a Class 8 Hydrogen Electric Hybrid Big Rig Truck and in the interim I got hooked on Electric Bicycles. Me and our Electrical engineer at Vision built 6 Prototype Electric police bikes for the Boston P.D. to ride in the 2014 Boston Marathon, they were built while I was with VBikellc.com (PICTURED ABOVE) .Marathon http://www.bostonmagazine.com/news/blog/2014/04...

  •  I recently moved to the midwest to open a business that can sell to and service all points in the US because service is as big a part of a customer oriented business as sales in my eyes, coastal companies can not offer service to the opposite coast because it is cost prohibitive and lets face it most of them don't care after they get your money. 

  • I think that we in america need to look at alternate means of transport for our short daily commutes and electric bikes are the answer. would it not be better for that freshman at college to ride a low cost bike around campus then to deal with a car or would it not be easier to jump on a bike to run to the store or work for that matter in most cases it takes 45 minutes to go 5 miles in a car at rush hour but on a bike that goes 20 miles an hour EFFORTLESSLY your there in 15 minutes with no sweat. My father who is over 70 got on my fat tire E-bike and rode (first time on a bike in 30+ years)around like a little kid with a big grin on his face. 
  •  but unfortunately we are experiencing what I call Cafe pricing of these bikes. A$2000.00 to $4000.00 price tag, which stalls the market and only serves the rich. Why the cafe pricing? because they are playing on  your eco-sympathy and guilt, and that is robbery in my book, I CAN GET THE SAME BIKE BUILT FOR $900.00 to $1600.00 and the $1600.00 version is a FULLY UPGRADED 48V 500W bike with 5 levels of pedal assist (power to the wheels from the motor) with an LCD display on a seven speed bike. (for us bigger people). I have done the research and the testing on several different drive systems and know that the best buy is the 48V because you can always lower the power but you have to replace the drive system to raise it
  • with this funding you will assist me in establishing WIL-GO EBikes and ordering the first 100 + 48 Volt units and parts for assembly and yes I can Get 36V. these Bikes will be fully tested and warranted.  I also am developing a mid crank fat tire using a bafang 2, 48V 750W drive for off road use as well as a E-Trike for older people and Disabled Vets. I plan on having spare parts for any replacement needs (already have vendor connections) because I believe it is about the service as well as the product. 


What We Need & What You Get

  • I am asking for $300,000.00 to set up an assembly facility and order the first shipment of units and spare batteries and service parts, a trailer to transport the products and cover the first year of operations and expansion.  I have already located the assembly facility to lease and have my team together I myself will be involved in the assembly because I am a hands on person, my electrical guy Matthew, is a tech grad and really knows his stuff as far as electric and electronics as well as machine human interfacing. my assemblers have all worked in the bike field and have a passion for it . I also will be establishing relationships with existing bike shops for servicing Wil-go E-bikes. 
  • for those that chose to invest in me I offer a 48V E-bike (street, beach cruiser or fat tire or foldable) at cost plus shipping if I reach my goal. Can I Deliver? yes it will take approximately 8 weeks from start up to ready to ship. Investors will be notified of progress through email.
  • If I don't reach my goal amount I will have to start out much smaller but am determined to beat those overpriced cafe bike Companies who claim to manufacture but merely assemble.

The Impact

  • to me this is the most exciting revolution in commuting. think about it most people live 10 miles or closer to where they work, more and more cities are dedicating bike lanes on roads. with pedal assist you can get to work fast and no sweat, coming home, peddle a little to get the cobwebs out after a long day in the office. you feel better all around. plus you are not polluting the air, you are cutting down on congestion and just feeling free with the wind in your face. on the weekends go for a ride in the park without the fear of getting too tired.
  • I have assembled upgraded and modified Ebikes. as stated above I have built police and patrol bikes for Boston P.D. and they love them.
  • Look I am not offering 50 or 100 mile ranges or 30 minute recharges because it simply does not happen without expensive upgrades or larger/Heavier battery packs. what I know is 20 to 40 mile range at up to 20 miles an hour depending on rider and road conditions.  I will say it cost 10 cents to recharge the battery. how much does it cost to refill the car? even with cheap gas prices you still have maintenance, registration, insurance and a whole lot of extra costs.

Risks & Challenges

I feel there are very few risks associated with this endeavor. I have already covered all my bases as far as Vendors and the best upgradable components, my team is solid and passionate about what we are trying to accomplish and as i stated above I have already assembled and modified ebikes.

the challenge is re establishing trust with the consumer after all the false statements about the E bike. people order it, ride it and it underperforms and the company comes up with excuses as to why it underpreformed in stead of giving factual limits.  it makes the whole industry look bad. I won't say it if it isn't true. what I mean is I wont tell you something just to sell you something. my bikes are all tested for range and speed and durability as well as max weight for the bike. for instance I am 6ft 7in and 340 lbs I ride my Fat tire and only have to pedal up hills but on the flat i easily get to 20 miles an hour and it really helps with my Knee that I damaged in the Navy. if i can ride it that means the average person would have no problem gliding along.  

  • now the word that they say to use a lot. PASSION, PASSION AND MORE PASSION. That is what I have for this Endeavor. funded full or underfunded I will keep trying to make this dream happen.
  • Please help me to change the world One, one hundred or one thousand Bikes at a time.

Other Ways You Can Help

Just because you can't contribute does not mean you can't help.

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. without your help getting the word out this wont happen so please spread the word.
  • use the Indiegogo share tools it helps all of us!

story:
Risks & Challenges

 

There are always possible bumps in the road with any new product development. Maintaining the integrity of the design and high standards of quality in the materials and craftsmanship is important to us, as is staying on schedule so our customers get their Jensors as soon as possible.  

We've worked hard to minimize risks by first designing, creating, testing, using and improving several working prototypes in-house so that any design flaws, however minor, could be identified and solved well ahead of time.

Next we've carefully selected and vetted our manufacturing resources to ensure reliability, quality and scheduling is monitored and maintained throughout the process. Instead of having one factory make our product, we will source to factories that excel for each unique part and then bring everything together to assembly.  

Finally, before the first unit ships, we'll personally perform final quality inspections so every Jensor meets our high standards of quality and performance. 

All that said, there's always the possibility for unforeseen delays due to circumstances beyond our control. Inclement weather can affect shipping times. Ports can become backed up with surplus cargo.

But no matter what, we promise to keep you informed with frequent updates on the progress of our project. So check back often to see how everything is going, and thank you again for all your support!

 

And don't forgot to share...

Even if you can't make a pledge, you can still help up by spreading the word about our campaign. Just click any of the share links at the top left of this page and share our campaign with your friends and family, or anyone you know who likes to grill! Thank you SO MUCH for supporting Jensor E-scooter!

story:
We value your mobility

Our main focus is practicality. Maximum speed of 67km/h and a range of 40km will meet all your requirements. 9 "pneumatic wheels will deal with  any surface unevenness.

 

 

We value your individuality

Don’t be dull! Stand out from the crowd!
Send us your graphic design and we will put it on your VIXA Board.

 

 

Are your brave enough to take
on the strongest electric board on earth?

VIXA Board’s drive with a total power of 5,5kW (7,48kM) can overcome any obstacle.

 

Comfort and safety without killing

the joy of ride is our priority

Ergonomic profiling of the board allows better twisting balance.

 

Wheels 9"

Don't be affraid of curbs.

 

Brakes

Don't waste energy. Use your regenerative braking system.

 

Water resistant

Don't be afraid to cross puddles.

 

Flexible deck

Have a smooth ride.

 

Torsional

Take the turns comfortable and confident.

 

We value your money

We offer a solid design, the highest quality materials
and solutions developed especially for you.

 

 

 

Digital Mockup

Trust our engineering skills.

 

Trust in us.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Can anyone ride the VIXA Board?
Yes!
Have you learned how to ride a bike? The process is similar. Your bony labyrinth – the sense of balance must get used to the new sensations. It is really simple but takes some time to master.
 

How do I choose my individual graphic design?
You have to upload your graphic in a PDF or JPG (300dpi, 103x27cm) format and we will put it on your VIXA board. You will get a visualization of your VIXA board to accept the effect before we start the production.

 

Is there a return and warranty policy?
Yes!
Your new VIXA Board comes with a 14-day return policy* and a 12-month warranty against manufacturer defects.
*15-20% restocking fee may apply


Do you offer after-sales service?
Yes!
We produce almost all the parts locally and keep a stock of spare ones ready to go if needed. We offer customer support by e-mail in the following languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Arabic and Polish.

 

What happens if the battery runs out of power?
You can use your VIXA Board in the traditional way. You can take down the transmission belt (to avoid additional resistance). You can also simply take a brake and recharge the battery.

 

What does it mean „free your hand” regarding to the control system?
It means that both your hands are free, because the controller is attached to your wrist in form of a watch and you control the board by moving your finger. Your palms stay free.

 

Is there a user manual included?
Yes!
You will get a user manual in the following languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Arabic and Polish. It contains both usage guidelines and VIXA board maintenance instructions.

 

Do you have any safety recommendations?
Hey, we want to animate you for some action and fun! First just get used to the VIXA Board. You should wear protective equipment like helmet and safety pads. Once you get more familiar and manage to maintain the balance don’t hold yourself back and try to break new limits.
Regardless, always remember you must obey local laws and regulations.
story_txt: We value your mobilityOur main focus is practicality. Maximum speed of 67km/h and a range of 40km will meet all your requirements. 9 "pneumatic wheels will deal with  any surface unevenness.  We value your individualityDon’t be dull! Stand out from the crowd!Send us your graphic design and we will put it on your VIXA Board.  Are your brave enough to takeon the strongest electric board on earth?VIXA Board’s drive with a total power of 5,5kW (7,48kM) can overcome any obstacle. Comfort and safety without killingthe joy of ride is our priorityErgonomic profiling of the board allows better twisting balance. Wheels 9"Don't be affraid of curbs. BrakesDon't waste energy. Use your regenerative braking system. Water resistantDon't be afraid to cross puddles. Flexible deckHave a smooth ride. TorsionalTake the turns comfortable and confident. We value your moneyWe offer a solid design, the highest quality materialsand solutions developed especially for you.   Digital MockupTrust our engineering skills. Trust in us.                         Can anyone ride the VIXA Board?Yes!Have you learned how to ride a bike? The process is similar. Your bony labyrinth – the sense of balance must get used to the new sensations. It is really simple but takes some time to master. How do I choose my individual graphic design?You have to upload your graphic in a PDF or JPG (300dpi, 103x27cm) format and we will put it on your VIXA board. You will get a visualization of your VIXA board to accept the effect before we start the production. Is there a return and warranty policy?Yes!Your new VIXA Board comes with a 14-day return policy* and a 12-month warranty against manufacturer defects.*15-20% restocking fee may applyDo you offer after-sales service?Yes!We produce almost all the parts locally and keep a stock of spare ones ready to go if needed. We offer customer support by e-mail in the following languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Arabic and Polish. What happens if the battery runs out of power?You can use your VIXA Board in the traditional way. You can take down the transmission belt (to avoid additional resistance). You can also simply take a brake and recharge the battery. What does it mean „free your hand” regarding to the control system?It means that both your hands are free, because the controller is attached to your wrist in form of a watch and you control the board by moving your finger. Your palms stay free. Is there a user manual included?Yes!You will get a user manual in the following languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Arabic and Polish. It contains both usage guidelines and VIXA board maintenance instructions. Do you have any safety recommendations?Hey, we want to animate you for some action and fun! First just get used to the VIXA Board. You should wear protective equipment like helmet and safety pads. Once you get more familiar and manage to maintain the balance don’t hold yourself back and try to break new limits.Regardless, always remember you must obey local laws and regulations.

story:
Short Summary

There is nothing quite as compelling as having to pay your own way through college.  I still remember working full time and taking classes whenever I could.  The university didn't have an evening program for Mechanical Engineering, so I sometimes took classes at lunchtime on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays.  I would drive to within 1.5 miles of the building, put on running shoes, and run to and from class (I gave up my Tuesday and Thursday lunch hours to make up for travel time).  I remember thinking how great it would be to have something in the trunk of my car that I could use to get to and from class and then have time to eat lunch twice a week.  Well, many years later I found myself solving this problem for others with our Origami folding bikes.  Now, its time to take the next step and bring a properly-engineered folding e-bike into the fray.  

We have finally come to point where our pre-production prototypes have been put through enough of their paces that we are ready to ready to offer the FireFly to the public and hopefully improve the lives of people who need effective and efficient transportation that can be taken just about anywhere.  

What We Need & What You Get

We need funding to finalize the production line, secure motors, and improve our warehousing and distribution processes.  Bottom line, we need your help to get there.

When the FireFly hits the market, it will be priced at $2,399.00 plus shipping.  But, we want to reward you early adopters with a lower price, a free carry bag, and free shipping; this will save you about $460!

If we don't reach our goal, we will offer you a refund, or the bike with about a 30-day delay.

The Impact

E-bikes make it possible for people to bike longer distances so commuting doesn't have to mean driving a car.  Since the controls of the bike require some pressure on the pedals, the rider is still getting exercise even while the motor amplifies the riders effort.  

We want to see people taking their FireFlies on the bus or train and enjoying the freedom to explore the city unhindered by the need for parking spaces.  Take you FireFly with you as you explore.  

Risks & Challenges

We know that every opportunity brings with it some challenges.  Although we have a wonderful product to share, we need to get enough backers on board to make the FireFly a reality.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Our biggest challenge is getting people to find our products and know that Origami Bicycle Company exists.  We hope that you will help us to spread the word to all of those who can benefit from owning a FireFly.

story:
History

E-bikes first appeared — briefly — in a much clunkier incarnation on the transportation scene in the 1930s.

Due to the high cost of electronic components and batteries the first e-bikes was hard to sell, development of e-bikes continued but remained a luxury item due to the high cost.



The bicycle above was sold during the 1930s by Philips, using lead acid batteries

Our story

We followed the market very closely and also which e-bikes have been the best ones on the market and why.

We noticed the type of improvements that could be done with our skillset and help changing the e-bike industry and keep moving forward with innovating the folding e-bike category. 

2017 - We got our design for the V-danci e-bike with LKK Industrial Design.

2018- There was some great awards given to us this year, prototype completed.

2019 - Time to raise funds so we can get a low production cost. 
This means we can offer one of the most advanced and ergonomic folding e-bike on the market for a very affordable price.

2020 March - Delivery our first batch of V-danci e-bikes to our great backers. 


Quick folding system



Fold your V-Danci and bring it wherever you go

Innovative Engineering

V-danci takes the folding e-bike category to new levels of stylistically pure design and engineering.

No visible bolts, everything is integrated forging.




We don't only use high end LED lamps for night time rides. 
V-danci also comes with reflective tires so you can feel more safe while riding at night.



V-danci comes with the very best LED lights on the market with a high illumination so you can have a clear path and visibility both your front and back lights.





One touch folding system makes it easy to fold and integrate into the bike.

Journey

V-danci is not just a e-bike it is also a lifestyle, the idea was to make it so portable that you can bring it almost whatever your journey takes you.




Smart foldable also very light



It's been a very long project but we are at the same time proud over what we have accomplished.

It took us exactly 325 days with more than 200 modifications before the team was happy with the result and the V-danci e-bike is ready to hit the market.



Specifications

 

Your contribution means everything for V-danci


There is very big reasons why we are on Indiegogo and presenting our new e-bike.
Your contribution is the only reason we can offer the V-danci lower then any other e-bike in this category.

One of our first priority was to make sure our e-bike production cost was to high so more people around the world could afford to have one.

Second reason is that we will get to know new people and maybe future business partners, the Indiegogo platform is a perfect way to connect with people from all over the world.

 


Team Vicci Danci


From left:
Product manager: Bill Jiang 
Designer:  Eric Yu
Founder & CEO: Yanhua Sun
R&D: Edward Zhang


Risks & Challenges

With a new product it always comes with risk and challenges, that is also why we did our job to perfection before releasing it to the market.

Pushing a new high technology product to the market is like shooting yourself in the foot, this is why we built a small batch and delivered it to few distribution partners to test and evaluate the V-danci e-Bike before hit the market.

This was our approach to protect our brand and also be sure that you as a backer will not be disappointed.

This campaign is powered by our partner Rumble Motors Inc

Thank you for the support and we can't wait to deliver the very first V-danci e-bike to you.

story:
We're the producers of Newer Lights, John Arnold & Warren Williams.  Two guys with a great product, and a dream to literally make the world a brighter place, one vehicle headlight at a time.  

Our patented product, NEWER LIGHTS, just might be the world's best & easiest at headlight restoration.  In less than 5-minutes….cloudy, foggy, oxidized headlights become crystal clear and sparkling again!  Thereby making nighttime driving MUCH SAFER.

We've had our product on the market since 2008 in limited distribution, mostly to commercial customers – auto detailers, repair shops and car dealerships.  Newer Lights has been in commercial use in 42 of the 50 states.

Our vision -- with your help -- is to mass-produce and market a consumer-sized version of our Newer Lights kit so folks can easily treat their own headlights at home.  It can improve a vehicle's nighttime illumination by as much as 75% in just a few minutes.  It's our patented Nano Solution that sets NEWER LIGHTS apart from the many headlight restoration products on the market today.

Each treatment is good for 6-to-12 months.  And, each kit, at a suggested retail cost of $19.99, will treat up to FOUR PAIRS of headlights – making it an outstanding consumer value!

  •  We have an aggressive marketing/promotional plan that we’ve begun to implement.  Including an innovative Facebook page that encourages ‘re-visits’ with new postings every day.
  • We have an informative, user-friendly website for our commercial version of NEWER LIGHTS.
  • We also have several informative and entertaining videos produced and posted to YouTube.  And, a series of 30-second spots ready to air on television in selected markets.

We're looking for the funding to create the infrastructure necessary to mass-produce our consumer kits at our facility in Dallas, Texas.  We're also ready to go with a multi-media advertising campaign through Los Angeles-based National Media Spots (NMS).  We need the money to make it happen.

Ultimately, we figure it'll take about $250,000 to begin the process of making NEWER LIGHTS the "next big thing" in consumer automotive products.

story:
ABOUT THE EVENTS:

Formula SAE (FSAE) is a student design competition organized by SAE International (Society of Automotive Engineers). Each student team designs, builds and tests a prototype race car based on a series of rules; whose purpose is both to ensure safety and promote clever problem solving.

SAE SUPRA INDIA is a similar event organized by SAE India but is limited to Indian universities.

FSAE promotes careers and excellence in engineering as it encompasses all aspects of the automotive industry including: research, design, manufacturing, testing, developing, marketing, management and finances. FSAE takes students out of the classroom and allows them to apply textbook theories to real world experiences.

ABOUT US:

Team Spark Racing is a student team representing the SAE (Society of Automotive Engineers) Collegiate Club of S.V.C.E. (Sri Venkateswara College of Engineering). Our team comprises of 25 student members in both Automobile and Mechanical Engineering from the junior and senior levels working towards building our first Formula style race car. We also have sufficient experience and support from faculty as our collegiate team has participated in the SAE BAJA event for the past 5 years.


OUR PROJECT AND THE CHALLENGES FACED:-
This year we are taking up a bigger challenge by participating in the SAE SUPRA INDIA 2015. We wish to take this challenge on to a global platform by also participating in the Formula SAE ITALY 2015.

This new task poses a significant challenge to us in terms of design and the costs associated with it.

1.  A 600cc Honda CBR engine is a monumental step-up from the 300cc Briggs and Stratton engine.

2.  Carbon fiber A-Arms will help further reduce 12 kilos.

3.  We are also the first team from India to use a turbocharger.

Also taking part in both these events is advantageous because:

·  The same vehicle is permitted to be used for both events.

·  Any issue in design or performance in the former event can be adjusted or improved before the latter event, which being more prestigious can enhance our exposure and reputation further.

USE OF FUNDS:

We are wholly self-funded and hence any form of contribution is useful.

All contributions go towards the project.

The most benefitting areas include:

·  Carbon fiber Impact Attenuator design

·  Turbocharger

·  Expenses involving logistics of the car to-and-from Italy.

THE IMPACT

Participation in these events is very beneficial to our educational progress and will also open more doors towards further advancement in our vehicle’s design.

We deeply apologize for not being able to give back to the contributors as of now since we are currently working on a shoestring budget.
