	green’ technology is now making good progress in the automotive
	industry, such a revolution has still lagged far behind in the marine
	world. “The industry has been caught by a circular argument.
	There’s been nothing that the customers can buy off the shelf –
	so they won't ask for it. At the same time, the big manufacturers
	are not offering greener solutions as there’s no queue of
	customers. The risk for manufacturers to offer such products is
	high. And frankly, there seems no need for them to change because
	their business works as is.” explains our founder, Dr Dennis
	Doerffel. We want to break through this vicious cycle that prevents
	the revolution of 'clean & green' technologies.


Why? Because someone should… and we can. Our partner in Venice states: “Cleaner technologies should be well established
by now. It is really overdue.”
What are we doing?


REAPsystems
are creating a clean drop-in hybrid diesel electric engine that can
be installed by any boat builder and fitted into all existing boats.
At this stage, we are starting with a Venice water taxi to demonstrate the technology. We
believe that this solution can address all the current challenges.


How does it work?



This hybrid
system uses the latest diesel engine technology paired with a
high-power, compact and efficient electric motor & inverter as well as a
modern lithium-ion battery and advanced system control unit.


This is a
parallel hybrid configuration, where both units – the diesel and
the electric - are connected to a conventional sterndrive. In the
city, the engine can be 'clutched out' to allow pure electric drive.
Here, at low speed and where it matters most, we will benefit from
all the advantages of the electric motor: no noise, no pollution, no
vibrations, no fuel consumption. During medium to high speed, the
diesel engine automatically and smoothly takes over. During diesel
operation, the electric motor works as a generator, recharging the
batteries and pushing the engine into a more efficient engine
loading. During fast transients of the diesel engine, the electric
motor may also assist in order to reduce exhaust emissions.


This photo
shows our founder, Dr Dennis Doerffel with the diesel engine and the
high power electric motor. This size of electric motor could power a whole pilot boat at more than 6 knots, which demonstrates the high power density and efficiency of electric machines.



Rendered images of the hybrid diesel electric engine to be installed in our original Venice water taxi.
How does it help?

Apart from the environmental benefits
mentioned above, we estimate an average fuel saving of at least 50%
if compared with current diesel engine boats. This is thanks to the
ultra efficient electric motor and clever control system.


The electric motor is very responsive, it
can operate down to zero rpm and change smoothly from forward to
reverse rotation. This gives the driver impressive manoeuvrability –
much better than what can be achieved with existing diesel engines.
It will allow a more controlled and safe operation in the confined
spaces of Venetian canals - all without gear changes.
As a drop-in and compact
solution the hybrid electric drive-train can be installed into existing diesel boats by any boat builder either as a replacement or
as an add-on to an existing diesel engine. There is virtually no
compromise on passenger or cargo carrying capabilities.
The diesel engine only
runs when high output is required. This is what they are designed
for. No need for long, inefficient and damaging idle operation. In
short, it will run less and better, increasing engine life, reducing
emissions and minimising maintenance. In fact, we believe that the
biggest saving for the operator will be in their cost of maintenance.
This is one of the points that we want to prove with the
demonstration in Venice.
The hybrid system
comprises two systems in one. Hence, the operator will benefit from
high reliability and peace of mind backup. If there is an issue with
the diesel system, it will be possible to get home with the electric
system or if there is any issue with the electric system then the
conventional and proven diesel system can be used.







Why not pure electric?

There has
been an unsuccessful project in Venice with a taxi boat and since
then, authorities are not keen on pure electrics. They fear they
would need a fleet of rescue vessels to tow stranded boats with empty
batteries. If the boat was pure electric, a single run to the airport
and back would require a battery capacity of 150 kWh. Such a large
battery is very costly. Additionally, they would need a network of
fast charging stations in order to support the 20 other runs to the
airport on the same day... So, in this case, one innovation (pure
electric boats) is not possible without the other (fast recharging
stations), making it hard to get off the ground.


We agree
that ultimately, if we want to be fully sustainable, we cannot rely
on oil at all. We will have to run our boats either on renewable
liquid fuels (e.g. ethanol) or on compressed gas or with high energy
density battery systems and a network of recharging stations or using
human power or wind.


However,
these technologies are currently not feasible for the marketplace (I
am happy to discuss this one...). We don't want to wait for the “big
decision” nobody wants to make. We want to start making changes now
instead of waiting for the “big idea”.  The marine industry is
very risk averse and resistant to change. So, any change in the
marine industry is difficult - continuous improvement has a better
chance. It is better to make a small change now that can reach many
instead of aiming for the big change that will take another 15 years.


Our hybrid
technology will get everyone started and thinking. The infrastructure
for our technology is fully developed and the acceptance is high. A
typical engine in a Venice water taxi has a short life and after
that it can be replaced with the next technological step. It is just
important that we get MANY people interested in sustainability NOW.
Our informative display and control system will change the drivers
perception and raise awareness. 

If you are
interested in more technical or philosophical discussions, please see
our perks. We have a few on offer that will allow you to meet our
team, see the technology in operation or discuss on the phone. Any
input welcome!


Why Venice?




The Grand Canal in Venice, Italy.



Big
Impact:
Venice,
a unique and irreplaceable UNESCO World Heritage City has 550 water
taxis and buses serving its tourist industry of 32 million visitors a
year, plus approximately 20,000 engine-driven private boats
circulating in the Venice lagoon for recreational purposes. Therefore Venice suffers from alarming levels of air and noise pollution, as
well as the vibration of these engines, all of which dramatically
effect the canal water, priceless city architecture and human health. With
REAPsystems' drop-in hybrid electric solution, the city, its
residents and visitors will benefit from clean air, clean water and a
quieter environment; its taxi operators will enjoy lower fuel
consumption, operating costs and overall cost of ownership plus
greater reliability and longer life without sacrificing performance;
drivers and their passengers will also enjoy the comfort of a hybrid
taxi boat with minimum noise, vibration and emissions.



A
'drop-in' Hybrid-drive system for easy installation in Venice's
existing water taxis means that the current fleet can be quickly and
easily converted by any boat builder to provide cleaner, greener
transport.


Great
Proving Ground:
One
of the reasons for the slow uptake of clean hybrid technologies in
the marine market is the high reliance on the reliability of the
engine. Also, the cost of training staff world-wide for maintenance,
repairs and operation for any new technology is significant. Venice
represents a tough testing ground to prove the reliability and
longevity of our hybrid solution. A standard 9 metre water taxi typically has a long, hard 20 hour day. There are many boats in a
very confined area, which means that the cost for training
maintenance staff can be limited.


Very
Suitable Scenario for Hybrid Technologies:
Hybrid
engines don't make sense for every scenario. Our parallel hybrid
engine is most suitable for varying operations that require low speed
or idle periods for extended lengths of time as well as high-speed
operation for some time. Venice needs both: quiet, low vibration, low
emission and good manoeuvrability at low speed inside the canals of
the city as well as fast taxi runs with several people on board to
the airport.


Setting
the Standard - Great Timing:
The
timing is perfect to influence the new regulation on boat emissions about to be imposed by Venice authorities. The
local authorities are currently working on new legislation concerning
pollution from water-borne traffic. We hope that with our
Hybrid-drive demonstrator operating in the lagoon, proving its
environmental benefits, together with our partner in Venice, we can
influence the legislation to favour the uptake of this green
technology and set the standards. 



What are our aims?




Our
short-term aim is to develop a hybrid electric taxi-boat prototype
that will be demonstrated and endurance tested in Venice this year,
then to influence the new regulation on vehicle emissions to be
imposed by the local authority.


Following
this, we will get the hybrid engine into production and roll-it out
to Venice and other places. Then, we will develop variants of this
technology. So that we can cover a wide range of applications and
crafts. In order to achieve this, we will work with our partners and
with existing manufacturers of engines. Other applications include
work-boats such as wind farm support vessels, patrol craft, small
passenger ferries and fishing boats, survey vessels and private
tenders.




Who are REAPsystems?



REAPsystems
are a UK-based independent specialist in advanced propulsion systems
with 13 years experience in supporting many customers worldwide in the
electric vehicle, energy storage and other markets.  



The REAPsystems team.
Back in
2001, the founder was the first in Europe to test large format li-ion
batteries, recognise their potential and publish the results. As part
of his PhD, he developed a concept 250mpg plug-in hybrid electric
car. In 2003, REAPsystems was founded with the purpose to make
cleaner and greener technologies a reality. Many customer projects
and student teams have been supplied with REAPsystems' Li-ion
battery electronics and systems. In 2013 we developed a small fully
electric tender that can plane at around 15 knots. Some other
examples of our work include fast Electric Boats by Heistracher,
Hybrid Bus in South Korea, Electric & Hybrid Swimmer Delivery
Vehicles, Solar Cars, and more.
Find out more and visit our website
www.reapsystems.co.uk.


What do others think about this project?

Please watch
what some of our partners say about this project.





Professor Suleiman Sharkh, Head of Mechatronics, University of Southampton.




Patrick Byrne, Owner and Managing Director, Scorpion RIBs Ltd.



What's happening when?
January
2016: Received a grant of €10,000 from LoToNo UK (Low Carbon Economy). Gathered info, identified options for components, sketches.

February
2016: Acquired a
genuine 9m Venice water taxi, refurbished and towed to Southampton. Decision about components and battery voltage.
Ordered major components.Our genuine 9m Venice water taxi.

March - May
2016: Designed all custom parts.

June - July 2016:
Battery specification, design and assembly. Preparation of boat.
Control systems and software development. 









The 40 kW, 12 kg powerful but lightweight electric motor during testing.

August 2016:
Assembly of engine and modules, bench testing.  Assembly into the
taxi boat prototype. Commissioning. 

September - October 2016:
Launch and sea trials in Southampton followed by launch in Venice.

October -
November 2016: Demonstration and endurance testing in Venice.

November -
December 2016: Collecting feedback from taxi drivers, visitors,
guests, boat builders and local authorities in Venice. The boat will
come back to Southampton for strip-down analysis, improvements and
further testing. Data analysis and review.

2017:
Production & roll-out of the hybrid engine. Development of
variants, preparation to roll-out into other areas and markets.

Project
progress is regularly updated in our project blog and social media.
Connect and sign up to stay informed!

Why do we need your help?



Banks would
never finance such a risky investment. Even for investors, the risk
is too high for the potential gain. The margins for manufacturers in
the marine market are relatively low compared with the risk and
investment of innovation. 
So far we
have been putting our own money into the project.  However, we are a
small business and without your help we cannot afford to focus on
Project Venice and put the required resources in. We need your
support to boost this project. We want to kickstart this technology
now - it is overdue!



We want to
involve the public - get people interested and excited about this
technology and demonstrate how it can help our environment and health
as well as reducing our oil dependency. “Our crowdfunding campaign
is a complete reversal of the usual commercial approach. We involve
the public on our journey. This way we can kickstart the hybrid
revolution together.” says our founder, Dr Doerffel.




Of course,
we do not expect your support for nothing. We have great rewards (“perks” just doesn't sound right here) for you!
Please share
this with as many people as possible. That would be of great
help. Thank you so much!

Our pitch video in animation version.



What do we spend the money on?




Hybrid
drivetrain components and parts: £60,000


The boat:
£25,000


Trailer,
transportation and mooring: £13,000


Labour and
subcontract: £55,000


Rewards:
£20,000Total:
£173,000















The project
to create a hybrid electric taxi boat prototype costs us at least
£173,000. Our fund-raising goal is £100,000. However we have the
ambition to overshoot that target. In case we can excite many people
about this project and overshoot our target significantly, we have
electrifying stretch goals. Stretch goals to be revealed soon – a
lot can be accomplished!

How can you help us?

Help us
	spread the word to your family, friends and anyone you know. Don't be a dinosaur. Together we can make a difference!
Donate
	to our project. Help fund the future and select from a range of great rewards!
Become our sponsor and benefit from a unique PR opportunity we are offering. Please see the Sponsor Kit for our sponsorship packages.
Follow
	us on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, our project blog and subscribe
	to our newsletter. This will keep us motivated!



Our project in the press:

A report by That's Solent TV about Project Venice in April 2016. It then featured in a BBC programme of the best of local TV.
Find out more about Project Venice in the press.
More about our Great Perks
Unique Venice Experience



Certosa island - a 'tranquil haven within busy Venice' .

You'll be offered a voucher for a 2-night Venice experience. You will stay on Certosa, a tranquil green island that is only 10-15 mins away from the heart of Venice by water taxi. This is an ideal place for those wanting a holiday in contact with nature while still conveniently enjoying cultural visits to other islands and sport activities such as sailing and kayaking to discover the charming lagoon.
The voucher includes:



2 nights in the only hotel on exclusive Certosa island


breakfasts 


dinner on the day of arrival 


2x water transits between Venice airport and Certosa island with our hybrid taxi boat


a special themed tour with our hybrid taxi boat


There are a selection of themes to choose from, e.g. City of Venice, Charming Islands, Historic & Defence. The theme will be agreed with the group of participating guests (fellow supporters) and the tour will take 4 hours with a tour guide. 
The Romantic theme tour is exclusive for two. It will take 3 hours; you can choose the route and timing for this tour upon arrival. There will be no tour guide.
Please note:



We will send you a voucher code within about one week of your donation. After that you can start arranging the trip with our partner in Venice.


Vouchers are valid from 1st Sep 2016 till 31st Oct 2016 & 1st Feb 2017 till
31st Oct 2017. 


Vouchers valid for weekends only (arriving on Friday & leaving on Sunday) although you're welcome to stay longer - please make such bookings directly with the hotel.

Your travel to and from Venice airport is not included in the voucher.



Venice Certosa Hotel.

story:
We are a very small family business in southern Germany. In fact we are just a family with a big goal.  For over ten years my dad has been working on this project and now the time has come to finally make it public. As mentioned before the project is about a motor he developed. This is the third prototype and it is finally ready to be published. Everything you see here is made by us. The Motor, this campaign, the video etc.  This product is not the average fancy Indiegogo lifestyle product, but it has the potential to change the world.

 

A lot of thinking and hard work has been put into this device but it was all worth it.
But why? This is the first question that would come to my mind if I were to read such a sentence.

Let me explain:
It is no secret that our environment is treated like the garbage it is filled with. This may seem drastic but it is true. For every new technology that could make the world a better place there is a new problem. For example the transportation of already produced renewable energy; one of the biggest issues with the energy sources.

 


Imagine that you could save energy very easily within your home.
Now imagine everybody could do that. The impact this would have is incredible.

The Zired-Motor is the solution. It has many uses but the most important one is the ability to convert electricity  into mechanical energy and vice versa. You do not even have to change something about its construction. For example  with a tank of air (or water) you can save all the energy that you overproduce. You may say that you could do the same with a pump and turbine but the Zired-Motor is more efficient, almost silent (especially in comparison to a water pump) and a lot smaller.

You may ask: How (does it work)?

This is the only question that we cannot answer. The only thing we can say is, that it is a rotor-based system. Also a reason why we cannot show you its composition.



Why are we on Indiegogo?

The time of going into production has come. Our goal is $ 1,000,000   to rent a production hall and start building the Zired-Motor and all byproducts (i.e. energy storage device). This includes hiring 2-3 workers, renting machines/tools and buying materials. Optimetron will be changed to a joint-stock company. All this will happen in southern Germany. We have a great infrastructure for the tech-industry but it is expensive as well. If we do not reach the goal, we will use the money to attract other investors/banks. We will post daily updates on what is happening on our Twitter/Facebook. Transparency is very important to us.

https://twitter.com/Optimetr0n
https://www.facebook.com/Optimetron/
http://www.optimetron.com

*Update (10/16/2016):
After some consideration we decided to make our $5000 and $10,000 more attractive. Depending on your location (within Europe) you can choose between the company shares and a energy storage unit for your renewable energy plant.
This means we will build a completly functioning  unit into your house. Take a look at this mockup of the final product:



About us:

Dimitris Zired

The tech-mastermind. With a strong background in electrical engineering and computer technology he managed to build up a broad knowledge of many different fields of work. Software developer by day, inventor by night/weekend. He developed the motor over  many years while still working his job.

Kamelia Zired

His wife and love of his life. She is helping in any way she can, mostly through keeping up the high spirits and doing anything non-tech related, so we can work on the project.

Timoleon Zired

I am the text & video editor, social media manager and maker of this campaign. I took part in developing and building the prototypes but I was only a small cog in this project.


Thank you for reading. If you want to help in a different way just share this with your friends and family. Every help we can get is greatly appreciated.

Auf Wiedersehen
Your Optimetron Crew

story:
Back the Game Changer:

 

 

Introducing

The VEGAN, the World’s First Light Weight Multipurpose Hybrid

Electric Self-Charging, Solar Tricycle 

 

 

With Stylish Looks

 

 

Designed from the Ground Up

 

We set out to design & create the world's lightest weight multipurpose electric & solar-powered tricycle, made from lightweight fiberglass & aluminum, which also recharges as it moves, for a maximum range of 120 km per charge. A key factor was designing & building the extremely durable lightweight reinforced aluminum (6061-T6) chassis that weighs under = 31 Kg and a reinforced fiberglass body with carbon fiber ribs that weighs under = 23 kg. As even the lightest steel is typically 2.5 times heavier than aluminum. That’s our secret weapon along with the other innovative design concepts in the VEGAN Electric Self-Charging Solar Tricycle.

It typically has a range of 90 to 95km on one charge (on batteries alone, without solar assistance and self-charging), but with self-charging and solar, we increased the range to 120 km +, and can carry a fully charged battery to be swapped to double the range to over 240 km.

It is the lowest weight multipurpose tricycle ever designed; with a high strength threshold and a lowered production cost which results in better efficiency & of course, affordability. It is roomier and can also carry up to 4 passengers depending on their size, and the back seats can also be folded away to make way for a large loading space, it can basically be converted into a minicab.

Operates on 100% solar power or electricity from the national electricity grid & self-charges as it moves. We use a simplistic cost-effective design & materials to come up with a stylish looking aerodynamic, high-efficiency vehicle with a minimum unit cost of only $1400 when we manufacture the windows, frame & body in bulk, but currently, it costs $3,393.70 to make. Once we fabricate our windows & cast the fiberglass body, our cost goes down almost 49%, to $1401,  Tricycles will be available to backers for that price, only through Indiegogo. After that, the price will be no less than $3500 per tricycle, which is still an unbelievable bargain.

Its simplistic engineering design is low maintenance due to having a minimalized drive train as the hub motor is directly attached to the rear wheel. Producing an average speed of 30 km/h & an amazing top speed of 70 km/h -- by increased acceleration through our own designed internal gear hub -- and of course has zero carbon emissions.

It is also easier to drive due to its dual front tires & there is no need for licenses or registration in most municipalities. Competitors use a one-piece body, that is made of heavy material that directly affects efficiency, and they are not solar & self-charging, but ours is.

Equipped with a built-in GPS tracking system & has high-end safety features, including a 12V AC outlet for your gadgets such as Bluetooth speakers & charging your phone.

Has a fully concealed cabin for protection from all the external elements, so you can get out & enjoy a ride in any weather.

 

 

Why Back the Vegan

 

  Max Speed

  70 km/h

  Range

  90-95 Km per charge without self-   charging or solar power assist, "with" the range is 120 km+

  Motor

  1000 Watt (Bush-less Hub Motor)/ Also   500 Watt Pedal Assist Version Coming   Soon

  Passenger Capacity

  3 or 4 (Depending on Size)

  Charging Source

  National Electricty Grid, Solar Panel &   Self-Charging

  Use

  Passengers or Cargo

  Total Weight

  Only 175 kg

  Payload

  320+ kg

  Charging Time

  From Electrical Grid 4.4 hrs. - From Solar Panel 10.2 hrs.

  Battery

  48 Volts, 22 Ah

  Solar Panel

  120 Watts

 

•    Let’s face it, we all like safety, comfort, performance & affordability; with The VEGAN Tricycle, you have all four in one exciting package.
•    We came up with the lowest weight multipurpose tricycle ever designed; for better performance which has a higher strength threshold & a lower production cost and weight, 
•    Is solar panel equipped & self-charges as it moves
•    Emits zero carbon emissions. 
•    Operates on either solar power or electricity from the national electricity grid & self-charges.
•    A high-efficiency vehicle with a minimum unit cost of only $1400 to produce—the price of an average mountain bike -- once we reach our funding goal.
•    120 km range per charge, with swappable battery, doubling the range to 240 km
•    Total weight without extra battery, only 120 km.
•    Payload 300 kg.
•    Stylish Looks & Aerodynamic Shape
•    Built-in GPS Tracking System
•    Internal 12V outlet for Bluetooth speakers & charging phones.
•    Easier to drive due to its dual front tires.
•    No need for licenses or registration in most municipalities.
•    High-end safety features.
•    Comfortable, Safe, Affordable & Fast

 

We designed the VEGAN Hybrid Electric Self-Charging Solar Tricycle to be the game-changer that it is.

 


 

Why is Our Production Cost So Low?

 

Because we will be producing it in the heart of the different manufacturing hubs in Pakistan, where fabricated components of the originals are of superior quality, notoriously cheap & easy to make. It is a logistics nightmare that not many people can pull off, but we have done our due diligence research & already know the producers of a lot of similar components & mechanical spare parts. If we chose, we could have opted to use "All" original components but the production cost of the tricycle would be significantly higher. We are not just trying to make a functioning reliable vehicle & profits, but are trying to revolutionize the market by producing a just as high quality -- if not better, tricycle, at a stupendously reduced cost, and once our prototype is finished, have our doors crashing down with pre-orders.

 

 

Who We Are

 

We are an honest bunch of visionaries; a mechatronics engineer & two vocational technicians & an educator, who are completely transparent in that we only have the completed conceptual designs so far. We have been working on tricycles for years & specialize in the fields of mechatronics, fiberglass & aluminum fabrication. We just need to build a few functioning prototypes to show the world what a game-changer this is.

All manufacturing will take place in Pakistan where raw materials are of the highest quality & very affordable, and select workmanship is more than excellent.

 

 

Our Mission

 

A vegan tricycle in every home, every shop & 100's more in every bustling city & suburb.

Manufacturing as many tricycles as possible, hence getting the manufacturing price down as low as we can get it, so everyone can enjoy a Vegan tricycle. We aim to bring the cost down an extra $450 by mass-producing its components.

 

Our Immediate Goal - Stage 1.0

Build Our First Working Prototype for $3,393.70

 

Our main cost now is for the fabrication of the windows, casting, molding & die of the stylish fiberglass body. After we have that, we are good to go, as all other components like our lightweight frame are fabricated in our workshop & the rest can be bought from the local market or select online shops.

Our immediate goal is to get the first prototype built, then build five (5) subsequent fully functioning tricycles at a cost of just $1400 each, which equals $7000, plus we need $2000 for logistics, then continue to CrowdFund for “GUARANTEED PRE- ORDER DELIVERIES.”

$3,393.70 (prototype) + $5,600 (5 subsequent tricyles) + $2,000 (logistics) = USD $12,393.70 (Our Funding Goal)

If we hit our funding goal for this campaign then the first 5 backers who donate $1400 will automatically be contacted to make shipping arrangements for shipping their new tricycle by Feb. 2021.

We Know its Ridiculously Cheap & There Probably Are Some Skeptics

So let us break it down for you:

 

The cost of our first prototype is as follows:

               Part Name

                    Cost  

                 Source

1

  Frame   Structure

   85.00 USD

   Fabricated in Workshop

  Lesser Cost After First Time   Fabrication Costs

 

Our Stretch Goal - Stage 1.2

To produce 50 VEGAN Tricycles at a cost of $45,000 by getting the price down even further, to $900, as low as it can get, and continue to keep the Vegan tricycle, the world's best value tricycle, selling at only USD$3,500, outside of Indiegogo.

We will also invest in more R&D & improving future models, such as adding the option of having an AC, etc. We are not opting for this the first time around as we are specifically concentrating on range, weight & battery life as well as price, in order to break all records.

 

Technical Specs for Us Geeks & Pics of Our Components

 

Solar Panel

 

 

Battery

Battery Specs

  • Battery Capacity = 88AH

  • Battery Type = AGM

  • Battery Type = Lithium Battery

  • Charger Capacity = 22amp

  • Charging Time of 100% of the battery on the charger is = 4.4 hrs

  • Charging Time of solar panel only is = 10 Hrs

  • The batteries used in the vehicle are rechargeable VRLA batteries (valve-regulated lead-acid batteries). They are also known as gel sealed batteries or maintenance-free batteries.

 

Frame & Body

 

  • Weight of fiberglass body = 22 kg approximately

  • Thickness = 5mm

  • Warranty = 4 years

 

  • Weight of frame/chassis = 30 kg approxiamtely

  • Warranty = 2 years

 

Frame

The frame -- is our secret weapon to be shared with the world -- as it is extremely sturdy, light & durable made from (Al 6061-T6) aluminum & is very reasonably priced throughout Asia, where we will be manufacturing.

         

 

 

 

Body

Fiberglass Casting, molding & dieing

 

Fabricating the Windows

At Autoglass plant (expensive, but not if we order bulk)

 

Steering

 

The steering is ready & purchased commercialy, but we plan to fabricate our own design in the future, once we get the ball rolling, to decrease costs even further.

 

 Minimized Transmission System

 

BLDC Electric HUB Motor & Controller

 

 

 

  • We use a HUB motor that is assembled on the rear tire and will directly control movement, so there is no need for a transmission.

  • The tire transmits power to the alternator by a chain and sprocket system directly, directly recharging the battery.

  • We will use our own designed modified generic Shimano-like 5 speed internal hub to control the speed, increasing it from 55  km/h to 70 km/h. We have tested it on similar weight tricycles & have reached this speed succesfully.

 

 We didn't mess much with the controller as it has proven to work well.

 

Alternator & Sprocket

 

This idea has already been implemented but with our combination of low weight & high capacity battery, we are able to extend the life of each charge by roughly 25%. With our recharging technology we have increased the range by 42%.

 

Suspension

 

Rear               

Front

 

             

We only use top of the line & the best suspension options on the market.

 

Rims

 

Wipers

Mirrors

Seats

 

​

 

Our Sexy Vegan Porn

(Our Final Product)

 

 

Cost & Warranty

 

The cost of a single unit will only be = $USD1400 once we raise $USD 3,393.70 in funding to create our first prototype which includes the major cost of fabricating of windows & the casting of the fiberglass body., then proceed with full production. 

 

   The warranty of the fiberglass body is 4 years.

   The warranty of the battery is 1 year.

   The Warranty of frame & all mechanical components is 2 years

   The Warranty of solar panel is 20 years

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Risk

  1. If we do not reach our funding goal, or at least USD$4,747; USD$ 2,747 for parts & USD$2,000 for logistics, then we will not be able to produce our first prototype & if we do not reach our final goal then we will not be able to produce all 5 subsequent prototypes at a cost of only $1,400 each.

Challenge

  1.  Keeping the price down, as lesser value & quality competitors already sell for over double the price for USD$4000. If we control sales, we promise not to cave into corporate greed & will keep the basic model version of The VEGAN Tricycle at a maximum price of $3500, for one year, after this crowdfunding campaign.

 

Join Our Referral Contest

​Through your Indiegogo dashboard, you can share & refer our camaign & we will choose the 2 backers who refer the highest number of backers, equal to or exceeding $2000 to receive a Free Vegan Hybrid Electric Self-Charging Solar Tricycle each, (not including shipping). Make sure you are signed into your Indiegogo account & use the share tools for analytics to track your referal contributions. We will update you weekly on the top referers.

 

So Help Bring the Vegan Hybrid Electric, Self-Charging Solar Tricycle to the World, NOW!

 

Every Contribution Means the World to Us in Bringing the World this Fun & Safe Clean Enegy Alternative for Everyday Transportation

 

*Special Thanks to:

All Our Backers & EV Enthusiasts throughout the World ...

If anyone has any questions, they can reach us at: the.vegan.hesst@gmail.com
story_txt:
Back the Game Changer:  IntroducingThe VEGAN, the World’s First Light Weight Multipurpose HybridElectric Self-Charging, Solar Tricycle   With Stylish Looks
 
 
Designed from the Ground Up
 
We set out to design & create the world's lightest weight multipurpose electric & solar-powered tricycle, made from lightweight fiberglass & aluminum, which also recharges as it moves, for a maximum range of 120 km per charge. A key factor was designing & building the extremely durable lightweight reinforced aluminum (6061-T6) chassis that weighs under = 31 Kg and a reinforced fiberglass body with carbon fiber ribs that weighs under = 23 kg. As even the lightest steel is typically 2.5 times heavier than aluminum. That’s our secret weapon along with the other innovative design concepts in the VEGAN Electric Self-Charging Solar Tricycle.It typically has a range of 90 to 95km on one charge (on batteries alone, without solar assistance and self-charging), but with self-charging and solar, we increased the range to 120 km +, and can carry a fully charged battery to be swapped to double the range to over 240 km.It is the lowest weight multipurpose tricycle ever designed; with a high strength threshold and a lowered production cost which results in better efficiency & of course, affordability. It is roomier and can also carry up to 4 passengers depending on their size, and the back seats can also be folded away to make way for a large loading space, it can basically be converted into a minicab.Operates on 100% solar power or electricity from the national electricity grid & self-charges as it moves. We use a simplistic cost-effective design & materials to come up with a stylish looking aerodynamic, high-efficiency vehicle with a minimum unit cost of only $1400 when we manufacture the windows, frame & body in bulk, but currently, it costs $3,393.70 to make. Once we fabricate our windows & cast the fiberglass body, our cost goes down almost 49%, to $1401,  Tricycles will be available to backers for that price, only through Indiegogo. After that, the price will be no less than $3500 per tricycle, which is still an unbelievable bargain.Its simplistic engineering design is low maintenance due to having a minimalized drive train as the hub motor is directly attached to the rear wheel. Producing an average speed of 30 km/h & an amazing top speed of 70 km/h -- by increased acceleration through our own designed internal gear hub -- and of course has zero carbon emissions.It is also easier to drive due to its dual front tires & there is no need for licenses or registration in most municipalities. Competitors use a one-piece body, that is made of heavy material that directly affects efficiency, and they are not solar & self-charging, but ours is.Equipped with a built-in GPS tracking system & has high-end safety features, including a 12V AC outlet for your gadgets such as Bluetooth speakers & charging your phone.Has a fully concealed cabin for protection from all the external elements, so you can get out & enjoy a ride in any weather.  Why Back the Vegan 

  Max Speed
  70 km/h


  Range
  90-95 Km per charge without self-   charging or solar power assist, "with" the range is 120 km+


  Motor 
  1000 Watt (Bush-less Hub Motor)/ Also   500 Watt Pedal Assist Version Coming   Soon


  Passenger Capacity
  3 or 4 (Depending on Size)


  Charging Source
  National Electricty Grid, Solar Panel &   Self-Charging


  Use
  Passengers or Cargo


  Total Weight
  Only 175 kg


  Payload
  320+ kg


  Charging Time
  From Electrical Grid 4.4 hrs. - From Solar Panel 10.2 hrs.


  Battery 
  48 Volts, 22 Ah


  Solar Panel
  120 Watts

 •    Let’s face it, we all like safety, comfort, performance & affordability; with The VEGAN Tricycle, you have all four in one exciting package.•    We came up with the lowest weight multipurpose tricycle ever designed; for better performance which has a higher strength threshold & a lower production cost and weight, •    Is solar panel equipped & self-charges as it moves•    Emits zero carbon emissions. •    Operates on either solar power or electricity from the national electricity grid & self-charges.•    A high-efficiency vehicle with a minimum unit cost of only $1400 to produce—the price of an average mountain bike -- once we reach our funding goal.•    120 km range per charge, with swappable battery, doubling the range to 240 km•    Total weight without extra battery, only 120 km.•    Payload 300 kg.•    Stylish Looks & Aerodynamic Shape•    Built-in GPS Tracking System•    Internal 12V outlet for Bluetooth speakers & charging phones.•    Easier to drive due to its dual front tires.•    No need for licenses or registration in most municipalities.•    High-end safety features.•    Comfortable, Safe, Affordable & Fast We designed the VEGAN Hybrid Electric Self-Charging Solar Tricycle to be the game-changer that it is.  Why is Our Production Cost So Low? Because we will be producing it in the heart of the different manufacturing hubs in Pakistan, where fabricated components of the originals are of superior quality, notoriously cheap & easy to make. It is a logistics nightmare that not many people can pull off, but we have done our due diligence research & already know the producers of a lot of similar components & mechanical spare parts. If we chose, we could have opted to use "All" original components but the production cost of the tricycle would be significantly higher. We are not just trying to make a functioning reliable vehicle & profits, but are trying to revolutionize the market by producing a just as high quality -- if not better, tricycle, at a stupendously reduced cost, and once our prototype is finished, have our doors crashing down with pre-orders.  Who We Are We are an honest bunch of visionaries; a mechatronics engineer & two vocational technicians & an educator, who are completely transparent in that we only have the completed conceptual designs so far. We have been working on tricycles for years & specialize in the fields of mechatronics, fiberglass & aluminum fabrication. We just need to build a few functioning prototypes to show the world what a game-changer this is.All manufacturing will take place in Pakistan where raw materials are of the highest quality & very affordable, and select workmanship is more than excellent.  Our Mission  A vegan tricycle in every home, every shop & 100's more in every bustling city & suburb.Manufacturing as many tricycles as possible, hence getting the manufacturing price down as low as we can get it, so everyone can enjoy a Vegan tricycle. We aim to bring the cost down an extra $450 by mass-producing its components. Our Immediate Goal - Stage 1.0Build Our First Working Prototype for $3,393.70 Our main cost now is for the fabrication of the windows, casting, molding & die of the stylish fiberglass body. After we have that, we are good to go, as all other components like our lightweight frame are fabricated in our workshop & the rest can be bought from the local market or select online shops.Our immediate goal is to get the first prototype built, then build five (5) subsequent fully functioning tricycles at a cost of just $1400 each, which equals $7000, plus we need $2000 for logistics, then continue to CrowdFund for “GUARANTEED PRE- ORDER DELIVERIES.”$3,393.70 (prototype) + $5,600 (5 subsequent tricyles) + $2,000 (logistics) = USD $12,393.70 (Our Funding Goal)If we hit our funding goal for this campaign then the first 5 backers who donate $1400 will automatically be contacted to make shipping arrangements for shipping their new tricycle by Feb. 2021.We Know its Ridiculously Cheap & There Probably Are Some SkepticsSo let us break it down for you: The cost of our first prototype is as follows:

story:
The Ninebot Gokart PRO reaches new levels of performance after two years and more than 20,000 miles of racetrack testing, resulting in improved steering response and overall durability.

Redesigned from the foundation up, the Gokart PRO is a completely reimagined version of its predecessor, the Ninebot Gokart.  Prepare for a whole new level of go-kart performance with the Ninebot Gokart PRO.

The Gokart PRO elevates your riding experience with a whopping 23 mph top speed. Get ready to drive like the wind.

As shown in the graph below, the Ninebot Gokart PRO has a maximum acceleration of 1.02 G, which is almost 1.5 times higher than the previous Ninebot Gokart.

The Gokart PRO outperforms a 150cc gas-powered go-kart on tracks with its acceleration.

The Gokart PRO is equipped with two wheel hub motors producing 4,800W maximum engine power output and 96Nm maximum torque. This allows the Ninebot Gokart PRO to sprint from 0 to 23 mph within seconds.

The Segway-Ninebot app allows you to pre-program your drifting experience depending on your own style or the site condition since the two wheel hub motors are connected separately to each rear tire.

Therefore, the Drifting Assistant System can control two motors to provide different power outputs for each rear tire as it drifts, helping the driver to adjust the drifting dynamic in any circumstance. So you can drift like a pro in no time.

Get ready to experience go-karting like never before with power oversteer drifting. The rear tires lose traction when turning, resulting in a faster speed cut-corner and dynamic drift. Suitable for both beginners and professionals. 

Gokart PRO features a remarkable mechanical braking effect  take drifting to the next level. Lifting the handbrake while turning is another way to achieve drifting.

Additionally, in the unlikely event that the electric brake fails, the handbrake can be used to stop the vehicle quickly.

Don’t forget to release the handbrake otherwise, the Gokart PRO will stop instead of a smooth drift.

The cutting-edge TPE rear tires bring users the most exciting drifting experience ever. The controllable rear-end and high-speed cornering make it easier to show off drifting techniques like a professional racer.

The Gokart PRO has an RR design; the rear engine and the rear-wheel-drive are set up like supercars. The weight distribution is designed with 40% front and 60% rear.

The Gokart PRO comes with a high-strength steel frame that can carry a payload of up to 220 lbs and reduces chassis flex during high-performance driving.

The front end of the Gokart features three layers of TPE impact protection to increase the safety of the rider and the whole body is IP54 water-resistant. Additional features such as TPE sides, aerodynamic rear wing, and metal pedals are included to up your Go-karting game.

Triple Front Protection

Inner layer: Steel frame can protect the body to maintain the shape.

Middle layer: High polymer material can effectively absorb the energy from high collision impacts.

Outer layer: TPE front lip can reduce the damage during a collision.

Four 8W high-power speakers on the Gokart PRO simulate engine sounds of single-cylinder, two-cylinder, V8, or V12 engines to create a more immersive Go karting experience.

The speaker can also be used as a normal Bluetooth speaker to play the rider’s choice of music.

Suitable for beginners and professionals, everyone can enjoy the ride.

The Segway Ninebot app allows you to control four driving modes, adjust the drifting assistant level, control the light effect, and much more.

Select the mode you prefer for safety or energy saving.

You can turn on/off the Drifting Assistant System via the Segway Ninebot App. You can also set the drifting assistant level from the control panel after you turn it on, which can be moved from -20 to + 100.

●When the number is neutral, there is no power output difference between the inner rear wheel and outer rear wheel. (In this situation, it is recommended to turn off the vehicle.)

●When the number is negative, it is suitable for slippery site conditions. and reduces oversteer.

●When the number is positive, it is easier to perform drifting and it can boost the oversteer.

The Gokart PRO battery is a powerhouse, clocking in with a capacity of 432 Wh, featuring 4 air-ducts and 15.5 miles of range.

With 15% hill grade ascent capability, it allows riders to climb the hills with ease. Additionally, the automatic holding system can prevent slipping when the Gokart PRO is parked on a slope.

Double tap on the brake pedal to switch into the reverse gear and to drive backward.

The Gokart PRO is designed with an adjustable frame and steering wheel to fit riders between 4’5” to 6’3”. The high-strength frame can carry 220 lbs of maximum payload and its high torsional stiffness effectively withstands impacts from the road.

Recommend Age: 14+

The Ninebot Gokart PRO is collapsible to fit into most vehicle trunks, allowing you to take it wherever you want to go.

The Gokart PRO has a power unit that's from our newest Ninebot self-balancing transporter.

Segway-Ninebot is a global leader in the field of intelligent short-distance transportation and service robots. The company’s businesses are international, selling products in more than 80 countries and regions. With world-renowned intellectual property, Segway-Ninebot aims to lead the users and the entire industry into the future.

story:
Don't miss this chance to save $2,000 on a YikeBike - the revolutionary fully electric and foldable bike that makes it super easy for you to get around your city and have fun while doing so!

The YikeBike is ideally suited for getting to and from public transport as well as a fun way to travel to your favourite local café on the weekends.


Following user testing and market validation with our earlier models, we have created the next evolution of the YikeBike - the Model V and the Model C. 

We have forged new territory when it comes to personal transport, offering the most compact fully electric bike available. The revolutionary folding and compact drive train (the components that deliver power for those of us without much tech speak) offers a unique value proposition.

We need your help to spread the word so we can get penetration in our key markets.


The YikeBike is also a great way to grab people’s attention. Add a bit of branding to the YikeBike and it’s a great way to market a new product or service.

You can be assured the YikeBike is genuinely innovative and award-winning. It's even made it into the World Guinness Book of Records for being the most compact electric folding bike, as well as one of the top 50 inventions of the year in Time magazine. Here’s some images of just a few of the awards and write-ups the YikeBike has received:


The model V is constructed of hydroformed aluminium and composite reinforced polymer. The model V is slightly lower than the model C, and comes with both a 2 and 3 wheel configuration. The 3 wheel option makes it super easy for first time riders to get started and can also be an ideal option as a fun alternative to a mobility scooter for adventurous seniors.

It's simple to switch over between the 2 and 3 wheel option, using a single screw and tools that are supplied. 

           Recommended Retail Price USD$4995 (excluding govt taxes and duty)

The model C is our prestigious premium product. Meticulous material preparation and finishing delivers the ultimate in bragging rights. High-tech carbon-fiber construction materials and hand finishing means there are only a limited number of model C’s available to the discerning buyer.

The model C is the lightest and most rigid YikeBike we can offer, with carbon fiber - Frame, Rear Leg, Front Wheel and Handlebar assembly. We are using the latest Panasonic Lithium Ion batteries offering a range of 20km and regenerative braking.

Please note, the model C is only available with the 2 wheel configuration, and is best suited if you are at least 5'4"/162cm in height. Any shorter and you are best to use the model V instead to ensure you can reach the ground while seated on our YikeBike.

           Recommended Retail Price USD$7995 (excluding govt taxes and duty)

Resellers Wanted  

We are actively looking to expand our network of authorised YikeBike resellers. If this is something that interests you, then please select the 5 YikeBike (resellers pack) perk. As well as 5 YikeBike's at a very special introductory reseller price, you will also receive a variety of high-quality printed promotional material and a three month listing as an authorised reseller on www.yikebike.com.

This special intro reseller pack will give you the opportunity to test and validate the YikeBike opportunity in your region without having to commit to a long-term commercial contract. 


Freight  

We will airfreight your new YikeBike directly to you under the standard shipping terms DAP (Delivered at Place). All costs to get the YikeBike to you will be covered by us except for any VAT, customs duties and import taxes. If there are any charges owing, a local customs representative will be in contact to arrange payment. Once this payment has been received, the YikeBike will be released and delivered to your specified address. Please note, for entry into USA, you may be required by your local customs representative, to provide your IRS number before your YikeBike will be released.

We have included the freight within the perk price so we can ensure that your delivery gets to you (anywhere in the world) within 7 days of dispatch. We will keep you informed of the delivery process and location of your YikeBike at all times. 

Regulation

It is your personal responsibility to check that the use of the YikeBike conforms with the laws and regulations in your country. We have been working with government bodies to ensure the YikeBike can join the cyclists and road users and we are leading the way in making light weight, fully electric vehicles commonplace in every city. 

Battery

There are important regulations with respect to the transportation of items containing Lithium Batteries. You will need to observe these when you own a YikeBike. 

Ordering through Indiegogo

YikeBikes can be fully customised to ensure your personality is reflected - with 2 models and 4 colour options, we have 7 options to choose from. With only limited quantities being made available at the special price, pre-ordering through Indiegogo is the only way that you can guarantee access to these special prices.

See www.yikebike.com/contact-us for up to date terms and conditions as well as safety information when riding a YikeBike.

Anyone purchasing a YikeBike on Indiegogo are deemed to have read, understood and agreed to the YikeBike International Terms of Trade as displayed on the YikeBike website at www.yikebike.com/contact-us. You acknowledge that your contractual rights are limited to these Terms of Trade and that by purchasing YikeBike Goods via Indiegogo these terms are binding and form the Contract between the parties. If you do not agree to these Trade Terms then you must not purchase YikeBike Goods on this www.indiegogo.com website.



  • What is different between model V and model C ?

    The weight, height, construction materials and battery technology are the areas of difference between the YikeBike models. The lower seat height model V is constructed of hydroformed aluminium and composite reinforced polymers, every bike includes the standard 2 wheel and additional 3 wheel configuration. The model C is our prestigious premium product, with the latest Lithium-Ion battery technology and high-tech Carbon-fiber construction materials on the wheel, frame and steering components. There are only a few model C’s available.


  • What are the performance figures ?

    The Yikebike will fully charge in 90 minutes and has a top speed of 14.3mph (23 kmh). The model V has a range of 8.7 miles (14km), and model C 12.4 miles (20 km). The additional regenerative braking system optimizes the battery performance.


  • Do I need a helmet ?

    Your personal safety is our highest concern, and while your local regulations may not require you to wear a helmet we do recommend you do so. YikeBike has provided you with anti-skid braking and permanent lighting for additional safety.


  • Can I lock my YikeBike ?

    Our lightweight construction and rapid folding means that you can eliminate the risk of theft by taking the YikeBike wherever you go.


  • Why 3 wheels ?

    The 3 wheel assembly has been specifically designed and is only available for the model V. The lower height seat and 3 wheels makes it easy for a first-time rider to get going. This configuration comes standard with every model V and is not compatible with any other version of the YikeBike.


  • Changing from 3 to 2 wheels ?

    The model V can be changed from the compact folding 2 wheel standard bike to the 3 wheel option using the simple instructions and tools that are included with your YikeBike. Changing the entire rear leg will only take you a few minutes. The YikeBike recommended maximum weight limit remains at 220lbs/100kg for both the 2 and 3 wheel versions.


  • YikeBike safety features ?

    Every time you turn on the YikeBike the front, side and rear lights are permanently powered on. The lighting incorporates flashing turn signals, and when combined with the anti-skid braking the YikeBike offers you a smooth and safe ride.


  • What colors can I get ?

    The model V is available in gold, silver and charcoal. The model C is available in the same gold, silver, charcoal but has an additional matte clear finish to accentuate the carbon fiber materials. You will select your YikeBike colors at the end of the campaign.

story:
Who are we?

We are a team of young Romanian volunteers, of various professions (students, architects, software engineers, historians, lawyers, truck drivers, etc.), backed by local authorities and British railway enthusiasts. We are gathering since 2008 in our spare time to work and have fun on our railway.


Our main objective is to preserve and gradually restore the 73km long narrow gauge railway which linked Sibiu (European Capital of Culture in 2007) to the town of Agnita in Transylvania, Romania. The railway was built between 1895 and 1910, abandoned in 2001 by the state railway company and has since fallen prey to nature and thefts. Our endeavour requires maintenance works such as track clearance of trees and shrubs, replacing worn sleepers, maintenance of bridges, maintenance and restoration of railway buildings, spraying herbicide, restoration of rolling stock and dealing with locals.

So far we succeeded to restore several railway buildings, clear the tracks and replace missing parts, build a carriage shed and restore the body of a passenger carriage. We also organized the railway’s centenary celebrations in 2010 by organizing a steam weekend and since then we are offering tourist rides with our self-made cyclo and moto-draisines.

Apart from working, we also know how to have fun. We go on trips (railway related of course), we share knowledge with volunteers of foreign railway organizations, we’re putting together photo exhibitions, raise signatures for our cause, organize contests amongst children and have even staged a flash mob. All in order to improve ourselves and raise the profile of our project.

What we plan to do?

In the weekend of 26-27 September 2015 we plan to celebrate the Days of Mocănița (nickname given to narrow gauge railways and trains in Romania) by running a steam train on 7km of track between the stations of Cornățel and Hosman.


Although we are already running our draisines on this section of track, in order to sustain the weight of a real train it needs quite a bit of work – several hundred worn sleepers to be replaced, missing bolts and plates to be put back, two metal bridges need attention, a level crossing needs rebuilding and ballast needs to be added to the trackbed. Renting and transporting a steam locomotive, building unloading ramps and organizing the event are additional costs to the above. The railway is listed as a historical monument and the works mentioned will contribute to its restoration.

The Impact

The event is to be first in a series which will take place annually and will bring an immediate benefit to the local communities and increase involvement of authorities. On the long term, it will contribute to the restoration of our railway and help the development of tourism along the Hârtibaciu valley. The works done during this project will allow the event to be repeated over the following years while enabling the volunteers to focus on other tasks, such as restoring rolling stock and extending the length of usable track.

You can check the progress of the project on our Facebook page (in Romanian): https://www.facebook.com/AsociatiaPrieteniiMocanitei, on Twitter (in English): twitter.com/mocanitaru or on our website: sibiuagnitarailway.com

How will the funds be used?

All funds raised during this campaign will be directed towards acquiring new sleepers, track fittings, ballast, hiring a contractor to rebuild the level crossing, renting and transporting the steam locomotive and organizing the event.

Thank you for your help and looking forward to seeing you in Transylvania!

this campaign will be directed towards acquiring new sleepers, track
fittings, ballast, hiring a contractor to rebuild the level
crossing, renting and transporting the steam locomotive and organizing the event.Thank you for your help
and looking forward to seeing you in Transylvania!

story:
SITGO -The World's Best Folding Electric Bike, specially designed for you, environmentally friendly, cool, compact, safe and unique: The world's first electric Bike can be charged with car cigarette lighter.

It has cool appearance, simple, lightweight and easy to store with 3 simple folding steps,it's the best partner when you traveling around.You can store it under your desk, take it on the subway or bus, put it in the trunk of your car or pack it in a suitcase —Sitgo is so compact it can fit almost anywhere.

Sitgo not just an ordinary electric bike, it has USB charging port, which can be used to charge your cell phone, MP3 and other digital equipment at anytime, anywhere, it also has a 360-degree rotating cell phone holder, you can riding while listen to the music or check on your navigation, with an unique 12V cigarette lighter charging function, it will keep your SITGO never run out of power, it’s your best travel companion.




Adhered the sporty design of awesome streamlines from German designer RICHARD SAPPER, referring to dynamics and science of riding wind resistance, the design of SITGO is fit for proportion of human height perfectly, with less effort and energy efficient, assembling the bike is also undergoing a rigorous testing and riding experience.

The next generation electric folding bike is here

Electric Folding bikes haven't fundamentally changed in over 10 years. They have normal wheels and less than ideal geometry. They ride poorly, are heavy and awkward to use, but worst of all, they don't actually fold that small.

We set out to change all of that

Two years ago we started working on a vision of the perfect electric folding bike — a bike that is lightweight, durable, rides and feels like a regular bike, is safe and easy to use and folds incredibly small.Now Sitgo takes a radical departure from conventional bike design. It is unlike any other electric bicycle in the world.

Use latest Japanese super mute brushless motor technology and energy-efficient power lithium battery, motor and battery, just like a car engine. Material selection directly affects the usage life and effectiveness, SITGO adhere to the quality-first principles and concepts, only make best electric bike, employed the feature of lightweight motor, low power consumption, super mute, and high-power, and the battery has the characteristics of environmentally safety, super power, and long life.

Korean unique design of 360degree rotary phone holder, 53mm-80mm retractable, suitable for most cell phones, so can listen to music, check on your navigation while you riding, make your trip fun.

Two Taiwan produced high brightness and wide range of high-energy, long life LED focusing lens lights are used as headlights and aluminum push ruby LED taillights (three lighting modes) as your travel escort at night.

We will give out an newly developed car charger to each INDIEGOGO BACKER, Let your SITGO never out of power, and keep you away from the power outlet trouble.

SITGO parameters:  

Battery: 36V 8.8AH power lithium battery  

Motor: 180W/250W brushless hub motor  

Speed: 0-25KM/H

Suitable Height: 155-195cm  

Age: not less than 16 years old  

Range: 35km  

Tire size: front wheel 18 inches, rear wheel 8 inches  

Handle features: LED battery indicator, horn, headlight control, speed control, power switch  

Pedals: Folding aluminum skid pedals  

Headlight: Dual5W lens focusing bright LED lights  

Taillight: Aluminum push ruby LED taillights (three lighting modes)  

USB charging port: 5V, 2A USB charging port  

Material: ABS, aerospace aluminum, high-strength steel, stainless steel  

Cushion: comfortable high elastic cushion  

Climbing angle: less than 15 degrees  

Brake system: Power-off brakes + V break hub  

Maximum load: 120KG  

Charging time: 4-5 hours  

Charger: 110-220V Household Charger + 12V car cigarette lighter charger  

Battery Life: 3-5Years(Not Less 1000 Cycles)

Unfold Size:102CM(height)x98CM(Length)x80CM(Seat Height)

Folding Size: 75CM(height)x64CM(width)x24CM(Thickness)  

Neight Weight: 17-18KG

Development process: 

SITGO have gone through 2 years of development with hundreds of drawing modification, and no less than five generations of prototypes before we were satisfied in offering you this product. We broke through the manufacturing process to create these beautiful electric folding bicycles. We partnered with German designer and Hongkong craftsman of 10 years experience in order to find the most suitable materials to complete a stylish, high quality e-bike.

SITGO TECHNOLOGY CO., Ltd. integrated research and development, production, sales and service in one; it’s an operator for intelligent short-haul travel equipment. The company was founded in 2014 and located in Hong Kong.

Our mission is to use artisan spirit of perfectionism, creating intelligent short-haul travel equipment with first-class user experience, to improve the quality of life. Nowadays, we travelling on a narrow street surrounded by tons of cars, while promoting environmental protection, to make travelling more compact, easier to carry around, energy saving and environmental protection is our goal.

Our motto is “Travelling as your heart goes”; this is also the commitment that we offered to our users from our product and design. In the industry that lack of innovation and capability for travel equipment, our team is particularly specializes in innovative design of appearance and streamline structure improvements. A solid professional knowledge base + excellent innovation capability = SITGO.


SITGO STORY:  

We are a small team with a big dream. Sitgo Team provide and keep design high quality and elegant electric bikes. We are going to production Five or more fantastic products in the next 3 years,we'll need your help to make all these come true.  

Already over 12,000 followers on board, keep asking us about whether they can get the Sitgo overseas. Even lots of celebrities are a fan of Sitgo! We want to introduce Sitgo to all of you lovely bikers through INDIEGOGO.With the support of our beloved backers, we wish to provide people across the world with the world's most elegant, stylish electric folding bike!

Lastly, we would like to thank you for taking the time to view the Sitgo. We hope that you will back and share this project!

160USD= Thipping to Australia, Canada,Asia Countries, EU Countries, NZ and USA. Shipping Cost is: $160USD for each SITGO.Please add shipping cost to Your Perks.

260USD= The countries outside Australia, Canada,Asia Countries, EU Countries, NZ and USA,the Shipping Cost is:$260USD for each SITGO.Please add shipping cost to Your Perks.

How to add Shipping cost to your perk:

First,Click the perk which you choose:

Second:Click "Custom",Then write the correct shipping cost(160USD or 260USD) or update cost(30USD for update quickly home charge) of your perk.

Please note additional duties/taxes maybe apply depending on your destination country.

The SITGO doesn’t fit into the traditional e-bicycle category because you cannot pedal it. It’s more of an electric transport vehicle or electric scooter akin to a Segway, only more bicycle-shaped.

For US,Canada,the US State laws vary. Some state laws approve the use of electric scooters in bike lanes of general road traffic and some do not. To the best of our knowledge  e-scooters are street legal in California, Connecticut, Kentucky, Missouri, Nevada, Texas, Virginia and Washington, with many other states expected to follow suit. 

For EU Countries,SITGO Will Apply and Get CE(Conformite Europeenne) Certificate Before Delivery,With this certificate,SITGO street legal Free in most EU countries.

All countries have their own rules on light electric vehicles or electric scooter so it’s best to consult with your local transportation authority.

Is it legal to ride SITGO? Please See Our Street Legal Explain Above FAQ.

What is the range? This depends on many factors such as riding style. rider weight, terrain and conditions. As a general guide our 8.8A model is capable of a range of 35km. 
Does SITGO come with a warranty? We are offering a one (1) year warranty on electric parts(Motor,Battery,Handle,Light and Etc) for "non normal wear". This means any defective parts we will replace within the 1st year. Except electric parts,SITGO other parts(wheel,tyre,seat,absorber and etc) you can easy find them in local bikeshop or hardware market.
Can it go uphill? For sure! Because of the power that SITGO has it can go up a 15 degree incline which should be adequate for most roads. 
What is the load capacity? Maximum recommended load capacity is 120kg.
Can I buy from any dealers? We do not have any dealers at present though we are looking to take on local dealers as soon as we can. If you are a dealership that would like to stock our products we would love to hear from you.
Can I change the battery myself? Yes, it is a not difficult process of unscrewing the side ABS plate on the front wheel and unplugging. We will provide instructions on how to do this with your SITGO by video later. 
How can you keep the price of SITGO so low? SITGO Design and manufacture by ourself own factory,we have more than 10years in electric bike and electric scooter production and experience.And SITGO future MSRP(retail) price will be:1099USD+Shipping.Now we want thank you for your Support and promotion our SITGO on Indiegogo,You can get 50%more discount for super early bird price(469USD+Shipping Only 30pcs limited).
Do you sell spare parts? Yes, We plan on offering replacement parts through a network of local dealers as well as offering direct sales from ourselves. 
What is the minimum and maximum rider height? There are no absolute minimums or maximums, the handlebars can be adjust by different height from 155m to 195cm.
Is SITGO fully assembled when delivered? Absolutely. Simply unpack and it's ready to go. When your SITGO arrives the battery will be about 50% charged.
Is SITGO waterproof? The SITGO is water proof though not to be submerged under water. With that being said, we do recommend to avoid riding in the rain for safety reasons. Always wipe out water afterwards and keep it dry to preserve the scooters life. 
If the battery runs out How i can do? On Sitgo handle bar,there's battery indication.You can know the left electricity always.Even the battery runs out,you still can easy push SITGO.and one full charge of SITGO can ride 35km,it's enough for daily use.
Can I use the battery charger in my country, what is the voltage? Yes! Our chargers work with voltages from 100V to 240V. 

Our passionate team are prepared to go all out to make SITGO.The SITGO prototypes have already been tried and tested. We've made the final refinements and are ready to go into production as soon as we reach our goal.

Our team are experienced in industrial design, working with manufacturers to get it right and delivering great product all over the world.

We promise our backers that we will do everything possible to deliver on spec and on time. We will always keep you in the know with progress updates and never leave you hanging.Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

Please note additional duties/taxes may apply depending on your destination country.
