story:
After Years of Fine Tuning and Development. Your Wait is Over.

Ever since the launch of Stark Drive and for those that went on to read our Master Plan, our launch of Stark Drive Torque has been on their minds and our inbox.  After many prototypes, hard work, and unrelenting dedication from our team we are officially ready to launch the NEXT GENERATION of Stark Drive with the most powerful motors and longest range to date.  It's our pleasure to bring this to all of you and get performance never seen at this level of affordability.

 

Meet the Founder of Stark Drive

 

Oscar Stark

Currently living in Stockholm, Sweden, Oscar created Stark Drive in 2016 out of his own frustrations in getting an affordable electric bike in the capital of Scandinavia.  In a goal of democratizing, affordable electric transport his team set out to create an ultra affordable e-bike that was portable to fit in tight spaces.  Our primary goal was getting these bikes to a price-point that competed with even non electric bikes.  Even with all the trials we faced during our initial campaign, we persevered and shipped thousands of bikes worldwide.  Then we went on to introduce the first mass produced electric bike you could take with you on a plane for even less than the cost of Stark Drive.  Oscar is relentless in his tenatious drive to innovate and bring the latest electric bike advancements to everyone at a price they can afford.  

 

This time we are bringing you two bikes

Stark Drive Torque: catered for any regions that have restrictions on the maximum watts that your electric bike may be restricted to at 250W

AND

Stark Drive Torque Max: a fat tire version which is meant to go full-on with the maximum amount of power legally allowed in regions such as the USA at 750W*.  (*upgradable to 1000w).

Either way, Stark Drive Torque is much more than an upgrade to the original Stark Drive it's a paradigm shift away from the delightfully antiquated and ubiquitous hub motor driven electric bikes to the future standard torque based mid motor drives which are more efficient, provide more torque, and are more responsive than any hub motor based electric bikes.  

Let us Introduce: STARK DRIVE TORQUE.

 

And of course: STARK DRIVE TORQUE MAX

 

Stark Drive Torque will be available in our standard Matte Black and Matte White while Stark Drive Torque Max will be available in Matte Black, Matte White and Neon Orange.

Stark Drive Torque has been designed completely from the ground up including the frame as no such frame existed that could accommodate our specially selected BAFANG mid motor drives used on Stark Drive Torque.  While many companies take existing open mould frames and simply customize the components on the bike, as we have in our first campaign, we knew that we had to think outside the box in order to get Mid-Motor based Torque Drive technology on the streets.

Which Stark Drive Torque is RIGHT for you?

No matter what you're looking for, there is a perfect Stark Drive Torque For you!

What about Dimensions?

STARK DRIVE TORQUE

 

STARK DRIVE TORQUE MAX

Our entirely new Stark Drive Torque has a much more powerful motor with up to 750W of power.  We have also upgraded the power system with up to a 48V Battery that has also been redesigned from the ground up to include a high power 10W USB output allowing you to take the battery with you and use it as a power station wherever your rides may take you.  Even our base model Stark Drive Torque includes a motor that outputs 80Nm of torque which is comparable to 750W Hub motors and totally legal in the EU and Australia.  Torque Max includes the Bafang Ultra Max motor at up to 1000W outputting a jaw-dropping 160Nm of torque.  

We've have included the best Shimano 8-speed gearing with easy to use 'rapidfire' shifters.  We are also using the latest

computer displays available from our Supplier Bafang with backlighting standard.  There is also the option to upgrade Stark Drive Torque to a new SMART backlit FULL COLOR LCD display.  for only $99 USD (199 USD Value).  Light sensing technology to automatically turn your front and rear lights on based on the lighting conditions is standard across the board.

 

All Stark Drive units always include the most state of the art metal foldable pedals to help Stark Drive Torque Fit in the tightest of spaces.

Due to the sheer power of Stark Drive Torque, we have upgraded the brakes across the lineup to provide you with more stopping power at the drop of a dime.  

We also decided that the only way that we could ensure complete customizability for your ride, we needed to forgo spring based suspension for the state of the art Air Suspension technology with 9 levels of suspension at the turn of a lever as well as the ability to adjust the amount of air in the suspension providing you an unlimited number of suspension options.

In term of Securing Stark Drive Torque, we decided that the best way to go was Fingerprint Recognition Technology letting you unlock Stark Drives power system with your finger and the ability to register hundreds of fingerprints so that you can share Stark Drive Torque with the family and your lucky friends.  Stark Drive Torque will also have the option to forgo a fingerprint and instead use NFC to unlock.  

Stark Drive Torque will also include wireless charging so you don't have to worry about carrying around and managing any USB cables to keep your Qi enabled mobile phone topped up no matter how long your ride.

Stark Drive Torque is exclusively using Bafang as our motor supplier with two motors of choice being the M400 and M620

M400

M620

 

 

Computer display

  • Easy-to-read display with backlit LCD
  • 6 speeds from 0 (no assist) to 5 (full assist)
  • On-the-go power-assist level adjustment
  • Displays all data needed incl. speed, distance, battery life
  • Ambient Light Sensor for automatic front and rear lights
  • Water-and dust-proof  
  • Built-in USB charger


SMART color display - upgrade option on Torque  

  • Full color LCD display for easier viewing
  • Monitored battery usage shown in %
  • Includes all functions of the original display
  • Access to advanced settings
  • Upgrade is 99 USD extra (199 USD value)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Ultra Wide and Comfortable Control Center

  • Comfort Grips 
  • rapidfire shifters
  • wide handlebars for added comfort and space
  • add features such as bell or phone holder with space to spare
  • center placed computer for easy viewing

 

 

 

 

Ultimate Traction, Grippy Fat Tires

  • Standard with Stark Drive Torque Max
  • 4.0'' (10 cm) Fat Tires with 26'' Wheels 
  • Wide Rims 
  • Specialized for Off Road and the Beach
  • Puncture Protection for better safety

Smooth and Comfortable Standard Tires

  • Standard with Stark Drive Torque
  • 1.95'' (5cm) tires with 26'' Wheels
  • Smooth, quiet and comfortable 
  • perfect for the city
  • heavy duty vulcanized rubber
     

 

Composite Aluminium 1-click Folding Pedals

  • latest style of pedals
  • durable and weather tested
  • foldable to save space when transporting
  • ensures complete power transfer when pedaling

 

 

 

Front Air Suspension

  • 9 Level Suspension adjustment toggle
  • Addition or removal of internal air volume 
  • Lighter than spring suspension and more adjustable
  • Configure your perfect ride based on load

 

 

The Best RapidFire Shifters

  • easily accessible 
  • rapidfire shifters
  • 8-speed SHIMANO gears and derailleur
  • perfectly configured for all terrain types

 

 

 

Premium Unparallelled Security (Fingerprint, NFC, Key)

  • 2 factor security option with either Fingerprint or NFC and key
  • Fingerprint reader can store hundreds of fingerprints
  • NFC to unlock the bike
  • share the bike with your family and friends
  • weatherproof premium security options not available on other bikes in this price class.

 

 

 

 

 

Premium Disc Brakes

  • High Friction Wide Pad Disc Brakes
  • More than 2x the stopping power of our first generation
  • low effort braking with the touch of a finger
  • easily replaceable standard brake pads  

 

 

 

Powerful Redesigned Battery Pack

  • rebuilt from the ground up with the latest technology
  • state-of-the-art powerful 36V/48V lithium Ion cells 
  • up to 18ah of capacity at 48V and 22ah of capacity at 36V
  • 36V 9Ah (324Wh) pack provides assist up to 50km or 35 miles
  • 48V 18ah (864Wh) pack provides assist up to 125km or 78 miles per charge
  • high power USB output built into the pack at 10W
  • Protective fuse included in every pack
  • convenient removal handle
  • removable: charge both inside or outside the bike
  • key locking system for extra security that disables the battery
  • protective undervoltage security system built in
  • functions with NFC or Fingerprint reader to enable/disable system power

 

 

100% Custom Built Frame Design

  • Two completely unique frames with extruded Stark Logo
  • Fat Tire and Thin Tire Frames
  • Forged out of 6061 aluminium alloy
  • approximately 3kg (6lbs) for thin tire and 4kg (8.8 lbs) for fat tire
  • Designed to hide all electrical components internally
  • hidden fingerprint reader access point
  • 100% weather-proof
  • Only folding Mid-Motor frame compatible with our chosen Bafang engines
  • WTO and EUIPO Protected design

 

 

Plug and Play Wiring System w/ Computer Link

  • New to Stark Drive Torque, Color Coded connections
  • Waterproof design making upgrades easy
  • Ability to connect to your desktop computer through USB and fine tune the firmware on your motor

 

 

 

Stark Drive Torque Accessories

These unique accessories add features to your bike that are not included by default.  If you order more than one bike, be sure to add each feature for each bike you would like upgraded. To add these to your bike click on the photos below and it will take you to the checkout page.

    

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

FOUNDERS EDITION 

The Founders Edition, designs only available on Indiegogo through our campaign, These two Limited Edition color options for Stark Drive Torque including Rustic Woodland and  Urban Marine which use an entirely new process to coat the frame with hydrographics. 

 

 

Folding For Transport.  Small Size, Huge Benefits

STARK DRIVE TORQUE

 

 

STARK DRIVE TORQUE MAX

 

Just like every bike in our lineup, we have designed Stark Drive Torque to easily fold to reduce its volume and allow it on any public transport with 1 easy step.  Stark Drive Torque fits easily in your trunk, frunk, hatch or RV.  

A rocky start has given us the tools to Succeed.

With the help of all of our backers for Stark Drive and Stark Drive Mini, we have continued to persevere in spite of significant challenges to deliver thousands of bikes worldwide.  We continue to innovate and work to bring you the latest innovations that the electric bike world has to offer.  For example Stark Drive Mini was the first mass produced electric bike you could legally bring with you anywhere, even on a plane.  Stark Drive will continue their tenacious drive to innovate with some exciting models in the pipeline that even include full carbon fiber frames.

Our motivation has never been profits, as can be seen with our unbelievable pricing, but rather to act as an enabler to allow anyone interested in getting an electric bike the opportunity to afford one. With pricing that competes with even non electric bikes, we continue to improve the quality of our products while contradictorily lowering the cost barrier to entry for electric bikes. 

We have made logistics improvements across the board

In our original campaign, circumstances beyond our knowledge resulted in the first deliveries happening 6 months from the end of our campaign even though we had planned for delivery no more than 2 months from the end date.  When we discovered there were problems, we immediately worked non stop until we solved them and our deliveries have been improving with each subsequent batch as well as our relationship with our factory.  We have fixed every level of production and our timeline is 100% accurate this time around.  

We don't use any computer generated imagery or videos, everything you see is actual functional prototype units.  Everything is ready to go, all we need is your help to get our contractual minimum order quantities so that we can deliver Stark Drive Torque worldwide.

 

Stark Drive Torque Prototype Reviewed

Stark Drive Torque

Stark Drive Torque Max

With more reviews to come.

 

Get Stark Drive Torque at less than half MSRP!

Only during our campaign can you get Stark Drive Torque at significant savings.  Prices will go up once we launch onto the retail scene, and even our retail pricing is competitive with similarly classed bikes with the features we include on Stark Drive Torque.  

Let's work together and Bring Stark Drive Torque to life.

Thank you to all our previous customers who believed in us through our original campaign and those who supported us for our launch of Stark Drive Mini.  Words cannot express our gratitude in helping us to bring electric bikes to the masses.  

Stark Drive Torque is Registered with WIPO and the European Intellectual Property Office.

 

Any questions? 

Contact us at hello@starkdrive.bike or even through our online chat which works 24/7, leave your email address if we are not immediately available.  You can even call our toll free number in North America at 1-888-HI-STARK

 

Want to Test Drive Torque?

You are welcome to book a time to test Drive Stark Drive Torque at our Showroom in Stockholm, Sweden.  Send a message to hello@starkdrive.com and we would be happy to give you a chance to try the most affordable torque based electric bike in the world.

such as the USA at 750W*.  (*upgradable to 1000w).Either way, Stark Drive Torque is much more than an upgrade to the original Stark Drive it's a paradigm shift away from the delightfully antiquated and ubiquitous hub motor driven electric bikes to the future standard torque based mid motor drives which are more efficient, provide more torque, and are more responsive than any hub motor based electric bikes.  Let us Introduce: STARK DRIVE TORQUE. And of course: STARK DRIVE TORQUE MAX Stark Drive Torque will be available in our standard Matte Black and Matte White while Stark Drive Torque Max will be available in Matte Black, Matte White and Neon Orange.Stark Drive Torque has been designed completely from the ground up including the frame as no such frame existed that could accommodate our specially selected BAFANG mid motor drives used on Stark Drive Torque.  While many companies take existing open mould frames and simply customize the components on the bike, as we have in our first campaign, we knew that we had to think outside the box in order to get Mid-Motor based Torque Drive technology on the streets.Which Stark Drive Torque is RIGHT for you?No matter what you're looking for, there is a perfect Stark Drive Torque For you!What about Dimensions?STARK DRIVE TORQUE STARK DRIVE TORQUE MAXOur entirely new Stark Drive Torque has a much more powerful motor with up to 750W of power.  We have also upgraded the power system with up to a 48V Battery that has also been redesigned from the ground up to include a high power 10W USB output allowing you to take the battery with you and use it as a power station wherever your rides may take you.  Even our base model Stark Drive Torque includes a motor that outputs 80Nm of torque which is comparable to 750W Hub motors and totally legal in the EU and Australia.  Torque Max includes the Bafang Ultra Max motor at up to 1000W outputting a jaw-dropping 160Nm of torque.  We've have included the best Shimano 8-speed gearing with easy to use 'rapidfire' shifters.  We are also using the latestcomputer displays available from our Supplier Bafang with backlighting standard.  There is also the option to upgrade Stark Drive Torque to a new SMART backlit FULL COLOR LCD display.  for only $99 USD (199 USD Value).  Light sensing technology to automatically turn your front and rear lights on based on the lighting conditions is standard across the board. All Stark Drive units always include the most state of the art metal foldable pedals to help Stark Drive Torque Fit in the tightest of spaces.Due to the sheer power of Stark Drive Torque, we have upgraded the brakes across the lineup to provide you with more stopping power at the drop of a dime.  We also decided that the only way that we could ensure complete customizability for your ride, we needed to forgo spring based suspension for the state of the art Air Suspension technology with 9 levels of suspension at the turn of a lever as well as the ability to adjust the amount of air in the suspension providing you an unlimited number of suspension options.In term of Securing Stark Drive Torque, we decided that the best way to go was Fingerprint Recognition Technology letting you unlock Stark Drives power system with your finger and the ability to register hundreds of fingerprints so that you can share Stark Drive Torque with the family and your lucky friends.  Stark Drive Torque will also have the option to forgo a fingerprint and instead use NFC to unlock.  Stark Drive Torque will also include wireless charging so you don't have to worry about carrying around and managing any USB cables to keep your Qi enabled mobile phone topped up no matter how long your ride.Stark Drive Torque is exclusively using Bafang as our motor supplier with two motors of choice being the M400 and M620M400M620

   Stark Drive Torque AccessoriesThese unique accessories add features to your bike that are not included by default.  If you order more than one bike, be sure to add each feature for each bike you would like upgraded. To add these to your bike click on the photos below and it will take you to the checkout page.           FOUNDERS EDITION The Founders Edition, designs only available on Indiegogo through our campaign, These two Limited Edition color options for Stark Drive Torque including Rustic Woodland and  Urban Marine which use an entirely new process to coat the frame with hydrographics.   Folding For Transport.  Small Size, Huge BenefitsSTARK DRIVE TORQUE   STARK DRIVE TORQUE MAX  Just like every bike in our lineup, we have designed Stark Drive Torque to easily fold to reduce its volume and allow it on any public transport with 1 easy step.  Stark Drive Torque fits easily in your trunk, frunk, hatch or RV.  A rocky start has given us the tools to Succeed.With the help of all of our backers for Stark Drive and Stark Drive Mini, we have continued to persevere in spite of significant challenges to deliver thousands of bikes worldwide.  We continue to innovate and work to bring you the latest innovations that the electric bike world has to offer.  For example Stark Drive Mini was the first mass produced electric bike you could legally bring with you anywhere, even on a plane.  Stark Drive will continue their tenacious drive to innovate with some exciting models in the pipeline that even include full carbon fiber frames.Our motivation has never been profits, as can be seen with our unbelievable pricing, but rather to act as an enabler to allow anyone interested in getting an electric bike the opportunity to afford one. With pricing that competes with even non electric bikes, we continue to improve the quality of our products while contradictorily lowering the cost barrier to entry for electric bikes. We have made logistics improvements across the boardIn our original campaign, circumstances beyond our knowledge resulted in the first deliveries happening 6 months from the end of our campaign even though we had planned for delivery no more than 2 months from the end date.  When we discovered there were problems, we immediately worked non stop until we solved them and our deliveries have been improving with each subsequent batch as well as our relationship with our factory.  We have fixed every level of production and our timeline is 100% accurate this time around.  We don't use any computer generated imagery or videos, everything you see is actual functional prototype units.  Everything is ready to go, all we need is your help to get our contractual minimum order quantities so that we can deliver Stark Drive Torque worldwide. Stark Drive Torque Prototype ReviewedStark Drive TorqueStark Drive Torque MaxWith more reviews to come. Get Stark Drive Torque at less than half MSRP!Only during our campaign can you get Stark Drive Torque at significant savings.  Prices will go up once we launch onto the retail scene, and even our retail pricing is competitive with similarly classed bikes with the features we include on Stark Drive Torque.  Let's work together and Bring Stark Drive Torque to life.Thank you to all our previous customers who believed in us through our original campaign and those who supported us for our launch of Stark Drive Mini.  Words cannot express our gratitude in helping us to bring electric bikes to the masses.  Stark Drive Torque is Registered with WIPO and the European Intellectual Property Office. Any questions? Contact us at hello@starkdrive.bike or even through our online chat which works 24/7, leave your email address if we are not immediately available.  You can even call our toll free number in North America at 1-888-HI-STARK Want to Test Drive Torque?You are welcome to book a time to test Drive Stark Drive Torque at our Showroom in Stockholm, Sweden.  Send a message to hello@starkdrive.com and we would be happy to give you a chance to try the most affordable torque based electric bike in the world.

story:
Over 80% of Americans will suffer from lower back pain in their lifetime. 

In 2016, researchers in Italy discovered that more than 60 percent of students had backpack-related pain. 

We created a bag to solve this problem.

  

 

Bagabon® wraps around the waist and doesn't load the spine thus relieving you from back and shoulder pain.

 

Features

Bagabon® can be worn in 5 ways!

This bag fits everything you need for the day, including up to 15-inch laptops!

 

 

The bag has a water-resistant fabric. Furthermore, it is internally coated by PU to ensure your belongings will remain nice and dry.

 

Here are a few of the many features we offer.

 and some more! 

 

 

 

We're Social!
